items.sourceText: Violent demonstrations against Spanish rule erupted in Ifni on 10 April 1957, followed by civil strife and widespread killings of those loyal to Spain. In response, Spanish dictator Francisco Franco dispatched two battalions of the Spanish Legion, Spain's elite fighting force, to El Aaiún in Saguia el-Hamra in June.

targets.targetText: Zanga-zangar adawa da mulkin Spain ta ɓarke a Ifni a ranar 10 ga watan Afrilun 1957, sannan tashe-tashen hankula da kashe-kashe da dama na masu biyayya ga Spain. Dangane da martani, 'yan mulkin kama karya na Spain Francisco Franco ya aike da bataliya biyu na Legion Spaniya , ƙwararrun sojojin Spain, zuwa El Aaiún a Saguia el-Hamra a watan Yuni.

Zanga-zangar adawa da mulkin Spain ta barke a Ifni a ranar 10 ga Afrilun 1957, sannan tashe-tashen hankula da kashe-kashe da dama na masu biyayya ga Spain. Dangane da martani, dan mulkin kama karya na Spain Francisco Franco ya aike da bataliya biyu na Legion Mutanen Espanya, ƙwararrun sojojin Spain, zuwa El Aaiún a Saguia el-Hamra a watan Yuni.

items.sourceText: Kenyatta's successor, Daniel arap Moi, appointed Odinga as chairman of the Cotton Lint and Seed Marketing Board. He did not last long in the post, presumably due to past grudges he was still outspoken against Kenyatta's policies. Odinga accused Jomo as a land grabber and that was why they had differed. Odinga attempted to register a political party in 1982, but The Constitution of Kenya (Amendment) Act, 1982 (which made Kenya a de jure single-party state), foiled his plans.

targets.targetText: Magajin Kenyatta, Daniel arap Moi, ya naɗa Odinga a matsayin shugaban hukumar sayar da auduga da iri. Bai daɗe ba a wannan muƙami, mai yiwuwa saboda ɓacin ran da ya nuna har yanzu yana nuna adawa da manufofin Kenyatta. Odinga ya zargi Jomo a matsayin ɗan kwacen fili, shi ya sa suka banbanta. Odinga ya yi yunkurin yin rajistar jam’iyyar siyasa a shekarar 1982, amma Dokar Tsarin Mulki ta Kenya, 1982 (wanda ta sanya Kenya ta zama ƙasa mai jam’iyya ɗaya), ta dakile shirinsa.

Magajin Kenyatta, Daniel arap Moi, ya nada Odinga a matsayin shugaban hukumar sayar da auduga da iri. Bai dade ba a wannan mukami, mai yiwuwa saboda bacin ran da ya nuna har yanzu yana nuna adawa da manufofin Kenyatta. Odinga ya zargi Jomo a matsayin dan kwacen fili, shi ya sa suka banbanta. Odinga ya yi yunkurin yin rajistar jam’iyyar siyasa a shekarar 1982, amma Dokar Tsarin Mulki ta Kenya, 1982 (wanda ta sanya Kenya ta zama kasa mai jam’iyya daya), ta dakile shirinsa.

items.sourceText: Following his father's death, Nabame spent a year or two hiding among the Arewa, who protected him from Sokoto. Eventually, he decided to surrender to Gwandu. After some deliberation, it was agreed to spare his life, and he was exiled to Sokoto in 1831.[1][2] Nabame was said to be about 12 years old at the time of his exile.[4]

targets.targetText: Bayan rasuwar mahaifinsa, Nabame ya shafe shekara daya zuwa biyu yana buya a cikin Arewa, wadanda suka kare shi daga Sakkwato. Daga karshe dai ya yanke shawarar mika wuya ga Gwandu. Bayan an yi shawara aka amince da a bar rayuwarsa, aka yi hijira zuwa Sakkwato a shekara ta 1831. [1] [2] An ce Nabame yana da kimanin shekara 12 a lokacin da yake gudun hijira. [3]

Bayan rasuwar mahaifinsa, Nabame ya shafe shekara ɗaya zuwa biyu yana ɓuya a cikin Arewa, waɗanda suka ƙare shi daga Sakkwato. Daga ƙarshe dai ya yanke shawarar miƙa wuya ga Gwandu. Bayan an yi shawara aka amince da a bar rayuwarsa, aka yi hijira zuwa Sakkwato a shekara ta 1831. [1] [2] An ce Nabame yana da kimanin shekara 12 a lokacin da yake gudun hijira. [3]

items.sourceText: Kansasa was the first Zambian High Commissioner to Kenya.[1] She was in that post in 1991, when UNIP was ousted from power. She was recalled six months later, and retired from active politics.[2]

targets.targetText: Kansasa ita ce Babban Kwamishinan Zambiya na farko a Kenya . [1] Ta kasance a wannan mukami a shekarar 1991, lokacin da aka hambarar da UNIP daga mulki. An tuno da ita bayan wata shida, kuma ta yi ritaya daga siyasa. [2]

Kansasa ita ce Babbar Kwamishiniya a Zambiya na farko a Kenya. [1] Ta kasance a wannan muƙami a shekarar 1991, lokacin da aka hambarar da UNIP daga mulki. An tuno da ita bayan wata shida, kuma ta yi ritaya daga siyasa. [2]

targets.targetText: Taswirar Cibiyar Bayar da Amsar Gaggawa (ERCC) tana nuna yawan ruwan sama tsakanin 27 ga Mayu da 5 ga Yuni a 6.00 UTC da wuraren da ambaliyar ruwa ta mamaye.
Taswirar Cibiyar ƙai ɗaukin Gaggawa (ERCC) tana nuna yawan ruwan sama tsakanin 27 ga Mayu da 5 ga Yuni a 6.00 UTC da wuraren da ambaliyar ruwa ta mamaye.

items.sourceText: The federal constituency was created in the 1974 redistribution and is mandated to return a single member to the Dewan Rakyat under the first past the post voting system.

targets.targetText: An ƙirƙiri mazabar tarayya a cikin 1974 sake rarrabawa kuma an ba da izinin mayar da mamba guda ɗaya zuwa Dewan Rakyat a ƙarƙashin tsarin farko da ya wuce.
An kirkiro mazabar tarayya a cikin sake rarraba 1974 kuma an ba da umarnin dawo da memba ɗaya zuwa Dewan Rakyat a ƙarƙashin tsarin jefa kuri'a na farko.

items.sourceText: The affairs of the Town Union are presided over by the President-General, who oversees other Umuguma Town Union branch presidents, and is the custodian of the Town Union at home. The President-General is elected at a general assembly - the present elected President-General is Engineer Uzoma Kenneth Osuagwu (elected 2014).

targets.targetText: Shugaban-Janar ne ke jagorantar al'amuran Tarayyar Birnin, wanda ke kula da sauran shugabannin reshen Rundunar Jama'a, kuma shine mai kula da Tarayyar Garin a gida. Ana zaɓar Shugaban-Janar a babban taro - Shugaban-Jar da aka zaɓa a yanzu shine Injiniya Uzoma Kenneth Osuagwu (wanda aka zaɓa.

Shugaban-Janar ne ke jagorantar al'amuran Tarayyar Birnin, wanda ke kula da sauran shugabannin reshen Rundunar Jama'a, kuma shine mai kula da Tarayyar Garin a gida. Ana zabar Shugaban-Janar a babban taro - Shugaban-Jar da aka zaba a yanzu shine Injiniya Uzoma Kenneth Osuagwu (wanda aka zaba a shekarar 2014).

items.sourceText: Schoon filed a civil suit against Williamson, seeking damages for his son Fritz. However, the suit was suspended pending Williamson’s Amnesty hearing. Schoon testified at Williamson’s hearing and[9] is remembered for his strong stance against[10] amnesty for the killer. He favoured justice over the Truth and Reconciliation Commission’s call for forgiveness, reconciliation and an amnesty. Williamson was granted amnesty in June 2000, a year after Schoon’s death, a decision his son appealed.[11]

targets.targetText: Schoon ya shigar da kara a kan Williamson, yana neman diyya ga dansa Fritz. Sai dai kuma an dakatar da karar har sai an saurari karar da Williamson zai yi. Schoon ya ba da shaida a sauraron Williamson kuma ana tunawa da [1] saboda matsayarsa mai karfi a kan [2] afuwa ga wanda ya kashe. Ya fifita adalci fiye da kiraye-kirayen da hukumar gaskiya da sulhu ta yi na neman gafara, sulhu da yin afuwa. An yi wa Williamson afuwa a watan Yuni 2000, shekara guda bayan mutuwar Schoon, shawarar da dansa ya daukaka kara. [3]

Schoon ya shigar da ƙara a kan Williamson, yana neman diyya ga ɗansa Fritz. Sai dai kuma an dakatar da ƙarar har sai an saurari ƙarar da Williamson zai yi. Schoon ya ba da shaida a sauraron Williamson kuma ana tunawa da [1] saboda matsayarsa mai karfi a kan [2] afuwa ga wanda ya kashe. Ya fifita adalci fiye da kiraye-kirayen da hukumar gaskiya da sulhu ta yi na neman gafara, sulhu da yin afuwa. An yi wa Williamson afuwa a watan Yuni 2000, shekara guda bayan mutuwar Schoon, shawarar da ɗansa ya ɗaukaka kara. [3]

items.sourceText: Boal later said of Cabral, who was a significant African anti-colonial leader until his assassination in 1973, "Amílcar cared about the issue of gender. He said that women had to fight for their freedom. He chose women for all aspects of the struggle: education, health, information, logistics.[1]

targets.targetText: Daga baya Boal ya ce game da Cabral, wanda ya kasance babban jagoran adawa da mulkin mallaka na Afirka har zuwa lokacin da aka kashe shi a 1973, "Amílcar ya damu da batun jinsi. Ya ce dole ne mata su yi fafutuka don kwato musu 'yanci. Ya zavi mata a kowane fanni na gwagwarmaya: ilimi, lafiya, bayanai, dabaru. [1]

Daga baya Boal yia ce game da Cabral, wanda ya kasance babban jagoran adawa da mulkin mallaka na Afirka har zuwa lokacin da aka kashe shi a shekarar 1973, "Amílcar ta damu da batun jinsi. Ta ce dole ne mata su yi fafutuka don kwato musu 'yanci. Ta zaɓi mata a kowane fanni na gwagwarmaya: ilimi, lafiya, bayanai, dabaru. [1]

items.sourceText: He became even more well-known after it was learned that he held all those senior government positions and other posts when he was not a citizen of Tanganyika or Tanzania. He was born in Mzimba, Nyasaland which was renamed Malawi after independence, and moved to Tanganyika with his parents when he was a child. He grew up in Tanganyika and attended school in Tanganyika. He was also trained as a medical assistant at Tanganyika's national hospital in the nation's capital Dar es Salaam and worked at hospitals in Tanganyika.

targets.targetText: Ya kuma shahara bayan an fahimci cewa ya rike dukkan wadannan manyan mukaman gwamnati da sauran mukamai a lokacin ba dan kasar Tanganyika ko Tanzaniya ba ne. An haife shi a Mzimba, Nyasaland wanda aka sake masa suna Malawi bayan samun 'yancin kai, kuma ya koma Tanganyika tare da iyayensa tun yana karami. Ya girma a Tanganyika kuma ya halarci makaranta a Tanganyika. An kuma horar da shi a matsayin mataimaki na likita a asibitin Tanganyika na kasa da ke Dar es Salaam babban birnin kasar kuma ya yi aiki a asibitoci a Tanganyika.

Ya kuma shahara bayan an fahimci cewa ya riƙe dukkan waɗannan manyan muƙaman gwamnati da sauran muƙamai a lokacin ba ɗan ƙasar Tanganyika ko Tanzaniya ba ne. An haife shi a Mzimba, Nyasaland wanda aka sake masa suna Malawi bayan samun 'yancin kai, kuma ya koma Tanganyika tare da iyayensa tun yana ƙarami. Ya girma a Tanganyika kuma ya halarci makaranta a Tanganyika. An kuma horar da shi a matsayin mataimaki na likita a asibitin Tanganyika na ƙasa da ke Dar es Salaam babban birnin ƙasar kuma ya yi aiki a asibitoci a Tanganyika.

items.sourceText: The Union Leagues promoted militia-like organizations in which the Black people banded together to protect themselves from being picked off one-by-one by harassers. Members were not allowed to vote the Democratic ticket.[15] The Union Leagues and similar groups came under violent assault from the KKK after 1869, and largely collapsed. Later efforts to revive the Union League failed.[16]

targets.targetText: Kungiyoyin Tarayyar Tarayyar sun inganta kungiyoyi masu kama da 'yan bindiga inda baƙar fata suka haɗu don kare kansu daga masu tayar da hankali. Ba a yarda membobin su jefa kuri'a kan tikitin Democrat ba.[1] Kungiyar Tarayyar Tarayya da irin waɗannan kungiyoyi sun fuskanci mummunan hari daga KKK bayan 1869, kuma sun rushe. Ƙoƙarin da aka yi daga baya don farfado da Union League ya gaza.[2]

Ba a yarda membobin su jefa kuri'a kan tikitin Democrat ba. Kungiyar Tarayyar Tarayya da irin waɗannan kungiyoyi sun fuskanci mummunan hari daga KKK bayan 1869, kuma sun rushe. items.sourceText: The Afar were not the only group in active revolt against the Derg regime, and the widespread ethnic unrest led the Derg to respond by announcing the Program for the National Democratic Revolution in April 1976. This would recognize the rights of ethnic groups who had suffered under the Haile Sellassie regime, and hopefully to solve the "national question" once and for all. In April of the following year the Derg met with representatives of the Afar National Liberation Movement (ANLM) in Gewane at an Afar congress. Afterwards a number of ANLM members were appointed to local administrative positions, which weakened both the ALF's military activity and political influence amongst the Afar.[4]

targets.targetText: Ba ‘yan kabilar Afar ba ne kadai suka yi tawaye ga gwamnatin Dergi, kuma rikicin kabilanci da ya barke ya sa Derg ta mayar da martani ta hanyar sanar da shirin juyin juya halin dimokuradiyya na kasa a watan Afrilun 1976. Wannan zai amince da hakkokin kabilun da suka sha wahala a karkashin mulkin Haile Sellassie, kuma da fatan za a warware "tambayar kasa" gaba daya. A cikin watan Afrilun shekara mai zuwa ne Dergi ya gana da wakilan kungiyar 'yantar da 'yantar da 'yanci ta 'yan kabilar Afar (ANLM) a garin Gewane a wani taron 'yan kabilar Afar. Bayan haka an nada mambobin ANLM da dama zuwa mukaman gudanarwa na cikin gida, wanda ya raunana duka ayyukan soja na ALF da tasirin siyasa a tsakanin 'yan kabilar Afar. [1]

Ba ‘yan ƙabilar Afar ba ne kaɗai suka yi tawaye ga gwamnatin Dergi, kuma rikicin ƙabilanci da ya ɓarke ya sa Derg ta mayar da martani ta hanyar sanar da shirin juyin juya halin Dimokuraɗiyya na ƙasa a watan Afrilun 1976. Wannan zai amince da hakkokin ƙabilun da suka sha wahala a ƙarƙashin mulkin Haile Sellassie, kuma da fatan za a warware "tambayar ƙasa" gaba ɗaya. A cikin watan Afrilun shekara mai zuwa ne Dergi ya gana da wakilan kungiyar 'yantar da 'yantar da 'yanci ta 'yan ƙabilar Afar (ANLM) a garin Gewane a wani taron 'yan ƙabilar Afar. Bayan haka an naɗa mambobin ANLM da dama zuwa muƙaman gudanarwa na cikin gida, wanda ya raunana duka ayyukan soja na ALF da tasirin siyasa a tsakanin 'yan ƙabilar Afar. [1]

items.sourceText: The ancestral homeland of Umuguma was located on the banks of the Nwaorie river, where Holy Ghost College (Arugo High School) Owerri is now located. Oratta's offspring include Ekwema and Arugo. Ekwema begat Owerre and Arugo begat Umuguma. Since Umuguma endured suffering due to the actions of Owerre, many boundaries were redrawn in the latter's favor and thus most of the area is now known as "New Owerri."[3] This term was created by recent settlers and non-indigenous individuals. Others however, take a different stance, believing the Owerri Municipal Local Government relied on the moniker to usurp some Owerri West or Umuguma land for their use.

targets.targetText: Gidan kakannin Umuguma ya kasance a gaɓar bakin Kogin Nwaorie, inda Kwalejin Ruhi Mai Tsarki (Arugo High School) Owerri theake yanzu. Yaran Oratta sun haɗa da Ekwema da Arugo . Ekwema ta haifi Owerre kuma Arugo ta haifi Umuguma. Tun lokacin da Umuguma ta jure da wahala saboda ayyukan Owerre, an sake zana iyakoki da yawa a cikin ni'imar na ƙarshe kuma ta haka ne yawancin yankin yanzu aka sani da "Sabon Owerri". [1] Wannan kalmar ta samo asali ne daga mazauna kwanan nan da waɗanda ba ƴan asalin ƙasar ba. Sauran duk da haka, suna ɗaukar matsayi daban, suna gaskata cewa ƙaramar hukumar Owerri ta dogara da sunan don kwace wasu ƙasashen Owerri West ko Umuguma don amfani da su.

Gidan kakannin Umuguma ya kasance a bakin Kogin Nwaorie, inda Kwalejin Ruhu Mai Tsarki (Arugo High School) Owerri yake yanzu. Yaran Oratta sun hada da Ekwema da Arugo . Ekwema ta haifi Owerre kuma Arugo ta haifi Umuguma. Tun lokacin da Umuguma ta jimre da wahala saboda ayyukan Owerre, an sake zana iyakoki da yawa a cikin ni'imar na ƙarshe kuma ta haka ne yawancin yankin yanzu aka sani da "Sabon Owerri". [1] Wannan kalmar ta samo asali ne daga mazauna kwanan nan da wadanda ba 'yan asalin ƙasar ba. Sauran duk da haka, suna ɗaukar matsayi daban, suna gaskata cewa karamar hukumar Owerri ta dogara da sunan don kwace wasu ƙasashen Owerri West ko Umuguma don amfani da su.

items.sourceText: From the creation in 1947 of the Special Organization (OS), he was one of its founding and most active members.

targets.targetText: Daga halittar a 1947 na Special Organisation (OS), ya kasance daya daga cikin kafa da kuma mafi m membobi.
Daga ƙirƙirar a shekarar 1947 na Special Organisation (OS), ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin wanda ya kafa da kuma mafi inganci acikin membobin.

items.sourceText: On their side, during a meeting with the Central Committee of the MPLA in February 1977, Mingas was one of those who accused the nitistas of “fractionalism”.[13] Along with this, on 21 May 1977, he became aware of documents relating to the expulsion of Nito Alves and José Jacinto Van-Dúnem from the party.[13] At the same time, his youngest brother, Zé Mingas, a police commander in the Directory of Information and Security of Angola (DISA), had become a supporter of the nitistas and informed Alves of plans to dismantle the coup attempt against the state.[16]

targets.targetText: A nasu ɓangaren, yayin ganawa da kwamitin tsakiya na MPLA a watan Fabrairun 1977, Mingas yana ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda suka zargi nitistas da "rashin ra'ayi". [1] Tare da wannan, a ranar 21 ga watan Mayu 1977, ya fahimci takardun da suka shafi korar Nito Alves da José Jacinto Van-Dúnem daga jam'iyyar. [1] A lokaci guda kuma, ƙannensa, Zé Mingas, wani kwamandan 'yan sanda a cikin Directory of Information and Security of Angola (DISA), ya zama mai goyon bayan nitistas kuma ya sanar da Alves game da shirin wargaza yunkurin juyin mulkin da aka yi wa jihar. [2]

A nasu bangaren, yayin ganawa da kwamitin tsakiya na MPLA a watan Fabrairun 1977, Mingas yana daya daga cikin wadanda suka zargi nitistas da "rashin ra'ayi". [1] Tare da wannan, a ranar 21 ga Mayu 1977, ya fahimci takardun da suka shafi korar Nito Alves da José Jacinto Van-Dúnem daga jam'iyyar. [1] A lokaci guda kuma, ƙannensa, Zé Mingas, wani kwamandan 'yan sanda a cikin Directory of Information and Security of Angola (DISA), ya zama mai goyon bayan nitistas kuma ya sanar da Alves game da shirin wargaza yunkurin juyin mulkin da aka yi wa jihar. [2]

items.sourceText: As Minister of Telecommunications, she tried to stop Strive Masiyiwa from establishing his independent cellphone network Econet.[6] Masiyiwa had been given an ultimatum by the cabinet to sell his imported equipment to his rivals. On 24 March 1997, Mujuru decided to issue Zimbabwe's second cellular telephone licence to the previously unknown Zairois consortium Telecel,[7] cutting out Masiyiwa. The Zairois consortium included her husband Solomon and President Robert Mugabe's nephew Leo. After many legal fights, Masiyiwa won his licence in December 1997.

targets.targetText: A matsayinta na ministar sadarwa, ta yi kokarin hana Strive Masiyiwa kafa cibiyar sadarwar wayar salula mai zaman kanta ta Econet. [1] Majalisar ministoci ta ba Masiyiwa wa'adin sayar da kayan aikin da ya shigo da su ga abokan hamayyarsa. A ranar 24 ga Maris 1997, Mujuru ya yanke shawarar ba da lasisin wayar salula na biyu na Zimbabwe ga ƙungiyar Zairois Telecel wanda ba a taɓa sani ba a baya, [2] yana yanke Masiyiwa. Kungiyar ta Zairois ta hada da mijinta Solomon da dan wan shugaba Robert Mugabe Leo. Bayan fadace-fadacen shari'a da yawa, Masiyiwa ya ci lasisinsa a watan Disamba 1997.

A matsayinta na ministar sadarwa, ta yi kokarin hana Strive Masiyiwa kafa cibiyar sadarwar wayar salula mai zaman kanta ta Econet. [1] Majalisar ministoci ta ba Masiyiwa wa'adin sayar da kayan aikin da ya shigo da su ga abokan hamayyarsa. A ranar 24 ga watan Maris 1997, Mujuru ta yanke shawarar ba da lasisin wayar salula na biyu na Zimbabwe ga ƙungiyar Zairois Telecel wanda ba a taɓa sani ba a baya, [2] yana yanke Masiyiwa. Kungiyar ta Zairois ta haɗa da mijinta Solomon da ɗan wan shugaba Robert Mugabe Leo. Bayan faɗace-faɗacen shari'a da yawa, Masiyiwa ya ci lasisinsa a watan Disamba 1997. Manazarta

items.sourceText: Unhappy with what he saw as an erosion of traditional tribal power in the country and the hasty democratization under Khama's rule, Bathoen abdicated his chiefship on 1 July 1969, after forty years of reign and ran as the presidential candidate for the BNF in the 1969 election. Although the BDP retained its electoral hegemony and the BNF proved to be tightly confined to Bathoen's tribal base in the south of the country, Bathoen himself defeated incumbent vice-president Quett Masire in the Kanye South constituency by an overwhelming margin, establishing himself as the Leader of the Opposition in the National Assembly.[5][6]

targets.targetText: Ba tare da jin dadin abin da ya gani a matsayin rushe ikon kabilanci a kasar da kuma saurin dimokuradiyya a karkashin mulkin Khama ba, Bathoen ya yi murabus daga mukaminsa a ranar 1 ga Yuli 1969, bayan shekaru arba'in yana mulki kuma ya tsaya a matsayin dan takarar shugaban kasa na BNF a zaben 1969 . Duk da cewa jam'iyyar BDP ta ci gaba da rike madafun iko a zaben kuma BNF ta tabbatar da cewa ta killace yankin Bathoen da ke kudancin kasar, Bathoen da kansa ya doke mataimakin shugaban kasa Quett Masire a mazabar Kanye ta Kudu da gagarumin rinjaye, inda ya kafa kansa a matsayin jagoran 'yan adawa a majalisar dokokin kasar. [1] [2]

Ba tare da jin daɗin abin da ya gani a matsayin rushe ikon ƙabilanci a ƙasar da kuma saurin Dimokuraɗiyya a ƙarƙashin mulkin Khama ba, Bathoen ya yi murabus daga muƙaminsa a ranar 1 ga watan Yuli 1969, bayan shekaru arba'in yana mulki kuma ya tsaya a matsayin ɗan takarar shugaban ƙasa na BNF a zaɓen 1969. Duk da cewa jam'iyyar BDP ta ci gaba da riƙe madafun iko a zaɓen kuma BNF ta tabbatar da cewa ta killace yankin Bathoen da ke kudancin ƙasar, Bathoen da kansa ya doke mataimakin shugaban ƙasa Quett Masire a mazaɓar Kanye ta Kudu da gagarumin rinjaye, inda ya kafa kansa a matsayin jagoran 'yan adawa a majalisar dokokin ƙasar. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Bathoen remained Leader of the Opposition and was subsequently re-elected in his constituency by landslides in both 1974 and 1979.[7] During this period, he was in a persistent conflict over his party's leadership with Kenneth Koma, a founding member and exponent of the party's socialist wing, turning the BNF into a shaky coalition between tribal traditionalists and socialists. For much of Bathoen's leadership, the opposition parties found themselves restricted to ethnic and regional strongholds, unable to establish a serious contest against the BDP. Bathoen finally withdrew from the National Assembly in 1984, paving the way for Koma's election as the Leader of the Opposition. He was appointed president of the Court of Appeals the following year, a position he held until his death.[8] He remained critical of both the government and Koma's leadership of the BNF, encouraging the formation of the Botswana Freedom Party (BFP) in the late 1980s, although he did not lead it. He passed away on 3 October 1992, at the age of 82.

targets.targetText: Bathoen ya ci gaba da zama Jagoran 'yan adawa kuma daga baya aka sake zaɓen shi a mazaɓar sa ta hanyar zabtarewar ƙasa a shekarar 1974 da 1979. [1] A cikin wannan lokaci, ya kasance cikin rigima mai ɗorewa kan shugabancin jam'iyyarsa da Kenneth Koma, wanda ya kafa jam'iyyar gurguzu kuma jigo a jam'iyyar gurguzu, wanda ya mayar da BNF zuwa gamayyar haɗaka tsakanin 'yan ƙabilar gargajiya da masu ra'ayin gurguzu. Domin galibin shugabancin Bathoen, jam'iyyun adawa sun tsinci kansu cikin ƙabilanci da yanki, ba su iya kafa wata babbar hamayya da jam'iyyar BDP. A ƙarshe dai Bathoen ya fice daga majalisar a shekarar 1984, inda ya share fagen zaɓen Koma a matsayin shugaban jam’iyyar adawa. An naɗa shi shugaban kotun ɗaukaka ƙara a shekara mai zuwa, muƙamin da ya riƙe har ya rasu. [2] Ya ci gaba da sukar gwamnati da kuma shugabancin Koma na BNF, yana karfafa kafa jam'iyyar 'yanci ta Botswana (BFP) a ƙarshen shekarun 1980, kodayake bai jagoranci ta ba. Ya rasu a ranar 3 ga Oktoba, 1992, yana da shekaru 82.

Bathoen ya ci gaba da zama Jagoran 'yan adawa kuma daga baya aka sake zabe shi a mazabarsa ta hanyar zabtarewar kasa a 1974 da 1979. [1] A cikin wannan lokaci, ya kasance cikin rigima mai dorewa kan shugabancin jam'iyyarsa da Kenneth Koma, wanda ya kafa jam'iyyar gurguzu kuma jigo a jam'iyyar gurguzu, wanda ya mayar da BNF zuwa gamayyar hadaka tsakanin 'yan kabilar gargajiya da masu ra'ayin gurguzu. Domin galibin shugabancin Bathoen, jam'iyyun adawa sun tsinci kansu cikin kabilanci da yanki, ba su iya kafa wata babbar hamayya da jam'iyyar BDP. A karshe dai Bathoen ya fice daga majalisar a shekarar 1984, inda ya share fagen zaben Koma a matsayin shugaban jam’iyyar adawa. An nada shi shugaban kotun daukaka kara a shekara mai zuwa, mukamin da ya rike har ya rasu. [2] Ya ci gaba da sukar gwamnati da kuma shugabancin Koma na BNF, yana karfafa kafa jam'iyyar 'yanci ta Botswana (BFP) a karshen shekarun 1980, kodayake bai jagoranci ta ba. Ya rasu a ranar 3 ga Oktoba, 1992, yana da shekaru 82.

items.sourceText: He became actively involved in the politics of the Gold Coast upon his return from the congress. He spoke against British imperialism and was seen in most political activities in the colony. When Kwame Nkrumah formed the Convention Peoples Party on 12 June 1949, He joined the party and was member of the first working committee of the convention. He chaired the first meeting of the committee and proposed the use of the red rooster—the symbol of Labadi, his native town—as the symbol of the newly formed political party.

targets.targetText: Ya tsunduma cikin harkokin siyasar kasar Gold Coast bayan ya dawo daga majalisa. Ya yi magana game da mulkin mallaka na Burtaniya kuma ana ganinsa a yawancin ayyukan siyasa a cikin mulkin mallaka. Lokacin da Kwame Nkrumah ya kafa jam'iyyar Convention Peoples Party a ranar 12 ga watan Yunin 1949, ya shiga jam'iyyar kuma ya kasance memba na kwamitin aiki na farko na babban taron. Ya jagoranci taron farko na kwamitin kuma ya ba da shawarar a yi amfani da jar zakara—alamar Labadi, garinsu—a matsayin alamar sabuwar jam’iyyar siyasa.

Ya tsunduma cikin harkokin siyasar ƙasar Gold Coast bayan ya dawo daga majalisa. Ya yi magana game da 'yan mulkin mallaka na Burtaniya kuma ana ganinsa a yawancin ayyukan siyasa a cikin 'yan mulkin mallaka. Lokacin da Kwame Nkrumah ya kafa jam'iyyar Convention Peoples Party a ranar 12 ga watan Yunin 1949, ya shiga jam'iyyar kuma ya kasance memba na kwamitin aiki na farko na babban taron. Ya jagoranci taron farko na kwamitin kuma ya ba da shawarar a yi amfani da jar zakara—alamar Labadi, garinsu—a matsayin alamar sabuwar jam’iyyar siyasa.

items.sourceText: After it was learned that he was not a citizen, he lost all his government positions and the other posts he held and eventually returned to his home country, Malawi, where he later died.

targets.targetText: Bayan an gano cewa shi ba ɗan ƙasa ba ne, ya rasa dukkan muƙaman gwamnati da sauran muƙaman da ya riƙe inda daga bisani ya koma kasarsa ta Malawi, inda daga bisani ya rasu.
Bayan an gano cewa shi ba dan kasa ba ne, ya rasa dukkan mukaman gwamnati da sauran mukaman da ya rike inda daga bisani ya koma kasarsa ta Malawi, inda daga bisani ya rasu.

items.sourceText: In Dar es Salaam, Josina became seriously ill on April 5. She was taken to Muhimbili Hospital and died on April 7, 1971, at the age of 25. She was buried in Kinondoni Cemetery, where her uncle Mateus Muthemba, who was assassinated by Portuguese agents in 1968, is also interred.

targets.targetText: A Dar es Salaam, Josina ta kamu da rashin lafiya a ranar 5 ga watan Afrilu. An kai ta asibitin Muhimbili kuma ta rasu a ranar 7 ga watan Afrilu, 1971, tana da shekaru 25 a duniya. An binne ta a makabartar Kinondoni, inda aka shiga tsakanin kawunta Mateus Muthemba, wanda jami'an Portugal suka ƙashe a shekarar 1968.

A Dar es Salaam, Josina ta kamu da rashin lafiya a ranar 5 ga Afrilu. An kai ta asibitin Muhimbili kuma ta rasu a ranar 7 ga Afrilu, 1971, tana da shekaru 25 a duniya. An binne ta a makabartar Kinondoni, inda aka shiga tsakanin kawunta Mateus Muthemba, wanda jami'an Portugal suka kashe a 1968.

items.sourceText: Clash occurred a few weeks after the forces of British General Henry Bartle Frere led a successful campaign against the Gcaleka forces, who joined the Xhosha resistance against the British rule. Bartle's forces, under their commander Veldman Bikitsha, managed to engage and finally defeat the Gcaleka on 13 January (near Nyumaxa).The imperial troops assisted, but were tired, short of rations and unable to follow up on the victory.

targets.targetText: Rikici ya faru ne 'yan makonni bayan da sojojin Birtaniya Janar Henry Bartle Frere ya jagoranci yakin nasara a kan sojojin Gcaleka, waɗanda suka shiga gwagwarmayar Xhosha a kan 'yan mulkin mallaka na Birtaniya. Sojojin Bartle, ƙarƙashin kwamandan su Veldman Bikitsha, sun yi nasarar yin galaba a kan Gcaleka a ranar 13 ga watan Janairu (kusa da Nyumaxa). Sojojin Masarautar sun taimaka, amma sun gaji, ƙarancin abinci kuma sun ƙasa bin diddigin nasarar.

Rikici ya faru ne 'yan makonni bayan da sojojin Birtaniya Janar Henry Bartle Frere ya jagoranci yakin nasara a kan sojojin Gcaleka, wadanda suka shiga gwagwarmayar Xhosha a kan mulkin Birtaniya. Sojojin Bartle, karkashin kwamandan su Veldman Bikitsha, sun yi nasarar yin galaba a kan Gcaleka a ranar 13 ga Janairu (kusa da Nyumaxa). Sojojin Masarautar sun taimaka, amma sun gaji, karancin abinci kuma sun kasa bin diddigin nasarar.

items.sourceText: In 1971, university students began to organize the Movement for the Liberation of Saguia el Hamra and Wadi el Dhahab, formally constituted as the Polisario Front in 1973. Ten days after its founding, the Polisario Front launched a guerilla war against the Spanish.[1]

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 1971, ɗaliban jami'a sun fara shirya ƙungiyoyin 'Yancin Saguia el Hamra da Wadi el Dhahab, waɗanda aka kafa a matsayin Polisario Front a shekarar 1973. Kwanaki 10 bayan kafuwarta, kungiyar Polisario Front ta kaddamar da kamfen da ƙasar Spain. [1]

A cikin 1971, ɗaliban jami'a sun fara shirya ƙungiyoyin 'Yancin Saguia el Hamra da Wadi el Dhahab, waɗanda aka kafa a matsayin Polisario Front a 1973. Kwanaki 10 bayan kafuwarta, kungiyar Polisario Front ta kaddamar da yakin neman zabe da kasar Spain. [1]

items.sourceText: Abbes Laghrour and Adjel Adjoul urged Bachir Chihani to order the retreat, but as he kept refusing, they eventually decided to leave anyway.[6] Adjoul took most of the men to the south and, under the cover of the night, they managed to cross the French lines near the Oued Helaïl, at the price of some casualties. Meanwhile, Laghrour escaped with 30 men through the eastern side of the encirclement.[7] Chihani remained in the cave where they had been hiding, and after the entrance was blown up with dynamite by the French army, he spent six days hidden under the rubble before successfully escaping at night.[8][9]

targets.targetText: Abbes Laghrour da Adjel Adjoul sun buƙaci Bachir Chihani da ya ba da umarnin komawar, amma yayin da ya ki amincewa, daga karshe suka yanke shawarar barin. [1] Adjoul ya ɗauki mafi yawan mutanen zuwa kudu, kuma a ƙarƙashin dare, sun yi nasarar ketare layin Faransa kusa da Oued Helaïl, kan farashin wasu da suka jikkata. A halin da ake ciki, Laghrour ya tsere tare da mutane 30 ta gefen gabas na kewaye. [2] Chihani ya ci gaba da zama a cikin kogon da suka ɓuya, kuma bayan da sojojin Faransa suka tarwatsa kofar shiga, ya shafe kwanaki shida a ɓoye a ƙarƙashin baraguzan ginin, kafin ya samu nasarar tserewa cikin dare. [ 8 ] [ 9 ]

Abbes Laghrour da Adjel Adjoul sun bukaci Bachir Chihani da ya ba da umarnin komawar, amma yayin da ya ki amincewa, daga karshe suka yanke shawarar barin. [1] Adjoul ya dauki mafi yawan mutanen zuwa kudu, kuma a karkashin dare, sun yi nasarar ketare layin Faransa kusa da Oued Helaïl, kan farashin wasu da suka jikkata. A halin da ake ciki, Laghrour ya tsere tare da mutane 30 ta gefen gabas na kewaye. [2] Chihani ya ci gaba da zama a cikin kogon da suka buya, kuma bayan da sojojin Faransa suka tarwatsa kofar shiga, ya shafe kwanaki shida a boye a karkashin baraguzan ginin, kafin ya samu nasarar tserewa cikin dare. [ 8 ] [ 9 ]

items.sourceText: On November 7, near Timimoun, 220 miles south of Colomb-Béchar the militants ambushed a convoy of 10 trucks belonging to a French oil prospecting team and French Foreign Legion troops guarding them.[12] Firing on the first two truck, one of which managed to escape, they turned to attack rest of the convoy, destroying 6 truck in total. 9 legionaries and 7 members of the oil prospecting team were killed, with the 12 wounded survivors managing to escape in the 4 remaining but damaged trucks.[13] 5 legionaries, and 7 engineers were captured and made hostage by the militants.[3] A later rescue mission found the 6 destroyed trucks, but found no survivors.[13][14][15] The ALN militants and deserters retreated with little to no casualties.

targets.targetText: A ranar 7 ga watan Nuwamba, a kusa da Tiimoun, mai tazarar kilomita 220 kudu da Colomb-Béchar mayakan sun yi wa ayarin motocin dakon kaya 10 kwantan bauna na tawagar masu neman mai na Faransa da sojojin Faransa na kasashen waje dake gadin su. [1] A yayin harbin da motar daukar kaya biyu ta farko daya ta yi nasarar tserewa, sai suka juya suka far wa sauran ayarin motocin, inda suka lalata motoci 6 gaba daya. Sojoji 9 da ‘yan tawagar masu neman mai 7 ne suka mutu, inda 12 da suka samu raunuka suka samu nasarar tserewa daga cikin 4 da suka rage amma suka lalace. [2] Sojoji 5, da injiniyoyi 7 'yan ta'adda sun kama tare da yin garkuwa da su. [3] Rundunar ceto daga baya ta gano manyan motoci 6 da aka lalata, amma babu wanda ya tsira. [2] [4] [5] ‘Yan ta’addan na ALN da ‘yan gudun hijirar sun ja da baya ba tare da samun asarar rai ba.

items.sourceText: At the outbreak of the Revolution, Boulahrouf was in France and joined the ranks of the Front as part of the Federation of France's National Liberation Front to publicize and disseminate the objectives and principles of the Revolution with the French public opinion. To this end, He worked to establish contacts with communist personalities in France, trying to obtain the support of the Communist Party of France, but he failed in his efforts. He also collaborated in the Journal of the Algerian resistance in France and Switzerland.

targets.targetText: A lokacin ɓullar juyin juya hali, Boulahrouf ya kasance a ƙasar Faransa kuma ya shiga sahun sahun gaba a matsayin wani ɓangare na kungiyar 'yantar da 'yancin ƙasar Faransa don yaɗa da kuma yaɗa manufofin juyin juya halin da ra'ayin al'ummar Faransa. Don haka, ya yi aiki don kulla tuntuɓar mutane masu ra'ayin gurguzu a Faransa, yana ƙoƙarin samun goyon bayan Jam'iyyar Kwaminisanci ta Faransa, amma ya gaza a ƙoƙarinsa. Ya kuma yi aiki tare a cikin Jaridar gwagwarmayar Aljeriya a Faransa da Switzerland.

A lokacin bullar juyin juya halin Musulunci, Boulahrouf ya kasance a kasar Faransa kuma ya shiga sahun sahun gaba a matsayin wani bangare na kungiyar 'yantar da 'yancin kasar Faransa don yada da kuma yada manufofin juyin juya halin Musulunci da ra'ayin al'ummar Faransa. Don haka, ya yi aiki don kulla tuntuɓar mutane masu ra'ayin gurguzu a Faransa, yana ƙoƙarin samun goyon bayan Jam'iyyar Kwaminisanci ta Faransa, amma ya gaza a ƙoƙarinsa. Ya kuma yi aiki tare a cikin Jaridar gwagwarmayar Aljeriya a Faransa da Switzerland.

items.sourceText: On 3 January 1961, agricultural workers employed by Cotonang, a Portuguese-Belgian cotton plantation company, staged a protest demanding improved working conditions.[1] The protest, which later became known as the Baixa de Cassanje revolt, was led by two previously unknown Angolans, António Mariano and Kulu-Xingu.[3] During the protest, the Angolan workers burned their identification cards and physically attacked Portuguese traders on the company premises. The protest led to a general uprising, which Portuguese authorities responded to with an air raid the following day on twenty villages in the area, killing large numbers of villagers. While the People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA) claimed that the air raid killed some ten thousand people, most estimates range from 400 to as many as 7,000 killed.[4][5] Colonial Martyrs Repression Day is commemorated each year with a public holiday on 4 January.[6][7]

targets.targetText: A ranar 3 ga watan Janairun 1961, ma'aikatan aikin gona da ke aiki da Cotonang, wani kamfanin noman auduga na Portugal-Belgium, sun gudanar da zanga-zangar neman a inganta yanayin aiki. [1] Zanga-zangar wacce daga baya ta zama tawaye ta Baixa de Cassanje, ta samu jagorancin wasu mutanen Angola biyu da ba a san su ba, António Mariano da Kulu-Xingu. [2] A yayin zanga-zangar, ma'aikatan 'yan ƙasar Angola sun kona katin shaida tare da kai hari ga 'yan kasuwar Portugal a harabar kamfanin. Zanga-zangar ta haifar da wani babban bore, wanda hukumomin Portugal suka mayar da martani da wani hari ta sama a washegari a ƙauyuka ashirin da ke yankin, inda aka kashe ɗimbin mutanen ƙauyen. Yayin da jam'iyyar People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA) ta yi ikirarin cewa harin da aka kai ta sama ya kashe mutane kusan dubu goma, yawancin alkaluma sun kai daga 400 zuwa 7,000. [3] [4] Ana tunawa da ranar danniyata shahidan i'yqn mulkin mallaka suka kashe kowace shekara tare da hutun jama'a a ranar 4 ga watan Janairu. [5] [6]

A ranar 3 ga Janairun 1961, ma'aikatan aikin gona da ke aiki da Cotonang, wani kamfanin noman auduga na Portugal-Belgium, sun gudanar da zanga-zangar neman a inganta yanayin aiki. [1] Zanga-zangar wadda daga baya ta zama tawaye ta Baixa de Cassanje, ta samu jagorancin wasu mutanen Angola biyu da ba a san su ba, António Mariano da Kulu-Xingu. [2] A yayin zanga-zangar, ma'aikatan 'yan kasar Angola sun kona katin shaida tare da kai hari ga 'yan kasuwar Portugal a harabar kamfanin. Zanga-zangar ta haifar da wani babban bore, wanda hukumomin Portugal suka mayar da martani da wani hari ta sama a washegari a kauyuka ashirin da ke yankin, inda aka kashe dimbin mutanen kauyen. Yayin da jam'iyyar People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA) ta yi ikirarin cewa harin da aka kai ta sama ya kashe mutane kusan dubu goma, yawancin alkaluma sun kai daga 400 zuwa 7,000. [3] [4] Ana tunawa da ranar danniyata shahidan mulkin mallaka kowace shekara tare da hutun jama'a a ranar 4 ga Janairu. [5] [6]

items.sourceText: The ADF has been fighting a guerrilla war against the Cameroonian Armed Forces in the Anglophone part of the country since September 2017.[11] In June 2018, it claimed to have 1,500 soldiers under its command, spread across 20 bases across Southern Cameroons.[2] Numerically and materially the inferior of their adversary, they rely on hit-and-run attacks, ambushes and raids, taking advantage of their familiarity with the terrain. The ADF aims to raise the cost of Cameroon's military presence in the region higher than the profits the country gets from there.[12] Cameroonian authorities have acknowledged that they have little control outside the cities in Southern Cameroons;[13] according to a foreign journalist who spent time with the ADF, this owes partly to the poor infrastructure in the region, making it hard for the army to pursue the guerrillas.[7]

targets.targetText: Tun a watan Satumban 2017 ne kungiyar ADF ke fafatawa da sojojin Kamaru a yankin Anglophone na ƙasar. [1] A watan Yunin 2018, ta yi ikirarin cewa tana da sojoji 1,500 da ke ƙarƙashin ta, waɗanda suka bazu a sansanoni 20 a Kudancin Kamaru. [2] A adadi da kuma zahiri na ƙasa da abokan gaba, sun dogara da kai hari, kwanton ɓauna da kai hari, suna cin gajiyar masaniyar da suka saba da filin. ADF na da burin ƙara kuɗin da sojojin Kamaru ke kashewa a yankin fiye da ribar da ƙasar ke samu daga can. [3] Hukumomin Kamaru sun yarda cewa ba su da iko a wajen garuruwan Kudancin Kamaru; [4] a cewar wani ɗan jarida na kasashen waje wanda ya dauki lokaci tare da ADF, wannan yana da wani ɓangare na rashin kyawun kayan aiki a yankin, wanda ya sa sojoji su yi wuya su bi 'yan ta'adda. [2]

Tun a watan Satumban 2017 ne kungiyar ADF ke fafatawa da sojojin Kamaru a yankin Anglophone na kasar. [1] A watan Yunin 2018, ta yi ikirarin cewa tana da sojoji 1,500 da ke karkashinta, wadanda suka bazu a sansanoni 20 a Kudancin Kamaru. [2] A adadi da kuma zahiri na kasa da abokan gaba, sun dogara da kai hari, kwanton bauna da kai hari, suna cin gajiyar masaniyar da suka saba da filin. ADF na da burin kara kudin da sojojin Kamaru ke kashewa a yankin fiye da ribar da kasar ke samu daga can. [3] Hukumomin Kamaru sun yarda cewa ba su da iko a wajen garuruwan Kudancin Kamaru; [4] a cewar wani dan jarida na kasashen waje wanda ya dauki lokaci tare da ADF, wannan yana da wani bangare na rashin kyawun kayan aiki a yankin, wanda ya sa sojoji su yi wuya su bi 'yan ta'adda. [2]

items.sourceText: There are considerable differences in the source material about the date of Savimbi's official induction into the UPA. Fred Bridgland, who wrote a much-cited biography of Savimbi, says that Savimbi was "inducted into the UPA" on 1 February 1961.[8] Nonetheless, he may not have officially joined the UPA until late 1961.[b]

targets.targetText: Akwai bambance-bambance masu yawa a cikin kayan tushe game da ranar shigar da Savimbi a hukumance a cikin UPA. Fred Bridgland, wanda ya rubuta tarihin rayuwar Savimbi da aka ambata da yawa, ya ce Savimbi an "shigar da shi cikin UPA" a ranar 1 ga watan Fabrairu 1961. [ 8 ]. Duk da haka, ƙila bai shiga UPA bisa hukuma ba har zuwa ƙarshen i 1961. [ b ]

Akwai bambance-bambance masu yawa a cikin kayan tushe game da ranar shigar da Savimbi a hukumance a cikin UPA. Fred Bridgland, wanda ya rubuta tarihin rayuwar Savimbi da aka ambata da yawa, ya ce Savimbi an "shigar da shi cikin UPA" a ranar 1 ga Fabrairu 1961. [ 8 ]. Duk da haka, ƙila bai shiga UPA bisa hukuma ba har zuwa ƙarshen 1961. [ b ]

items.sourceText: Cassava was one of the crops imported from Latin America through the Manila galleons from at least the 16th century.[2][3] Cassava cake is a type of bibingka (traditional baked cakes), having its origins from adopting native recipes but using cassava instead of the traditional galapong (ground glutinous rice) batter. It is also known more rarely as cassava bibingka or bibingkang kamoteng kahoy, although the English name is more commonly used.[3][5] In Quezon, cassava cake is more commonly known as budin.[6][7]

targets.targetText: Cassava na ɗaya daga cikin amfanin gona da aka shigo da su daga Latin Amurka ta hanyar Manila galleons daga akalla karni na 16. [1][2] Cassava cake wani nau'in bibingka ne (keke na gargajiya), wanda ya samo asali ne daga karɓar girke-girke na asali amma ta amfani da cassava maimakon galapong na gargajiya (shinkafa mai laushi). Har ila yau, an san shi da wuya a matsayin cassava bibingka ko bibingkang kaatuang casso, kodayake ana amfani da sunan Ingilishi mafi yawa.[3][4] A Quezon, cake cassava an fi sani da budin.[5][6]

Rogo na ɗaya daga cikin amfanin gona da aka shigo da su daga Latin Amurka ta hanyar Manila galleons daga akalla karni na 16. [1][2] wainar rogo (Ďan Narogo) wani nau'in bibingka ne (keke na gargajiya), wanda ya samo asali ne daga karɓar girke-girke na asali amma ta amfani da cassava maimakon galapong na gargajiya (shinkafa mai laushi). Har ila yau, an san shi da wuya a matsayin cassava bibingka ko bibingkang kaatuang casso, kodayake ana amfani da sunan Ingilishi mafi yawa.[3][4] A Quezon, cake cassava an fi sani da budin.[5][6]

items.sourceText: Tumu is a town located in Gombe State, Nigeria's Akko Local Government Area. The distance between Gombe and Tumu is roughly 36 kilometers / 23 mi. The capital of Nigeria, Abuja, is located about 399 kilometers (248 miles) away from Tumu.[1]

targets.targetText: Tumu wani gari ne da ke cikin Jihar Gombe, Yankin Karamar Hukumar Akko ta Najeriya . Tsakanin Gombe da Tumu kusan kilomita 36 ne / 23 mi. Babban birnin Najeriya, Abuja, yana da nisan kilomita 399 (248 miles) daga Tumu.[1]

Tumu wani gari ne da ke cikin Jihar Gombe, a Yankin Karamar Hukumar Akko ta Najeriya . Tsakanin cikin garin Gombe zuwa garin Tumu akwai kusan kilomita 36 ne / 23 mi. Daga Babban birnin Najeriya, Abuja, yana da nisan kilomita 399 (248 miles) daga Tumu.[1]

items.sourceText: Witbooi was educated at Rhenish Missionary and Wesleyan Methodist Schools in Namibia as well as at the Wilberforce Institute in Evaton, South Africa. First, he took up employment as a teacher in 1856 at Keetmanshoop, transferred in 1859 to Maltahöhe, and returned in 1865 to Gibeon at the request of the community and the Church to build on the foundations laid by his aging father.

targets.targetText: Witbooi ya yi karatu a Makarantar Mishan ta Rhenish da Wesleyan Methodist a Namibiya da kuma Cibiyar Wilberforce da ke Evaton, Afirka ta Kudu. Na farko, ya ɗauki aiki a matsayin malami a shekarar 1856 a Keetmanshoop, canjawa wuri a shekarar 1859 zuwa Maltahöhe, kuma ya dawo a t 1865 zuwa Gibeyon bisa ga buƙatar da al'umma da kuma Church don gina a kan tushen ɗage farawa daga tsohon mahaifinsa.

items.sourceText: He was elected to parliament for his tribal stronghold of Chipinge in southeastern Zimbabwe in 1995, and was a candidate in the 1996 presidential election (though he withdrew shortly before the election after claiming that Mugabe's ZANU-PF was undermining his campaign).[7] In December 1997, a court tried and convicted him of conspiring with Chimwenje to assassinate Mugabe and the government disqualified him from attending parliament.[8] Sithole's small opposition group again won the Chipinge seat in the June 2000 elections.

targets.targetText: An zabe shi a matsayin dan majalisa a yankinsa na Chipinge da ke kudu maso gabashin Zimbabwe a shekarar 1995, kuma ya kasance dan takara a zaben shugaban kasa na 1996 (ko da yake ya janye jim kadan kafin zaben bayan ya yi ikirarin cewa jam'iyyar ZANU-PF ta Mugabe tana yi masa zagon kasa). [1] A watan Disambar 1997, wata kotu ta yi masa shari'a tare da samunsa da laifin hada baki da Chimwenje wajen kashe Mugabe kuma gwamnati ta hana shi halartar majalisar dokoki. [2] Ƙananan ƙungiyar adawa ta Sithole ta sake lashe kujerar Chipinge a zaɓen watan Yunin 2000 .

An zaɓe shi a matsayin ɗan majalisa a yankinsa na Chipinge da ke kudu maso gabashin Zimbabwe a shekarar 1995, kuma ya kasance ɗan takara a zaɓen shugaban ƙasa na t 1996 (ko da yake ya janye jim kaɗan kafin zaɓen bayan ya yi ikirarin cewa jam'iyyar ZANU-PF ta Mugabe tana yi masa zagon ƙasa). [1] A watan Disambar 1997, wata kotu ta yi masa shari'a tare da samunsa da laifin haɗa baki da Chimwenje wajen kashe Mugabe kuma gwamnati ta hana shi halartar majalisar dokoki. [2] Ƙananan ƙungiyar adawa ta Sithole ta sake lashe kujerar Chipinge a zaɓen watan Yunin 2000.

items.sourceText: The outbreak of the First World War proved significant, with the withdrawal of troops for service in France compounded by the loss of more than 600 French killed at the Battle of El Herri. Lyautey reorganised his available forces into a "living barricade", consisting of outposts manned by his best troops protecting the perimeter of French territory with lower quality troops manning the rear-guard positions. Over the next four years the French retained most of their territory despite intelligence and financial support provided by the Central Powers to the Zaian Confederation and continual raids and skirmishes reducing scarce French manpower.

targets.targetText: Ɓarkewar yakin duniya na farko ya kasance mai matukar muhimmanci, tare da janye sojojin da aka yi don hidima a Faransa tare da asarar fiye da Faransawa 600 da aka kashe a yakin El Herri. Lyautey ya sake tsara rundunan da yake da su zuwa wani “shinge mai rai”, wanda ya kunshi sansanonin da sojojinsa mafi kyawu ke kula da su da ke kare kewayen ƙasar Faransa tare da dakaru masu ƙaramin karfi da ke riƙe da mukaman gadin baya. A cikin shekaru huɗu masu zuwa Faransawa sun ci gaba da riƙe mafi yawan yankunansu duk da bayanan sirri da tallafin kudi da gwamnatin tsakiya ta baiwa kungiyar ta Zaian da ci gaba da kai hare-hare da faɗace-faɗac na rage ƙarancin ma'aikatan Faransa.

Barkewar yakin duniya na farko ya kasance mai matukar muhimmanci, tare da janye sojojin da aka yi don hidima a Faransa tare da asarar fiye da Faransawa 600 da aka kashe a yakin El Herri . Lyautey ya sake tsara rundunan da yake da su zuwa wani “shinge mai rai”, wanda ya kunshi sansanonin da sojojinsa mafi kyawu ke kula da su da ke kare kewayen kasar Faransa tare da dakaru masu karamin karfi da ke rike da mukaman gadin baya. A cikin shekaru hudu masu zuwa Faransawa sun ci gaba da rike mafi yawan yankunansu duk da bayanan sirri da tallafin kudi da gwamnatin tsakiya ta baiwa kungiyar ta Zaian da ci gaba da kai hare-hare da fadace-fadace na rage karancin ma'aikatan Faransa.

items.sourceText: Lyautey's plans for taking Taza also extended to capturing Khénifra, Hammou's headquarters. He had been advised by his political officer, Maurice Le Glay that doing so would "finish him off definitively" and cut the Zaians off from support of other tribes.[1] The French outpost at nearby Kasbah Tadla had recently been attacked by Said and subsequent peace negotiations led by Lyautey's head of intelligence, Colonel Henri Simon, had achieved little.[19] As a result, Mangin was authorised to lead a retaliatory raid to Said's camp at El Ksiba but, despite inflicting heavy casualties, was forced to withdraw with the loss of 60 killed, 150 wounded and much equipment abandoned.[19] Having failed to make any impression on the Zaians through negotiation in May 1914, Lyautey authorised General Paul Prosper Henrys to take command of all French troops in the area and launch an attack on Taza and Khénifra.[3][4] Henrys captured Taza within a few days using units drawn from garrisons in Fez, Meknes, Rabat and Marrakesh and then turned his attention to Khénifra.[5][20]

targets.targetText: Shirye-shiryen Lyautey na ɗaukar Taza kuma ya ƙara zuwa kama Khénifra, hedkwatar Hammou. Jami’in siyasarsa, Maurice Le Glay, ya ba shi shawarar cewa yin hakan zai “kare shi da gaske” kuma ya yanke Za’awa daga goyon bayan wasu kabilu. [1] Kwanan nan Said ya kai wa sansanin Faransa hari a Kasbah Tadla, kuma tattaunawar zaman lafiya karkashin jagorancin shugaban leken asirin Lyautey, Kanar Henri Simon, bai cimma komai ba. [2] Sakamakon haka, an ba Mangin izinin jagorantar harin ramuwar gayya zuwa sansanin Said da ke El Ksiba amma, duk da cewa ya yi munanan raunuka, an tilasta masa janyewa tare da asarar rayuka 60, 150 da suka samu raunuka, an kuma yi watsi da kayan aiki da yawa. [2] Bayan da ya kasa yin wani ra'ayi a kan Zaians ta hanyar yin shawarwari a watan Mayu 1914, Lyautey ya ba Janar Paul Prosper Henrys izini ya jagoranci dukan sojojin Faransa a yankin da kuma kaddamar da hari a Taza da Khénifra. [3] [4] Henrys ya kama Taza a cikin 'yan kwanaki ta hanyar amfani da sassan da aka zana daga garrisons a Fez, Meknes, Rabat da Marrakesh sannan ya mai da hankalinsa ga Khénifra. [5] [6]

items.sourceText: Following Basutoland's transformation into a British territory on 12 March 1868, it became the target of rapid westernization efforts by the Cape Colony administration. In 1879, the Cape Parliament extended the Peace Preservation Act to Basutoland, with the aim of disarming the Basuto people. The immense significance of guns in Basuto society, compounded with past grievances, resulted in a rebellion led by chiefs Lerotholi and Masopha, which erupted on 13 September 1880. Heavily outnumbered and stretched thin by the simultaneous outbreak of other revolts, the Cape Colonial Forces failed to achieve a decisive military victory.

targets.targetText: Bayan da Basutoland ya rikiɗe zuwa yankin Biritaniya a ranar 12 ga watan Maris 1868, ya zama abin da gwamnatin Cape Colony ta yi niyyar mayar da shi cikin gaggawa. A shekara ta 1879, majalisar dokokin Cape ta tsawaita dokar kiyaye zaman lafiya zuwa Basutoland, da nufin kwance damarar mutanen Basuto. Babban mahimmancin bindigogi a cikin al'ummar Basuto, tare da koke-koke na baya, ya haifar da tawaye ƙarƙashin jagorancin sarakuna Lerotholi da Masopha, wanda ya ɓarke a ranar 13 ga watan Satumba 1880. Da yawa sun fi yawa kuma sun miƙe ta hanyar fashewar wasu tawaye a lokaci guda, Sojojin mulkin mallaka na Cape sun ƙasa cimma gaggarumar nasarar soji.

Bayan da Basutoland ya rikide zuwa yankin Biritaniya a ranar 12 ga Maris 1868, ya zama abin da gwamnatin Cape Colony ta yi niyyar mayar da shi cikin gaggawa. A shekara ta 1879, majalisar dokokin Cape ta tsawaita dokar kiyaye zaman lafiya zuwa Basutoland, da nufin kwance damarar mutanen Basuto. Babban mahimmancin bindigogi a cikin al'ummar Basuto, tare da koke-koke na baya, ya haifar da tawaye karkashin jagorancin sarakuna Lerotholi da Masopha, wanda ya barke a ranar 13 ga Satumba 1880. Da yawa sun fi yawa kuma sun miƙe ta hanyar fashewar wasu tawaye a lokaci guda, Sojojin mulkin mallaka na Cape sun kasa cimma gaggarumar nasarar soji.

items.sourceText: He is the only traditional chief in Zimbabwe to have been accorded the status of being a national hero, and he is buried at the National Heroes' Acre in Harare.[2]

targets.targetText: Shi ne basaraken gargajiya ɗaya tilo a ƙasar Zimbabwe da aka ba shi matsayin gwarzon ƙasa, kuma an binne shi a Acre na Jaruman ƙasa da ke Harare. [1]
Shi ne basaraken gargajiya daya tilo a kasar Zimbabwe da aka ba shi matsayin gwarzon kasa, kuma an binne shi a Acre na Jaruman kasa da ke Harare . [1]

items.sourceText: After independence, Agostinho Neto assigned her to various activities linked to political education linked to the Angolan state, later designating her, in 1979, the chief of the Staff Training Department of the MPLA. She also played a role in the program to send Angolan students overseas.[1] She ultimately saw, that same year, her husband lead the country and become interim president of Angola[5] after Agostinho Neto's death.[3][6]

targets.targetText: Bayan samun 'yancin kai, Agostinho Neto ya ba ta ayyuka daban-daban masu nasaba da ilimin siyasa da ke da alaƙa da ƙasar Angola, daga baya ya nada ta, a cikin 1979, shugabar sashen horar da ma'aikata na MPLA. Ta kuma taka rawa a cikin shirin tura daliban Angola zuwa kasashen ketare. [1] A ƙarshe ta ga, a wannan shekarar, mijinta ya jagoranci ƙasar kuma ya zama shugaban wucin gadi na Angola [2] bayan mutuwar Agostinho Neto. [3] [4]

Bayan samun 'yancin kai, Agostinho Neto ta ba ta ayyuka daban-daban masu nasaba da ilimin siyasa da ke da alaƙa da ƙasar Angola, daga baya ya naɗa ta, a cikin shekarar 1979, shugabar sashen horar da ma'aikata na MPLA. Ta kuma taka rawa a cikin shirin tura ɗaliban Angola zuwa ƙasashen ketare. [1] A ƙarshe ta ga, a wannan shekarar, mijinta ya jagoranci ƙasar kuma ya zama shugaban wucin gadi na Angola [2] bayan mutuwar Agostinho Neto. [3] [4]

items.sourceText: In June 1947, Khama met Ruth Williams, an English clerk at Lloyd's of London.[1] After a year of courtship, they married. The interracial marriage sparked a furore,[3] alarming both the Union of South Africa, which had established legal apartheid (racial segregation), and the tribal elders of the Bamangwato, who were angered he had not chosen one of their women.

targets.targetText: A cikin watan Yuni 1947, Khama ya sadu da Ruth Williams, ma'aikaciyar Ingilishi a Lloyd's na London . [1] Bayan shekara guda suna zawarcinsu, suka yi aure. Auren kabilanci ya haifar da tashin hankali, [1] yana tsoratar da Tarayyar Afirka ta Kudu, wacce ta kafa wariyar launin fata na shari'a (rarrabuwar kabilanci), da kuma dattawan kabilu na Bamangwato, waɗanda suka fusata bai zaɓi ɗaya daga cikin matansu ba.

A cikin watan Yuni 1947, Khama ya haɗu da Ruth Williams, ma'aikaciyar Ingilishi a Lloyd's na London. [1] Bayan shekara guda suna zawarcinsu, suka yi aure. Auren ƙabilu ya haifar da tashin hankali, [1] yana tsoratar da Tarayyar Afirka ta Kudu, wacce ta kafa wariyar launin fata na shari'a (rarrabuwar ƙabilu), da kuma dattawan ƙabilu na Bamangwato, waɗanda suka fusata bai zaɓi ɗaya daga cikin matansu ba.

items.sourceText: Kofi Baako was elected as Member of Parliament for Saltpond in the Central Region of Ghana. He was appointed a Minister of State by Kwame Nkrumah in his colonial government prior to independence. He continued in various capacities throughout the duration of the Nkrumah government. In the earlier years of the government, he was initially a Minister without portfolio prior to being appointed Minister for Information and Broadcasting in August 1957, making him the youngest minister not only in Ghana[2] but in the whole of the British Commonwealth of Nations. He was appointed into office when he was only 29 years old.[3]

targets.targetText: An zaɓi Kofi Baako a matsayin ɗan majalisa mai wakiltar Saltpond a yankin tsakiyar ƙasar Ghana. Kwame Nkrumah ya naɗa shi ƙaramin minista a gwamnatinsa ta mulkin mallaka kafin samun ‘yancin kai. Ya ci gaba da ayyuka daban-daban a tsawon lokacin mulkin Nkrumah. A cikin shekarun farko na gwamnati, da farko ya kasance Minista ba tare da fayil ba kafin a naɗa shi Ministan Yaɗa Labarai da Watsa Labarai a watan Agustan 1957, wanda hakan ya sa ya zama minista mafi ƙarancin shekaru ba kawai a Ghana [1] ba, har ma a cikin ƙasashen Commonwealth na Burtaniya baki ɗaya. An naɗa shi muƙamin ne tun yana ɗan shekara 29 kacal. [2]

An zabi Kofi Baako a matsayin dan majalisa mai wakiltar Saltpond a yankin tsakiyar kasar Ghana. Kwame Nkrumah ya nada shi karamin minista a gwamnatinsa ta mulkin mallaka kafin samun ‘yancin kai. Ya ci gaba da ayyuka daban-daban a tsawon lokacin mulkin Nkrumah . A cikin shekarun farko na gwamnati, da farko ya kasance Minista ba tare da fayil ba kafin a nada shi Ministan Yada Labarai da Watsa Labarai a watan Agustan 1957, wanda hakan ya sa ya zama minista mafi karancin shekaru ba kawai a Ghana [1] ba, har ma a cikin kasashen Commonwealth na Burtaniya baki daya. An nada shi mukamin ne tun yana dan shekara 29 kacal. [2]

items.sourceText: Austin Shaba was one of the leaders of Tanganyika, later Tanzania, from the time the country won independence from Britain on 9 December 1961.

targets.targetText: Austin Shaba yana daya daga cikin shugabannin Tanganyika, daga baya Tanzaniya, daga lokacin da kasar ta sami 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya a ranar 9 ga Disamba 1961.
Austin Shaba yana ɗaya daga cikin shugabannin Tanganyika, daga baya Tanzaniya, daga lokacin da katsar ta sami 'yancin kai daga Birtaniya a ranar 9 ga watan Disamba 1961.

items.sourceText: Ali Amhaouch was born in 1844 and became widely known as a religious figure, of the Darqawa sufi order, who commanded respect across Morocco and was one of the few people capable of bringing peace to warring tribes.[3][4] He made his own prophecies and considered the Jbel Toujjit mountain, the source of the Moulouya River, to be a sacred site.[5] Amhaouch supported the Ait Sukhman tribe against the rival Zaian Confederation in intermittent warfare lasting from 1877 to 1909.[6] Amhaouch was also a key backer of Si Mhand Laârbi, a member of the Alaouite dynasty, against Moroccan government forces in the 1880s.[7] Laârbi's men were able to defeat a force commanded by Moulay Srou, the uncle of Sultan Hassan I, in battle in 1888.[8]

targets.targetText: An haifi Ali Amhaouch a shekara ta 1844 kuma ya zama sananne a matsayin mai addini, na darikar Sufaye na Darqawa, wanda ya ba da umarnin girmamawa a duk fadin kasar Maroko kuma yana daya daga cikin mutane kalilan da ke iya samar da zaman lafiya ga kabilun da ke fada. [1] [2] Ya yi nasa annabce-annabce kuma ya ɗauki dutsen Jbel Toujjit, tushen kogin Moulouya, wuri mai tsarki. [3] Amhaouch ya goyi bayan kabilar Ait Sukhman a kan 'yan adawar Zaian Confederation a yakin da ya dauki tsawon lokaci daga 1877 zuwa 1909. [4] Amhaouch ya kasance babban mai goyon bayan Si Mhand Laârbi, memba na daular Alaouite, a kan sojojin gwamnatin Morocco a cikin 1880s. [5] Mutanen Laârbi sun sami nasarar fatattakar rundunar da Moulay Srou, kawun Sultan Hassan I, ya umarta a yaƙi a shekara ta 1888. [6]

An haifi Ali Amhaouch a shekara ta 1844 kuma ya zama sananne a matsayin mai addini, na ɗarikar Sufaye na Darqawa, wanda ya ba da umarnin girmamawa a duk faɗin ƙasar Maroko kuma yana ɗaya daga cikin mutane kalilan da ke iya samar da zaman lafiya ga ƙabilun da ke faɗa. [1] [2] Ya yi nasa annabce-annabce kuma ya ɗauki dutsen Jbel Toujjit, tushen kogin Moulouya, wuri mai tsarki. [3] Amhaouch ya goyi bayan ƙabilar Ait Sukhman a kan 'yan adawar Zaian Confederation a yakin da ya ɗauki tsawon lokaci daga shekarun 1877 zuwa 1909. [4] Amhaouch ya kasance babban mai goyon bayan Si Mhand Laârbi, memba na daular Alaouite, a kan sojojin gwamnatin Morocco a cikin shekarar 1880s. [5] Mutanen Laârbi sun sami nasarar fatattakar rundunar da Moulay Srou, kawun Sultan Hassan I, ya umarta a yaƙi a shekara ta 1888. [6]

items.sourceText: In the war against the Derg regime the GPLM would ally itself with the Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF), joining the joint anti-Derg offensive in western Ethiopia in 1989.[1][10] However, the alliance had an uneasy start. The GPLM discourse on 'Highlanders' differed from the other ethno-nationalist movements, whose discourse focused specifically on Amhara domination.[3]

targets.targetText: A yakin da ake yi da gwamnatin Dergi jam'iyyar GPLM za ta hada kai da jam'iyyar People's Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF) ta kasar Habasha, tare da shiga yakin da ake yi na yaki da Dergi a yammacin kasar Habasha a shekarar 1989. [1] [2] Koyaya, ƙawancen ya fara rashin jin daɗi. Jawabin GPLM akan 'Highlanders' ya sha bamban da sauran kungiyoyin 'yan kabilanci, wadanda jawabinsu ya mayar da hankali musamman kan mamayar Amhara. [3]

A yakin da ake yi da gwamnatin Dergi jam'iyyar GPLM za ta hada kai da jam'iyyar People's Revolutionary Democratic Front (EPRDF) ta ƙasar Habasha, tare da shiga yakin da ake yi na yaki da Dergi a yammacin ƙasar Habasha a shekarar 1989. [1] [2] Koyaya, ƙawancen ya fara rashin jin daɗi. Jawabin GPLM akan 'Highlanders' ya sha bamban da sauran kungiyoyin 'yan ƙabilu, wadanda jawabinsu ya mayar da hankali musamman kan mamayar Amhara. [3]

items.sourceText: On 9 December 1977, the Ethiopian garrison launched a strong counterattack against the EPLF positions on the coastal lowlands near Mai Antal, however this attack ended in failure and the Ethiopians were forced to retreat to Massawa, allowing the EPLF to take control of Dogali. On 21st December 1977, the EPLF managed to overrun the city's main defensive perimeter, forcing the Ethiopian defenders to pull back to the Abd-el Kader and Gherar peninsulas and the islands, where they were protected by naval support.[1][1] On December 23rd, the EPLF launched a massive frontal assault on the final Ethiopian positions on the peninsulas. When the EPLF fighters attempted to march through the evaporation ponds of the Salina saltworks, the Ethiopian naval artillery initiated a devastating slaughter that killed over 2,000 EPLF fighters and wounded 400. The EPLF was forced to pull back for a long siege, before completely withdrawing to Semhar in July 1978.[5][1]

targets.targetText: A ranar 9 ga watan Disamban shekarar 1977, sojojin Habasha sun kaddamar da wani gagarumin farmaki kan mayakan EPLF a lungu da sako na gabar teku da ke kusa da Mai Antal, duk da haka wannan harin ya kawo karshe ba tare da nasara ba, aka tilasta wa 'yan Habasha komawa Massawa, lamarin da ya baiwa EPLF damar karbe ikon Dogali. A ranar 21 ga Disamban 1977, EPLF ta yi nasarar mamaye babban birnin na tsaro, lamarin da ya tilasta wa masu tsaron Habasha komawa yankin Abd-el Kader da Gherar da tsibiran, inda aka ba su kariya daga tallafin ruwa. [1] A ranar 23 ga Disamba, EPLF ta kaddamar da wani gagarumin hari na gaba a kan matsayi na karshe na Habasha a tsibirin. A lokacin da mayakan na EPLF suka yi yunkurin tafiya ta cikin tafkunan da aka kwashe na Salina saltworks, sojojin ruwa na Habasha sun kaddamar da wani mummunan kisa wanda ya kashe mayakan EPLF sama da 2,000 tare da raunata 400. An tilastawa EPLF ja da baya na dogon zango, kafin daga bisani ta fice zuwa Semhar a watan Yuli 1978. [2]

A ranar 21 ga watan Disamban 1977, EPLF ta yi nasarar mamaye babban birnin na tsaro, lamarin da ya tilasta wa masu tsaron Habasha komawa yankin Abd-el Kader da Gherar da tsibiran, inda aka ba su kariya daga tallafin ruwa. An tilastawa EPLF ja da baya na dogon zango, kafin daga bisani ta fice zuwa Semhar a watan Yuli 1978. [2]

items.sourceText: Then he was elected Municipal Councillor and Deputy Mayor of Tiaret from 1951 to 1954. He became secretary of the UDMA journalist and a daily Oran in August 1953, and moderated the region of Tiaret an awareness campaign on the situation in the country and local elections, as well as arrange for three Tagdempt days, the congress of the youth of UDMA.[2]

targets.targetText: Sannan aka zabe shi dan majalisar karamar hukuma kuma mataimakin magajin garin Tiaret daga 1951 zuwa 1954. Ya zama sakataren kungiyar UDMA dan jarida kuma jaridar Oran ta kullum a watan Agustan 1953, kuma ya jagoranci yankin Tiaret wajen gangamin wayar da kan al'ummar kasar nan da zabukan kananan hukumomi, tare da shirya kwanaki uku na Tagdemp, taron majalisar matasan UDMA. [1]

Sannan aka zaɓe shi ɗan majalisar ƙaramar hukuma kuma mataimakin magajin garin Tiaret daga shekarun 1951 zuwa 1954. Ya zama sakataren kungiyar UDMA ɗan jarida kuma jaridar Oran ta kullum a watan Agustan 1953, kuma ya jagoranci yankin Tiaret wajen gangamin wayar da kan al'ummar ƙasar nan da zaɓukan ƙananan hukumomi, tare da shirya kwanaki uku na Tagdemp, taron majalisar matasan UDMA. [1]

items.sourceText: As a lecturer at the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Lisbon, Helena coordinated an extracurricular course on sutures organised by students, the ‘AEFMUL Sutures Workshop’, which she continued to coordinate on a pro-bono basis even after she retired.[6] She was a member of the College of Surgery Speciality of the Portuguese Medical Association from 1993[2][3] and also kept in constant contact and collaborated with the Cape Verdean Medical Association and the country's health system.[7] She was also a member of the AEFMUL's Medical Association.

targets.targetText: A matsayinta na malami a tsangayar koyar da aikin likitanci ta Jami'ar Lisbon, Helena ta hada wani kwas na musamman kan dinkin da dalibai suka shirya, 'AEFMUL Sutures Workshop', wanda ta ci gaba da hadawa bisa tsarin bono ko da bayan ta yi ritaya. [1] Ta kasance memba a kwalejin tiyata ta kwashe ta hanyar kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Portugal daga 1993 [2] [3] kuma suna aiki a cikin saduwa ta Cape Verdean da tsarin kiwon lafiya na kasar. [4] Ta kasance mamba a kungiyar likitoci ta AEFMUL.

A matsayinta na malama a tsangayar koyar da aikin likitanci ta Jami'ar Lisbon, Helena ta haɗa wani kwas na musamman kan ɗinkin da ɗalibai suka shirya, 'AEFMUL Sutures Workshop', wanda ta ci gaba da haɗawa bisa tsarin bono ko da bayan ta yi ritaya. [1] Ta kasance memba a kwalejin tiyata ta kwashe ta hanyar kungiyar kwallon kafa ta Portugal daga shekarun 1993 [2] [3] kuma suna aiki a cikin haɗuwa ta Cape Verdean da tsarin kiwon lafiya na ƙasar. [4] Ta kasance mamba a kungiyar likitoci ta AEFMUL.

items.sourceText: Chapter Two covered the specifics of Algeria's independence, and what its cooperation with France would entail. It declared that upon a vote of self-determination, the Algerian State would in its own rights exercise full and complete sovereignty.[1] This section also guaranteed the interests of France in exchange for France's provision of technical and cultural assistance, and social and economic aid. These interests referred specifically to the exercise of mining titles granted by France, preference in granting new mining titles to French companies, and the purchase of Saharan hydrocarbons to be conducted in francs.

targets.targetText: Babi na biyu ya tabo batun ‘yancin kai na Aljeriya, da abin da hadin gwiwarta da Faransa zai kunsa. Ta bayyana cewa, bayan kada kuri'ar cin gashin kai, kasar Aljeriya za ta gudanar da cikakken 'yancin kanta. [1] Har ila yau, wannan sashe ya tabbatar da muradun Faransa don musaya ga samar da taimakon fasaha da al'adu na Faransa, da taimakon zamantakewa da tattalin arziki. Wadannan bukatu sun yi tsokaci ne musamman kan yadda ake gudanar da ayyukan hakar ma'adinai da Faransa ta ba da, fifiko wajen bai wa kamfanonin kasar Faransa sabbin mukaman hakar ma'adinai, da kuma sayan iskar gas na Saharan da za a gudanar da shi a cikin francs.

Ta bayyana cewa, bayan kaɗa kuri'ar cin gashin kai, ƙasar Aljeriya za ta gudanar da cikakken samun 'yancin kanta. [1] Har ila yau, wannan sashe ya tabbatar da muradun Faransa don musaya ga samar da taimakon fasaha da al'adu na Faransa, da taimakon zamantakewa da tattalin arziki. Waɗannan buƙatu sun yi tsokaci ne musamman kan yadda ake gudanar da ayyukan hakar ma'adinai da Faransa ta ba da, fifiko wajen bai wa kamfanonin ƙasar Faransa sabbin muƙaman hakar ma'adinai, da kuma sayan iskar gas na Saharan da za a gudanar da shi a cikin francs.

items.sourceText: The cause of the raid was the a theft committed against the entourage of Ferhat ben Said, a local leader in South Constantinois who was seeking common cause with France against Ahmad Bey, though none of the people killed in the raid were responsible for the theft but were instead thought by the French to have been from the same tribe.[6]

targets.targetText: Dalilin harin dai shi ne satar da aka yi wa tawagar Ferhat ben Said, wani shugaban yankin Kudancin Constantinois wanda ke neman hadin kan kasar Faransa kan Ahmad Bey, duk da cewa babu daya daga cikin mutanen da aka kashe a harin da ya dauki alhakin satar, amma Faransawa sun dauka cewa ya fito daga kabila daya. [1]

Dalilin harin dai shi ne satar da aka yi wa tawagar Ferhat ben Said, wani shugaban yankin Kudancin Constantinois wanda ke neman haɗin kan ƙasar Faransa kan Ahmad Bey, duk da cewa babu ɗaya daga cikin mutanen da aka kashe a harin da ya ɗauki alhakin satar, amma Faransawa sun ɗauka cewa ya fito daga ƙabila ɗaya. [1]

items.sourceText: Born in Uzumba in Mashonaland East, Nyamubaya left secondary school at the age of 15 to join the Zimbabwe African National Liberation Army (ZANLA) during its insurgency against Rhodesia's predominantly white government.[5] She travelled to a ZANLA training camp in Mozambique, believing she could "change something".[6] During the Rhodesian Bush War, she was one of the few female field operation commanders; although after the war, she felt let down by the way demobilised guerrillas were treated. She went on to become Secretary for Education at the first conference of the Zimbabwe African National Union (ZANU) Women’s League.[6]

targets.targetText: An haife shi a garin Uzumba da ke yankin Mashonaland ta Gabas, Nyamubaya ya bar makarantar sakandare yana da shekaru 15 ya shiga kungiyar ‘yantar da ‘yancin kai ta Zimbabwe (ZANLA) a lokacin da take tada kayar baya da gwamnatin Rhodesia wadda galibin farar fata ne. [1] Ta yi tafiya zuwa sansanin horar da ZANLA da ke Mozambique, ta yi imanin cewa za ta iya "canza wani abu". [2] A lokacin Yaƙin Bush na Rhodesian, ta kasance ɗaya daga cikin ƴan kwamandojin fage mata; ko da yake bayan yakin, ta ji takaicin yadda ake yi wa ‘yan daba da aka kora. Ta ci gaba da zama Sakatariyar Ilimi a taron farko na kungiyar Mata ta Afirka ta Zimbabwe (ZANU). [2]

An haife ta a garin Uzumba da ke yankin Mashonaland ta Gabas, Nyamubaya ta bar makarantar sakandare tana da shekaru 15 yia shiga kungiyar ‘yantar da ‘yancin kai ta Zimbabwe (ZANLA) a lokacin da take tada kayar baya da gwamnatin Rhodesia wadda galibin farar fata ne. [1] Ta yi tafiya zuwa sansanin horar da ZANLA da ke Mozambique, ta yi imanin cewa za ta iya "canza wani abu". [2] A lokacin Yaƙin Bush na Rhodesian, ta kasance ɗaya daga cikin ƴan kwamandojin fagen mata; ko da yake bayan yakin, ta ji takaicin yadda ake yi wa ‘yan daba da aka kora. Ta ci gaba da zama Sakatariyar Ilimi a taron farko na kungiyar Mata ta Afirka ta Zimbabwe (ZANU). [2]

targets.targetText: A cikin wakar ta mai suna 'Gabatarwa' da ta sake bude Kan hanya, Nyamubaya ta bayyana kudurinta na ci gaba da yaki da zalunci bayan kawo karshen yakin daji: [1] [2]
A cikin wakar ta mai suna 'Gabatarwa' da ta On the Road agai, Nyamubaya ta bayyana kudurinta na ci gaba da yaki da zalunci bayan kawo ƙarshen yakin daji: [1] [2]

items.sourceText: In 1884, Spain set up a colony on the Rio de Oro bay (Villa Cisneros, current day Dakhla). Despite considering the entire territory of current-day Western Sahara as its possession, beyond a handful of coastal settlements, Spain did not have effective control over the desert hinterland due to its harsh climatic conditions and the presence of small, nomadic groups, among whom intertribal conflicts were frequent.[1]

targets.targetText: A cikin 1884, Spain ta kafa wani yanki a kan tekun Rio de Oro (Villa Cisneros, ranar Dakhla na yanzu). Duk da la'akari da daukacin yankin yammacin Sahara na yau a matsayin mallakarta, bayan wasu 'yan matsugunan da ke gabar teku, Spain ba ta da wani tasiri mai inganci a kan yankin hamada saboda tsananin yanayin da take ciki da kuma kasancewar kananan kungiyoyin makiyaya, wadanda ake yawan samun rikice-rikicen kabilanci a tsakanin su. [1]

A cikin shekarar 1884, Spain ta kafa wani yanki a kan tekun Rio de Oro (Villa Cisneros, ranar Dakhla na yanzu). Duk da la'akari da ɗaukacin yankin yammacin Sahara na yau a matsayin mallakarta, bayan wasu 'yan matsugunan da ke gaɓar teku, Spain ba ta da wani tasiri mai inganci a kan yankin hamada saboda tsananin yanayin da take ciki da kuma kasancewar ƙananan kungiyoyin makiyaya, waɗanda ake yawan samun rikice-rikicen ƙabilanci a tsakanin su. [1]

items.sourceText: In 1977, when the Osman II government was formed, Aherdane agreed to take part in it and became Minister of State in charge of posts and telecommunications, a position he would keep in the Bouabid I government. In 1981, he became Minister of State in charge of Cooperation in the Bouabid II government.[1]

targets.targetText: A shekara ta 1977, lokacin da aka kafa gwamnatin Osman II, Aherdane ya amince ya shiga cikinta kuma ya zama ƙaramin minista mai kula da ayyuka da sadarwa, muƙamin da zai riƙe a gwamnatin Bouabid na ɗaya. A shekarar 1981, ya zama ƙaramin minista mai kula da haɗin gwiwa a gwamnatin Bouabid II. [1]

A shekara ta 1977, lokacin da aka kafa gwamnatin Osman II, Aherdane ya amince ya shiga cikinta kuma ya zama karamin minista mai kula da ayyuka da sadarwa, mukamin da zai rike a gwamnatin Bouabid na daya. A shekarar 1981, ya zama karamin minista mai kula da hadin gwiwa a gwamnatin Bouabid II. [1]

items.sourceText: James Beauttah was sentenced to prison for 2 years in February 1952 after being arrested with regards to his political activities in Murang'a where he had settled in 1936, a few years after leaving colonial service. While still serving this sentence, he was sentenced to serve another 6-year sentence for his alleged links to the Mau Mau movement and its operations in Central Kenya.[1]

targets.targetText: An yanke wa James Beauttah hukuncin daurin shekaru 2 a gidan yari a watan Fabrairun 1952 bayan da aka kama shi kan harkokin siyasarsa a Murang'a inda ya zauna a shekara ta 1936, 'yan shekaru bayan barin mulkin mallaka. Yayin da yake ci gaba da wannan hukuncin, an yanke masa hukuncin daurin shekaru 6 saboda zarginsa da alaka da kungiyar Mau Mau da ayyukanta a tsakiyar kasar Kenya. [1]

An yanke wa James Beauttah hukuncin ɗaurin shekaru 2 a gidan yari a watan Fabrairun 1952 bayan da aka kama shi kan harkokin siyasarsa a Murang'a inda ya zauna a shekara ta 1936, 'yan shekaru bayan barin 'yan mulkin mallaka. Yayin da yake ci gaba da wannan hukuncin, an yanke masa hukuncin ɗaurin shekaru 6 saboda zarginsa da alaka da kungiyar Mau Mau da ayyukanta a tsakiyar ƙasar Kenya. [1]

items.sourceText: Oneko was one of the six freedom fighters arrested by the British colonial government in Kapenguria in 1952. Other members of the group, known as "Kapenguria Six" were Jomo Kenyatta, Paul Ngei, Bildad Kaggia, Kungu Karumba and Fred Kubai. They were arrested for allegedly being linked with the Mau Mau rebellion movement.[3] Oneko was charged as "Accused No.3." After they were convicted, all six appealed the conviction.

targets.targetText: Oneko na ɗaya daga cikin masu fafutukar 'yanci guda shida da gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta Burtaniya ta kama a Kapenguria a shekarar 1952. Sauran mambobin kungiyar da aka fi sani da "Kapenguria Six" sun haɗa da Jomo Kenyatta, Paul Ngei, Bildad Kaggia, Kungu Karumba da kuma Fred Kubai. An kama su ne bisa zargin suna da alaka da ƙungiyar tawaye ta Mau Mau. [1] An tuhumi Oneko a matsayin "Wanda ake tuhuma mai lamba 3." Bayan an same su da laifi, dukkansu shida sun ɗaukaka ƙara kan hukuncin.

Oneko na daya daga cikin masu fafutukar 'yanci guda shida da gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta Burtaniya ta kama a Kapenguria a shekarar 1952. Sauran mambobin kungiyar da aka fi sani da " Kapenguria Six " sun hada da Jomo Kenyatta, Paul Ngei, Bildad Kaggia, Kungu Karumba da kuma Fred Kubai . An kama su ne bisa zargin suna da alaka da kungiyar tawaye ta Mau Mau . [1] An tuhumi Oneko a matsayin "Wanda ake tuhuma mai lamba 3." Bayan an same su da laifi, dukkansu shida sun daukaka kara kan hukuncin.

items.sourceText: In 1999, an old Oujda clan stalwart, the former foreign minister Abdelaziz Bouteflika (who, coincidentally, was born in Oujda), made an unexpected comeback, winning the Algerian presidential elections. He had been convicted for corruption in 1981, soon after Chadli's takeover, in what was viewed as one of the most important steps of de-Boumédiènisation, and in 1983 he had gone into exile. Bouteflika was reelected for a second term in 2004, and then, for a third term, in 2009 and a fourth term in 2014.[5]

targets.targetText: A shekarar 1999, wani tsohon dan kabilar Oujda, tsohon ministan harkokin wajen kasar Abdelaziz Bouteflika (wanda, aka haife shi a birnin Oujda, ba zato ba tsammani), ya yi nasarar lashe zaben shugaban kasar Aljeriya. An same shi da laifin cin hanci da rashawa a shekarar 1981, jim kadan bayan da Chadli ya kwace mulki, a wani mataki da ake kallo a matsayin daya daga cikin muhimman matakai na de-Boumédiènisation, kuma a shekara ta 1983 ya tafi gudun hijira. An sake zaben Bouteflika a wa'adi na biyu a shekara ta 2004, sannan, a karo na uku, a shekarar 2009 da wa'adi na hudu a 2014. [1]

A shekarar 1999, wani tsohon ɗan ƙabilar Oujda, tsohon ministan harkokin wajen ƙasar Abdelaziz Bouteflika (wanda, aka haife shi a birnin Oujda, ba zato ba tsammani), ya yi nasarar lashe zaɓen shugaban ƙasar Aljeriya. An same shi da laifin cin hanci da rashawa a shekarar 1981, jim kaɗan bayan da Chadli ya kwace mulki, a wani mataki da ake kallo a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin muhimman matakai na de-Boumédiènisation, kuma a shekara ta 1983 ya tafi gudun hijira. An sake zaɓen Bouteflika a wa'adi na biyu a shekara ta 2004, sannan, a karo na uku, a shekarar 2009 da wa'adi na huɗu a shekarar 2014. [1]

items.sourceText: In early May 1957, Commando 41 (‘Ali Khodja’) of the Algerian National Liberation Front (FLN) routed a Dragoon unit, killing 60 men while only losing 7 men themselves. Roughly two weeks later, on 21 May, the same unit ambushed a detachment of the 5th Algerian Tirailleur Battalion near Médéa. A captain and 15 tirailleurs were killed in the engagement, while others where persuaded to defect, the FLN only lost 1 killed and 2 wounded.[3]

targets.targetText: A farkon watan Mayu na shekara ta 1957, Commando 41 ('Ali Khodja") na Algeria National Liberation Front (FLN) ya kori ƙungiyar Dragoon, ya kashe mutane 60 yayin da kawai suka rasa mutane 7 da kansu. Kimanin makonni biyu bayan haka, a ranar 21 ga Mayu, wannan rukunin ya yi wa wani sashi na 5th Algerian Tirailleur Battalion kusa da Medea kwanton bauna. An kashe wani kyaftin da 15 tirailleurs a cikin gwagwarmayar, yayin da wasu suka shawo kansu su yi fice, FLN kawai ta rasa 1 da aka kashe da 2 da suka ji rauni.

A farkon watan Mayu na shekara ta 1957, Commando 41 ('Ali Khodja") na Algeria National Liberation Front (FLN) ya kori ƙungiyar Dragoon, ya kashe mutane 60 yayin da kawai suka rasa mutane 7 da kansu.
