Kimanin makonni biyu bayan haka, a ranar 21 ga watan Mayu, wannan ruƙunin ya yi wa wani sashi na 5th Algerian Tirailleur Battalion kusa da Medea kwanton ɓauna. An kashe wani kyaftin da 15 tirailleurs a cikin gwagwarmayar, yayin da wasu suka shawo kansu su yi fice, FLN kawai ta rasa 1 da aka kashe da 2 da suka ji rauni.

items.sourceText: Despite their initial successes, the ten Fellaghas got cornered by the numerically superior, and far better armed French units. Despite this, they resisted until about 5:15 pm. By the end of the battle 7 fellaghas died, two were wounded, and one was able to escape, albeit wounded.[7] One of the killed was Mourad Didouche himself.[8][9][10]

targets.targetText: Duk da nasarorin da suka samu na farko, Fellaghas goma sun sami ci gaba ta hanyar manyan lambobi, kuma mafi kyawun rukunin Faransa masu dauke da makamai. Duk da haka sun yi turjiya har misalin karfe 5:15 na yamma. A karshen yakin ‘yan bindiga 7 sun mutu, biyu sun jikkata, daya kuma ya iya tserewa, ko da yake ya samu rauni. [1] Daya daga cikin wadanda aka kashe shi ne Mourad Didouche da kansa. [2] [3] [4]

Duk da nasarorin da suka samu na farko, Fellaghas goma sun sami ci gaba ta hanyar manyan lambobi, kuma mafi kyawun rukunin Faransa masu ɗauke da makamai. Duk da haka sun yi turjiya har misalin karfe 5:15 na yamma. A ƙarshen yakin ‘yan bindiga 7 sun mutu, biyu sun jikkata, ɗaya kuma ya iya tserewa, ko da yake ya samu rauni. [1] Ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda aka kashe shi ne Mourad Didouchppe da kansa. [2] [3] [4]

items.sourceText: For his part in the 1924 Khartoum revolt Latif was sentenced to 7 years imprisonment. Following the completion of his sentence he was not released, but transferred to a mental hospital in Cairo, where he died years later in 1948.[5]

targets.targetText: A nasa bangare a cikin tawayen Khartoum a 1924 an yanke wa Latif hukuncin daurin shekaru 7 a gidan yari. Bayan kammala hukuncin da aka yanke masa ba a sake shi ba, amma an mayar da shi asibitin tabin hankali a birnin Alkahira, inda ya rasu bayan shekaru a 1948. [1]

A nasa ɓangare a cikin tawayen Khartoum a shekarar 1924 an yanke wa Latif hukuncin ɗaurin daurin shekaru 7 a gidan yari. Bayan kammala hukuncin da aka yanke masa ba a sake shi ba, amma an mayar da shi asibitin tabin hankali a birnin Alkahira, inda ya rasu bayan shekaru a 1948. [1]

items.sourceText: Mehdi Bennouna was born in Tetouan, Morocco. His father was Hajj Abdelsalam, the legendary "father of Moroccan nationalism". He left Morocco for Nablus in Palestine at the age of eleven, without his parents, and began high school in 1929 at the Najah School.

targets.targetText: An haifi Mehdi Bennouna a Tetouan, Morocco. Mahaifinsa shi ne Hajj Abdelsalam, mashahurin "uban kishin ƙasa na Moroko". Ya bar Maroko zuwa Nablus a ƙasar Falasɗinu yana ɗan shekara sha ɗaya, ba tare da iyayensa ba, ya fara makarantar sakandare a shekarar 1929 a makarantar Najah.

An haifi Mehdi Bennouna a Tetouan, Morocco. Mahaifinsa shi ne Hajj Abdelsalam, mashahurin "uban kishin kasa na Moroko". Ya bar Maroko zuwa Nablus a kasar Falasdinu yana dan shekara sha daya, ba tare da iyayensa ba, ya fara makarantar sakandare a shekarar 1929 a makarantar Najah.

items.sourceText: Leftist military officers overthrew the Caetano government in Portugal in the Carnation Revolution on 25 April 1974. The MPLA, FNLA and UNITA all negotiated peace agreements with the transitional Portuguese government and began to fight one another for control of the Angolan capital, Luanda, and for the rest the country. Holden Roberto, Agostinho Neto, and Jonas Savimbi met in Bukavu, Zaire, in July and agreed to negotiate with the Portuguese as one political entity. They met again in Mombasa, Kenya, on 5 January 1975, agreed to stop fighting one another, and outlined a joint negotiating position on a new constitution. They met for a third time in Alvor, Portugal from January 10–15 and signed what became known as the Alvor Agreement.[1]

targets.targetText: Jami'an soji na hagu sun hambarar da gwamnatin Caetano a Portugal a cikin juyin juya halin Carnation a ranar 25 ga watan Afrilu 1974. MPLA, FNLA da UNITA duk sun yi shawarwari kan yarjejeniyoyin zaman lafiya da gwamnatin rikon kwarya ta Portugal tare da fara fafatawa da juna domin samun iko da babban birnin Angola, Luanda, da ma sauran ƙasar. Holden Roberto, Agostinho Neto, da Jonas Savimbi sun haɗu a Bukavu, Zaire, a watan Yuli kuma sun amince su yi shawarwari tare da Portuguese a matsayin ƙungiya ɗaya na siyasa. Sun sake haɗuwa a birnin Mombasa na ƙasar Kenya a ranar 5 ga watan Janairun 1975, sun amince su daina faɗa da juna, tare da bayyana matsayar yin shawarwarin haɗin gwiwa kan sabon kundin tsarin mulki. Sun haɗu a karo na uku a Alvor, Portugal daga watan Janairu 10–15 kuma sun sanya hannu kan abin da aka sani da Yarjejeniyar Alvor. [1]

Jami'an soji na hagu sun hambarar da gwamnatin Caetano a Portugal a cikin juyin juya halin Carnation a ranar 25 ga Afrilu 1974. MPLA, FNLA da UNITA duk sun yi shawarwari kan yarjejeniyoyin zaman lafiya da gwamnatin rikon kwarya ta Portugal tare da fara fafatawa da juna domin samun iko da babban birnin Angola, Luanda, da ma sauran kasar. Holden Roberto, Agostinho Neto, da Jonas Savimbi sun hadu a Bukavu, Zaire, a watan Yuli kuma sun amince su yi shawarwari tare da Portuguese a matsayin ƙungiya ɗaya na siyasa. Sun sake haduwa a birnin Mombasa na kasar Kenya a ranar 5 ga Janairun 1975, sun amince su daina fada da juna, tare da bayyana matsayar yin shawarwarin hadin gwiwa kan sabon kundin tsarin mulki. Sun hadu a karo na uku a Alvor, Portugal daga Janairu 10–15 kuma sun sanya hannu kan abin da aka sani da Yarjejeniyar Alvor. [1]

items.sourceText: The agreement did not establish a mechanism to verify the number of fighters from each force. All three parties soon had forces greater in number than the Portuguese did, which endangered the colonial power's ability to keep the peace. Factional fighting resumed and reached new heights as foreign supplies of arms increased. In February, the Cuban government warned the Eastern Bloc that the Alvor Agreement would not succeed. By spring, the African National Congress and SWAPO echoed Cuba's warning.[6] Leaders of the Organization of African Unity organised a peace conference, moderated by Kenyan President Jomo Kenyatta, with the three leaders in Nakuru, Kenya, in June. The Angolan leaders issued the Nakuru Declaration on 21 June,[7] agreeing to abide by the provisions of the Alvor Agreement while they acknowledged that a mutual lack of trust had led to violence.[3]

targets.targetText: Yarjejeniyar ba ta samar da hanyar tabbatar da adadin mayakan daga kowace runduna ba. Ba da ɗewa ba dukkan ɓangarorin uku suka sami dakaru da suka fi na Portugal yawansu, wanda hakan ya yi barazana ga ikon mulkin mallaka na kiyaye zaman lafiya. Yakin ɓangaranci ya sake komawa inda ya kai wani matsayi yayin da kayan yaki na ƙasashen waje ke karuwa. A cikin watan Fabrairu, gwamnatin Cuba ta gargaɗi kungiyar Gabashin ƙasar cewa yarjejeniyar Alvor ba za ta yi nasara ba. A lokacin bazara, Majalisar Wakilan Afirka da SWAPO sun yi na'am da gargaɗin Cuba. [1] Shugabannin kungiyar haɗin kan Afrika sun shirya taron zaman lafiya, wanda shugaban ƙasar Kenya Jomo Kenyatta ya jagoranta, tare da shugabannin uku a Nakuru, Kenya, a watan Yuni. Shugabannin Angolan sun ba da sanarwar Nakuru a ranar 21 ga watan Yuni, [2] sun amince da yin biyayya ga tanadin yarjejeniyar Alvor yayin da suka yarda cewa rashin amincewa da juna ya haifar da tashin hankali. [3]

Yarjejeniyar ba ta samar da hanyar tabbatar da adadin mayakan daga kowace runduna ba. Ba da da ewa ba dukkan bangarorin uku suka sami dakaru da suka fi na Portugal yawansu, wanda hakan ya yi barazana ga ikon mulkin mallaka na kiyaye zaman lafiya. Yakin bangaranci ya sake komawa inda ya kai wani matsayi yayin da kayan yaki na kasashen waje ke karuwa. A cikin watan Fabrairu, gwamnatin Cuba ta gargadi kungiyar Gabashin kasar cewa yarjejeniyar Alvor ba za ta yi nasara ba. A lokacin bazara, Majalisar Wakilan Afirka da SWAPO sun yi na'am da gargaɗin Cuba. [1] Shugabannin kungiyar hadin kan Afrika sun shirya taron zaman lafiya, wanda shugaban kasar Kenya Jomo Kenyatta ya jagoranta, tare da shugabannin uku a Nakuru, Kenya, a watan Yuni. Shugabannin Angolan sun ba da sanarwar Nakuru a ranar 21 ga Yuni, [2] sun amince da yin biyayya ga tanadin yarjejeniyar Alvor yayin da suka yarda cewa rashin amincewa da juna ya haifar da tashin hankali. [3]

items.sourceText: Many analysts have criticised the transitional government in Portugal for the violence that followed the Alvor Agreement in terms of a lack of concern for internal Angolan security and favoritism towards the MPLA. High Commissioner Coutinho, one of the seven leaders of the National Salvation Junta, openly distributed ex-Portuguese arms and military equipment to MPLA forces.[1][8][3] Edward Mulcahy, Acting Assistant Secretary of State for African Affairs in the United States State Department, told Tom Killoran, the US Consul General in Angola, to congratulate the PMC, rather than the FNLA and the UNITA on their own and Coutinho, for Portugal's "untiring and protracted efforts" at a peace agreement.[3][9] US Secretary of State Henry Kissinger considered any government involving the pro-Soviet, communist MPLA, to be unacceptable, but US President Gerald Ford oversaw heightened aid to the FNLA.[10]

targets.targetText: Manazarta da dama sun soki gwamnatin riƙon kwarya a ƙasar Portugal da tashe-tashen hankula da suka biyo bayan yarjejeniyar Alvor dangane da rashin nuna damuwa ga tsaron cikin gida na Angola da kuma nuna kyama ga jam'iyyar MPLA. Babban Kwamishina Coutinho, ɗaya daga cikin jagororin kungiyar ceto ta ƙasa bakwai, ya fito fili ya raba wa dakarun MPLA makamai da kayan aikin soja na tsohon ɗan Portugal. [1] [2] [3] Edward Mulcahy, Mukaddashin Mataimakin Sakataren Harkokin Wajen Amurka kan Harkokin Afirka a Ma'aikatar Harkokin Wajen Amurka, ya gaya wa Tom Killoran, ƙaramin jakadan Amurka a Angola, ya taya PMC murna, maimakon FNLA da UNITA da kansu da kuma Coutinho, saboda "kokarin da Portugal ta yi ba tare da gajiyawa ba" a yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya. [3] [4] Sakataren harkokin wajen Amurka Henry Kissinger ya yi la'akari da duk wata gwamnati da ta shafi 'yan Soviet masu ra'ayin gurguzu, MPLA, a matsayin abin da ba za a amince da su ba, amma shugaban Amurka Gerald Ford ya sa ido kan kara ba da taimako ga FNLA. [5]

Manazarta da dama sun soki gwamnatin rikon kwarya a kasar Portugal da tashe-tashen hankula da suka biyo bayan yarjejeniyar Alvor dangane da rashin nuna damuwa ga tsaron cikin gida na Angola da kuma nuna kyama ga jam'iyyar MPLA. Babban Kwamishina Coutinho, daya daga cikin jagororin kungiyar ceto ta kasa bakwai, ya fito fili ya raba wa dakarun MPLA makamai da kayan aikin soja na tsohon dan Portugal. [1] [2] [3] Edward Mulcahy, Mukaddashin Mataimakin Sakataren Harkokin Wajen Amurka kan Harkokin Afirka a Ma'aikatar Harkokin Wajen Amurka, ya gaya wa Tom Killoran, karamin jakadan Amurka a Angola, ya taya PMC murna, maimakon FNLA da UNITA da kansu da kuma Coutinho, saboda "kokarin da Portugal ta yi ba tare da gajiyawa ba" a yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya. [3] [4] Sakataren harkokin wajen Amurka Henry Kissinger ya yi la'akari da duk wata gwamnati da ta shafi 'yan Soviet masu ra'ayin gurguzu, MPLA, a matsayin abin da ba za a amince da su ba, amma shugaban Amurka Gerald Ford ya sa ido kan kara ba da taimako ga FNLA. [5]

items.sourceText: The territory of the Congo was created by Belgian colonial rulers that borrowed the name used by the historic Kongo Kingdom. At the time there was no concept of a Congolese people however, as the people living within the region were divided into ethnic groups.[1] Congolese nationalism first erupted in 1959 during riots against Belgian colonial rule.[1] Attempts to solidify the country quickly collapsed after independence when Mobutu Sese Seko rebelled against the government of Patrice Lumumba in 1960.[1] After several years in power Mobutu renamed the country Zaire in 1971 and sought to define and forge a united Zairian nation through his policy of authenticity, that included efforts to purge Christianity from Zaire – for it was deemed colonial.[1] There have been critics of Zairian/Congolese nationalism who believe that it was a manipulative ploy by Mobutu to gain legitimacy for his rule, though this criticism has been challenged by the persistence of a post-Mobutu nationalism after the fall of Mobutu from power and the renaming of the country back to the Democratic Republic of Congo.[1]

targets.targetText: Sarakuna 'yan mulkin mallaka na Belgium ne suka kirkiro yankin Kongo waɗanda suka ari sunan da masarautar Kongo mai tarihi ke amfani da ita. A lokacin babu wani ra'ayi na al'ummar Kongo duk da haka, saboda mutanen da ke zaune a yankin sun rabu zuwa ƙabilu. [1] Kishin ƙasa a Kongo ya fara ɓarkewa ne a shekara ta 1959 a lokacin tarzomar adawa da 'yan mulkin mallaka na Belgium. [1] Yunkurin tabbatar da ƙasar ya ruguje cikin sauri bayan samun 'yancin kai lokacin da Mobutu Sese Seko ya yi tawaye ga gwamnatin Patrice Lumumba a shekarar 1960. [1] Bayan shekaru da dama yana mulki Mobutu ya sake sunan ƙasar Zaire a shekara ta 1971 kuma ya nemi ayyana tare da kafa ƙasa ɗaya tak ta hanyar manufofinsa na sahihanci, wanda ya haɗa da kokarin tsarkake addinin Kiristanci daga Zaire - domin ita ce mulkin mallaka. [1] Akwai masu sukar kishin ƙasa na Zairian/Congo da ke ganin cewa wata dabara ce ta Mobutu don samun halaccin mulkinsa, ko da yake an ƙalubalanci wannan suka saboda dagewar kishin ƙasa bayan Mobutu bayan faɗuwar Mobutu daga ƙaragar mulki tare da mayar da ƙasar suna zuwa Jamhuriyar Dimokuraɗiyyar Kwango. [1]

Sarakunan mulkin mallaka na Belgium ne suka kirkiro yankin Kongo waɗanda suka ari sunan da masarautar Kongo mai tarihi ke amfani da ita. A lokacin babu wani ra'ayi na al'ummar Kongo duk da haka, saboda mutanen da ke zaune a yankin sun rabu zuwa kabilu. [1] Kishin kasa a Kongo ya fara barkewa ne a shekara ta 1959 a lokacin tarzomar adawa da mulkin mallaka na Belgium. [1] Yunkurin tabbatar da kasar ya ruguje cikin sauri bayan samun 'yancin kai lokacin da Mobutu Sese Seko ya yi tawaye ga gwamnatin Patrice Lumumba a 1960. [1] Bayan shekaru da dama yana mulki Mobutu ya sake sunan kasar Zaire a shekara ta 1971 kuma ya nemi ayyana tare da kafa kasa daya tak ta hanyar manufofinsa na sahihanci, wanda ya hada da kokarin tsarkake addinin Kiristanci daga Zaire - domin ita ce mulkin mallaka. [1] Akwai masu sukar kishin kasa na Zairian/Congo da ke ganin cewa wata dabara ce ta Mobutu don samun halaccin mulkinsa, ko da yake an kalubalanci wannan suka saboda dagewar kishin kasa bayan Mobutu bayan faduwar Mobutu daga karagar mulki tare da mayar da kasar suna zuwa Jamhuriyar Dimokaradiyyar Kwango. [1]

items.sourceText: The novel concerns the conflict between the fictional General Haraka, a leader of the Mau Mau, and British forces representing the colonial government, led by Captain Kingsley. Haraka is a former village chief whose disagreement with Kingsley, before the conflict, causes him to consider rebelling against the British.

targets.targetText: Littafin ya shafi rikicin da ke tsakanin almara Janar Haraka, shugaban Mau Mau, da sojojin Birtaniya da ke wakiltar gwamnatin mulkin mallaka, karkashin jagorancin Kyaftin Kingsley. Haraka tsohon hakimin kauye ne wanda rashin jituwarsa da Kingsley, kafin rikicin, ya sa ya yi tunanin yin tawaye ga Birtaniya.

Littafin ya shafi rikicin da ke tsakanin a Janar Haraka, shugaban Mau Mau, da sojojin Birtaniya da ke wakiltar gwamnatin 'yan mulkin mallaka, ƙarƙashin jagorancin Kyaftin Kingsley. Haraka tsohon hakimin ƙauye ne wanda rashin jituwarsa da Kingsley, kafin rikicin, ya sa ya yi tunanin yin tawaye ga Birtaniya.

items.sourceText: In June 1975, the Derg attempted to arrest the Afar Sultan, Ras Alimirah Hanfadhe, an action which led to a pitched battle in Asayita, home of Ras Alimirah, that left both Derg soldiers and Afar loyalists killed or wounded, and sent the Sultan and his son Hanfadhe Alimirah fleeing from Ethiopia. With their departure the Afar rose in revolt, burning the Tendaho Plantation and killing many non-Afar in the area around Asayita, as well as closing the highway that linked the Red Sea port of Assab with the rest of the country, bringing a halt to the Ethiopian economy. Gasoline was rationed in the capital city, Addis Ababa, for the first time. The Derg responded by devastating Asayita, and slaughtering innocent and guilty Afars indiscriminately. Despite this vicious response, Ras Alimirah and his son had been watching developments in Ethiopia, and had prepared accordingly by secretly sending a number of students to Somalia for training in guerrilla warfare. By the time the Sultan fled Ethiopia, these trained followers became the core of the Afar Liberation Front, who led the Afar fight against the Derg.[3]

targets.targetText: A watan Yunin 1975, Dergi ya yi yunkurin kama Sarkin Afara, Ras Alimirah Hanfadhe, matakin da ya kai ga kazamin faɗa a Asayita, gidan Ras Alimirah, wanda ya yi sanadin kashe sojojin Dergi da masu biyayya ga 'yan ƙabilar Afar ko kuma suka jikkata, ya kuma tura Sarkin Musulmi da ɗansa Hanfadhe Alimirah suka tsere daga Habasha. Bayan tafiyarsu ‘yan ƙabilar Afar sun tayar da ƙayar baya, inda suka kona gonakin Tendaho tare da kashe wasu da dama daga cikin waɗanda ba ‘yan ƙabilar Afar ba a yankin Asayita, tare da rufe babbar hanyar da ta haɗa tashar ruwan Bahar Maliya ta Assab da sauran sassan ƙasar, lamarin da ya kawo cikas ga tattalin arzikin ƙasar Habasha. An raba man fetur a babban birnin ƙasar, Addis Ababa, a karon farko. Dergi ya mayar da martani da murkushe Asayita, tare da kashe mutanen Afar da ba su ji ba ba su gani ba ba gaira ba dalili. Duk da wannan mummunan martani, Ras Alimirah da ɗansa sun kasance suna kallon abubuwan da ke faruwa a Habasha, kuma sun shirya hakan ta hanyar tura ɗalibai da yawa a asirce zuwa Somaliya don horar da yaƙin tawaye. A lokacin da Sarkin Musulmi ya gudu daga Habasha, waɗannan mabiyan da aka horar sun zama ginshikin kungiyar 'yantar da 'yantar da yankin Afar, waɗanda suka jagoranci yakin da 'yan ƙabilar Afar suka yi da Dergi. [1]

A watan Yunin 1975, Dergi ya yi yunkurin kama Sarkin Afara, Ras Alimirah Hanfadhe, matakin da ya kai ga kazamin fada a Asayita, gidan Ras Alimirah, wanda ya yi sanadin kashe sojojin Dergi da masu biyayya ga 'yan kabilar Afar ko kuma suka jikkata, ya kuma tura Sarkin Musulmi da dansa Hanfadhe Alimirah suka tsere daga Habasha. Bayan tafiyarsu ‘yan kabilar Afar sun tayar da kayar baya, inda suka kona gonakin Tendaho tare da kashe da dama daga cikin wadanda ba ‘yan kabilar Afar ba a yankin Asayita, tare da rufe babbar hanyar da ta hada tashar ruwan Bahar Maliya ta Assab da sauran sassan kasar, lamarin da ya kawo cikas ga tattalin arzikin kasar Habasha. An raba man fetur a babban birnin kasar, Addis Ababa, a karon farko. Dergi ya mayar da martani da murkushe Asayita, tare da kashe mutanen Afar da ba su ji ba ba su gani ba ba gaira ba dalili. Duk da wannan mummunan martani, Ras Alimirah da dansa sun kasance suna kallon abubuwan da ke faruwa a Habasha, kuma sun shirya hakan ta hanyar tura ɗalibai da yawa a asirce zuwa Somaliya don horar da yaƙin tawaye . A lokacin da Sarkin Musulmi ya gudu daga Habasha, wadannan mabiyan da aka horar sun zama ginshikin kungiyar 'yantar da 'yantar da yankin Afar, wadanda suka jagoranci yakin da 'yan kabilar Afar suka yi da Dergi. [1]

items.sourceText: Like most varieties of African-American English, African-American Vernacular English shares a large portion of its grammar and phonology with the regional dialects of the Southern United States,[10] and especially older Southern American English,[11] due to the historical enslavement of African Americans primarily in that region.

targets.targetText: Kamar yawancin nau'ikan Turanci na Afirka, Turanci na Afirka na Afirka yana da babban ɓangare na ƙamus da sauti tare da yarukan yanki na Kudancin Amurka, kuma musamman tsohuwar Turanci na Kudanci na Amurka, saboda Bautar tarihi na Afirka da farko a wannan yankin.[10][11]

Kamar yawancin nau'ikan Turanci na Afirka, Turanci na Afirka na Afirka yana da babban ɓangare na ƙamus da sauti tare da yarukan yanki na Kudancin Amurka, kuma musamman tsohuwar Turanci na Kudanci na Amurka, saboda Bautar tarihi na Afirka da farko a wannan yankin.

items.sourceText: The Front for the Liberation of Zimbabwe (FROLIZI) was an African nationalist organisation established in opposition to the white minority government of Rhodesia. It was announced in Lusaka, Zambia in October 1971 as a merger of the two principal African nationalist factions in Rhodesia, the Zimbabwe African People's Union (ZAPU) and the Zimbabwe African National Union (ZANU). However, it was in fact a breakaway faction of both ZAPU and ZANU, established by members of both groups who had become disaffected due to their rival organisations' incessant internal and external disputes.[1] Its domination by members of the Zezuru, a subgroup of the Shona people, led to accusations that it was merely a tribal grouping and ridicule as the "Front for the Liaison of Zezuru Intellectuals".[2]

targets.targetText: Front for the Liberation of Zimbabwe ( FROLIZI ) ƙungiya ce ta 'yan kishin ƙasa ta Afirka da aka kafa domin adawa da gwamnatin tsirarun fararen fata na Rhodesia. An ba da sanarwar a Lusaka, Zambia a watan Oktoba 1971 a matsayin haɗewar manyan ɓangarori biyu na Afirka masu kishin ƙasa a Rhodesia, ƙungiyar Jama'ar Afirka ta Zimbabwe (ZAPU) da ƙungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta Zimbabwe (ZANU). To sai dai kuma a hakikanin gaskiya ƙungiyar ta ZAPU da ZANU ce ta ɓalle, waɗanda ‘yan ƙungiyoyin biyu suka kafa waɗanda suka rasa nasaba da rigingimun da ƙungiyoyin da ke hamayya da su ke yi a cikin gida da waje. [1] Mallakar da 'yan kungiyar Zezuru, reshen mutanen Shona suka yi, ya haifar da zargin cewa ƙungiyar ta ƙabilanci ce kawai da kuma ba'a a matsayin "Gaba ga Hadin Kan Zezuru Intellectuals". [2]

Front for the Liberation of Zimbabwe ( FROLIZI ) kungiya ce mai kishin kasa ta Afirka da aka kafa domin adawa da gwamnatin tsirarun fararen fata na Rhodesia . An ba da sanarwar a Lusaka, Zambia a watan Oktoba 1971 a matsayin hadewar manyan bangarorin biyu na Afirka masu kishin kasa a Rhodesia, kungiyar Jama'ar Afirka ta Zimbabwe (ZAPU) da kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta Zimbabwe (ZANU). To sai dai kuma a hakikanin gaskiya kungiyar ta ZAPU da ZANU ce ta balle, wadanda ‘yan kungiyoyin biyu suka kafa wadanda suka rasa nasaba da rigingimun da kungiyoyin da ke hamayya da su ke yi a cikin gida da waje. [1] Mallakar da 'yan kungiyar Zezuru, reshen mutanen Shona suka yi, ya haifar da zargin cewa kungiyar ta kabilanci ce kawai da kuma ba'a a matsayin "Gaba ga Hadin Kan Zezuru Intellectuals". [2]

items.sourceText: From a military standpoint, the Portuguese regular army held the upper hand during the conflict against FRELIMO guerrilla forces. Nonetheless, Mozambique succeeded in achieving independence on 25 June 1975, after a civil resistance movement known as the Carnation Revolution backed by portions of the military in Portugal overthrew the Salazar regime, thus ending 470 years of Portuguese colonial rule in the East African region. According to historians of the Revolution, the military coup in Portugal was in part fueled by protests concerning the conduct of Portuguese troops in their treatment of some of the indigenous Mozambican populace.[45][46] The growing communist influence within the group of Portuguese insurgents who led the military coup and the pressure of the international community in relation to the Portuguese Colonial War were the primary causes of the outcome.[47]

targets.targetText: Ta fuskar soji, sojojin Portugal na yau da kullun sun kasance da hannu a rikicin da ake yi da dakarun FRELIMO. Duk da haka, Mozambik ta yi nasarar samun 'yancin kai a ranar 25 ga watan Yunin 1975, bayan wata gwagwarmaya ta farar hula da aka fi sani da juyin juya halin Carnation da wasu sassa na soji a Portugal suka kifar da gwamnatin Salazar, wanda hakan ya kawo ƙarshen mulkin mallaka na Portugal shekaru 470 a yankin gabashin Afirka. A cewar masana tarihi na juyin juya hali, juyin mulkin da sojoji suka yi a Portugal a wani ɓangare na zanga-zangar nuna adawa da yadda sojojin Portugal suka yi mu'amala da wasu 'yan asalin ƙasar Mozambik. [1] [2] Ƙaruwar tasirin gurguzu a cikin gungun 'yan tawayen Portugal waɗanda suka jagoranci juyin mulkin soja da matsin lambar ƙasashen duniya dangane da yakin Turawan mulkin mallaka na Portugal su ne musabbabin farko na sakamakon. [3]

Ta fuskar soji, sojojin Portugal na yau da kullun sun kasance da hannu a rikicin da ake yi da dakarun FRELIMO. Duk da haka, Mozambik ta yi nasarar samun 'yancin kai a ranar 25 ga watan Yunin 1975, bayan wata gwagwarmaya ta farar hula da aka fi sani da juyin juya halin Carnation da wasu sassa na soji a Portugal suka kifar da gwamnatin Salazar, wanda hakan ya kawo karshen mulkin mallaka na Portugal shekaru 470 a yankin gabashin Afirka. A cewar masana tarihi na juyin juya halin Musulunci, juyin mulkin da sojoji suka yi a Portugal a wani bangare na zanga-zangar nuna adawa da yadda sojojin Portugal suka yi mu'amala da wasu 'yan asalin kasar Mozambik. [1] [2] Karuwar tasirin gurguzu a cikin gungun 'yan tawayen Portugal wadanda suka jagoranci juyin mulkin soja da matsin lambar kasashen duniya dangane da yakin Turawan mulkin mallaka na Portugal su ne musabbabin farko na sakamakon. [3]

items.sourceText: Italians felt that the battle of Dogali was an insult to be avenged, and started to attack Ethiopia for revenge. They were able to occupy Eritrea in 1887–89, although they failed in the occupation of the remaining Ethiopian territory in the First Italo-Ethiopian War. In 1936, Fascist Italy launched a second invasion which resulted in the Italian victory and the occupation of Ethiopia, until it was liberated during WW2.

targets.targetText: Italiyawa sun ji cewa yakin Dogali cin mutunci ne da za a rama, sai suka fara kai wa Habasha hari domin daukar fansa. Sun sami damar mamaye kasar Eritrea a shekara ta 1887-89, duk da cewa sun gaza wajen mamaye sauran yankunan Habasha a yakin farko na Italo da Habasha . A cikin 1936, Italiyanci na Fascist ya kaddamar da mamayewa na biyu wanda ya haifar da nasarar Italiya da mamaye Habasha, har sai da aka 'yantar da ita a lokacin yakin duniya na biyu.

Italiyawa sun ji cewa yakin Dogali cin mutunci ne da za a rama, sai suka fara kai wa Habasha hari domin ɗaukar fansa. Sun sami damar mamaye ƙasar Eritrea a shekara ta 1887-89, duk da cewa sun gaza wajen mamaye sauran yankunan Habasha a yakin farko na Italo da Habasha. A cikin shekarar 1936, Italiyawa na Fascist ya kaddamar da mamayewa na biyu wanda ya haifar da nasarar Italiya da mamaye Habasha, har sai da aka 'yantar da ita a lokacin yakin duniya na biyu.

items.sourceText: As soon as the Italians considered they were strong enough to advance into Abyssinia, they seized the villages of Ua-à and Zula along with the town of Sahati, in modern-day Eritrea, and erected a small redoubt on the heights commanding the water supply for the caravans. Ras Alula Engida, the governor under Emperor Yohannes IV, had at the time left Asmara, his headquarters, for the Basen country, in order to punish the Dervishes for raiding the Dembala provinces. On hearing the news of the Italian advance, he returned to Asmara and informed the Italian officials that they were violating the treaty between Abyssinia, Egypt, and Britain, and that any further movement of troops toward Sahati – the fortification of which could only be directed against Abyssinia – would be considered a hostile action and be treated accordingly. The Italians responded by strengthening their redoubt and reinforcing their garrison. By 25 January, the fort at Sahati was held by 167 Italians and 1,000 native troops.[5] On his own initiative, Ras Alula attacked Sahati. Hundreds of his men were slaughtered by cannon and rifle fire, while only four Italians were injured, forcing Ras Alula to pull his men back. The besieged Italians, however, needed more ammunition and requested supplies.

targets.targetText: Da turawan Italiya suka yi la’akari da cewa suna da karfin da za su iya shiga kasar Abisiniya, sai suka kwace kauyukan Ua-à da Zula tare da garin Sahati, a kasar Eritriya ta zamani, kuma suka kafa wani dan karamin shakku a kan tudu da ke ba da umarnin samar da ruwa ga ayari. Ras Alula Engida, gwamna a karkashin Emperor Yohannes IV, a lokacin ya bar Asmara, hedkwatarsa, zuwa Basen kasa, domin ya hukunta Dervishes saboda farmakin lardin Dembala . Da ya ji labarin ci gaban Italiya, sai ya koma Asmara ya sanar da jami'an Italiya cewa suna karya yarjejeniyar da aka kulla tsakanin Abyssinia, Masar, da Biritaniya, kuma duk wani yunkuri na dakaru zuwa Sahati - katangar da kawai za a iya kaiwa ga Abyssiniya - za a dauki mataki na gaba kuma za a bi da su daidai. Italiyawa sun mayar da martani ta hanyar ƙarfafa shakku da ƙarfafa sansaninsu. A ranar 25 ga Janairu, Italiyanci 167 da sojoji 1,000 ne suka rike katangar a Sahati. [1] Da kansa Ras Alula ya kai wa Sahati hari. An kashe daruruwan mutanensa ta hanyar harbin bindiga da harbin bindiga, yayin da Italiyawa hudu kawai suka jikkata, lamarin da ya tilasta wa Ras Alula janye sojojinsa. Italiyawan da aka yiwa kawanya, duk da haka, suna buƙatar ƙarin harsasai kuma sun nemi kayayyaki.

Da turawan Italiya suka yi la’akari da cewa suna da karfin da za su iya shiga ƙasar Abisiniya, sai suka kwace kauyukan Ua-à da Zula tare da garin Sahati, a ƙasar Eritriya ta zamani, kuma suka kafa wani ɗan ƙaramin shakku a kan tudu da ke ba da umarnin samar da ruwa ga ayari. Ras Alula Engida, gwamna a ƙarƙashin Emperor Yohannes IV, a lokacin ya bar Asmara, hedkwatarsa, zuwa Basen ƙasa, domin ya hukunta Dervishes saboda farmakin lardin Dembala. Da ya ji labarin ci gaban Italiya, sai ya koma Asmara ya sanar da jami'an Italiya cewa suna karya yarjejeniyar da aka kulla tsakanin Abyssinia, Masar, da Biritaniya, kuma duk wani yunkuri na dakaru zuwa Sahati - katangar da kawai za a iya kaiwa ga Abyssiniya - za a ɗauki mataki na gaba kuma za a bi da su daidai. Italiyawa sun mayar da martani ta hanyar ƙarfafa shakku da ƙarfafa sansaninsu. A ranar 25 ga watan Janairu, Italiya 167 da sojoji 1,000 ne suka riƙe katangar a Sahati. [1] Da kansa Ras Alula ya kai wa Sahati hari. An kashe ɗaruruwan mutanensa ta hanyar harbin bindiga da harbin bindiga, yayin da Italiyawa huɗu kawai suka jikkata, lamarin da ya tilasta wa Ras Alula janye sojojinsa. Italiyawan da aka yiwa ƙawanya, duk da haka, suna buƙatar ƙarin harsasai kuma sun nemi kayayyaki.

items.sourceText: After his brother Djilali Rahmoune died as a martyr (shahid) in the field of honor in 1957, he joined the ranks of the National Liberation Army (ALN) in the third district, the first region, in the fourth historical wilaya, where he participated in many battles.[23][24]

targets.targetText: Bayan da ɗan uwansa Djilali Rahmoune ya rasu a matsayin shahidi (shahid) a fagen girmamawa a shekarar 1957, ya shiga sahun rundunar sojojin 'yantar da ƙasa (ALN) a gunduma ta uku, yankin farko, a wilaya ta huɗu na tarihi, inda ya halarci yakoki da dama. [1] [2]

Bayan da dan uwansa Djilali Rahmoune ya rasu a matsayin shahidi ( shahid ) a fagen girmamawa a shekarar 1957, ya shiga sahun rundunar sojojin 'yantar da kasa (ALN) a gunduma ta uku, yankin farko, a wilaya ta hudu na tarihi, inda ya halarci yakoki da dama. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Zoulikha Oudai was an Algerian Chenouas woman who died during the Algerian War of Independence.[1][2] She was born 7 May 1911 in Hadjout, and grew up in Cherchell. She had five children; after her husband and one of her sons were executed by French forces, she became committed to the independence cause and joined the National Liberation Front (Algeria) as the Cherchell regional head. She then went underground and became a noted intelligence operative for the Front. She was captured by French forces in 1957 and executed after 10 days of unfruitful torture. Her body was not recovered until 1984; she is now interred in a martyrs' cemetery in Menaceur.[3][4][5]

targets.targetText: Zoulikha Oudai wata 'yar ƙasar Chenouas ce kuma 'yar ƙasar Algeria da ta mutu a lokacin yakin 'yancin kai na Aljeriya. [1] [2] An haife ta a ranar 7 ga Mayu 1911 a Hadjout, kuma ta girma a Cherchell. Ta haifi 'ya'ya biyar; Bayan da sojojin Faransa suka kashe mijinta da ɗaya daga cikin 'ya'yanta, ta kasance mai himma ga neman 'yancin kai kuma ta shiga cikin National Liberation Front (Algeria) a matsayin shugabar yankin Cherchell. Daga nan sai ta shiga ƙarƙashin ƙasa ta zama fitacciyar jami’ar leken asiri a banygaren Front. Sojojin Faransa sun kama ta a shekara ta 1957 kuma aka kashe ta bayan kwanaki 10 na azabtarwa ba tare da amfani ba. Jikinta bai sake dawowa ba sai a shekarar 1984; Yanzu haka tana cikin makabartar shahidai da ke Menaceur. [3] [4] [5]

Zoulikha Oudai wata 'yar kasar Chenouas ce 'yar kasar Algeria da ta mutu a lokacin yakin 'yancin kai na Aljeriya . [1] [2] An haife ta a ranar 7 ga Mayu 1911 a Hadjout, kuma ta girma a Cherchell . Ta haifi 'ya'ya biyar; Bayan da sojojin Faransa suka kashe mijinta da daya daga cikin 'ya'yanta, ta kasance mai himma ga neman 'yancin kai kuma ta shiga cikin National Liberation Front (Algeria) a matsayin shugabar yankin Cherchell. Daga nan sai ta shiga karkashin kasa ta zama fitacciyar jami’ar leken asiri a bangaren Front. Sojojin Faransa sun kama ta a shekara ta 1957 kuma aka kashe ta bayan kwanaki 10 na azabtarwa ba tare da amfani ba. Jikinta bai sake dawowa ba sai a shekarar 1984; Yanzu haka tana cikin makabartar shahidai da ke Menaceur . [3] [4] [5]

items.sourceText: The Feminist movement of the 1940s combined with the Revolution gave Algerian women like Lavalette the confidence to challenge societal values, break social taboos, assert their independence, and showcase their political importance.[1] Manipulating gendered expectations empowered them to control their identities and assert their independence. In Lavalette’s case, she held power as an officer and fighter of the FLN and resisted French colonial abuse.[13] She fought her oppression as a Pied-Noir by realizing her stories were valuable and interesting, which motivated her to break her silence.

targets.targetText: Yunkurin mata na shekarun 1940 tare da juyin juya hali ya baiwa matan Aljeriya irinsu Lavalette kwarin guiwar ƙalubalantar ɗabi'un al'umma, karya haramtattun al'umma, tabbatar da 'yancin kansu, da nuna muhimmancinsu na siyasa. [1] Yin amfani da tsammanin jinsi ya ba su ikon sarrafa ainihin su da tabbatar da 'yancin kansu. A cikin shari'ar Lavalette, ta riƙe madafun iko a matsayin jami'a kuma mayaƙin FLN kuma ta yi tsayayya da cin zarafi na Faransa. [2] Ta yi yaƙi da zaluncinta a matsayinta na Pied-Noir ta hanyar gane labarunta suna da kima da ban sha'awa, wanda ya motsa ta ta karya shirun.

Yunkurin mata na shekarun 1940 tare da juyin juya halin Musulunci ya baiwa matan Aljeriya irinsu Lavalette kwarin guiwar kalubalantar dabi'un al'umma, karya haramtattun al'umma, tabbatar da 'yancin kansu, da nuna muhimmancinsu na siyasa. [1] Yin amfani da tsammanin jinsi ya ba su ikon sarrafa ainihin su da tabbatar da 'yancin kansu. A cikin shari'ar Lavalette, ta rike madafun iko a matsayin jami'a kuma mayaƙin FLN kuma ta yi tsayayya da cin zarafi na Faransanci. [2] Ta yi yaƙi da zaluncinta a matsayinta na Pied-Noir ta hanyar gane labarunta suna da kima da ban sha'awa, wanda ya motsa ta ta karya shirun.

items.sourceText: He began his musical career while a government employee at the National Bank of Angola in the 1930s, a position he held until he was imprisoned in 1959. He was forced out of the institution in 1962, after a disciplinary process claimed that he frequently did not show up for work despite having been imprisoned during that time period.[1]

targets.targetText: Ya fara harkar waka ne a lokacin da yake ma’aikacin gwamnati a babban bankin ƙasar Angola a shekarun 1930, muƙamin da ya riƙe har aka ɗaure shi a shekarar 1959. An tilasta masa ficewa daga makarantar a shekarar 1962, bayan da tsarin ladabtarwa ya yi ikirarin cewa ba ya zuwa aiki akai-akai duk da cewa an ɗaure shi a lokacin. [1]

Ya fara harkar waka ne a lokacin da yake ma’aikacin gwamnati a babban bankin kasar Angola a shekarun 1930, mukamin da ya rike har aka daure shi a shekarar 1959. An tilasta masa ficewa daga makarantar a shekarar 1962, bayan da tsarin ladabtarwa ya yi ikirarin cewa ba ya zuwa aiki akai-akai duk da cewa an daure shi a lokacin. [1]

items.sourceText: In September 2023, Mahe was appointed the State Secretary to the Government of Kwara State, a position he held prior to his appointment as Chief of Staff to the Executive Governor of Kwara State, Mallam AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq. Mahe, a retired permanent secretary, also served as the former Clerk at the Kwara State House of Assembly.[1][3][4]

targets.targetText: A watan Satumbar 2023, an zaɓi Mahe a matsayin sakataren gwamnatin jihar Kwara, mukamin da ya rike kafin a nada shi a matsayin shugaban ma’aikatan gwamnan jihar Kwara, Mallam AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq. Mahe, wanda ya kasance sakataren dindindin wanda yayi ritaya, ya kuma taba zama tsohon magatakarda a majalisar dokokin Jihar Kwara. [1] [2] [3]

A watan Satumbar 2023, an nada Mahe a matsayin sakataren gwamnatin jihar Kwara, mukamin da ya rike kafin a nada shi a matsayin shugaban ma’aikatan gwamnan jihar Kwara, Mallam AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq. Mahe, wanda ya kasance sakataren dindindin mai ritaya, ya kuma taba zama tsohon magatakarda a majalisar dokokin jihar Kwara. [1] [2] [3]

items.sourceText: On 31 July 1981, while Jawara was abroad, a 12-member National Revolutionary Council (NRC) headed by Sanyang seized control of the country. The leftist NRC accused Jawara's government of being "corrupt, tribalistic, and despotic". They also announced the suspension of the country's constitution and proclaimed their intention to establish a "dictatorship of the proletariat".

targets.targetText: A ranar 31 ga Yulin 1981, yayin da Jawara yake kasar waje, wata majalisar juyin juya hali ta kasa (NRC) mai wakilai 12 karkashin jagorancin Sanyang ta kwace iko da kasar. Jam'iyyar NRC ta hagu ta zargi gwamnatin Jawara da " cin hanci da rashawa, kabilanci, da kuma son zuciya ". Har ila yau, sun sanar da dakatar da kundin tsarin mulkin kasar tare da bayyana aniyarsu ta kafa " mulkin kama-karya na masu ra'ayin rikau ".

A ranar 31 ga Yulin 1981, yayin da Jawara yake ƙasar waje, wata majalisar juyin juya hali ta kasa (NRC) mai wakilai 12 ƙarƙashin jagorancin Sanyang ta kwace iko da ƙasar. Jam'iyyar NRC leftist ta zargi gwamnatin Jawara da "cin hanci da rashawa, kabilanci, da kuma son zuciya". Har ila yau, sun sanar da dakatar da kundin tsarin mulkin ƙasar tare da bayyana aniyarsu ta kafa "mulkin kama-karya na masu ra'ayin rikau".

items.sourceText: Adeyemi Ambrose Afolahan (born 26 December 1949) was appointed the first Administrator of Taraba State, Nigeria in August 1991 after the state was created from part of the old Gongola State during the military regime of General Ibrahim Babangida. He handed over to the elected civilian governor Jolly Nyame in January 1992 at the start of the Third Nigerian Republic.[1]

targets.targetText: Adeyemi Ambrose Afolahan (an haife shi a ranar 26 ga watan Disamba na shekara ta 1949) an nada shi mai gudanarwa na farko na Jihar Taraba, Najeriya a watan Agustan shekara ta 1991 bayan an kirkiro jihar daga wani ɓangare na tsohuwar Jihar Gongola a lokacin mulkin soja na Janar Ibrahim Babangida .Ya mika wuya ga zababben gwamnan farar hula Jolly Nyame a watan Janairun 1992 a farkon Jamhuriyar Najeriya ta Uku. [1]

Adeyemi Ambrose Afolahan (an haife shi a ranar 26 ga watan Disamba na shekara ta 1949) an naɗa shi mai gudanarwa na farko na Jihar Taraba, a Najeriya a watan Agustan shekara ta 1991 bayan an ƙirƙiro jihar daga wani ɓangare na tsohuwar Jihar Gongola a lokacin mulkin soja na Janar Ibrahim Babangida .Ya miƙa wuya ga zaɓaɓɓen gwamnan farar hula Jolly Nyame a watan Janairun shekarar 1992 a farkon Jamhuriyar Najeriya ta Uku. [1]

items.sourceText: On 28 January 1944, Bouabid led a big demonstration in Salé denouncing the arrest of some influential figures of his party. He was jailed alongside a number of Istiqlal leaders before being released a year later. In 1946 he joined his friend Mehdi Ben Barka in France to write a report on the Moroccan situation and submit it to the United Nations. While living in France, he pursued his law studies at university and became a lawyer in 1949.[2]

targets.targetText: A ranar 28 ga watan Janairun 1944, Bouabid ya jagoranci wata babbar zanga-zanga a Salé yana yin tir da kama wasu masu faɗa a ji na jam'iyyarsa. An ɗaure shi ne tare da wasu shugabannin Istiklal kafin a sake shi bayan shekara guda. A cikin shekarar 1946 ya shiga tare da abokinsa Mehdi Ben Barka a Faransa don rubuta rahoto game da halin da Morocco ke ciki kuma ya miƙa shi ga Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya. Yayin da yake zaune a Faransa, ya ci gaba da karatunsa na shari'a a jami'a kuma ya zama lauya a shekarar 1949. [1]

A ranar 28 ga Janairun 1944, Bouabid ya jagoranci wata babbar zanga-zanga a Salé yana yin tir da kama wasu masu fada a ji na jam'iyyarsa. An daure shi ne tare da wasu shugabannin Istiklal kafin a sake shi bayan shekara guda. A cikin 1946 ya shiga tare da abokinsa Mehdi Ben Barka a Faransa don rubuta rahoto game da halin da Morocco ke ciki kuma ya mika shi ga Majalisar Dinkin Duniya. Yayin da yake zaune a Faransa, ya ci gaba da karatunsa na shari'a a jami'a kuma ya zama lauya a 1949. [1]

items.sourceText: In the 1810s, Yakubu Nabame was born to Samaila (better known as Karari), a prince of the Hausa kingdom of Kebbi. He was raised during a period of great instability in the region. Kebbi had fallen to the Sokoto Caliphate during its jihad from 1804 to 1809. Under Nabame's uncle, Muhammadu Hodi, the Kebbawa waged fierce resistance against Gwandu, the vassal state of the Caliphate overseeing the area.[1]

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarun 1810, an haifi Yakubu Nabame ga Samaila (wanda aka fi sani da Karari), basaraken masarautar Hausa ta Kebbi . Ya taso ne a lokacin da ake fama da rashin zaman lafiya a yankin. Kebbi ta fada hannun Khalifancin Sokoto a lokacin jihadin ta daga 1804 zuwa 1809. Karkashin kawun Nabame, Muhammadu Hodi, 'yan kabilar Kebbawa sun yi turjiya mai tsanani ga Gwandu, daular halifanci mai kula da yankin. [1]

A cikin shekarun 1810, an haifi Yakubu Nabame ga Samaila (wanda aka fi sani da Karari), basaraken masarautar Hausa ta Kebbi. Ya taso ne a lokacin da ake fama da rashin zaman lafiya a yankin. Kebbi ta faɗa hannun Khalifancin Sokoto a lokacin jihadin ta daga shekarun 1804 zuwa 1809. Ƙarƙashin kawun Nabame, Muhammadu Hodi, 'yan ƙabilar Kebbawa sun yi turjiya mai tsanani ga Gwandu, daular halifanci mai kula da yankin. [1]

items.sourceText: After Hodi's death in 1826, his brother Karari, Nabame's father, adopted the title of Sarkin Kebbi ("Lord of Kebbi") and established himself in Argungu, continuing the struggle for independence. Argungu soon became the capital town for the Kebbawa and their center of resistance. In 1831, a combined force from Gwandu and Sokoto besieged Argungu. The Kebbawa held out for some time, but after the Gwandu forces set fire to their houses, they were forced to capitulate.[1][3]

targets.targetText: Bayan rasuwar Hodi a 1826, dan uwansa Karari, mahaifin Nabame, ya karbi sarautar Sarkin Kebbi ("Ubangijin Kebbi") ya kafa kansa a Argungu, ya ci gaba da gwagwarmayar neman 'yancin kai. Ba da jimawa ba Argungu ya zama babban birnin Kebbawa da cibiyar gwagwarmayarsu. A shekara ta 1831, rundunar hadin gwiwa daga Gwandu da Sokoto suka yiwa Argungu kawanya. ‘Yan kabilar Kebbawa sun dade, amma bayan da sojojin Gwandu suka kona gidajensu, aka tilasta musu kwacewa. [1] [2]

Bayan rasuwar Hodi a shekarar 1826, ɗan uwansa Karari, mahaifin Nabame, ya karɓi sarautar Sarkin Kebbi ("Ubangijin Kebbi") ya kafa kansa a Argungu, ya ci gaba da gwagwarmayar neman 'yancin kai. Ba da jimawa ba Argungu ya zama babban birnin Kebbawa da cibiyar gwagwarmayarsu. A shekara ta 1831, rundunar haɗin gwiwa daga Gwandu da Sokoto suka yiwa Argungu ƙawanya. ‘Yan ƙabilar Kebbawa sun daɗe, amma bayan da sojojin Gwandu suka kona gidajensu, aka tilasta musu kwacewa. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Caliph Ali's retreat marked the first surrender of territory by the Sokoto Caliphate outside of Bornu since its original conquests. Following Nabame's revival of the Kebbawa struggle for independence, the Kebbawa continued to harass the Caliphate for over fifty years until its collapse in 1903, solidifying Kebbi's independence as an irreversible reality. The Kebbawa frequently organised raiding parties and engaged in guerrilla warfare, preventing the Caliphate from ever fully subduing them. Nabame was eventually killed during one of these raids in 1854.[1][7][8][9][10]

targets.targetText: Komawar da Halifa Ali ya yi ita ce miƙa wuya na farko da Daular Sakkwato ta yi a wajen Bornu tun bayan da ta fara ci. Bayan da Nabame ya farfaɗo da gwagwarmayar neman ‘yancin kai na Kebbawa, Kebbawa sun ci gaba da takurawa Halifanci sama da shekaru hamsin har zuwa lokacin da ta ruguje a shekarar 1903, wanda hakan ya tabbatar da ‘yancin kai na Kebbi a matsayin gaskiya da ba za a iya dawo da ita ba. Kebbawa akai-akai suna shirya ƙungiyoyin mamaya da yaƙin neman zaɓe, tare da hana halifanci samun galaba a kansu. Daga ƙarshe an kashe Nabame a ɗaya daga cikin waɗannan hare-hare a shekarar 1854. [1] [2] [3] [4] [5]

Komawar da Halifa Ali ya yi ita ce mika wuya na farko da Daular Sakkwato ta yi a wajen Bornu tun bayan da ta fara ci. Bayan da Nabame ya farfado da gwagwarmayar neman ‘yancin kai na Kebbawa, Kebbawa sun ci gaba da takurawa Halifanci sama da shekaru hamsin har zuwa lokacin da ta ruguje a shekarar 1903, wanda hakan ya tabbatar da ‘yancin kai na Kebbi a matsayin gaskiya da ba za a iya dawo da ita ba. Kebbawa akai-akai suna shirya ƙungiyoyin mamaya da yaƙin neman zaɓe, tare da hana halifanci samun galaba a kansu. Daga karshe an kashe Nabame a daya daga cikin wadannan hare-hare a shekarar 1854. [1] [2] [3] [4] [5]

items.sourceText: Mlangeni died on 21 July 2020 in 1 Military Hospital in Pretoria after complaining of abdominal related issues. He was 95 and was the last surviving Rivonia Trialist following the death of Denis Goldberg on 29 April same year. President Cyril Ramaphosa expressed his condolences on behalf of the government, stating: "The passing of Andrew Mokete Mlangeni signifies the end of a generational history and places our future squarely in our hands".[21] He was given a special state funeral on 29 July 2020 and he was buried at Roodepoort cemetery next to his wife June.

targets.targetText: Mlangeni ya mutu ne a ranar 21 ga watan Yuli, 2020 a Asibitin Soja na 1 da ke Pretoria bayan ya koka da matsalolin ciki. Ya kasance ɗan shekara 95 kuma shine na ƙarshe da ya tsira daga Rivonia Trialist bayan mutuwar Denis Goldberg a ranar 29 ga watan Afrilu a wannan shekarar. Shugaba Cyril Ramaphosa ya bayyana ta'aziyyarsa a madadin gwamnati, yana mai cewa: "Rasuwar Andrew Mokete Mlangeni na nuni da ƙarshen tarihin tsararraki da kuma sanya makomarmu a hannunmu". [1] An yi jana'izar ta musamman a ranar 29 ga watan Yuli, 2020 kuma an binne shi a makabartar Roodepoort kusa da matarsa June.

Mlangeni ya mutu ne a ranar 21 ga Yuli, 2020 a Asibitin Soja na 1 da ke Pretoria bayan ya koka da matsalolin ciki. Ya kasance dan shekara 95 kuma shine na karshe da ya tsira daga Rivonia Trialist bayan mutuwar Denis Goldberg a ranar 29 ga Afrilu a wannan shekarar. Shugaba Cyril Ramaphosa ya bayyana ta'aziyyarsa a madadin gwamnati, yana mai cewa: "Rasuwar Andrew Mokete Mlangeni na nuni da karshen tarihin tsararraki da kuma sanya makomarmu a hannunmu". [1] An yi jana'izar ta musamman a ranar 29 ga Yuli, 2020 kuma an binne shi a makabartar Roodepoort kusa da matarsa June.

items.sourceText: Under Pokela, the use of funds was set, with 50% set aside for military operations, 30% going to administration, and 20% used for propaganda; the idea of members submitting annual financial reports about their use of PAC funds was also floated. Nevertheless, money went missing at various points in time, and the PAC ran out of funds between March and November 1981.[1]

targets.targetText: A karkashin Pokela, an saita amfani da kudade, tare da 50% da aka kebe don ayyukan soja, 30% za a yi mulki, kuma 20% ana amfani da su don farfaganda; ra'ayin membobin da ke gabatar da rahoton kuɗi na shekara-shekara game da amfani da su na kuɗin PAC an kuma yi ta iyo. Duk da haka, kuɗi ya ɓace a wurare daban-daban a cikin lokaci, kuma PAC ta ƙare tsakanin Maris da Nuwamba 1981. [1]

A ƙarƙashin Pokela, an saita amfani da kuɗaɗe, tare da 50% da aka kebe don ayyukan soja, 30% za a yi mulki, kuma 20% ana amfani da su don farfaganda; ra'ayin membobin da ke gabatar da rahoton kuɗi na shekara-shekara game da amfani da su na kuɗin PAC an kuma yi ta iyo. Duk da haka, kuɗi ya ɓace a wurare daban-daban a cikin lokaci, kuma PAC ta ƙare tsakanin watan Maris da Nuwamba 1981. [1]

items.sourceText: He was granted the right to appeal, appeal was filed, but the case was never heard by the Supreme Court. He was allowed bail because of his deteriorating health. He died on 12 December 2000, in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, United States. The author of three books on African politics, he is survived by his wife, Vesta, and five adult children.

targets.targetText: An ba shi damar daukaka kara, an shigar da kara, amma kotun koli ba ta taba sauraron karar ba. An ba shi belinsa saboda tabarbarewar lafiyarsa. Ya mutu a ranar 12 ga Disamba, 2000, a Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, Amurka. Marubucin litattafai uku kan siyasar Afirka, ya bar matarsa, Vesta, da ’ya’ya biyar manya.

An ba shi damar ɗaukaka kara, an shigar da kara, amma kotun koli ba ta taɓa sauraron ƙarar ba. An ba shi belinsa saboda taɓarɓarewar lafiyarsa. Ya mutu a ranar 12 ga watan Disamba, 2000, a Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, Amurka. Marubucin litattafai uku kan siyasar Afirka, ya bar matarsa, Vesta, da ’ya’ya biyar manya.

items.sourceText: At the University of Coimbra, she met Manuel Boal, an Angolan medical student and later a fellow freedom fighter. The couple married in 1958 and had two daughters, Sara and Baluka, who were raised in part by Lilica Boal's mother during the height of the liberation fight.[1][2]

targets.targetText: A Jami'ar Coimbra, ta haɗu da Manuel Boal, ɗalibin likitancin Angola kuma daga baya abokin gwagwarmayar 'yanci. Ma'auratan sun yi aure a shekara ta 1958 kuma suna da 'ya'ya mata biyu, Sara da Baluka, waɗanda mahaifiyar Lilica Boal ta girma a wani ɓangare na yakin neman 'yanci. [1] [2]

A Jami'ar Coimbra, ta sadu da Manuel Boal, dalibin likitancin Angola kuma daga baya abokin gwagwarmayar 'yanci. Ma'auratan sun yi aure a shekara ta 1958 kuma suna da 'ya'ya mata biyu, Sara da Baluka, wadanda mahaifiyar Lilica Boal ta girma a wani bangare na yakin neman 'yanci. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: After the signing of the Armistice with Germany in November 1918, significant forces of tribesmen remained opposed to French rule. The French resumed their offensive in the Khénifra area in 1920, establishing a series of blockhouses to limit the Zaians' freedom of movement. They opened negotiations with Hammou's sons, persuading three of them, along with many of their followers, to submit to French rule. A split in the Zaian Confederation between those who supported submission and those still opposed led to infighting and the death of Hammou in Spring 1921. The French responded with a strong, three-pronged attack into the Middle Atlas that pacified the area. Some tribesmen, led by Moha ou Said, fled to the High Atlas and continued a guerrilla war against the French well into the 1930s.

targets.targetText: Bayan rattaba hannu kan Sojan Sama da Jamus a watan Nuwamba 1918, manyan dakarun kabilu sun kasance masu adawa da mulkin Faransa. Faransawa sun ci gaba da kai hare-hare a yankin Khénifra a cikin 1920, inda suka kafa jerin gidaje don iyakance 'yancin walwala na Zaiians. Sun bude tattaunawa da ’ya’yan Hammou, inda suka shawo kan uku daga cikinsu, tare da da yawa daga cikin mabiyansu, su mika wuya ga mulkin Faransa. Rarraba a cikin kungiyar ta Zaian tsakanin wadanda suka goyi bayan mika wuya da wadanda har yanzu suke adawa da shi ya haifar da fadace-fadace da kuma mutuwar Hammou a lokacin bazara na 1921. Faransawa sun mayar da martani da kakkausan kai hari mai matakai uku a cikin tsakiyar Atlas wanda ya daidaita yankin. Wasu 'yan kabilar, karkashin jagorancin Moha ou Said, sun gudu zuwa High Atlas kuma suka ci gaba da yakin basasa da Faransanci a cikin 1930s.

Bayan rattaba hannu kan Sojan Sama da Jamus a watan Nuwamba 1918, manyan dakarun kabilu sun kasance masu adawa da mulkin Faransa. Faransawa sun ci gaba da kai hare-hare a yankin Khénifra a cikin t 1920, inda suka kafa jerin gidaje don iyakance 'yancin walwala na Zaiians. Sun buɗe tattaunawa da ’ya’yan Hammou, inda suka shawo kan uku daga cikinsu, tare da da yawa daga cikin mabiyansu, su miƙa wuya ga mulkin Faransa. Rarraba a cikin kungiyar ta Zaian tsakanin waɗanda suka goyi bayan mika wuya da waɗanda har yanzu suke adawa da shi ya haifar da faɗace-faɗace da kuma mutuwar Hammou a lokacin bazara na shekarar 1921. Faransawa sun mayar da martani da kakkausan kai hari mai matakai uku a cikin tsakiyar Atlas wanda ya ɗaiɗaita yankin. Wasu 'yan ƙabilar, ƙarƙashin jagorancin Moha ou Said, sun gudu zuwa High Atlas kuma suka ci gaba da yakin basasa da Faransa a cikin shekarar 1930s.

items.sourceText: German colonial expansion was apparent conflict with the emerging power of the Hehe people who since the 1860's consolidated the highlands of the south under their chiefs Munyigumba Muyinga and Mkwawa. In military operations the Hehe were reaching into areas along the caravan routes and attacking groups that were associated with the colonial authority by means of treaties. As a result, the officials in the recently established center of administrative power in Dar es Salaam made the decision to use force and established a campaign of punishment against the Hehe.[4]

targets.targetText: Fadayda mulkin mallaka na Jamus ya kasance a fili karo na gaba da ikon mutanen Hehe wanda tun shekarun 1860 suka haɗe tsaunukan kudu ƙarƙashin sarakunansu Munyigumba Muyinga da Mkwawa. A cikin ayyukan soji Hehe na kai hare-hare zuwa yankunan da ke kan hanyoyin ayari da kai hari ga kungiyoyin da ke da alaka da 'yan mulkin mallaka ta hanyar yarjejeniyoyin. A sakamakon haka, jami'ai a cibiyar gudanarwar da aka kafa kwanan nan a Dar es Salaam sun yanke shawarar yin amfani da karfi tare da kafa yakin hukunta Hehe. [1]

Fadada mulkin mallaka na Jamus ya kasance a fili karo na gaba da ikon mutanen Hehe wanda tun shekarun 1860 suka hade tsaunukan kudu karkashin sarakunansu Munyigumba Muyinga da Mkwawa . A cikin ayyukan soji Hehe na kai hare-hare zuwa yankunan da ke kan hanyoyin ayari da kai hari ga kungiyoyin da ke da alaka da mulkin mallaka ta hanyar yarjejeniyoyin. A sakamakon haka, jami'ai a cibiyar gudanarwar da aka kafa kwanan nan a Dar es Salaam sun yanke shawarar yin amfani da karfi tare da kafa yakin hukunta Hehe. [1]

items.sourceText: The ensuing military stalemate and the high cost of conducting the war in made it increasingly unpopular among Cape politicians. On 29 April 1881, High Commissioner for Southern Africa, Sir Hercules Robinson announced the peaceful settlement of the conflict. The Cape's subsequent efforts to enforce disarmament and re-establish the rule of law in Basutoland met with stiff resistance from Masopha and his supporters. Unable to control the Basuto, the Cape Parliament passed the Disannexation Act in September 1883. The Basuto Gun War represents a rare example of an African nation's military victory against a colonial power, whereby the Basuto were able to retain their guns. Under the terms of the Disannexation Act, Basutoland was transformed into a British High Commission Territory, and thus not later incorporated into the Union of South Africa.

targets.targetText: Rikicin soji da ya biyo baya da kuma kuɗin da ake kashewa wajen gudanar da yakin, ya sa ya zama bashi da farin jini a tsakanin 'yan siyasar Cape. A ranar 29 ga watan Afrilu 1881, Babban Kwamishinan Kudancin Afirka, Sir Hercules Robinson ya ba da sanarwar sasanta rikicin cikin lumana. Yunkurin da Cape ta yi a baya na tabbatar da kwance ɗamara da sake tabbatar da doka a Basutoland ya fuskanci turjiya daga Masopha da magoya bayansa. Ba za a iya sarrafa Basuto ba, Majalisar Cape Cape ta zartar da Dokar Dissannexation a watan Satumba 1883. Yakin Bindiga na Basuto yana wakiltar wani misali da ba kasafai ba na nasarar da sojojin ƙasar Afirka suka samu a kan 'yan mulkin mallaka, inda Basuto suka sami damar riƙe bindigoginsu. Ƙarƙashin sharuɗɗan Dokar Kashe Basutoland, ta rikiɗe zuwa Babban Babban Hukumar Biritaniya, don haka daga baya ba a haɗa shi cikin Tarayyar Afirka ta Kudu ba.

Rikicin soji da ya biyo baya da kuma tsadar da ake kashewa wajen gudanar da yakin, ya sa ya zama rashin farin jini a tsakanin 'yan siyasar Cape. A ranar 29 ga Afrilu 1881, Babban Kwamishinan Kudancin Afirka, Sir Hercules Robinson ya ba da sanarwar sasanta rikicin cikin lumana. Yunkurin da Cape ta yi a baya na tabbatar da kwance damara da sake tabbatar da doka a Basutoland ya fuskanci turjiya daga Masopha da magoya bayansa. Ba za a iya sarrafa Basuto ba, Majalisar Cape Cape ta zartar da Dokar Dissannexation a watan Satumba 1883. Yakin Bindiga na Basuto yana wakiltar wani misali da ba kasafai ba na nasarar da sojojin kasar Afirka suka samu a kan mulkin mallaka, inda Basuto suka sami damar rike bindigoginsu. Karkashin sharuɗɗan Dokar Kashe Basutoland, an rikiɗe zuwa Babban Babban Hukumar Biritaniya, don haka daga baya ba a haɗa shi cikin Tarayyar Afirka ta Kudu ba.

items.sourceText: The Dervishes had prior knowledge of the approaching three columns of British troops and had already prepared for battle, while the British, unaware of this, intended to launch a surprise attack. On the afternoon of April 14th, the column from Hobyo arrived at the Geledi well, where they encountered a Dervish man with a water-carrying camel. When interrogated, he claimed, "I am not aware of any Dervishes here". They detained him, but he escaped at night and alerted the Dervishes about the British army’s strength, weapons, conversations, and overall situation. On April 15th, the British column reached Agaarweyne and set up a large defensive encampment, unaware that the Dervishes, led by Isman Boos, were preparing for a jihad to be launched at dawn. The Dervishes split their forces into two groups and attacked the British from four directions at first light, following a well-coordinated plan. The first Dervish forces fought until around 11:00 A.M. on April 16th, after which they were replaced by the second shift as planned. The fighting, fierce and continuous, lasted until late in the day. Meanwhile, the British government had coordinated efforts with Italy on the Hobyo front and Ethiopia on the Jigjiga front, as the colonial powers sought to crush the Dervish threat. However, the Dervishes, fully aware of the British maneuverers, had prepared meticulously, even deciding the type of horses to deploy during the heat of the day and the cooler hours of the morning.[4][5]

targets.targetText: Dervishes sun riga sun san ginshiƙai uku na sojojin Biritaniya da ke gabatowa kuma sun riga sun shirya yaƙi, yayin da Birtaniyya, ba su san da hakan ba, sun yi niyyar kai harin ba-zata. Da yammacin ranar 14 ga watan Afrilu, ginshiƙin Hobyo ya isa rijiyar Geledi, inda suka ci karo da wani Bature da wani raƙumi mai ɗauke da ruwa. Lokacin da aka yi masa tambayoyi, ya yi iƙirarin, "Ban san wani Dervishes a nan ba". Suka tsare shi, amma ya tsere da daddare, ya sanar da Derwish irin ƙarfin da sojojin Birtaniya suke da shi, da makamansu, da hirarrakinsu, da halin da suke ciki. A ranar 15 ga watan Afrilu, ruƙunin Birtaniya ya isa Agaarweyne, suka kafa wani babban sansanin tsaro, ba tare da sanin cewa Derwish, ƙarƙashin jagorancin Isman Boos, suna shirin yin jihadi da za a kaddamar da wayewar gari ba. Dervishes sun raba sojojinsu gida biyu, suka far wa Ingila daga wurare huɗu a farkon haske, suna bin tsari mai kyau. Sojojin Dervish na farko sun yi fafatawa har zuwa karfe 11:00 na safe a ranar 16 ga watan Afrilu, bayan da aka maye gurbinsu da sauyi na biyu kamar yadda aka tsara. Faɗan, mai tsanani da ci gaba, ya ci gaba da kasancewa har dare ya yi. A halin da ake ciki dai gwamnatin Burtaniya ta haɗa kai da Italiya a fagen daga Hobyo da Habasha a ɓangaren Jigaji, yayin da turawan mulkin mallaka suka nemi murkushe barazanar Derwish. Duk da haka, Dervishes, suna da cikakkiyar masaniya game da ma'aikatan Birtaniya, sun yi shiri sosai, har ma da yanke shawarar nau'in dawakai da za su yi amfani da su a lokacin zafi na rana da kuma lokacin sanyi na safe. [1] [2]

Dervishes sun riga sun san ginshiƙai uku na sojojin Biritaniya da ke gabatowa kuma sun riga sun shirya yaƙi, yayin da Birtaniyya, ba su san da hakan ba, sun yi niyyar kai harin ba-zata. Da yammacin ranar 14 ga Afrilu, ginshiƙin Hobyo ya isa rijiyar Geledi, inda suka ci karo da wani Bature da wani raƙumi mai ɗauke da ruwa. Lokacin da aka yi masa tambayoyi, ya yi iƙirarin, "Ban san wani Dervishes a nan ba". Suka tsare shi, amma ya tsere da daddare, ya sanar da Derwish irin ƙarfin da sojojin Birtaniya suke da shi, da makamansu, da hirarrakinsu, da halin da suke ciki. A ranar 15 ga Afrilu, rukunin Birtaniya ya isa Agaarweyne, suka kafa wani babban sansanin tsaro, ba tare da sanin cewa Derwish, karkashin jagorancin Isman Boos, suna shirin yin jihadi da za a kaddamar da wayewar gari ba. Dervishes sun raba sojojinsu gida biyu, suka far wa Ingila daga wurare hudu a farkon haske, suna bin tsari mai kyau. Sojojin Dervish na farko sun yi fafatawa har zuwa karfe 11:00 na safe a ranar 16 ga Afrilu, bayan da aka maye gurbinsu da sauyi na biyu kamar yadda aka tsara. Fadan, mai tsanani da ci gaba, ya ci gaba da kasancewa har dare ya yi. A halin da ake ciki dai gwamnatin Burtaniya ta hada kai da Italiya a fagen daga Hobyo da Habasha a bangaren Jigaji, yayin da turawan mulkin mallaka suka nemi murkushe barazanar Derwish. Duk da haka, Dervishes, suna da cikakkiyar masaniya game da ma'aikatan Birtaniya, sun yi shiri sosai, har ma da yanke shawarar nau'in dawakai da za su yi amfani da su a lokacin zafi na rana da kuma lokacin sanyi na safe. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Initially the United Nations was unable to carry out any sort of substantial action against the French, which angered the Tunisian authorities.[4] The French finally handed Bizerte over on 15 October 1963, after the conclusion of the Algerian War.

targets.targetText: Da farko Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta kasa aiwatar da wani gagarumin mataki kan Faransawa, lamarin da ya fusata mahukuntan Tunisiya. [1] A karshe Faransa ta mika Bizerte a ranar 15 ga Oktoban 1963, bayan kammala yakin Aljeriya.

Da farko Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya ta ƙasa aiwatar da wani gagarumin mataki kan Faransawa, lamarin da ya fusata mahukuntan Tunisiya. [1] A ƙarshe Faransa ta miƙa Bizerte a ranar 15 ga watan Oktoban 1963, bayan kammala yakin Aljeriya.

items.sourceText: On the evening of 29 March 1947, coordinated surprise attacks were launched by Malagasy nationalists, armed mainly with spears, against military bases and French-owned plantations in the eastern part of the island concentrated around Moramanga and Manakara. The nationalist cause was rapidly adopted in the south and spread to the central highlands and the capital of Antananarivo by the following month, with the number of Malagasy nationalist fighters estimated at over one million.[5]

targets.targetText: Da yammacin ranar 29 ga Maris, 1947, masu kishin kasar Malagasy, dauke da makamai, suka kaddamar da hare-haren ba-zata, a kan sansanonin soji da gonaki mallakar Faransa a gabashin tsibirin dake kewayen Moramanga da Manakara . An amince da manufar kishin kasa cikin sauri a kudanci kuma ta bazu zuwa tsakiyar tsaunuka da babban birnin Antananarivo a cikin wata mai zuwa, inda aka kiyasta adadin mayakan kishin kasa na Malagasy sama da miliyan daya. [1]

Da yammacin ranar 29 ga watan Maris, 1947, masu kishin ƙasar Malagasy, ɗauke da makamai, suka kaddamar da hare-haren ba-zata, a kan sansanonin soji da gonakin 'yan mulkin mallakar Faransa a gabashin tsibirin dake kewayen Moramanga da Manakara. An amince da manufar kishin ƙasa cikin sauri a kudanci kuma ta bazu zuwa tsakiyar tsaunuka da babban birnin Antananarivo a cikin wata mai zuwa, inda aka kiyasta adadin mayakan kishin ƙasa na Malagasy sama da miliyan ɗaya. [1]

items.sourceText: By the close of the 19th century, Madagascar was largely under the control of the Kingdom of Imerina, with its royal palaces at its capital in Antananarivo. Although the kingdom had existed since the early 16th century, it expanded its control beyond its traditional borders in the 1820s under King Radama I, who the British government officially recognized as the sovereign over the entire island of Madagascar. After several failed attempts to impose its authority over the island, France used military force to capture the royal palace in September 1894 and exiled Prime Minister Rainilaiarivony upon officially colonizing the island in February 1895. Queen Ranavalona III was allowed to remain as a figurehead until the emergence of a popular uprising, termed the Menalamba rebellion, for which the queen was held responsible. The rebellion was harshly crushed, and the queen was exiled in 1897.[7][8]

targets.targetText: A ƙarshen ƙarni na 19, Madagascar tana ƙarƙashin ikon Masarautar Imerina, tare da manyan gidajen sarauta a babban birninta a Antananarivo. Duk da cewa Masarautar ta wanzu tun farkon ƙarni na 16, amma ta faɗaɗa ikonta fiye da iyakokinta na gargajiya a cikin shekarar 1820s ƙarƙashin Sarki Radama I, wanda gwamnatin Burtaniya ta amince da shi a matsayin mai mulki a kan ɗaukacin tsibirin Madagascar. Bayan da aka yi yunƙuri da yawa na ƙaddamar da ikonta a kan tsibirin, Faransa ta yi amfani da ƙarfin soji don kame gidan sarauta a watan Satumba na 1894 kuma ta kori Firayim Minista Rainilaiarivony a kan mulkin mallaka a hukumance a watan Fabrairun 1895. An bar Sarauniya Ranavalona III ta ci gaba da kasancewa a matsayin jagora har zuwa ɓullar wani boren jama'a, wanda ake kira tawayen Menalamba, wanda Sarauniyar ke da alhakinsa. An murkushe tawayen da kakkausar murya, kuma an kai sarauniyar gudun hijira a shekara ta 1897. [ 7 ] [ 8 ]

A ƙarshen karni na 19, Madagascar tana ƙarƙashin ikon Masarautar Imerina, tare da manyan gidajen sarauta a babban birninta a Antananarivo . Duk da cewa Masarautar ta wanzu tun farkon karni na 16, amma ta fadada ikonta fiye da iyakokinta na gargajiya a cikin 1820s karkashin Sarki Radama I, wanda gwamnatin Burtaniya ta amince da shi a matsayin mai mulki a kan daukacin tsibirin Madagascar. Bayan da aka yi yunƙuri da yawa na ƙaddamar da ikonta a kan tsibirin, Faransa ta yi amfani da ƙarfin soji don kame gidan sarauta a watan Satumba na 1894 kuma ta kori Firayim Minista Rainilaiarivony a kan mulkin mallaka a hukumance a watan Fabrairun 1895. An bar Sarauniya Ranavalona III ta ci gaba da kasancewa a matsayin jagora har zuwa bullar wani boren jama'a, wanda ake kira tawayen Menalamba, wanda Sarauniyar ke da alhakinsa. An murkushe tawayen da kakkausar murya, kuma an kai sarauniyar gudun hijira a shekara ta 1897. [ 7 ] [ 8 ]

items.sourceText: Following the end of the Second World War, several key Malagasy nationalist leaders attempted to achieve independence for Madagascar through legal means.[12] At the first post-war constituent assembly convened in Paris in November 1945 to draft the constitution of the French Fourth Republic, Madagascar was represented by two doctors named Joseph Raseta and Joseph Ravoahangy. Together with future writer Jacques Rabemananjara, in early 1946 they formed the Mouvement démocratique de la rénovation malgache (MDRM) political party, whose platform was built on national independence from France.[1]

targets.targetText: Bayan karshen yakin duniya na biyu, wasu manyan jagororin kishin kasa na Malagasy da dama sun yi yunkurin samun 'yancin kai ga Madagascar ta hanyar doka. [ 12 ] A babban taro na farko bayan yaƙin da aka yi a birnin Paris a watan Nuwamba 1945 don tsara kundin tsarin mulkin jamhuriya ta huɗu ta Faransa, likitoci biyu masu suna Joseph Raseta da Joseph Ravoahangy ne suka wakilci Madagascar. Tare da marubucin nan gaba Jacques Rabemananjara, a farkon 1946 sun kafa jam'iyyar siyasa ta Mouvement démocratique de la rénovation malgache (MDRM), wadda aka gina dandalinta akan 'yancin kai na kasa daga Faransa. [1]

Bayan ƙarshen yakin duniya na biyu, wasu manyan jagororin kishin ƙasa na Malagasy da dama sun yi yunkurin samun 'yancin kai ga Madagascar ta hanyar doka. [ 12 ] A babban taro na farko bayan yaƙin da aka yi a birnin Paris a watan Nuwamba 1945 don tsara kundin tsarin mulkin jamhuriya ta huɗu ta Faransa, likitoci biyu masu suna Joseph Raseta da Joseph Ravoahangy ne suka wakilci Madagascar. Tare da marubucin nan gaba Jacques Rabemananjara, a farkon shekara ta 1946 sun kafa jam'iyyar siyasa ta Mouvement démocratique de la rénovation malgache (MDRM), wadda aka gina dandalinta akan 'yancin kai na ƙasa daga Faransa. [1]

items.sourceText: Knowing this setback would prompt an aggressive British response, the French again sent Braulot, at the head of an armed column, to try to acquire Bouna by negotiation. Saranken Mori initially accepted.[1]: 117–9  But when Braulot arrived at Bouna, he was killed and his column destroyed outside the city on August 20, 1897, restarting the war between the French and Samory Toure.[8]

targets.targetText: Sanin wannan koma baya zai haifar da martani mai tsanani na Birtaniyya, Faransawa sun sake aika Braulot, a shugaban rukunin masu dauke da makamai, ya yi kokarin sayen Bouna ta hanyar shawarwari. Saranken Mori ya karɓa da farko. [1] : 117–9 Amma lokacin da Braulot ya isa Bouna, an kashe shi kuma aka lalata shi a wajen birnin a ranar 20 ga Agusta, 1897, inda aka sake fara yakin Faransa da Samory Toure. [2]

Sanin wannan koma baya zai haifar da martani mai tsanani na Birtaniyya, Faransawa sun sake aika Braulot, a shugaban ruƙunin masu ɗauke da makamai, ya yi kokarin sayen Bouna ta hanyar shawarwari. Saranken Mori ya karɓa da farko. [1] : 117–9 Amma lokacin da Braulot ya isa Bouna, an kashe shi kuma aka lalata shi a wajen birnin a ranar 20 ga watan Agusta, 1897, inda aka sake fara yakin Faransa da Samory Toure. [2]

items.sourceText: The war started after the 1915 rainy season when a group of representatives from around a dozen villages gathered at Bona where they resolved to take up arms against the French occupiers.[3] This took place in the context of World War I and introduction of conscription for the French Army. There was also widespread optimism that the colonial government could be beaten at this moment of weakness. It went through various phases as the colonial army organised two suppression campaigns but initially failed in its purpose, in the face of fierce opposition and superior tactics. The Volta-Bani War is one of the most significant armed oppositions to colonial government anywhere in Africa. It was the main reason for the creation of the colony of Haute Volta (now Burkina Faso) after World War I, by splitting off seven districts from the large colony of Haut-Sénégal and Niger.[4]

targets.targetText: Yakin dai ya faro ne bayan damina ta shekarar 1915 inda wasu wakilai daga ƙauyuka kusan goma sha biyu suka taru a Bona inda suka kuduri aniyar ɗaukar makamai domin yakar 'yan mamaya na Faransa. [ 3 ] Wannan ya faru ne a yanayin yakin duniya na ɗaya da shigar da sojojin Faransa. An kuma yi hasashen cewa za a iya doke gwamnatin 'yan mulkin mallaka a wannan lokaci na rauni. An shiga matakai daban-daban yayin da sojojin 'yan mulkin mallaka suka shirya yakin murkushe su guda biyu amma da farko sun ƙasa cimma manufarsu, ta fuskar adawa mai tsanani da dabaru masu kyau. Yaƙin Volta-Bani na ɗaya daga cikin manyan masu adawa da gwamnatin 'yan mulkin mallaka a ko'ina cikin Afirka. Wannan shi ne babban dalilin da ya sa aka samar da mulkin mallaka na Haute Volta (yanzu Burkina Faso) bayan yakin duniya na ɗaya, ta hanyar raba gundumomi bakwai daga babban yankin Haut-Sénégal da Nijar. [ 4 ]

Yakin dai ya faro ne bayan damina ta shekarar 1915 inda wasu wakilai daga kauyuka kusan goma sha biyu suka taru a Bona inda suka kuduri aniyar daukar makamai domin yakar 'yan mamaya na Faransa. [ 3 ] Wannan ya faru ne a yanayin yakin duniya na daya da shigar da sojojin Faransa. An kuma yi hasashen cewa za a iya doke gwamnatin mulkin mallaka a wannan lokaci na rauni. An shiga matakai daban-daban yayin da sojojin mulkin mallaka suka shirya yakin murkushe su guda biyu amma da farko sun kasa cimma manufarsu, ta fuskar adawa mai tsanani da dabaru masu kyau. Yaƙin Volta-Bani na ɗaya daga cikin manyan masu adawa da gwamnatin mulkin mallaka a ko'ina cikin Afirka. Wannan shi ne babban dalilin da ya sa aka samar da mulkin mallaka na Haute Volta (yanzu Burkina Faso) bayan yakin duniya na daya, ta hanyar raba gundumomi bakwai daga babban yankin Haut-Sénégal da Nijar. [ 4 ]

items.sourceText: On 13 August 1913, the colonial administrator for the region, Arthur Champion, held a public meeting where he gave his demands to the community. Mekatilili played a major role in the meeting as she expressed her opposition to Champion's demands and gave a verbal oath that she would not cooperate with the colonial administrators.[1]

targets.targetText: A ranar 13 ga Agusta 1913, mai kula da mulkin mallaka na yankin, Arthur Champion, ya gudanar da taron jama'a inda ya ba da bukatunsa ga al'umma. Mekatilili ta taka rawar gani a taron inda ta nuna rashin amincewarta da bukatun Champion tare da yin rantsuwa da cewa ba za ta hada kai da masu mulkin mallaka ba. [1]

A ranar 13 ga watan Agusta 1913, mai kula da 'yan mulkin mallaka na yankin, Arthur Champion, ya gudanar da taron jama'a inda ya ba da buƙatunsa ga al'umma. Mekatilili ta taka rawar gani a taron inda ta nuna rashin amincewarta da buƙatun Champion tare da yin rantsuwa da cewa ba za ta haɗa kai da masu mulkin mallaka ba. [1]

items.sourceText: Educated in local schools, then sent to South Africa from 1919 to 1927 for secondary education at Tiger Kloof and the Lovedale Missionary Institute,[2] Bathoen II took over as chief of the Bangwaketse tribe in 1928. He worked closely with Tshekedi Khama, chief of the Bangwato tribe in the struggle to uphold tribal power over British colonial authority.[3] He was a Senior Tribal Chief and Chairman of the Joint Advisory Council.[4] As an opponent of Seretse Khama and his BDP), Bathoen signed, albeit reluctantly, an agreement for the drafting of a constitution and the independence of the protectorate of Bechuanaland from the United Kingdom in September 1966.

targets.targetText: Ya yi karatu a makarantun gida, sannan aka tura shi Afirka ta Kudu daga 1919 zuwa 1927 don karatun sakandare a Tiger Kloof da Cibiyar Mishan ta Lovedale, [1] Bathoen II ya zama shugaban kabilar Bangwaketse a 1928. Ya yi aiki kafada da kafada da Tshekedi Khama, shugaban kabilar Bangwato a gwagwarmayar tabbatar da ikon kabilanci a kan ikon mulkin mallaka na Burtaniya. [2] Ya kasance Babban Hakimin Kabila kuma Shugaban Majalisar Ba da Shawara ta Hadin Kai. [3] A matsayinsa na abokin hamayyar Seretse Khama da BDP dinsa), Bathoen ya sanya hannu, ko da yake ba da son rai ba, yarjejeniyar tsara kundin tsarin mulki da 'yancin kai na kare Bechuanaland daga Birtaniya a watan Satumba na 1966.

Ya yi karatu a makarantun gida, sannan aka tura shi Afirka ta Kudu daga shekarun 1919 zuwa 1927 don karatun sakandare a Tiger Kloof da Cibiyar Mishan ta Lovedale, [1] Bathoen II ya zama shugaban ƙabilar Bangwaketse a shekarar 1928. Ya yi aiki kafaɗa da kafaɗa da Tshekedi Khama, shugaban ƙabilar Bangwato a gwagwarmayar tabbatar da ikon ƙabilu a kan ikon mulkin mallaka na Burtaniya. [2] Ya kasance Babban Hakimin Ƙabila kuma Shugaban Majalisar Ba da Shawara ta Haɗin Kai. [3] A matsayinsa na abokin hamayyar Seretse Khama da BDP dinsa), Bathoen ya sanya hannu, ko da yake ba da son rai ba, yarjejeniyar tsara kundin tsarin mulki da 'yancin kai na kare Bechuanaland daga Birtaniya a watan Satumba na 1966.

items.sourceText: After she left the position in 1959, despite becoming the first female member of the national assembly,[7] the fact that she did not obtain a government post after Upper Volta's independence in 1960 could be considered a backward step for the political role of women.[8] Representing Upper Volta, Ouezzin Coulibaly was elected to the senate of the French Community on 30 April 1959 where she sat on the Committee for Transport and Telecommunications. She held the position until 16 March 1961.[9]

targets.targetText: Bayan da ta bar muƙamin a shekarar 1959, duk da kasancewarta mace ta farko a majalisar dokokin ƙasar, [1] kasancewar ba ta samu muƙamin gwamnati ba bayan samun ‘yancin kai na Upper Volta a shekarar 1960 na iya zama koma baya ga rawar da mata ke takawa a siyasance. [2] Mai wakiltar Upper Volta, Ouezzin Coulibaly an zaɓe ta a majalisar dattijai ta Faransa a ranar 30 ga watan Afrilu 1959 inda ta zauna a kwamitin sufuri da sadarwa. Ta riƙe muƙamin har zuwa ranar 16 ga watan Maris 1961. [3]

Bayan da ta bar mukamin a shekarar 1959, duk da kasancewarta mace ta farko a majalisar dokokin kasar, [1] kasancewar ba ta samu mukamin gwamnati ba bayan samun ‘yancin kai na Upper Volta a 1960 na iya zama koma baya ga rawar da mata ke takawa a siyasance. [2] Mai wakiltar Upper Volta, Ouezzin Coulibaly an zabe ta a majalisar dattijai ta Faransa a ranar 30 ga Afrilu 1959 inda ta zauna a kwamitin sufuri da sadarwa. Ta rike mukamin har zuwa 16 Maris 1961. [3]

items.sourceText: The At-Tauhid Mosque (Spanish: Mezquita At-Tauhid) is a Shia Islam mosque, located in the Floresta neighbourhood of Buenos Aires, Argentina.[1] Inaugurated in October 1983, it is the oldest mosque in the country, and was established with the support of the Embassy of the Islamic Republic of Iran to Argentina.[2] It is a simple building with a subtle Islamic style in its façade.

targets.targetText: Masallaci At-Tauhid (Spanish) masallaci ne na Shia Islam, wanda ke cikin unguwar Floresta na Buenos Aires, Argentina . [1] An kaddamar da shi a watan Oktoba na shekara ta 1983, shi ne masallaci mafi tsufa a kasar, kuma an kafa shi ne tare da goyon bayan Ofishin Jakadancin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran a Argentina.[2] Ginin mai sauƙi ne tare da salon Islama mai zurfi a bangon sa.

Masallaci At-Tauhid (Spanish) masallaci ne na yan Shia Islam, wanda ke cikin unguwar Floresta na Buenos Aires, Argentina . [1] An kaddamar da shi a watan Oktoban shekarar 1983, shi ne masallaci mafi dadewa a kasar, kuma an kafa shi tare da goyon bayan ofishin jakadancin Jamhuriyar Musulunci ta Iran a kasar Argentina..[2] Ginin mai sauƙi ne tare da salon Islama mai zurfi a bangon sa.

items.sourceText: In September 1945, settlers opened fire in Douala on a strike demonstration that eventually turned into a riot. According to the colonial authorities, the official death toll was 8 (and 20 wounded), However this count has been disputed.[3] The ensuing repression against the USCC and its leaders led a new generation of activists to take over the leadership with Um Nyobè becoming general secretary of the union in 1947.[2]

targets.targetText: A watan Satumban 1945, mazauna garin sun buɗe wuta a Douala a kan zanga-zangar yajin aikin da a ƙarshe ta rikiɗe zuwa tarzoma.
