Bayan juyin mulkin, Zbiri ya zama mamba na majalisar juyin juya hali, hukumar da gwamnatin Boumédiène ta kafa. [1]

items.sourceText: With the independence of Angola in 1975, Alves was appointed to head the Ministry of Interior [pt]. He used the position to place his loyal followers - known as Nitistas - into positions of power in the new state. But the Nitistas ended up causing a supply chain crisis after stockpiling food, prompting the government to dissolve Alves' ministry. Alves supported fractionism, opposing Neto's foreign policy of nonalignment, evolutionary socialism, and multiracialism.

targets.targetText: Tare da samun 'yancin kai na Angola a shekarar 1975, an naɗa Alves ya jagoranci Ministry of Interior [ pt ] . Ya yi amfani da wannan matsayi wajen sanya mabiyansa masu aminci - wanda aka fi sani da Nitistas - a cikin muƙamai a sabuwar jihar. Amma Nitistas ya kawo ƙarshen matsalar samar da kayayyaki bayan tara abinci, lamarin da ya sa gwamnati ta rusa ma'aikatar Alves. Alves ya goyi bayan ɓangaranci, yana adawa da manufofin Neto na ketare na rashin daidaituwa, zamantakewar juyin halitta, da bambancin launin fata.

Tare da samun 'yancin kai na Angola a 1975, an nada Alves ya jagoranci Ministry of Interior [ pt ] . Ya yi amfani da wannan matsayi wajen sanya mabiyansa masu aminci - wanda aka fi sani da Nitistas - a cikin mukamai a sabuwar jihar. Amma Nitistas ya kawo karshen matsalar samar da kayayyaki bayan tara abinci, lamarin da ya sa gwamnati ta rusa ma'aikatar Alves. Alves ya goyi bayan bangaranci, yana adawa da manufofin Neto na ketare na rashin daidaituwa, zamantakewar juyin halitta, da bambancin launin fata.

items.sourceText: In 1945, Nito Alves was born in the Northern Angolan town of Piri. He started his education at an evangelical mission near his hometown, before moving to the Angolan capital of Luanda in 1960 to continue his education. In 1965, he joined the anti-colonial movement, while in his sixth year at school. After a number of his fellow activists were arrested and imprisoned in 1966, he left the capital and joined the MPLA in the forests of Dembos, where anti-colonial guerrillas had been fighting since the outbreak of the Angolan War of Independence.[1]

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 1945, an haifi Nito Alves a garin Piri na Arewacin Angola. Ya fara karatunsa ne a wata wa'azin bishara kusa da garinsu, kafin ya koma babban birnin Angola na Luanda a shekara ta 1960 don ci gaba da karatunsa. A shekarar 1965, ya shiga kungiyar masu adawa da mulkin mallaka, yayin da yake shekara ta shida a makaranta. Bayan da aka kama wasu ’yan uwansa da aka ɗaure shi a shekarar 1966, ya bar babban birnin ƙasar ya koma jam’iyyar MPLA a dazuzzukan Dembos, inda ‘yan daba masu adawa da mulkin mallaka suka yi ta gwabzawa tun bayan ɓarkewar yakin ‘yancin kai na Angola. [ 1 ]

A cikin 1945, an haifi Nito Alves a garin Piri na Arewacin Angola. Ya fara karatunsa ne a wata wa'azin bishara kusa da garinsu, kafin ya koma babban birnin Angola na Luanda a shekara ta 1960 don ci gaba da karatunsa. A shekarar 1965, ya shiga kungiyar masu adawa da mulkin mallaka, yayin da yake shekara ta shida a makaranta. Bayan da aka kama wasu ’yan uwansa da aka daure shi a shekarar 1966, ya bar babban birnin kasar ya koma jam’iyyar MPLA a dazuzzukan Dembos, inda ‘yan daba masu adawa da mulkin mallaka suka yi ta gwabzawa tun bayan barkewar yakin ‘yancin kai na Angola . [ 1 ]

items.sourceText: Surrounded by Africans, African Americans felt that they could be reunited with long-lost relatives in their homeland. However, some argue that these perceptions of Africa by African Americans were detrimental to African American experiences in Ghana. According to Derek Catsam, "the African American image of Africa has historically been no less warped [than the White American image] but has been characterized by romanticism, fetishism, and nostalgia. Black Americans have often perpetuated an uncomplicated view of Africa as a vestigial homeland awaiting the return of its lost souls."[6]

targets.targetText: Da 'yan Afirka ke kewaye da su, 'yan Afirka na Amurka sun ji cewa za a iya sake haɗuwa da dangi da suka ɓace a ƙasarsu. Koyaya, wasu suna jayayya cewa waɗannan ra'ayoyin Afirka ta Afirka na Afirka sun kasance masu lahani ga abubuwan da Afirka ta Amirka ta samu a Ghana. A cewar Derek Catsam, "hoton Afirka na Afirka a tarihi bai kasance ba wanda ya lalace [kamar hoton White American] amma an nuna shi da soyayya, fetishism, da nostalgia. Baƙar fata Amurkawa galibi suna ci gaba da ra'ayi mara rikitarwa game da Afirka a matsayin ƙasar da ke jiran dawowar rayukan da suka ɓace. "[1]

Da 'yan Afirka ke kewaye da su, 'yan Afirka na Amurka sun ji cewa za a iya sake haɗuwa da dangi da suka ɓace a ƙasarsu. Koyaya, wasu suna jayayya cewa waɗannan ra'ayoyin Afirka ta Afirka na Afirka sun kasance masu lahani ga abubuwan da Afirka ta Amirka ta samu a Ghana. A cewar Derek Catsam, "hoton Afirka na Afirka a tarihi bai kasance ba wanda ya lalace [kamar hoton White American] amma an nuna shi da soyayya, fetishism, da nostalgia. Baƙar fata Amurkawa galibi suna ci gaba da ra'ayi mara rikitarwa game da Afirka a matsayin ƙasar da ke jiran dawowar rayukan da suka ɓace.

items.sourceText: He decided to leave public life for health reasons in November 2003, when he resigned from the legislative mandate he had held since 1975.[19] The Angolan Ministry of Defense retired him as an army general in 2004, but he refused to use the rank because he did not consider himself a military professional.[2]

targets.targetText: Ya yanke shawarar barin rayuwar jama'a saboda dalilai na kiwon lafiya a cikin Nuwamba 2003, lokacin da ya yi murabus daga wa'adin majalisar da ya rike tun 1975. [1] Ma'aikatar tsaron Angola ta yi masa ritaya a matsayin Janar na soja a shekara ta 2004, amma ya ki yin amfani da wannan mukamin saboda bai dauki kansa a matsayin kwararren soja ba. [2]

Ya yanke shawarar barin rayuwar jama'a saboda dalilai na kiwon lafiya a cikin watan Nuwamba 2003, lokacin da ya yi murabus daga wa'adin majalisar da ya riƙe tun 1975. [1] Ma'aikatar tsaron Angola ta yi masa ritaya a matsayin Janar na soja a shekara ta 2004, amma ya ki yin amfani da wannan muƙamin saboda bai ɗauki kansa a matsayin kwararren soja ba. [2]

items.sourceText: While there, probably in August 1960,[6] he met Holden Roberto, who was already a rising star in émigré circles. Roberto was a founding member of the UPA ( União das Populaçoes de Angola) and was already known for his efforts to promote Angolan independence at the United Nations. He tried to recruit Savimbi who seemed to have been undecided whether to commit himself to the cause of Angolan independence at that point in his life.

targets.targetText: Yayin da yake can, mai yiwuwa a cikin watan Agusta 1960, [ 6 ] ya haɗu da Holden Roberto, wanda ya riga ya kasance tauraro mai tasowa a cikin da'irar émigré. Roberto ya kasance memban na kafa UPA (União das Populaçoes de Angola) kuma an riga an san shi da ƙoƙarinsa na inganta 'yancin Angola a Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya. Ya yi ƙoƙari ya ɗauki Savimbi wanda da alama bai yanke shawarar ko zai sadaukar da kansa ga fa'idar samun 'yancin kai na Angola a wancan lokacin a rayuwarsa ba.

Yayin da yake can, mai yiwuwa a cikin Agusta 1960, [ 6 ] ya sadu da Holden Roberto, wanda ya riga ya kasance tauraro mai tasowa a cikin da'irar émigré. Roberto ya kasance memban kafa UPA ( União das Populaçoes de Angola ) kuma an riga an san shi da ƙoƙarinsa na inganta 'yancin Angola a Majalisar Dinkin Duniya . Ya yi ƙoƙari ya ɗauki Savimbi wanda da alama bai yanke shawarar ko zai sadaukar da kansa ga fa'idar samun 'yancin kai na Angola a wancan lokacin a rayuwarsa ba.

items.sourceText: In 1963, he co-founded the Front for the Liberation of the Enclave of Cabinda (FLEC), a political organization that fought, at the time, against Portuguese colonial rule.[1] Because he was part of the FLEC, he was arrested in 1970 by the colonial PIDE.[8] He served his sentence in the São Nicolau jail in Bentiaba.[9] He was released in 1974, opened a FLEC office in Tchiowa, the capital of Cabinda;[9] and a year later, he was appointed chairman of the FLEC.[10]

targets.targetText: A shekara ta 1963, ya kafa kungiyar 'yantar da 'yantar da yankin Cabinda (FLEC), kungiyar siyasa da ta yi yaki, a lokacin, da mulkin mallaka na Portugal. [1] Domin yana cikin FLEC, an kama shi a cikin 1970 ta PIDE na mulkin mallaka. [2] Ya yanke hukuncin ne a gidan yarin São Nicolau da ke Bentiaba . [3] An sake shi a cikin 1974, ya bude ofishin FLEC a Tchiowa, babban birnin Cabinda; [3] kuma bayan shekara guda, an nada shi shugaban FLEC. [4]

A shekara ta 1963, ya kafa kungiyar 'yantar da 'yantar da yankin Cabinda (FLEC), kungiyar siyasa da ta yi yaki, a lokacin, 'yan mulkin mallaka na ƙasar Portugal. [1] Domin yana cikin FLEC, an kama shi a cikin shekarar 1970 ta PIDE na mulkin mallaka. [2] Ya yanke hukuncin ne a gidan yarin São Nicolau da ke Bentiaba. [3] An sake shi a cikin shekarar 1974, ya buɗe ofishin FLEC a Tchiowa, babban birnin Cabinda; [3] kuma bayan shekara guda, an naɗa shi shugaban FLEC. [4]

items.sourceText: In March 1975, Agostinho Neto named him the national political commissioner and sub-chief of the general staff of FAPLA.[2] In his post, he was the third in command of the military hierarchy of the party, after Armed Forces head Iko Carreira and head of general staff João Luís Xietu. On 11 November 1975, Angola's independence was declared, with the MPLA as the ruling party. A long civil war began afterwards between the new Angolan state and various rival groups. Van-Dúnem actively participated in the battles of 1975 and 1976.[2]

targets.targetText: A cikin watan Maris 1975, Agostinho Neto ya naɗa shi kwamishinan siyasa na ƙasa da kuma babban hafsan hafsoshin FAPLA. [1] A cikin muƙaminsa, shi ne na uku a kan muƙamin kwamandan manyan jami'an soji na jam'iyyar, bayan shugaban rundunar soji Iko Carreira da kuma babban hafsan hafsoshin João Luís Xietu. A ranar 11 ga watan Nuwamban 1975, aka ayyana ‘yancin kai na Angola, tare da MPLA a matsayin jam’iyya mai mulki. Bayan haka ne aka fara wani dogon yakin basasa tsakanin sabuwar ƙasar Angola da kungiyoyi daban-daban masu gaba da juna. Van-Dúnem ya halarci yaƙe-yaƙe na shekarar 1975 da 1976. [1]

A cikin Maris 1975, Agostinho Neto ya nada shi kwamishinan siyasa na kasa da kuma babban hafsan hafsoshin FAPLA. [1] A cikin mukaminsa, shi ne na uku a kan mukamin kwamandan manyan jami'an soji na jam'iyyar, bayan shugaban rundunar soji Iko Carreira da kuma babban hafsan hafsoshin João Luís Xietu . A ranar 11 ga Nuwamban 1975, aka ayyana ‘yancin kai na Angola, tare da MPLA a matsayin jam’iyya mai mulki. Bayan haka ne aka fara wani dogon yakin basasa tsakanin sabuwar kasar Angola da kungiyoyi daban-daban masu gaba da juna. Van-Dúnem ya halarci yaƙe-yaƙe na 1975 da 1976. [1]

items.sourceText: With the Carnation Revolution in Portugal on 25 April 1974, the decolonization process had begun.[2] Van-Dúnem was freed, and he became, along with Nito Alves and Daniel Chipenda, the most influential figures in the MPLA for their participation and leadership in the fight for independence.[2] With Alves, both him and Van-Dúnem initiated the reforms of the 1st Military Police Region (Luanda, Dembos and Norte Angolano) of the MPLA and the reactivation of the 4th region (Malanje and Cuanza).[2] They were also able to reactive the important cell organizations in Luanda,[3] the Operational Command of Luanda (COL), and partially stabilize the situation in the capital,[3] organizing patrols to maintain order, feats that would guarantee the success of the Agostinho Neto wing of the party during the Lundoji Conference.[3] In the conference in July 1974, Van-Dúnem was elected to the party's Central Committee and became the youngest member of MPLA's leadership.[2]

targets.targetText: Tare da juyin juya halin Carnation a Portugal a ranar 25 ga watan Afrilu 1974, an fara aiwatar da tsarin mulkin mallaka. [1] An 'yantar da Van-Dúnem, kuma ya zama, tare da Nito Alves da Daniel Chipenda, manyan mutane masu tasiri a cikin MPLA don shiga da jagoranci a yakin neman 'yancin kai. [1] Tare da Alves, shi da Van-Dúnem sun fara gyare-gyaren gyare-gyare na Yanki na 1st Soja (Luanda, Dembos da Norte Angolano) na MPLA da sake kunnawa yankin na 4 (Malanje da Cuanza). [1] Har ila yau, sun sami damar mayar da martani ga muhimman kungiyoyin tantanin halitta a Luanda, [2] Dokar Ayyuka na Luanda (COL), da wani ɓangare na daidaita al'amura a babban birnin ƙasar, [2] shirya sintiri don tabbatar da tsari, abubuwan da za su tabbatar da nasarar reshen Agostinho Neto na jam'iyyar yayin taron Lundoji. [2] A taron da aka yi a watan Yulin 1974, an zaɓi Van-Dúnem a matsayin Babban Kwamitin Jam’iyyar kuma ya zama ɗan ƙarami a cikin shugabancin MPLA. [1]

Tare da juyin juya halin Carnation a Portugal a ranar 25 ga Afrilu 1974, an fara aiwatar da tsarin mulkin mallaka. [1] An 'yantar da Van-Dúnem, kuma ya zama, tare da Nito Alves da Daniel Chipenda, manyan mutane masu tasiri a cikin MPLA don shiga da jagoranci a yakin neman 'yancin kai. [1] Tare da Alves, shi da Van-Dúnem sun fara gyare-gyaren gyare-gyare na Yanki na 1st Soja (Luanda, Dembos da Norte Angolano) na MPLA da sake kunnawa yankin na 4 (Malanje da Cuanza). [1] Har ila yau, sun sami damar mayar da martani ga muhimman kungiyoyin tantanin halitta a Luanda, [2] Dokar Ayyuka na Luanda (COL), da wani bangare na daidaita al'amura a babban birnin kasar, [2] shirya sintiri don tabbatar da tsari, abubuwan da za su tabbatar da nasarar reshen Agostinho Neto na jam'iyyar yayin taron Lundoji. [2] A taron da aka yi a watan Yulin 1974, an zaɓi Van-Dúnem a matsayin Babban Kwamitin Jam’iyyar kuma ya zama ɗan ƙarami a cikin shugabancin MPLA. [1]

items.sourceText: Lake Léré is a lake in the Mayo-Kebbi Ouest Region in southwestern Chad about 6 km east of the border with Cameroon. It is fed by the Mayo Kébbi that leaves near Léré the smaller Lake Tréné.[1]

targets.targetText: Tafkin Léré tafki ne a yankin Mayo-Kebbi Ouest a kudu maso yammacin Chadi kimanin kilomita 6 a gabashin iyakar da Kamaru .  Mayo Kébbi ne ke ciyar da shi wanda ke barin kusa da Lere karamin Tafkin Tréné . [1]

Tafkin Léré tafki ne a yankin Mayo-Kebbi Ouest a kudu maso yammacin Chadi kimanin nisan kilomita 6 da gabashin iyakar da Kamaru.  Tafkin Mayo Kébbi ne ke bashi ruwa, wanda ke ɓarin kusa da Lere karamin Tafkin Tréné . [1]

items.sourceText: Liceu's parents, José Vieira Dias and Jaquenita do Aniceto de Carvalho, were originally from northern Angola and were of Kongo origin. They migrated to Luanda, where Liceu was born on 1 May 1919.[1] Liceu was one of the couples ten children, the others being Fernando Torres Vieira Dias, Domingas Torres Vieira Dias, José Vieira Dias Filho, Antónia Diniz de Aniceto Vieira Dias, Joaquim Militão Vieira Dias, Zita Vieira Dias, Manuel Helder Vieira Dias, Novato Vieira Dias, and Bernardo Vieira Dias.

targets.targetText: Iyayen Liceu, José Vieira Dias da Jaquenita do Aniceto de Carvalho, sun fito ne daga arewacin Angola kuma ƴan asalin Kongo ne. Sun yi ƙaura zuwa Luanda, inda aka haifi Liceu a ranar 1 ga Mayu 1919. [1] Liceu yana ɗaya daga cikin ma'auratan yara goma, sauran su ne Fernando Torres Vieira Dias, Domingas Torres Vieira Dias, José Vieira Dias Filho, Antónia Diniz de Aniceto Vieira Dias, Joaquim Militão Vieira Dias, Zita Vieira Dias, Manuel Helder Vieira Dias, Novatoe.

Iyayen Liceu, José Vieira Dias da Jaquenita do Aniceto de Carvalho, sun fito ne daga arewacin Angola kuma ƴan asalin Kongo ne. Sun yi ƙaura zuwa Luanda, inda aka haifi Liceu a ranar 1 ga watan Mayu 1919. [1] Liceu yana ɗaya daga cikin 'ya'yan ma'auratan yara goma, sauran su ne Fernando Torres Vieira Dias, Domingas Torres Vieira Dias, José Vieira Dias Filho, Antónia Diniz de Aniceto Vieira Dias, Joaquim Militão Vieira Dias, Zita Vieira Dias, Manuel Helder Vieira Dias, Novatoe.

items.sourceText: Liceu was also one of the co-founders of the Movement for the Independence of Angola (MIA) and MPLA.[4] He was later imprisoned for more than a decade at Tarrafal concentration camp in Cape Verde, being implicated in the Trial of Fifty.[5] By the time he had left prison in 1969, Liceu attempted to reunite the members of Ngola Ritmos again beginning in the 1970s, but encountered major difficulties due to political persecution. They were effectively blocked out of public performances or political activities. After the war for Angola's independence ended in 1975, the subsequent civil war brought a rapid decline to musical productions in Angola. In 1978, Ngola Ritmos made their last public appearance with all of their members. Liceu began performing solo afterwards.[6]

targets.targetText: Liceu kuma ya kasance daya daga cikin wadanda suka kafa kungiyar Movement for the Independence of Angola (MIA) da MPLA. [1] Daga baya an daure shi fiye da shekaru goma a sansanin taro na Tarrafal da ke Cape Verde, ana tuhumar sa a cikin shari'ar hamsin . [2] A lokacin da ya bar gidan yari a shekarar 1969, Liceu ya yi yunkurin sake haduwa da mambobin Ngola Ritmos tun daga shekarun 1970, amma ya ci karo da manyan matsaloli saboda tsanantar siyasa. An toshe su yadda ya kamata daga ayyukan jama'a ko ayyukan siyasa. Bayan yakin neman 'yancin kai na Angola a shekarar 1975, yakin basasar da ya biyo baya ya kawo koma baya ga ayyukan kade-kade a Angola. A cikin 1978, Ngola Ritmos sun fito fili na ƙarshe tare da dukkan membobinsu. Liceu ya fara yin solo daga baya. [3]

Liceu kuma ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda suka kafa kungiyar Movement for the Independence of Angola (MIA) da MPLA. [1] Daga baya an ɗaure shi fiye da shekaru goma a sansanin taro na Tarrafal da ke Cape Verde, ana tuhumar sa a cikin shari'ar hamsin. [2] A lokacin da ya bar gidan yari a shekarar 1969, Liceu ya yi yunkurin sake haɗuwa da mambobin Ngola Ritmos tun daga shekarun 1970, amma ya ci karo da manyan matsaloli saboda tsanantar siyasa. An toshe su yadda ya kamata daga ayyukan jama'a ko ayyukan siyasa. Bayan yakin neman 'yancin kai na Angola a shekarar 1975, yakin basasar da ya biyo baya ya kawo koma baya ga ayyukan kaɗe-kaɗe a Angola. A cikin shekarar 1978, Ngola Ritmos sun fito fili na ƙarshe tare da dukkan membobinsu. Liceu ya fara yin solo daga baya. [3]

items.sourceText: Mahe was born in 1951 in Ilorin, Ilorin South Local Government Area of Kwara State, Nigeria. He studied Business Administration at the University of Calabar, where he obtained his master's degree. Additionally, he earned an Ordinary National Diploma and a Higher National Diploma in Marketing from Kaduna Polytechnic and Kwara State Polytechnic, respectively.[1]

targets.targetText: An haifi Mahe a shekarar 1951 a Ilorin, karamar hukumar Ilorin ta kudu a Jihar Kwara, kasar Najeriya. Ya karanta Business Administration a Jami'ar Calabar, inda ya samu digiri na biyu. Bugu da kari, ya samu takardar shaidar kammala difloma ta kasa(ND) da kuma babbar difloma(HND)a fannin kasuwanci daga Kaduna Polytechnic da kuma Kwara State Polytechnic, bi da bi. [1]

An haifi Mahe a shekarar 1951 a Ilorin, karamar hukumar Ilorin ta kudu a jihar Kwara, Najeriya. Ya karanta Business Administration a Jami'ar Calabar, inda ya samu digiri na biyu. Bugu da kari, ya samu takardar shaidar kammala difloma ta kasa da kuma babbar difloma a fannin kasuwanci daga Kaduna Polytechnic da Kwara State Polytechnic, bi da bi. [1]

items.sourceText: In the middle of the Carnation Revolution and the expectations of the decolonization of Angola, he was invited by Neto in July 1974 to serve in as a party representative at the Organisation of African Unity to discuss and attempt one last solution to split the Active Revolt and the Eastern Revolt.[8] Frustrated and obliged to, he received permission with other commanders to reformulate the EPLA and transformed it into the People's Armed Forces of Liberation of Angola (FAPLA).[9]

targets.targetText: A tsakiyar juyin juya hali na Carnation da kuma tsammanin da za a yankewa Angola mulkin mallaka, Neto ya gayyace shi a cikin Yuli 1974 don zama wakilin jam'iyya a Ƙungiyar Hadin Kan Afirka don tattaunawa da ƙoƙarin warwarewa ta ƙarshe don raba Tawayen Aiki da Tawayen Gabas. [1] Cike da takaici kuma ya zama dole, ya sami izini tare da wasu kwamandoji don sake fasalin EPLA kuma ya canza ta zuwa Rundunar Sojojin Yantar da Angola (FAPLA). [2]

A tsakiyar juyin juya hali na Carnation da kuma tsammanin da za a yankewa Angola mulkin mallaka, Neto ya gayyace shi a cikin watan Yuli 1974 don zama wakilin jam'iyya a Ƙungiyar Haɗin Kan Afirka don tattaunawa da ƙoƙarin warwarewa ta ƙarshe don raba Tawayen Aiki da Tawayen Gabas. [1] Cike da takaici kuma ya zama dole, ya sami izini tare da wasu kwamandoji don sake fasalin EPLA kuma ya canza ta zuwa Rundunar Sojojin Yantar da Angola (FAPLA). [2]

items.sourceText: On 8 November 1974 he lodged with the “delegation of 26” of the party, led by secretary-general Lara. His participation contributed to his rapid ascension into leadership positions in the MPLA, including being elected to the Central Committee of the Movement.[6] In January 1975, at the Alvor Agreement, he organized the Presidential Council on the Transition of Government as the minister of Planning and Finances.[10]

targets.targetText: A ranar 8 ga watan Nuwamba, 1974 ya zauna tare da "wakilan 26" na jam'iyyar, wanda babban sakataren Lara ya jagoranta. Shigar da ya yi ya taimaka wajen hawan sa cikin gaggawa zuwa muƙaman shugabanci a cikin MPLA, ciki har da zaɓen da aka yi masa a kwamitin tsakiya na kungiyar. [1] A cikin shekarar Janairu 1975, a Yarjejeniyar Alvor, ya shirya Majalisar Shugaban Ƙasa akan Canjin Gwamnati a matsayin Ministan Tsare-tsare da Kuɗi. [2]

A ranar 8 ga Nuwamba, 1974 ya zauna tare da "wakilan 26" na jam'iyyar, wanda babban sakataren Lara ya jagoranta. Shigar da ya yi ya taimaka wajen hawan sa cikin gaggawa zuwa mukaman shugabanci a cikin MPLA, ciki har da zaben da aka yi masa a kwamitin tsakiya na kungiyar. [1] A cikin Janairu 1975, a Yarjejeniyar Alvor, ya shirya Majalisar Shugaban Kasa akan Canjin Gwamnati a matsayin Ministan Tsare-tsare da Kuɗi. [2]

items.sourceText: On 27 May 1977, the nitistas attempted to overthrow the state.[13] Various national leaders were taken hostage, among them Mingas, who had driven to meet with Neto and lead a group to attempt to retake the 9th Brigade headquarters and take control of the mutinous troops.[13] Mingas was captured by the nitistas from DISA and was taken, along with Eugénio Nzaji and other military personnel against the revolt, to Sambizanga, where they were later burned alive.[13] Zé Mingas was not aware of the plans of the nitistas to kidnap and kill his brother, and himself was ultimately killed during the violent repression by the state against the coup attempt.

targets.targetText: A ranar 27 ga Mayu 1977, nitistas sun yi yunkurin hambarar da jihar. [1] An yi garkuwa da shugabannin kasar daban-daban, ciki har da Mingas, wanda ya tuka motar Neto don ganawa da Neto, ya jagoranci wata kungiyar da ta yi yunkurin kwato hedikwatar Brigade ta 9 da kuma kwace iko da sojojin da suka yi kaca-kaca da su. [1] An kama Mingas daga nitistas daga DISA kuma an dauke su tare da Eugénio Nzaji da wasu jami'an soji da ke adawa da tawayen zuwa Sambizanga, inda daga baya aka kona su da ransu. [1] Zé Mingas bai san shirin nitistas na yin garkuwa da kuma kashe dan uwansa ba, kuma a karshe an kashe shi a lokacin da ake muzgunawa jihar a kan yunkurin juyin mulkin.

A ranar 27 ga watan Mayu 1977, nitistas sun yi yunkurin hambarar da jihar. [1] An yi garkuwa da shugabannin ƙasar daban-daban, ciki har da Mingas, wanda ya tuka motar Neto don ganawa da Neto, ya jagoranci wata kungiyar da ta yi yunkurin kwato hedikwatar Brigade ta 9 da kuma kwace iko da sojojin da suka yi kaca-kaca da su. [1] An kama Mingas daga nitistas daga DISA kuma an ɗauke su tare da Eugénio Nzaji da wasu jami'an soji da ke adawa da tawayen zuwa Sambizanga, inda daga baya aka kona su da ransu. [1] Zé Mingas bai san shirin nitistas na yin garkuwa da kuma kashe ɗan uwansa ba, kuma a ƙarshe an kashe shi a lokacin da ake muzgunawa jihar a kan yunkurin juyin mulkin.

items.sourceText: In early June 2006, shortly before the Gambian presidential elections, he was along with some of his men put in detention “at the house of a military officer in Bissau" during a visit to that country.[2] He was detained at the Masuang Military Camp "in maximum military detention” on 12 May 2007.[3] On January 30, some military officers in Bissau blocked their own government in its attempts to hand Kukoi Sanyang over to the authorities in Banjul.[2] That government has spent close to three million US dollars in its attempts at extradition, wanting to arrange for Sanyang's repatriation to Banjul against Casamance hard-line rebel leader being handed over to Senegal.[3] It has been suggested that Sanyang may have been preparing an attack on Yahya Jammeh prior to the elections, and then seize power.[citation needed]

targets.targetText: A farkon watan Yuni na shekara ta 2006, jim kadan kafin zaben shugaban kasar Gambia, yana tare da wasu mutanensa da aka tsare a “gidan wani jami’in soja da ke Bissau ” a wata ziyara da ya kai kasar. [1] An tsare shi a sansanin soji na Masuang "a iyakar tsare soja" a ranar 12 ga Mayu 2007. [2] A ranar 30 ga watan Janairu, wasu jami’an soji a Bissau sun tare gwamnatinsu a yunkurinta na mika Kukoi Sanyang ga hukuma a Banjul. [1] Wannan gwamnati ta kashe kusan dalar Amurka miliyan uku wajen yunkurin tasa keyar kasar, inda take son shirya mayar da Sanyang zuwa Banjul a kan mika shugaban 'yan tawayen Casamance ga Senegal. [2] An dai bayyana cewa, mai yiwuwa Sanyang ya shirya kai hari kan Yahya Jammeh kafin zaben, sannan ya kwace mulki. [ abubuwan da ake bukata ]

A farkon watan Yuni na shekara ta 2006, jim kaɗan kafin zaɓen shugaban ƙasar Gambia, yana tare da wasu mutanensa da aka tsare a “gidan wani jami’in soja da ke Bissau” a wata ziyara da ya kai kasar. [1] An tsare shi a sansanin soji na Masuang "a iyakar tsare soja" a ranar 12 ga watan Mayu 2007. [2] A ranar 30 ga watan Janairu, wasu jami’an soji a Bissau sun tare gwamnatinsu a yunkurinta na miƙa Kukoi Sanyang ga hukuma a Banjul. [1] Wannan gwamnati ta kashe kusan dalar Amurka miliyan uku wajen yunkurin tasa keyar ƙasar, inda take son shirya mayar da Sanyang zuwa Banjul a kan miƙa shugaban 'yan tawayen Casamance ga Senegal. [2] An dai bayyana cewa, mai yiwuwa Sanyang ya shirya kai hari kan Yahya Jammeh kafin zaɓen, sannan ya kwace mulki. [ abubuwan da ake bukata ]

items.sourceText: During the Congress of Vienna on 21 January 1815 the British agreed to pay the Portuguese Prince Regent £300,000 in reparations for Portuguese ships seized by the British "cruizers" prior to 1 June 1814, on the basis that they were engaged in the slave trade.[5]: 73  The next day they entered into a further treaty which prohibited Portuguese ships from engaging in the slave trade along the coast of Africa north of the equator.[5]: 77 This was tied to a loan of £600,000 and the treaty was to be ratified within five months.[5]: 79  Over two years later on 28 July 1817 an Additional Convention was added which included the first provision for Mixed Commissions formed of an equal number of individuals of the two nations. One was to be located in a British possession and the other in a Portuguese possession, with one on the coast of Africa, and the other on the coast of Brazil.[5]: 89  A further Mixed Commission was also set up on a similar basis in London. While the treaty allowed Portuguese slave traders to continue their business south of the equator, the trade was forbidden to the north. The £300,000 mentioned in 1815 had not been paid, but the British agreed to pay it in two instalments of £150,000, as well as 5% interest since the earlier convention in January 1815. Full documentation of the treaty was to be available in English and Portuguese on all British ships. Further regulations governing the Mixed Commissions:

targets.targetText: A lokacin Majalisa ta Vienna a ranar 21 ga watan Janairun shekara ta 1815 Birtaniya ta amince da biyan Yarima Regent na Portugal £ 300,000 a matsayin fansa ga jiragen ruwa na Portugal da 'yan Birtaniya suka kwace kafin 1 ga Yuni 1814, bisa ga cewa suna cikin cinikin bayi. [1]: 73 Kashegari sun shiga wani yarjejeniya wanda ya hana jiragen ruwa na Portugal shiga cinikin bayi a bakin tekun Afirka a arewacin ma'auni.[1]: 77 Wannan an ɗaure shi da rancen £ 600,000 kuma za a tabbatar da yarjejeniyar cikin watanni biyar.[1]: 79 Fiye da shekaru biyu bayan haka a ranar 28 ga Yuli 1817 an kara wani Ƙarin Yarjejeniya wanda ya haɗa da tanadi na farko don Kwamitin Haɗin gwiwa wanda aka kafa na daidaitattun mutane na ƙasashe biyu. Ɗaya zai kasance a cikin mallakar Burtaniya ɗayan kuma a cikin mallakarsa ta Fotigal, tare da ɗaya a bakin tekun Afirka, ɗayan kuma a bakin tekon Brazil.[1]: 89 An kuma kafa wani hadin gwiwa a kan irin wannan tushe a London. Duk da yake yarjejeniyar ta ba da damar 'yan kasuwa na bayi na Portugal su ci gaba da kasuwancin su a kudancin ma'auni, an haramta cinikin zuwa arewa. Ba a biya £ 300,000 da aka ambata a 1815 ba, amma Birtaniya sun amince da biyan shi a kashi biyu na £ 150,000, da kuma kashi 5% tun lokacin da aka yi taron da ya gabata a watan Janairun 1815. Cikakken takardun yarjejeniyar za su kasance a cikin Turanci da Portuguese a duk jiragen ruwa na Burtaniya. Ƙarin ƙa'idodi da ke kula da Kwamitin Haɗin Kai:

A lokacin Majalisa ta Vienna a ranar 21 ga watan Janairun shekara ta 1815 Birtaniya ta amince da biyan Yarima Regent na Portugal £ 300,000 a matsayin fansa ga jiragen ruwa na Portugal da 'yan Birtaniya suka kwace kafin 1 ga Yuni 1814, bisa ga cewa suna cikin cinikin bayi.: 73 Kashegari sun shiga wani yarjejeniya wanda ya hana jiragen ruwa na Portugal shiga cinikin bayi a bakin tekun Afirka a arewacin ma'auni.: 77 Wannan an ɗaure shi da rancen £ 600,000 kuma za a tabbatar da yarjejeniyar cikin watanni biyar.: 79 Fiye da shekaru biyu bayan haka a ranar 28 ga Yuli 1817 an kara wani Ƙarin Yarjejeniya wanda ya haɗa da tanadi na farko don Kwamitin Haɗin gwiwa wanda aka kafa na daidaitattun mutane na ƙasashe biyu. Ɗaya zai kasance a cikin mallakar Burtaniya ɗayan kuma a cikin mallakarsa ta Fotigal, tare da ɗaya a bakin tekun Afirka, ɗayan kuma a bakin tekon Brazil. 89 An kuma kafa wani hadin gwiwa a kan irin wannan tushe a London. Duk da yake yarjejeniyar ta ba da damar 'yan kasuwa na bayi na Portugal su ci gaba da kasuwancin su a kudancin ma'auni, an haramta cinikin zuwa arewa. Ba a biya £ 300,000 da aka ambata a 1815 ba, amma Birtaniya sun amince da biyan shi a kashi biyu na £ 150,000, da kuma kashi 5% tun lokacin da aka yi taron da ya gabata a watan Janairun 1815. Cikakken takardun yarjejeniyar za su kasance a cikin Turanci da Portuguese a duk jiragen ruwa na Burtaniya. Ƙarin ƙa'idodi da ke kula da Kwamitin Haɗin Kai:

items.sourceText: Abusedra achieved her Bachelor of Science and Master of Science degrees at the University of Garyounis in Benghazi. After achieving her PhD at the University of Exeter in the United Kingdom, Abusedra worked as an associate researcher at Exeter's School of Engineering, Computer Science and Mathematics from 2007 to 2009.[1]

targets.targetText: Abusedra ta samu digirin farko na Kimiyya da Digiri na biyu a Jami'ar Garyounis da ke Benghazi . Bayan ta sami digiri na uku a Jami'ar Exeter a Burtaniya, Abusedra ta yi aiki a matsayin abokiyar bincike a Makarantar Injiniya, Kimiyyar Kwamfuta da Lissafi daga 2007 zuwa 2009. [1]

Abusedra ta samu digirin farko na Kimiyya da Digiri na biyu a Jami'ar Garyounis da ke Benghazi. Bayan ta sami digiri na uku a Jami'ar Exeter a Burtaniya, Abusedra ta yi aiki a matsayin abokiyar bincike a Makarantar Injiniyanci da, Kimiyyar Kwamfuta da Lissafi daga shekarun 2007 zuwa 2009. [1]

items.sourceText: Abusedra then became the Head of International Relations Administration under the new de facto government of Libya, serving with the National Transitional Council’s Office for Culture and Civil Society.[1] From March 2013 to December 2014, she served as Deputy Minister of Information of Libya. From June 2017 to June 2020, she served as an advisor to the Minister of State for Institution Reform.[2][3]

targets.targetText: Daga nan Abusedra ya zama Shugaban Hukumar Kula da Hulda da Kasa da Kasa a karkashin sabuwar gwamnatin Libya, yana aiki da Ofishin Al'adu da Jama'a na Majalisar Rikon kwarya ta kasa . [1] Daga Maris 2013 zuwa Disamba 2014, ta yi aiki a matsayin mataimakiyar ministar yada labarai na Libya. Daga watan Yuni 2017 zuwa Yuni 2020, ta yi aiki a matsayin mai ba da shawara ga Karamar Ministar Ma'aikatar Gyaran Hukumomi. [2] [3]

Daga nan Abusedra ta zama Shugaban Hukumar Kula da Hulɗa da Ƙasa da Ƙasa a ƙarƙashin sabuwar gwamnatin Libya, tana aiki da Ofishin Al'adu da Jama'a na Majalisar Rikon kwarya ta ƙasa. [1] Daga watan Maris 2013 zuwa watan Disamba 2014, ta yi aiki a matsayin mataimakiyar ministar yaɗa labarai na Libya. Daga watan Yuni 2017 zuwa Yuni 2020, ta yi aiki a matsayin mai ba da shawara ga Ƙaramar Ministar Ma'aikatar Gyaran Hukumomi. [2] [3]

items.sourceText: In this role, Abusedra has supported and cooperated with the UN's independent fact-finding mission, which had a mandate to investigate human rights, in Libya. The mission found "reports of torture, extrajudicial killings, enforced disappearances and sexual and gender-based violence" and "political division, insecurity, the proliferation of weapons and the increasing phenomenon of irregular migration and external intervention." A national human rights plan has been implemented in Libya to address the issues and violations of international human rights law.[7][8]

targets.targetText: A cikin wannan rawar, Abusedra ya ba da goyon baya tare da ba da haɗin kai tare da tawagar bincike mai zaman kanta ta Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya, wacce ke da alhakin binciken 'yancin ɗan adam, a Libya. Ofishin ya gano "rahotanni na azabtarwa, kisan gilla, tilasta ɓacewar mutane da cin zarafi na jima'i da jinsi" da "rarrabuwar siyasa, rashin tsaro, yaɗuwar makamai da kyaruwar al'amuran ƙaura ba bisa ka'ida ba da kuma shiga tsakani na waje." An aiwatar da wani shiri na kare hakkin ɗan Adam na ƙasa a Libya don magance batutuwa da take hakki na dokokin ƙasa da ƙasa. [1] [2]

A cikin wannan rawar, Abusedra ya ba da goyon baya tare da ba da haɗin kai tare da tawagar bincike mai zaman kanta ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, wadda ke da alhakin binciken 'yancin ɗan adam, a Libya. Ofishin ya gano "rahotanni na azabtarwa, kisan gilla, tilasta bacewar mutane da cin zarafi na jima'i da jinsi" da "rarrabuwar siyasa, rashin tsaro, yaduwar makamai da karuwar al'amuran ƙaura ba bisa ka'ida ba da kuma shiga tsakani na waje." An aiwatar da wani shiri na kare hakkin dan Adam na kasa a Libya don magance batutuwa da take hakki na dokokin kasa da kasa . [1] [2]

items.sourceText: After independence, while commanding the National Liberation Army of the South, he helped found the UNFP, a socialist party that split from the Istiqlal party in 1959, and headed its daily newspaper, Al-Tahrir.

targets.targetText: Bayan samun 'yancin kai, a lokacin da yake jagorantar rundunar 'yantar da 'yancin kai ta Kudu, ya taimaka wajen kafa UNFP, jam'iyyar gurguzu wacce ta balle daga jam'iyyar Istiqlal a 1959, kuma ta jagoranci jaridarta ta Al-Tahrir.

Bayan samun 'yancin kai, a lokacin da yake jagorantar rundunar 'yantar da 'yancin kai ta Kudu, ya taimaka wajen kafa UNFP, jam'iyyar gurguzu wacce ta ɓalle daga jam'iyyar Istiqlal a shekarar 1959, kuma ta jagoranci jaridarta ta Al-Tahrir.

items.sourceText: At an All Progressives Congress campaign event in Lagos in 2019, MC Oluomo was stabbed by someone thought to be loyal to the then outgoing Lagos State governor, Akinwumi Ambode whose re-election bid had been thwarted.[6]

targets.targetText: A wani taron yakin neman zabe na All Progressives Congress a Legas a shekarar 2019, wani da ake zaton yana da aminci ga Gwamnan Jihar Legas mai barin gado, Akinwumi Ambode wanda aka hana sake zabensa.[1]

A wani taron yaƙin neman zaɓe na jam'iyyar All Progressives Congress a Legas a shekarar 2019, wani da ake zaton yana da aminci ga Gwamnan Jihar Legas mai barin gado, Akinwumi Ambode wanda aka hana sake zaɓensa.[1]

items.sourceText: In 1976, he appeared in Ola Balogun's Ajani Ogun and later produced and starred Ija Ominira (1979), also directed by Balogun. Kadara, also called Destiny in English was the first movie he wrote, produced and also starred as the leading actor. The movie was shown at the ninth Tashkent film festival for African and Asian cinema. Afolayan went on to produce and star in other productions such as Ija Orogun, Taxi Driver and Iya ni Wura.[1]

targets.targetText: A shekara ta 1976, ya bayyana a cikin Ola Balogun's Ajani Ogun kuma daga baya ya samar da kuma fito da Ija Ominira (1979), wanda Balogun ya jagoranta. Kadara, wanda kuma ake kira Destiny a Turanci shine fim na farko da ya rubuta, ya samar ya fito a matsayin babban ɗan wasan kwaikwayo. An nuna fim ɗin a bikin fim na Tashkent na tara don fina-finai na Afirka da nahiyar Asiya. Afolayan ya ci gaba da samarwa da kuma fitowa a wasu shirye-shirye kamar Ija Orogun, Taxi Driver da Iya ko Wura . [1]

A shekara ta 1976, ya bayyana a cikin Ola Balogun's Ajani Ogun kuma daga baya ya samar da kuma fito da Ija Ominira (1979), wanda Balogun ya jagoranta. Kadara, wanda kuma ake kira Destiny a Turanci shine fim na farko da ya rubuta, ya samar kuma ya fito a matsayin babban ɗan wasan kwaikwayo. An nuna fim din a bikin fim na Tashkent na tara don fina-finai na Afirka da Asiya. Afolayan ya ci gaba da samarwa da kuma fitowa a wasu shirye-shirye kamar Ija Orogun, Taxi Driver da Iya ko Wura . [1]

items.sourceText: Involved in politics since his youth, Bouabid became one of the youngest activists and politicians to sign the Proclamation of Independence of Morocco, a manifesto presented by the Independence party on 11 January 1944 demanding full independence from France and Spain, national reunification, and a democratic constitution.

targets.targetText: Tun yana matashi Bouabid ya tsunduma cikin harkokin siyasa tun yana matashi, ya zama daya daga cikin matasa 'yan gwagwarmaya da 'yan siyasa da suka rattaba hannu kan ayyana 'yancin kai na Maroko, takardar da jam'iyyar 'yancin kai ta gabatar a ranar 11 ga watan Janairun 1944 tana neman cikakken 'yancin kai daga Faransa da Spain, hadewar kasa, da tsarin mulkin demokradiyya.

Tun yana matashi Bouabid ya tsunduma cikin harkokin siyasa tun yana matashi, ya zama ɗaya daga cikin matasa 'yan gwagwarmaya da 'yan siyasa da suka rattaba hannu kan ayyana 'yancin kai na Maroko, takardar da jam'iyyar 'yancin kai ta gabatar a ranar 11 ga watan Janairun 1944 tana neman cikakken 'yancin kai daga Faransa da Spain, haɗewar ƙasa, da tsarin mulkin Demokraɗiyya.

items.sourceText: After independence, Nkunda was involved in various roles related to women's equality and education. Following the end of the civil war, from 1996 to 2011, she was secretary-general of the Organization of Mozambican Women (OMM).[1] Between 2006 and 2012, she served on the Political Commission of FRELIMO, the party's highest body.[3] She was elected to the Assembly of the Republic in 2009, serving there until her death in 2013.

targets.targetText: Bayan samun 'yancin kai, Nkunda ta shiga cikin ayyuka daban-daban da suka shafi daidaito da ilimin mata. Bayan kawo ƙarshen yakin basasa, daga shekarun 1996 zuwa 2011, ta kasance babbar sakatariyar kungiyar mata ta Mozambique (OMM). [1] A tsakanin shekarar 2006 zuwa 2012, ta yi aiki a hukumar siyasa ta FRELIMO, babbar hukuma ta jam'iyyar. [2] An zaɓe ta a Majalisar Dokokin Jamhuriyar a shekarar 2009, inda ta yi aiki a can har zuwa mutuwarta a shekarar 2013.

Bayan samun 'yancin kai, Nkunda ta shiga cikin ayyuka daban-daban da suka shafi daidaito da ilimin mata. Bayan kawo karshen yakin basasa, daga 1996 zuwa 2011, ta kasance babbar sakatariyar kungiyar mata ta Mozambique (OMM). [1] A tsakanin shekarar 2006 zuwa 2012, ta yi aiki a hukumar siyasa ta FRELIMO, babbar hukuma ta jam'iyyar. [2] An zabe ta a Majalisar Dokokin Jamhuriyar a 2009, inda ta yi aiki a can har zuwa mutuwarta a 2013.

items.sourceText: He owns several small businesses in and around Onayena. Nashandi married Kauna Nashandi, a former mayor of Ondangwa, who died in Windhoek in 2013.[3]

targets.targetText: Ya mallaki kananan sana'o'i da dama a cikin Onayena da kewaye. Nashandi ya auri Kauna Nashandi, tsohon magajin garin Ondangwa, wanda ya mutu a Windhoek a 2013. [1]
Ya mallaki ƙananan sana'o'i da dama a cikin Onayena da kewaye. Nashandi ya auri Kauna Nashandi, tsohuwar magajiyar garin Ondangwa, wacce ta mutu a Windhoek a 2013. [1]

items.sourceText: He joined the African National Congress (ANC) at Cape Town in 1957. Later that year, he co-founded the Ovamboland People's Congress (OPC), forerunner of the Ovamboland People's Organization (OPO). He also established close contacts with the two South African parties the Congress of Democrats and the Liberal Party. The OPC sought to fight for the rights of migrant workers, some of whom had defected from the South West African Native Labour Association (SWANLA). The organisation also mobilised against the incorporation of Namibia into South Africa, and therefore shared a political allegiance with other organisations in South Africa.

targets.targetText: Ya shiga jam'iyyar African National Congress (ANC) a Cape Town a shekarar 1957. A wannan shekarar, ya kafa jam'iyyar Ovamboland People's Congress (OPC), wadda ta kasance ta farko a Ovamboland People's Organisation (OPO). Ya kuma kulla alaka ta kut-da-kut da jam'iyyun Afirka ta Kudu biyu wato Congress of Democrats da Liberal Party . Kungiyar ta OPC dai ta yi kokarin fafutukar kwato ‘yancin ma’aikatan bakin haure, wadanda wasu daga cikinsu sun fice daga kungiyar kwadago ta Afirka ta Kudu (SWANLA). Kungiyar ta kuma yi wani yunkuri na nuna adawa da shigar kasar Namibiya cikin Afirka ta Kudu, don haka ta yi mubayi'a ta siyasa da sauran kungiyoyi a Afirka ta Kudu.

Ya shiga jam'iyyar African National Congress (ANC) a Cape Town a shekarar 1957. A wannan shekarar, ya kafa jam'iyyar Ovamboland People's Congress (OPC), wacce ta kasance ta farko a Ovamboland People's Organisation (OPO). Ya kuma kulla alaka ta kut-da-kut da jam'iyyun Afirka ta Kudu biyu wato Congress of Democrats da Liberal Party. Kungiyar ta OPC dai ta yi kokarin fafutukar kwato ‘yancin ma’aikatan baƙin haure, waɗanda wasu daga cikinsu sun fice daga kungiyar kwadago ta Afirka ta Kudu (SWANLA). Kungiyar ta kuma yi wani yunkuri na nuna adawa da shigar ƙasar Namibiya cikin Afirka ta Kudu, don haka ta yi mubayi'a ta siyasa da sauran kungiyoyi a Afirka ta Kudu.

items.sourceText: Witbooi moved north on 16 May 1884, with a faction of the ǀKhowesin tribe. This was against the wishes of his father, Moses, who remained opposed to Hendrik's plans. As evidenced by his diaries (which contain a large portion of the surviving documents of Witbooi) he still admired his father greatly, despite their political difference. On 22 February 1887, Moses' chief rival, his subchief Paul Visser, had Moses killed and deposed.

targets.targetText: Witbooi ya koma arewa a ranar 16 ga Mayu 1884, tare da wani yanki na kabilar ǀKhowesin. Wannan ya saba wa burin mahaifinsa, Musa, wanda ya kasance yana adawa da shirye-shiryen Hendrik. Kamar yadda littattafan littattafansa suka tabbatar (waɗanda ke ɗauke da babban kaso na takaddun da suka tsira na Witbooi) har yanzu yana sha'awar mahaifinsa sosai, duk da bambancin siyasa. A ranar 22 ga Fabrairun 1887, babban abokin hamayyar Musa, babban shugabansa Paul Visser, ya kashe Musa kuma ya tsige shi.

Witbooi ya koma arewa a ranar 16 ga watan Mayu 1884, tare da wani yanki na ƙabilar ǀKhowesin. Wannan ya saɓa wa burin mahaifinsa, Moses, wanda ya kasance yana adawa da shirye-shiryen Hendrik. Kamar yadda littattafan littattafansa suka tabbatar (waɗanda ke ɗauke da babban kaso na takaddun da suka tsira na Witbooi) har yanzu yana sha'awar mahaifinsa sosai, duk da bambancin siyasa. A ranar 22 ga watan Fabrairun 1887, babban abokin hamayyar Moses, babban shugabansa Paul Visser, ya kashe Moses kuma ya tsige shi.

items.sourceText: Hendrik Witbooi held leadership at Gibeon in 1888, long after the death of Jonker Afrikaner in 1861 causing a power struggle among the various groups for paramount leadership. Several combats incorporated various leaders ensured until Hendrik finally defeated his last chief rival, Paul Visser, in July 1888 and took over leadership at Gibeon. Hendrik retaliated on 12 July 1888, shooting Visser. This led to Hendrik becoming chief of the ǀKhowesin people. He began to unite other Nama tribes under his control as well. By 1890, Hendrik Witbooi was signing all his letters, 'Chief of Great Namaqualand'.

targets.targetText: Hendrik Witbooi ya gudanar da shugabanci a Gibeon a shekara ta 1888, bayan mutuwar Jonker Afrikaner a shekara ta 1861 wanda ya haifar da gwagwarmayar mulki tsakanin kungiyoyi daban-daban don jagoranci mafi girma. Yaƙe-yaƙe da yawa sun haɗa da shugabanni daban-daban sun tabbatar har sai Hendrik ya ci nasara a kan babban abokin hamayyarsa na ƙarshe, Paul Visser, a cikin Yuli 1888 kuma ya karɓi jagoranci a Gibeon. Hendrik ya rama a ranar 12 ga Yuli 1888, yana harbi Visser. Wannan ya haifar da Hendrik ya zama shugaban mutanen ǀKhowesin. Ya fara hada kan sauran kabilun Nama da ke karkashinsa su ma. A shekara ta 1890, Hendrik Witbooi yana sanya hannu kan duk wasiƙunsa, 'Shugaban Babban Namaqualand'.

Hendrik Witbooi ya gudanar da shugabanci a Gibeon a shekara ta 1888, bayan mutuwar Jonker Afrikaner a shekara ta 1861 wanda ya haifar da gwagwarmayar mulki tsakanin kungiyoyi daban-daban don jagoranci mafi girma. Yaƙe-yaƙe da yawa sun haɗa da shugabanni daban-daban sun tabbatar har sai Hendrik ya ci nasara a kan babban abokin hamayyarsa na ƙarshe, Paul Visser, a cikin watan Yuli 1888 kuma ya karɓi jagoranci a Gibeon. Hendrik ya rama a ranar 12 ga watan Yuli 1888, yana harbi Visser. Wannan ya haifar da Hendrik ya zama shugaban mutanen ǀKhowesin. Ya fara haɗa kan sauran ƙabilun Nama da ke ƙarƙashin sa su ma. A shekara ta 1890, Hendrik Witbooi yana sanya hannu kan duk wasiƙunsa, 'Shugaban Babban Namaqualand'.

items.sourceText: In the early morning of 12 April 1893, the ǀKhowesin were attacked by the Germans at Hornkranz. Many were killed, although Hendrik managed to escape with most of his fighting men. [citation needed] He campaigned against the Germans for two years, until the treaty of Gurus on 15 September 1894 where he agreed to a conditional surrender. Witbooi also decided to render military support for the Germans against other smaller tribes, such as the eastern Mbanderu Herero, Afrikaners, and Swartbooi.[3]

targets.targetText: A safiyar ranar 12 ga Afrilun 1893, Jamusawa sun kai wa Khowesin hari a Hornkranz. An kashe da yawa, ko da yake Hendrik ya yi nasarar tserewa tare da yawancin mayakansa. Ya [ yaƙi ] Jamusawa na tsawon shekaru biyu, har zuwa yarjejeniyar Gurus a ranar 15 ga Satumba 1894 inda ya amince da mika wuya. Witbooi ya kuma yanke shawarar ba da goyon bayan soji ga Jamusawa kan wasu kananan kabilu, kamar gabashin Mbanderu Herero, Afrikaners, da Swartbooi. [1]

A safiyar ranar 12 ga watan Afrilun 1893, Jamusawa sun kai wa Khowesin hari a Hornkranz. An kashe da yawa, ko da yake Hendrik ya yi nasarar tserewa tare da yawancin mayakansa. Ya [ yaƙi ] Jamusawa na tsawon shekaru biyu, har zuwa yarjejeniyar Gurus a ranar 15 ga watan Satumba 1894 inda ya amince da miƙa wuya. Witbooi ya kuma yanke shawarar ba da goyon bayan soji ga Jamusawa kan wasu ƙananan ƙabilu, kamar gabashin Mbanderu Herero, Afrikaners, da Swartbooi. [1]

items.sourceText: Witbooi is the subject of Conny Braam's 2016 Dutch language novel Ik ben Hendrik Witbooi depicting his struggle against German colonialism.[8] Witbooi is depicted in the 1989 South African Boer War miniseries Arende where he is the leader of a group that ambushes the protagonist, Sloet Steenkamp, party of Boer exiles in the final episode of the last season.[9]

targets.targetText: Witbooi batu ne na littafin Conny Braam na 2016 yaren Dutch Ik ben Hendrik Witbooi wanda ke nuna gwagwarmayar sa da mulkin mallaka na Jamus. [1] An nuna Witbooi a cikin 1989 na Afirka ta Kudu Boer War miniseries Arende inda shi ne shugaban kungiyar da suka yi wa jarumin kwanton bauna, Sloet Steenkamp, jam'iyyar Boer gudun hijira a wasan karshe na kakar wasa ta karshe. [2]

Witbooi batu ne na littafin Conny Braam na 2016 yaren Dutch Ik ben Hendrik Witbooi wanda ke nuna gwagwarmayar sa da 'yan mulkin mallaka na Jamus. [1] An nuna Witbooi a cikin shekara ta 1989 na Afirka ta Kudu Boer War miniseries Arende inda shi ne shugaban kungiyar da suka yi wa jarumin kwanton ɓauna, Sloet Steenkamp, jam'iyyar Boer gudun hijira a wasan karshe na kakar wasa ta karshe. [2]

items.sourceText: Flag Marutle Boshielo (born 1920; disappeared 20 August 1970) was a South African anti-apartheid activist, trade unionist, and communist. He went into exile with the African National Congress (ANC) after the party was banned in 1960 and served as political commissar of Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK) from 1969 until his disappearance in 1970. He went missing in August 1970 during an unsuccessful MK operation after his contingent was ambushed. He is presumed to have died in 1970 or soon afterwards.

targets.targetText: Tuta Marutle Boshielo (an haife shi a shekara ta 1920; ya ɓace 20 ga Agusta 1970) ɗan gwagwarmayar yaƙi da wariyar launin fata ne na Afirka ta Kudu, ɗan ƙungiyar kasuwanci, kuma ɗan gurguzu . Ya tafi gudun hijira tare da jam’iyyar ANC bayan da aka dakatar da jam’iyyar a shekarar 1960 sannan ya rike mukamin kwamishinan siyasa na Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK) daga 1969 har zuwa lokacin da ya bace a 1970. Ya bace ne a watan Agustan shekarar 1970 a yayin wani aikin MK da bai yi nasara ba bayan an yi wa tawagarsa kwanton bauna. Ana kyautata zaton ya mutu a shekara ta 1970 ko kuma jim kadan bayan haka.

Tuta Marutle Boshielo (an haife shi a shekara ta 1920; ya ɓace 20 ga watan Agusta 1970) ɗan gwagwarmayar yaƙi da wariyar launin fata ne na Afirka ta Kudu, ɗan ƙungiyar kasuwanci, kuma ɗan gurguzu. Ya tafi gudun hijira tare da jam’iyyar ANC bayan da aka dakatar da jam’iyyar a shekarar 1960 sannan ya riƙe muƙamin kwamishinan siyasa na Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK) daga shekarun 1969 har zuwa lokacin da ya ɓace a shekarar 1970. Ya ɓace ne a watan Agustan shekarar 1970 a yayin wani aikin MK da bai yi nasara ba bayan an yi wa tawagarsa kwanton ɓauna. Ana kyautata zaton ya mutu a shekara ta 1970 ko kuma jim kaɗan bayan haka.

items.sourceText: In the early 1960s, Boshielo went into exile with the ANC, which was banned by the apartheid government in 1960. He received political and military training in Moscow as a recruit to Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK), the new joint armed wing of the ANC and CPSA, and then joined MK at its Kongwa camp in Tanzania.[1] At the ANC's 1969 Morogoro Conference, Boshielo was the foremost defender of a new proposal to open ANC membership to people of all race groups.[6][7] The proposal was adopted and, in addition, Boshielo was appointed as MK's overall political commissar.[6]

targets.targetText: A farkon shekarun 1960, Boshielo ya tafi gudun hijira tare da ANC, wanda gwamnatin wariyar launin fata ta haramta a 1960. Ya sami horon siyasa da na soja a Moscow a matsayin wanda zai dauka aiki zuwa Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK), sabon reshen hadaka na ANC da CPSA, sannan ya koma MK a sansanin Kongwa da ke Tanzaniya. [1] A taron Morogoro na ANC na 1969, Boshielo shine babban mai kare wata sabuwar shawara don buɗe membobin ANC ga mutanen kowane nau'in jinsi. [2] [3] An amince da shawarar kuma, bugu da kari, an nada Boshielo a matsayin kwamishanan siyasa na MK gaba daya. [2]

A farkon shekarun 1960, Boshielo ya tafi gudun hijira tare da ANC, wanda gwamnatin wariyar launin fata ta haramta a shekarar 1960. Ya sami horon siyasa da na soja a Moscow a matsayin wanda zai ɗauka aiki zuwa Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK), sabon reshen haɗaka na ANC da CPSA, sannan ya koma MK a sansanin Kongwa da ke Tanzaniya. [1] A taron Morogoro na ANC na shekarar 1969, Boshielo shine babban mai kare wata sabuwar shawara don buɗe membobin ANC ga mutanen kowane nau'in jinsi. [2] [3] An amince da shawarar kuma, bugu da ƙari, an naɗa Boshielo a matsayin kwamishanan siyasa na MK gaba ɗaya. [2]

items.sourceText: Boshielo disappeared on 20 August 1970 during an MK operation which aimed to infiltrate a small group of cadres across Rhodesia into Sekhukhuneland. The group was ambushed while crossing the Zambezi River near the Caprivi Strip, and two other cadres died in a shoot-out.[1][2] Speaking at the University of Lagos in 1971, ANC president Oliver Tambo, calling for a pan-African campaign to find and rescue Boshielo, said that he was presumed wounded and captured.[8]

targets.targetText: Boshielo ya ɓace a ranar 20 ga watan Agustan 1970 yayin wani aiki na MK wanda ke da nufin kutsawa wasu ƙananan gungun 'yan sanda a faɗin Rhodesia zuwa Sekhukhuneland. An yi wa kungiyar kwanton ɓauna ne a lokacin da suke tsallaka kogin Zambezi kusa da gabar tekun Caprivi, kuma wasu ‘yan bindiga biyu sun mutu a wani harbi da aka yi. [1] [2] Da yake magana a Jami'ar Legas a shekarar 1971, shugaban ANC, Oliver Tambo, yana kira ga yakin Afirka baki ɗaya don nemo da ceto Boshielo, ya ce an yi zaton ya samu rauni kuma an kama shi. [3]

Boshielo ya bace a ranar 20 ga watan Agustan 1970 yayin wani aiki na MK wanda ke da nufin kutsawa wasu kananan gungun 'yan sanda a fadin Rhodesia zuwa Sekhukhuneland. An yi wa kungiyar kwanton bauna ne a lokacin da suke tsallaka kogin Zambezi kusa da gabar tekun Caprivi, kuma wasu ‘yan bindiga biyu sun mutu a wani harbi da aka yi. [1] [2] Da yake magana a Jami'ar Legas a 1971, shugaban ANC, Oliver Tambo, yana kira ga yakin Afirka baki daya don nemo da ceto Boshielo, ya ce an yi zaton ya samu rauni kuma an kama shi. [3]

items.sourceText: Prior to the events in Sharpville, Chiba was an activist in the Transvaal Indian Congress in the late 1950s and the South African Communist Party in 1960.[1][2] After the Sharpeville massacre in 1960, he concluded that peaceful protest had failed and military action was necessary, so he joined the ANC's armed wing, Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK) in 1961.[3]

targets.targetText: Kafin abubuwan da suka faru a Sharpville, Chiba ya kasance mai fafutuka a cikin Transvaal Indian Congress a ƙarshen shekarar 1950s da Jam'iyyar Kwaminisanci ta Afirka ta Kudu a shekarar 1960. [1] [2] Bayan kisan kiyashin da aka yi a Sharpeville a shekarar 1960, ya yanke shawarar cewa zanga-zangar lumana ta gaza kuma matakin soji ya zama dole, don haka ya shiga reshen jam'iyyar ANC mai ɗauke da makamai, Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK) a shekarar 1961. [2]

Kafin abubuwan da suka faru a Sharpville, Chiba ya kasance mai fafutuka a cikin Transvaal Indian Congress a ƙarshen 1950s da Jam'iyyar Kwaminisanci ta Afirka ta Kudu a 1960. [1] [2] Bayan kisan kiyashin da aka yi a Sharpeville a 1960, ya yanke shawarar cewa zanga-zangar lumana ta gaza kuma matakin soji ya zama dole, don haka ya shiga reshen jam'iyyar ANC mai dauke da makamai, Umkhonto we Sizwe (MK) a 1961. [2]

items.sourceText: He was a platoon commander in 1962 and a member of the group's High Command by 1963.[1] He was captured and tortured after a failed attempt to sabotage a railway line.[3] He was arrested on the 6 July 1964 for sabotage. He and the rest of the group were sentenced as members of a banned organisation and sent to Robben Island.[3] Released in 1982, he continued the work of the ANC as a member of the United Democratic Front.[3] In 1983, he became one of the vice-presidents of the Transvaal Indian Congress.[2] He was rearrested in July 1985 and released without a trial in March 1986, after which he went into hiding so he could continue his work for the ANC.[2]

targets.targetText: Ya kasance kwamandan runduna a shekarar 1962 kuma memba na Babban Kwamandan kungiyar ta 1963. [1] An kama shi tare da azabtar da shi bayan yunkurin da aka yi na lalata layin dogo. [1] An kama shi a ranar 6 ga watan Yuli 1964 saboda zagon ƙasa. An yanke masa hukunci tare da sauran ’yan kungiyar a matsayin mambobin haramtacciyar kungiyar kuma aka aika zuwa tsibirin Robben. [1] An sake shi a cikin shekara ta 1982, ya ci gaba da aikin ANC a matsayin memba na United Democratic Front. [1] A cikin shekarar 1983, ya zama ɗaya daga cikin mataimakan shugabanin Transvaal Indian Congress. [2] An sake kama shi a watan Yulin 1985 kuma aka sake shi ba tare da yi masa shari’a ba a watan Maris na 1986, bayan haka ya shiga ɓuya domin ya ci gaba da aikinsa na jam’iyyar ANC. [2]
