Dergi ya samu goyon bayan Tarayyar Soviet da sauran ƙasashen gurguzu wajen yakar 'yan Eritrea. ELF kuma ta sami goyon bayan diflomasiyya da ta hanyar soja daga ƙasashe daban-daban. A lokacin yakin basasa na Eritriya, EPLF ta fito a matsayin kungiyar 'yantar da ƙasa ta farko a shekarar 1977, bayan ta kori ELF daga Eritrea. Daga nan ne EPLF ta yi amfani da damar da aka yi a yakin Ogaden ta ƙara zafafa yakin da take yi da Habasha.

items.sourceText: During the 1960s, the Eritrean independence struggle was led by the Eritrean Liberation Front (ELF) in resistance to Ethiopia's annexation of Eritrea long after Italian control ended. The Ethiopian Monarchy's actions against Muslims in the Eritrean government also contributed to the revolution.[46] At first, this group factionalized the liberation movement along ethnic and geographic lines. The initial four zonal commands of the ELF were all lowland areas and primarily Muslim. Few Christians joined the organization in the beginning, fearing Muslim domination.[47]

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarun 1960, gwagwarmayar samun 'yancin kai na Eritiriya ta kasance karkashin jagorancin kungiyar 'yantar da 'yancin kai ta Eritrea (ELF) a kokarin da take yi na kalubalantar mamayar da Habasha ta yi wa Eritrea tun bayan kare mulkin Italiya. Haka nan irin matakan da Masarautar Habasha ta dauka kan musulmi a gwamnatin Eritriya ya taimaka wajen juyin juya hali. [1] Da farko dai wannan kungiya ta sanya kungiyar ta ‘yantar da kungiyar ta hanyar kabilanci da yanki. Dokokin shiyya guda huɗu na farko na ELF duk yankunan ƙasa ne kuma musulmi. Kiristoci kadan ne suka shiga kungiyar tun farko, saboda tsoron mamayar musulmi. [2]

A cikin shekarun 1960, gwagwarmayar samun 'yancin kai na Eritiriya ta kasance ƙarƙashin jagorancin kungiyar 'yantar da 'yancin kai ta Eritrea (ELF) a kokarin da take yi na ƙalubalantar mamayar da Habasha ta yi wa Eritrea tun bayan kare mulkin Italiya. Haka nan irin matakan da Masarautar Habasha ta ɗauka kan musulmi a gwamnatin Eritriya ya taimaka wajen juyin juya hali. [1] Da farko dai wannan kungiya ta sanya kungiyar ta ‘yantar da kungiyar ta hanyar ƙabilanci da yanki. Dokokin shiyya guda huɗu na farko na ELF duk yankunan ƙasa ne kuma musulmi. Kiristoci kaɗan ne suka shiga kungiyar tun farko, saboda tsoron mamayar musulmi. [2]

items.sourceText: On November 30, 1970, approximately 122 inhabitants of the village were killed,[1] whereas other reports claim 200 civilians were killed.[3]

targets.targetText: A ranar 30 ga watan Nuwamba, 1970, an kashe kusan mazauna ƙauyen 122, [1] yayin da wasu rahotanni suka ce an kashe fararen hula 200. [2]

items.sourceText: The Dogon's spiritual leader is called hogon. According to Dogon cosmogony, there were four pairs of twins, four females and four males. They were ancestors of humans. Of these, Griaule M. (1970, p. 223) refer to the seventh as "The Master of Speech"—alluding to its "masculine" characteristics. In the Dogon tradition, the seventh ancestor's gift to humankind included weaving, music, dress and language.[26]

targets.targetText: Ana kiran jagoran ruhaniya Dogon hogon . A cewar Dogon cosmogony, akwai tagwaye guda hudu, mata hudu, maza hudu. Kakannin mutane ne. Daga cikin waɗannan, Griaule M. (1970, p. 223) koma na bakwai a matsayin "Mai Jagoran Magana" - yana magana da halayen "namiji". A al'adar Dogon, kyautar kakanni na bakwai ga bil'adama sun hada da saƙa, kiɗa, sutura da harshe.

(1970, p. 223) koma na bakwai a matsayin "Mai Jagoran Magana" - yana magana da halayen "namiji". A al'adar Dogon, kyautar kakanni na bakwai ga bil'adama sun hada da saƙa, kiɗa, sutura da harshe. [1]

items.sourceText: The Ethiopian garrison was reorganized as Task Force 507, while the Ethiopian Air Force deployed their F-5Es in Mekelle and began using their air superiority to their advantage. This close air support inflicted heavy casualties on the forces of the ELF and EPLF who were conducting their first major joint operation. The failure of this joint operation would have significant consequences later in the War of Independence.[2]

targets.targetText: An sake tsara sojojin Habasha a matsayin Task Force 507, yayin da sojojin saman Habasha suka jibge F-5E a Mekelle kuma suka fara amfani da karfinsu na sama don amfanin su. Wannan tallafin na kurkusa ya yi sanadin jikkatar sojojin ELF da EPLF waɗanda ke gudanar da babban aikin haɗin gwiwa na farko. Rashin nasarar wannan aiki na haɗin gwiwa zai haifar da gagarumin sakamako daga baya a yakin neman'yancin kai. [1]

An sake tsara sojojin Habasha a matsayin Task Force 507, yayin da sojojin saman Habasha suka jibge F-5E a Mekelle kuma suka fara amfani da karfinsu na sama don amfanin su. Wannan tallafin na kurkusa ya yi sanadin jikkatar sojojin ELF da EPLF wadanda ke gudanar da babban aikin hadin gwiwa na farko. Rashin nasarar wannan aiki na hadin gwiwa zai haifar da gagarumin sakamako daga baya a yakin 'yancin kai. [1]

items.sourceText: Mesfin Hagos left the ELF in 1970 with Isaias Afwerki, Major General Asmerom Gerezgiher, Solomon Weldemariam, and Tewelde Eyob. Hagos was a part of the founding leadership of the EPLF. Mesfin Hagos briefly served as the Chief of Staff in the EPLF. He was one of the commanders of the Battle of Af'abet that destroyed the backbone of the Ethiopian army.

targets.targetText: Mesfin Hagos ya bar ELF a shekarar 1970 tare da Isaias Afwerki, Major General Asmerom Gerezgiher, Solomon Weldemariam, da Tewelde Eyob. Hagos ya kasance wani ɓangare na kafa kungiyar EPLF. Mesfin Hagos ya zama shugaban ma'aikata na EPLF a takaice. Yana ɗaya daga cikin kwamandojin yakin Af'abet da ya ruguza ƙashin bayan sojojin Habasha.

Mesfin Hagos ya bar ELF a 1970 tare da Isaias Afwerki, Major General Asmerom Gerezgiher, Solomon Weldemariam, da Tewelde Eyob. Hagos ya kasance wani bangare na kafa kungiyar EPLF. Mesfin Hagos ya zama shugaban ma'aikata na EPLF a takaice. Yana daya daga cikin kwamandojin yakin Af'abet da ya ruguza kashin bayan sojojin Habasha.

items.sourceText: In September 2001 he was detained indefinitely along with other politicians who were known as the G-15, a group which opposes the rule of Eritrean president Isaias Afewerki. Solomon along with 15 other ministers were arrested by the ruling front and detained in unknown location ever since. The ministers were criticizing the border war of the then president, Isaias and signed an open letter. He was fired along with other opposing members and was detained on 18 September 2001. He has not been seen or heard from since.[4] He was considered a prisoner of conscience by Amnesty International.[7]

targets.targetText: A watan Satumban 2001 an tsare shi har abada tare da wasu 'yan siyasa da aka fi sani da G-15, kungiyar da ke adawa da mulkin shugaban Eritrea Isaias Afewerki . Sulemanu tare da wasu ministoci 15 ne bangaren masu mulki suka kama tare da tsare su a inda ba a san ko wane lokaci ba. Ministocin na sukar yakin kan iyaka na shugaban kasar na lokacin, Isaias tare da sanya hannu kan wata budaddiyar wasika. An kore shi tare da wasu membobin da ke adawa da shi kuma an tsare shi a ranar 18 ga Satumba 2001. Tun daga lokacin ba a gan shi ko jin duriyarsa ba. [1] Amnesty International ta dauke shi a matsayin fursuna. [2]

An kore shi tare da wasu membobin da ke adawa da shi kuma an tsare shi a ranar 18 ga watan Satumba 2001. Tun daga lokacin ba a gan shi ko jin ɗuriyarsa ba. [1] Amnesty International ta ɗauke shi a matsayin fursuna. [2]

items.sourceText: Jackson was born in the borough of Queens, New York City, and raised in its South Jamaica neighborhood[1] by his mother Sabrina. Sabrina, a drug dealer, raised Jackson until she died in a fire when Jackson was eight years old.[13][14] Jackson revealed in an interview that his mother was a lesbian.[15][16] After his mother's death and his father's departure, Jackson was raised by his grandparents.[17]

targets.targetText: An haifi Jackson a cikin garin Queens, Birnin New York, kuma mahaifiyarsa Sabrina ce ta girma a unguwar ta Kudancin Jamaica [1] . Sabrina, dillaliyar miyagun ƙwayoyi ce, ta haifi Jackson har sai da ta mutu a wuta (Gobara) lokacin da Jackson ke da shekaru takwas.[2][3] Jackson ya bayyana a cikin wata hira cewa mahaifiyarsa 'yar luwaɗi ce.[4][5] Bayan mutuwar mahaifiyarsa da tafiyar mahaifinsa, kakanninsa ne suka rene shi wajen tasowarsa Jackson.[6]

An haifi Jackson a cikin garin Queens, Birnin New York, kuma mahaifiyarsa Sabrina ce ta girma a unguwar ta Kudancin Jamaica [1] . Sabrina, dillalin miyagun ƙwayoyi, ta haifi Jackson har sai da ta mutu a wuta lokacin da Jackson ke da shekaru takwas.[2][3] Jackson ya bayyana a cikin wata hira cewa mahaifiyarsa 'yar luwaɗi ce.[4][5] Bayan mutuwar mahaifiyarsa da tafiyar mahaifinsa, kakanninsa ne suka haifi Jackson.[6]

items.sourceText: Saleh Meki died on Friday, October 2, 2009, following a heart attack at the age of 62.[1] He was buried in the Martyrs’ Cemetery in Asmara, the capital of Eritrea.[1]

targets.targetText: Saleh Meki ya rasu ne a ranar Juma’a, 2 ga Oktoba, 2009, sakamakon bugun zuciya yana da shekaru 62. [1] An binne shi a makabartar Shahidai da ke Asmara babban birnin kasar Eritrea. [1]

items.sourceText: He opposed the coup d'etat of 19 June 1965, by Houari Boumedienne, which led him to prison before being placed under house arrest in the south from 1965 to 1971. He went into exile in France after 1973 and returned to his country after the death of Algerian President Houari Boumédiène.[6]

targets.targetText: Ya yi adawa da juyin mulkin ranar 19 ga watan Yunin 1965, da Houari Boumedienne ya yi, wanda ya kai shi gidan yari kafin a tsare shi a gidan yari a kudancin ƙasar daga shekarun 1965 zuwa 1971. Ya tafi gudun hijira a Faransa bayan shekarun 1973 kuma ya koma ƙasarsa bayan mutuwar shugaban Aljeriya Houari Boumédiène. [1]

Ya yi adawa da juyin mulkin ranar 19 ga watan Yunin 1965, da Houari Boumedienne ya yi, wanda ya kai shi gidan yari kafin a tsare shi a gidan yari a kudancin kasar daga 1965 zuwa 1971. Ya tafi gudun hijira a Faransa bayan 1973 kuma ya koma kasarsa bayan mutuwar shugaban Aljeriya Houari Boumédiène. [1]

items.sourceText: Upon his return to Algeria, Inal became a teacher at the Tlemcen College in Slane (now named Ibn Khaldoun) and joined the National Liberation Army (ALN); he became an officer and secretary of the command of the fifth wilaya (Oran) in the maquis in Algeria.[2] While he was with the fifth wilaya maquis, he was injured in combat in the Battle of Tadjmout, before being captured by the French army. He was tortured and then killed by French soldiers on November 1, 1956.

targets.targetText: Bayan ya koma Aljeriya, Inal ya zama malami a Kwalejin Tlemcen da ke Slane (wanda ake kira Ibn Khaldoun a yanzu) kuma ya shiga rundunar 'yantar da kasa (ALN); ya zama hafsa kuma sakataren kwamandan wilaya (Oran) na biyar a maquis a Aljeriya. [1] Yayin da yake tare da wilaya maquis na biyar, ya ji rauni a yakin Tadjmout, kafin sojojin Faransa su kama shi. Sojojin Faransa sun azabtar da shi sannan suka kashe shi a ranar 1 ga Nuwamba, 1956.

Bayan ya koma Aljeriya, Inal ya zama malami a Kwalejin Tlemcen da ke Slane (wanda ake kira Ibn Khaldoun a yanzu) kuma ya shiga rundunar 'yantar da ƙasa (ALN); ya zama hafsa kuma sakataren kwamandan wilaya (Oran) na biyar a maquis a Aljeriya. [1] Yayin da yake tare da wilaya maquis na biyar, ya ji rauni a yakin Tadjmout, kafin sojojin Faransa su kama shi. Sojojin Faransa sun azabtar da shi sannan suka kashe shi a ranar 1 ga watan Nuwamba, 1956.

items.sourceText: Amirouche Aït Hamouda (Arabic: عميروش آيت حمودة), better known by his nom de guerre Colonel Amirouche, was an Algerian military leader and revolutionary during the Algerian War. He organized the irregular military of the Wilaya III and is considered a national hero in Algeria.

targets.targetText: Amirouche Aït Hamouda ( Arabic ), wanda aka fi sani da sunan sa Kanar Amirouche, shi ne shugaban sojojin Aljeriya kuma mai juyin juya hali a lokacin yakin Aljeriya . Ya shirya sojojin da ba bisa ka'ida ba na Wilaya III kuma ana daukarsa a matsayin gwarzo na kasa a Aljeriya.

items.sourceText: Hassiba Ben Bouali (Arabic: حسيبة بن بوعلي) (18 January 1938 – 9 October 1957) was an Algerian militant and revolutionary figure of the Algerian War.

targets.targetText: Hassiba Ben Bouali (18 Janairu 1938 - 9 Oktoba 1957) 'yar gwagwarmayar Aljeriya ne kuma 'yar juyin juya hali na Yaƙin Aljeriya.
Hassiba Ben Bouali ( Arabic ) (18 Janairu 1938 - 9 Oktoba 1957) ɗan gwagwarmayar Aljeriya ne kuma ɗan juyin juya hali na Yaƙin Aljeriya .

items.sourceText: Baya Hocine, also known as Baya Mamadi (born 20 May 1940, in the Casbah of Algiers, died 1 May 2000) was an Algerian independence fighter.

targets.targetText: Baya Hocine, wanda kuma aka fi sani da Baya Mamadi (an haife ta a ranar 20 ga watan Mayu 1940, a cikin Casbah na Algiers, ta mutu 1 ga watan Mayu 2000) 'yar gwagwarmayar neman 'yancin kai ta Aljeriya ce.
Baya Hocine, wanda kuma aka fi sani da Baya Mamadi (an haife shi a ranar 20 ga Mayu 1940, a cikin Casbah na Algiers, ya mutu 1 ga Mayu 2000) ɗan gwagwarmayar 'yancin kai na Aljeriya ne.

items.sourceText: Two years later, on October 18, 1970, he was found strangled with his tie in a room at the Inter-Continental Hotel in Frankfurt, presumably by Algerian military security agents.[4]

targets.targetText: Shekaru biyu bayan haka, a ranar 18 ga watan Oktoba, 1970, an same shi an shake shi da kunnen doki a wani ɗaki a Otal ɗin Inter-Continental da ke Frankfurt, mai yiwuwa jami’an tsaron sojan Algeria ne. [1]

items.sourceText: During the crisis that arose in the MTLD after the April 1953 congress, Mahsas refused to choose between Messali Hadj and the centralists.[1]

targets.targetText: A lokacin rikicin da ya taso a jam'iyyar MTLD bayan da aka yi taron Afrilu na shekarar 1953, Mahsas ya ki zaɓi tsakanin Messali Hadj da 'yan tsakiya. [1]
A lokacin rikicin da ya taso a jam'iyyar MTLD bayan da aka yi taron Afrilu na 1953, Mahsas ya ki zabi tsakanin Messali Hadj da 'yan tsakiya. [1]

items.sourceText: Mahsas joined the city of Cairo in 1955 in order to join the FLN external delegation and become a member of the National Council of the Algerian Revolution in 1956 and 1957.[24][25]

targets.targetText: Mahsas ya shiga birnin Alkahira a shekara ta 1955 domin shiga tawagar FLN na waje kuma ya zama memba na majalisar ƙasa ta juyin juya halin Aljeriya a shekarun 1956 da 1957. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: After the dissolution of the Revolutionary Committee of Unity and Action on 5 July 1954, Zabana was commissioned by Larbi Ben M'hidi to prepare for the revolution by obtaining weapons and personnel. Zabana's tasks were to structure revolutionary forces and train them, and also to visit strategic locations to choose places that could be made centers of revolution. Zabana succeeded in forming revolutionary cadres in Zahana, Oran, Aïn Témouchent, Hammam Bou Hadjar, Hassi El Ghella, and Chaabet El Ham. he then ordered the men of the cadres to gather subscriptions for buying weapons and ammunition. With Abdulmalek Ramadan, Zabana supervised the military training of the cadres. At a meeting on 30 October 1954, chaired by Ben M'hidi, the organizers of the revolution determined that it would begin with a series of attacks on the night of 1 November. The following day, 31 October, Zabana met with his units and assigned specific targets as well as a rendezvous point on Jabal al-Qada.

targets.targetText: Bayan rusa kwamitin juyin juya hali na hadin kai da aiki a ranar 5 ga Yulin 1954, Larbi Ben M'hidi ya ba wa Zabana umarnin shirya juyin juya hali ta hanyar samun makamai da ma'aikata. Ayyukan Zabana sune tsara dakarun juyin juya hali da horar da su, da kuma ziyartar wurare masu mahimmanci don zabar wuraren da za a iya zama cibiyar juyin juya hali. Zabana ya yi nasarar kafa 'yan gwagwarmayar juyin juya hali a Zahana, Oran, Aïn Témouchent, Hammam Bou Hadjar, Hassi El Ghella, da Chaabet El Ham . Daga nan sai ya umurci mutanen ’yan bangar da su tattara kudin sayen makamai da alburusai. Tare da Abdulmalek Ramadan, Zabana ya kula da horar da jami'an soji. A wani taro da aka yi a ranar 30 ga Oktoban 1954, karkashin jagorancin Ben M'hidi, masu shirya juyin juya halin Musulunci sun kuduri aniyar cewa za a fara ne da jerin hare-hare a daren 1 ga watan Nuwamba. Washegari, 31 ga Oktoba, Zabana ya gana da rukuninsa kuma ya sanya takamaiman hari da kuma wani batu kan Jabal al-Qada.

Washegari, 31 ga Oktoba, Zabana ya gana da ruƙuninsa kuma ya sanya takamaiman hari da kuma wani batu kan Jabal al-Qada.

items.sourceText: The Pan Africanist Movement is a minor South African political party founded by Thami ka Plaatjie and others from a faction in the Pan Africanist Congress. After a year of in-fighting between supporters of Ka Plaatjie and PAC president Letlapa Mphahlele, the high court ruled that ka Plaatjie's faction could not organise under the name or colours of the Pan Africanist Congress, and a new party was formed to accommodate the Ka Plaatjie faction.[1]

targets.targetText: Ƙungiyar Pan Africanist wata ƙaramar jam'iyyar siyasa ce ta Afirka ta Kudu wadda Thami ka Plaatjie da wasu daga wani bangare a cikin Pan Africanist Congress suka kafa. Bayan shafe shekara guda ana gwabza fada tsakanin magoya bayan Ka Plaatjie da shugaban PAC Letlapa Mphahlele, babbar kotu ta yanke hukuncin cewa bangaren ka Plaatjie ba zai iya yin shiri da suna ko launin jam'iyyar Pan Africanist Congress ba, an kuma kafa wata sabuwar jam'iyya wadda za ta dauki nauyin bangaren Ka Plaatjie. [1]

Pan Africanist Movement wata ƙaramar jam'iyyar siyasa ce ta Afirka ta Kudu wadda Thami ka Plaatjie da wasu daga wani bangare a cikin Pan Africanist Congress suka kafa. Bayan shafe shekara guda ana gwabza fada tsakanin magoya bayan Ka Plaatjie da shugaban PAC Letlapa Mphahlele, babbar kotu ta yanke hukuncin cewa bangaren ka Plaatjie ba zai iya yin shiri da suna ko launin jam'iyyar Pan Africanist Congress ba, an kuma kafa wata sabuwar jam'iyya wadda za ta dauki nauyin bangaren Ka Plaatjie. [1]

items.sourceText: Following the end of the war in 1962, extensive efforts were made by the new Algerian authorities to clear and dismantle the Morice Line. They included the forced employment of captured harkis and other Muslim loyalists who had served with the French Army, many of whom were killed by landmines.[2] Decades after the confrontation came to an end, the Morice Line, which had been heavily mined by the French, continued to cause casualties among local Algerian populations.[3][4] Algeria eventually joined the Ottawa Treaty, which bans the use of landmines, and in 2017, Algeria announced that after decades of work, it had fulfilled its mine clearance obligation under the treaty. It announced the clearing of the last 93 mined or suspected mined areas, including 78 former mine barrages[5] in the Morice Line.

targets.targetText: Bayan kawo ƙarshen yakin a shekarar 1962, sabbin mahukuntan Aljeriya sun yi kokarin kawar da tare da wargaza layin Morice. Sun haɗa da aikin tilasta wa harkis da aka kama da kuma sauran musulmi masu biyayya da suka yi aiki da Sojojin Faransa, waɗanda aka kashe da yawa daga cikinsu ta hanyar nakiyoyi. [1] Shekaru goma bayan kawo ƙarshen arangamar, Layin Morice, wanda Faransa ta yi ta hakowa sosai, ya ci gaba da haddasa asarar rayuka a tsakanin al'ummar ƙasar Aljeriya. [2] [3] Daga ƙarshe Aljeriya ta shiga yarjejeniyar Ottawa, wacce ta haramta amfani da nakiyoyi, kuma a cikin shekarar 2017, Aljeriya ta sanar da cewa, bayan shekaru da dama na aiki, ta cika hakkinta na kawar da nakiyoyin a ƙarƙashin yarjejeniyar. Ya sanar da share wuraren hakar ma'adinai na 93 na ƙarshe ko waɗanda ake zargin, ciki har da 78 tsoffin ma'adanai [4] a cikin Layin Morice.

Bayan kawo karshen yakin a shekarar 1962, sabbin mahukuntan Aljeriya sun yi kokarin kawar da tare da wargaza layin Morice. Sun hada da aikin tilasta wa harkis da aka kama da kuma sauran musulmi masu biyayya da suka yi aiki da Sojojin Faransa, wadanda aka kashe da yawa daga cikinsu ta hanyar nakiyoyi. [1] Shekaru goma bayan kawo karshen arangamar, Layin Morice, wanda Faransa ta yi ta hakowa sosai, ya ci gaba da haddasa asarar rayuka a tsakanin al'ummar kasar Aljeriya. [2] [3] Daga karshe Aljeriya ta shiga yarjejeniyar Ottawa, wadda ta haramta amfani da nakiyoyi, kuma a cikin 2017, Aljeriya ta sanar da cewa, bayan shekaru da dama na aiki, ta cika hakkinta na kawar da nakiyoyin a karkashin yarjejeniyar. Ya sanar da share wuraren hakar ma'adinai na 93 na ƙarshe ko waɗanda ake zargin, ciki har da 78 tsoffin ma'adanai [4] a cikin Layin Morice.

items.sourceText: The start of the Algerian War in 1954 emerged from a growing Algerian nationalist movement. The population was asked to fight in the Second World War alongside the French. In exchange for their duty, they demanded more political and economic rights which were refused.[3] The tensions between the two parties rose when the National Liberation Front (FLN) called for independence in their Declaration of 1 November 1954.[4] The French Government led by Pierre Mendès France declined their requests because of the pressure established by the pieds-noirs and the political context in France.[5]

targets.targetText: Farkon yakin Aljeriya a shekara ta 1954 ya fito daga wani yunkuri na kishin kasa na Aljeriya. An bukaci jama'ar da su yi yaki a yakin duniya na biyu tare da Faransa. A madadin aikinsu, sun bukaci ƙarin haƙƙoƙin siyasa da tattalin arziki waɗanda aka ƙi. [1] Rikicin da ke tsakanin bangarorin biyu ya taso ne a lokacin da jam'iyyar National Liberation Front (FLN) ta yi kira ga 'yancin kai a cikin sanarwar da ta yi na 1 ga Nuwamba 1954 . [2] Gwamnatin Faransa karkashin jagorancin Pierre Mendès Faransa ta ki amincewa da bukatunsu saboda matsin lamba da masu fafutuka suka kafa da kuma yanayin siyasa a Faransa. [3]

Farkon yakin Aljeriya a shekara ta 1954 ya fito daga wani yunkuri na kishin ƙasa na Aljeriya. An buƙaci jama'ar da su yi yaki a yakin duniya na biyu tare da Faransa. A madadin aikinsu, sun buƙaci ƙarin haƙƙoƙin siyasa da tattalin arziki waɗanda aka ƙi. [1] Rikicin da ke tsakanin ɓangarori biyu ya taso ne a lokacin da jam'iyyar National Liberation Front (FLN) ta yi kira ga 'yancin kai a cikin sanarwar da ta yi na 1 ga Nuwamba 1954 . [2] Gwamnatin Faransa ƙarƙashin jagorancin Pierre Mendès Faransa ta ki amincewa da bukatunsu saboda matsin lamba da masu fafutuka suka kafa da kuma yanayin siyasa a Faransa. [3]

items.sourceText: On 6 July 1629, the survivors and authorities wrote a letter to King Christian IV to ask for his protection against the pirates. When informed about the women and children abducted, the king ordered the Faroese population to collect a ransom for the prisoners to save them from slavery. However, the Faroese replied that the poverty caused by several years of piracy on the island, had made it impossible to collect the money necessary to buy the prisoners back.[1]

targets.targetText: A ranar 6 ga Yuli 1629, waɗanda suka tsira da hukumomi sun rubuta wasiƙa zuwa ga Sarki Christian IV don neman kariyarsa daga masu fashin teku. Da aka samu labarin matan da yaran da aka sace, sarkin ya umarci al’ummar Farowa da su karbi kudin fansa ga fursunonin domin kubutar da su daga bauta. Duk da haka, Faroese ya amsa cewa talaucin da ake fama da shi na shekaru da yawa na fashin teku a tsibirin, ya sa ba a iya tattara kudaden da ake bukata don sayen fursunoni ba. [1]

A ranar 6 ga watan Yuli 1629, waɗanda suka tsira da hukumomi sun rubuta wasiƙa zuwa ga Sarki Christian IV don neman kariyarsa daga masu fashin teku. Da aka samu labarin matan da yaran da aka sace, sarkin ya umarci al’ummar Farowa da su karbi kuɗin fansa ga fursunonin domin kuɓutar da su daga bauta. Duk da haka, Faroese ya amsa cewa talaucin da ake fama da shi na shekaru da yawa na fashin teku a tsibirin, ya sa ba a iya tattara kuɗaɗen da ake buƙata don sayen fursunoni ba. [1]

items.sourceText: Freedom Nyamubaya has two published collections of poems, On the Road Again: Poems During and After the National Liberation of Zimbabwe (Zimbabwe Publishing House, 1985), and Dusk of Dawn (College Press, 1995).[1][8] She co-authored Ndangariro with Irene Ropa Rinopfuka Mahamba (Zimbabwe Foundation for Education with Production, 1987).[3] Her short story “Special Place” is published in the anthology Writing Still: New Stories from Zimbabwe (Weaver Press, 2003).[5]

targets.targetText: Freedom Nyamubaya tana da tarin wakoki guda biyu da aka buga, On the Road again: Waƙoƙi Lokacin da Bayan 'Yancin Ƙasar Zimbabwe (Zimbabwe Publishing House, 1985), da Dusk of Dawn (Jarida na Kwalejin, 1995). [1] [2] Ta haɗu da Ndangariro tare da Irene Ropa Rinopfuka Mahamba (Zimbabwe Foundation for Education with Production, 1987). [3] An buga gajeriyar labarinta "Wuri na Musamman" a cikin littafin tarihin Rubutun Har yanzu: Sabbin Labarun daga Zimbabwe (Weaver Press, 2003). [1]

items.sourceText: Shortly after the British Parliament outlawed British participation in the slave trade in 1807, the Royal Navy started to patrol the African coast and high seas, seizing British vessels suspected of engaging in the slave trade. After the Congress of Vienna and the ratification of various international agreements to restrict or outlaw the transatlantic trade, the West Africa Squadron, and to a lesser extent maritime patrols flying under the flags of Spain, Portugal, the Netherlands, Brazil, and the United States, also intercepted ships suspected of trafficking slaves in contravention of treaty provisions. In addition to the courts established in Freetown, tribunals to judge ships seized by anti-slaving patrols also operated in Havana, Rio de Janeiro, Luanda, Cape Verde, and St. Helena.

targets.targetText: Jim kadan bayan da Majalisar Biritaniya ta haramta shigar Birtaniya shiga cinikin bayi a shekara ta 1807, rundunar sojojin ruwa ta Royal Navy ta fara sintiri a gabar tekun Afirka da manyan tekuna, tare da kwace jiragen ruwa na Burtaniya da ake zargi da yin cinikin bayi. Bayan Majalisar Vienna da kuma amincewa da yarjejeniyoyin kasa da kasa daban-daban don takura ko haramta cinikayyar tekun Atlantika, Rundunar Sojin Afirka ta Yamma, da kuma wasu ‘yan sintiri na teku da ke shawagi a karkashin tutocin Spain, Portugal, Netherlands, Brazil, da Amurka, sun kuma katse jiragen ruwa da ake zargi da safarar bayi da suka saba wa tanadin yarjejeniya. Baya ga kotunan da aka kafa a Freetown, kotunan shari'ar da za ta yi shari'ar jiragen ruwa da jami'an sintiri na yaki da bautar suka kama suna aiki a Havana, Rio de Janeiro, Luanda, Cape Verde, da St. Helena.

Jim kaɗan bayan da Majalisar Biritaniya ta haramta shigar Birtaniya shiga cinikin bayi a shekara ta 1807, rundunar sojojin ruwa ta Royal Navy ta fara sintiri a gabar tekun Afirka da manyan tekuna, tare da kwace jiragen ruwa na Burtaniya da ake zargi da yin cinikin bayi. Bayan Majalisar Vienna da kuma amincewa da yarjejeniyoyin ƙasa da ƙasa daban-daban don takura ko haramta cinikayyar tekun Atlantika, Rundunar Sojin Afirka ta Yamma, da kuma wasu ‘yan sintiri na teku da ke shawagi a ƙarƙashin tutocin Spain, Portugal, Netherlands, Brazil, da Amurka, sun kuma katse jiragen ruwa da ake zargi da safarar bayi da suka saɓa wa tanadin yarjejeniya. Baya ga kotunan da aka kafa a Freetown, kotunan shari'ar da za ta yi shari'ar jiragen ruwa da jami'an sintiri na yaki da bautar suka kama suna aiki a Havana, Rio de Janeiro, Luanda, Cape Verde, da St. Helena.

items.sourceText: More than 80,000 Africans rescued from the illegal trade between Africa and the Americas were emancipated before courts operating in Freetown between 1808 and 1871, when the last remaining mixed commission was shuttered. Upon emancipation, most liberated Africans were registered with a Christian name, but a large number of registries also listed African names, based on information given by the liberated African or a translator. Many registries also record estimated age, height, brands, and body modifications.[1]

targets.targetText: Fiye da 'yan Afirka 80,000 da aka ceto daga cinikin haramtacciyar hanya tsakanin Afirka da Amurka an 'yantar da su a gaban kotunan da ke aiki a Freetown tsakanin shekarun 1808 zuwa 1871, lokacin da aka rufe sauran haɗaɗɗiyar hukumar. Bayan samun 'yanci, yawancin 'yan Afirka masu 'yanci an yi musu rajista da sunan Kirista, amma yawancin rajista kuma sun jera sunayen Afirka, bisa bayanan da aka samu 'yan Afirka ko mai fassara. Rijista da yawa kuma suna yin rikodin kiyasin shekaru, tsayi, tambura, da gyare-gyaren jiki. [1]

Rijista da yawa kuma suna yin rikodin kiyasin shekaru, tsayi, tambura, da gyare-gyaren jiki. [1]

items.sourceText: The SPDM advocated for greater representation of the Saho people in the EPLF, as well as for the recognition of Saho as an official language in Eritrea. The organization also demanded an end to the forced conscription of young men into the EPLF, and for greater democracy and human rights in the country.[6][7]

targets.targetText: SPDM ta ba da shawarar samun wakilcin al'ummar Saho a cikin EPLF, da kuma amincewa da Saho a matsayin harshen hukuma a Eritrea. Ƙungiyar ta kuma buƙaci a kawo ƙarshen tilasta wa matasa shiga cikin kungiyar ta EPLF, da kuma inganta dimokuraɗiyya da kare hakkin ɗan Adam a ƙasar. [1] [2]

SPDM ta ba da shawarar samun wakilcin al'ummar Saho a cikin EPLF, da kuma amincewa da Saho a matsayin harshen hukuma a Eritrea. Kungiyar ta kuma bukaci a kawo karshen tilasta wa matasa shiga cikin kungiyar ta EPLF, da kuma inganta dimokuradiyya da kare hakkin dan Adam a kasar. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: In December 1966, the General Assembly of the United Nations adopted a resolution and proposed an UN-supervised self-determination referendum in Western Sahara.[2]

targets.targetText: A watan Disambar 1966, babban taron Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya ya zartas da wani kuduri tare da ba da shawarar gudanar da zaɓen raba gardama na cin gashin kai ƙarƙashin kulawar Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya a yammacin Sahara. [1]

A watan Disambar 1966, babban taron Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ya zartas da wani kuduri tare da ba da shawarar gudanar da zaben raba gardama na cin gashin kai karkashin kulawar Majalisar Dinkin Duniya a yammacin Sahara. [1]

items.sourceText: Planned in secrecy, Operation Écouvillon was significant in understanding the broader context of Western Sahara. It occurred within a complex geopolitical landscape, as the operation took place in a strategically significant territory claimed by Spain and various independence movements that had complicated relationships with the newly independent Morocco at the time. The decolonization processes in Algeria and Mauritania further complicated the political context. Additionally, many insurgents from the Moroccan Army of Liberation received support from members of the Berber peoples and tribes in the Sahel region.

targets.targetText: An tsara shi cikin sirri, Operation Écouvillon yana da mahimmanci wajen fahimtar faffadan mahallin yammacin Sahara . Hakan ya faru ne a cikin wani yanayi mai sarkakkiya na geopolitical, yayin da aikin ya gudana a cikin wani yanki mai mahimmanci da Spain ta yi iƙirari da ƙungiyoyin ƴancin kai daban-daban waɗanda ke da sarƙaƙiya dangantaka da sabuwar ƙasar Maroko mai cin gashin kanta a lokacin. Hanyoyin kawar da mulkin mallaka a Aljeriya da Mauritania sun kara dagula al'amuran siyasa. Bugu da kari, da yawa daga cikin 'yan tada kayar baya daga Sojojin Moroko na 'Yanci sun samu tallafi daga 'yan kabilar Berber da kabilun yankin Sahel.

An tsara shi cikin sirri, Operation Écouvillon yana da mahimmanci wajen fahimtar faffaɗan mahallin yammacin Sahara. Hakan ya faru ne a cikin wani yanayi mai sarkakkiya na geopolitical, yayin da aikin ya gudana a cikin wani yanki mai mahimmanci da Spain ta yi iƙirari da ƙungiyoyin ƴancin kai daban-daban waɗanda ke da sarƙaƙiya dangantaka da sabuwar ƙasar Maroko mai cin gashin kanta a lokacin. Hanyoyin kawar da 'yan mulkin mallaka a Aljeriya da Mauritania sun ƙara dagula al'amuran siyasa. Bugu da ƙari, da yawa daga cikin 'yan tada ƙayar baya daga Sojojin Moroko na 'Yanci sun samu tallafi daga 'yan ƙabilar Berber da ƙabilun yankin Sahel.

items.sourceText: According to Luo tradition, a Ker cannot be a politician, so Odinga relinquished his position as king in 1957 and became the political spokesman of the Luo. The same year, he was elected member of the Legislative Council for the Central Nyanza constituency, and in 1958 he joined the Kenya African Union (KAU). He was amongst the founders of the Kenya Independence Movement in 1959, and in 1960, together with Tom Mboya he joined Kenya African National Union (KANU). When Kenya became a Republic in 1964, he was its first Vice-President.

targets.targetText: Bisa al'adar Luo, Ker ba zai iya zama ɗan siyasa ba, don haka Odinga ya ajiye muƙaminsa na sarki a shekara ta 1957 kuma ya zama kakakin siyasa na Luo. A wannan shekarar, an zaɓe shi mamba a majalisar dokokin yankin tsakiyar Nyanza, kuma a shekarar 1958 ya shiga ƙungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta Kenya (KAU). Ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda suka kafa kungiyar 'yancin kai ta Kenya a shekarar 1959, kuma a cikin shekarar 1960, tare da Tom Mboya ya shiga kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta Kenya (KANU). Lokacin da Kenya ta zama jamhuriya a shekarar 1964, shi ne mataimakin shugabanta na farko.

Bisa al'adar Luo, Ker ba zai iya zama dan siyasa ba, don haka Odinga ya ajiye mukaminsa na sarki a shekara ta 1957 kuma ya zama kakakin siyasa na Luo. A wannan shekarar, an zabe shi mamba a majalisar dokokin yankin tsakiyar Nyanza, kuma a shekarar 1958 ya shiga kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta Kenya (KAU). Ya kasance daya daga cikin wadanda suka kafa kungiyar 'yancin kai ta Kenya a 1959, kuma a cikin 1960, tare da Tom Mboya ya shiga kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka ta Kenya (KANU). Lokacin da Kenya ta zama jamhuriya a 1964, shi ne mataimakin shugabanta na farko.

items.sourceText: The friction between Odinga and Kenyatta continued, and in 1969 Odinga was arrested after the two verbally abused each other publicly at a chaotic function in Kisumu – and where at least 11 people were killed and dozens were injured in riots. That was when Jomo as the President of Kenya was to open New Nyanza General Hospital (Russia Hospital), in October 1969 which was seen as Odinga's project due to his Russian connection. Due to the incident KPU was banned making Kenya a de facto party state under KANU. He was detained along with other KPU members for eighteen months until the Government made decision to free him on 27 March 1971.[8] He consigned to political limbo until after Kenyatta's death in August 1978. In the Uganda–Tanzania War (1978–1979), Odinga reportedly supported anti-Idi Amin rebels, sheltering a number of them at his farm in Bondo District during the preparation phase for the Battle of Tororo.[9]

targets.targetText: An ci gaba da gwabza fada tsakanin Odinga da Kenyatta, kuma a shekara ta 1969 aka kama Odinga bayan da mutanen biyu suka yi wa juna kalaman batanci a bainar jama'a a wani taro da aka yi a Kisumu - kuma inda aka kashe akalla mutane 11 tare da jikkata wasu da dama a tarzomar. A lokacin ne Jomo a matsayin shugaban kasar Kenya zai bude sabon asibitin Nyanza (Asibitin Rasha), a watan Oktoban 1969 wanda ake ganin aikin Odinga ne saboda alakarsa da Rasha. Sakamakon lamarin an hana KPU maida Kenya ta zama jaha ta jam'iyyar ta KANU. An tsare shi tare da wasu membobin KPU tsawon watanni goma sha takwas har sai da gwamnati ta yanke shawarar sake shi a ranar 27 ga Maris 1971. [1] Ya shiga siyasa har sai bayan mutuwar Kenyatta a watan Agustan 1978. A yakin Uganda-Tanzaniya (1978-1979), Odinga ya bayar da rahoton goyon bayan 'yan tawayen Idi Amin, inda ya ba da mafaka da dama daga cikinsu a gonarsa da ke gundumar Bondo a lokacin shirye-shiryen yakin Tororo . [2]

An ci gaba da gwabza faɗa tsakanin Odinga da Kenyatta, kuma a shekara ta 1969 aka kama Odinga bayan da mutanen biyu suka yi wa juna kalaman ɓatanci a bainar jama'a a wani taro da aka yi a Kisumu - kuma inda aka kashe akalla mutane 11 tare da jikkata wasu da dama a tarzomar. A lokacin ne Jomo a matsayin shugaban ƙasar Kenya zai buɗe sabon asibitin Nyanza (Asibitin Rasha), a watan Oktoban 1969 wanda ake ganin aikin Odinga ne saboda alakarsa da Rasha. Sakamakon lamarin an hana KPU maida Kenya ta zama jaha ta jam'iyyar ta KANU. An tsare shi tare da wasu membobin KPU tsawon watanni goma sha takwas har sai da gwamnati ta yanke shawarar sake shi a ranar 27 ga watan Maris 1971. [1] Ya shiga siyasa har sai bayan mutuwar Kenyatta a watan Agustan 1978. A yakin Uganda-Tanzaniya (1978-1979), Odinga ya bayar da rahoton goyon bayan 'yan tawayen Idi Amin, inda ya ba da mafaka da dama daga cikinsu a gonarsa da ke gundumar Bondo a lokacin shirye-shiryen yakin Tororo. [2]

items.sourceText: In 1929, the Kikuyu Central Association decided to send Jomo Kenyatta to Britain to present African grievances before the colonial office.[5] Indian leader and Legco member, Isher Dass, collected the funds for his trip.[6]

targets.targetText: A shekara ta 1929, kungiyar Kikuyu ta tsakiya ta yanke shawarar tura Jomo Kenyatta zuwa Burtaniya don gabatar da korafe-korafen Afirka a gaban ofishin 'yan mulkin mallaka. [1] Shugaban Indiya kuma memba na Legco, Isher Dass, ya tattara kuɗaɗen tafiyar tasa. [2]

A shekara ta 1929, kungiyar Kikuyu ta tsakiya ta yanke shawarar tura Jomo Kenyatta zuwa Burtaniya don gabatar da korafe-korafen Afirka a gaban ofishin mulkin mallaka. [1] Shugaban Indiya kuma memba na Legco, Isher Dass, ya tattara kudaden tafiyar tasa. [2]

items.sourceText: Ngei died in August 2004 at the age of 81 after suffering from diabetes.[6] A mausoleum was built in Mbilini, Kangundo, the constituency he had served for 27 years, by the Kenyan government and unveiled in 2006.[7] On 20 October 2016, the president of the Republic of Kenya unveiled a statue in honour of Paul Ngei at Chumvi town which is in the junction that leads to Machakos from the Mombasa Highway. This was during the celebrations of the year's Heroes' Day which were held in Machakos. The Jubilee Government committed to have national days celebrated outside the capital, Nairobi.

targets.targetText: Ngei ya rasu ne a watan Agustan shekarar 2004 yana da shekaru 81 bayan fama da ciwon suga. [1] An gina wani kabari a Mbilini, Kangundo, mazaɓar da ya yi aiki tsawon shekaru 27, da gwamnatin Kenya ta kaddamar da shi a shekara ta 2006. [2] A ranar 20 ga watan Oktoba, 2016, shugaban ƙasar Kenya ya kaddamar da wani mutum-mutumi na girmama Paul Ngei a garin Chumvi da ke mahaɗar da ke kan hanyar zuwa Machakos daga babbar hanyar Mombasa. Hakan ya faru ne a yayin bikin ranar jarumai na shekara wanda aka gudanar a garin Machakos. Gwamnatin Jubilee ta kuduri aniyar gudanar da bukukuwan ranar ƙasa a wajen babban birnin kasar, Nairobi.

Ngei ya rasu ne a watan Agustan shekarar 2004 yana da shekaru 81 bayan fama da ciwon suga . [1] An gina wani kabari a Mbilini, Kangundo, mazabar da ya yi aiki tsawon shekaru 27, da gwamnatin Kenya ta kaddamar da shi a shekara ta 2006. [2] A ranar 20 ga Oktoba, 2016, shugaban kasar Kenya ya kaddamar da wani mutum-mutumi na girmama Paul Ngei a garin Chumvi da ke mahadar da ke kan hanyar zuwa Machakos daga babbar hanyar Mombasa. Hakan ya faru ne a yayin bikin ranar jarumai na shekara wanda aka gudanar a garin Machakos. Gwamnatin Jubilee ta kuduri aniyar gudanar da bukukuwan ranar kasa a wajen babban birnin kasar, Nairobi .

items.sourceText: Henry Pius Masinde Muliro (June 30, 1922[1] – August 14, 1992) was a Kenyan politician from the Bukusu sub-tribe of the larger Abaluhya people of western Kenya. He was one of the central figures in the shaping of the political landscape in Kenya. An anti-colonial activist, he campaigned for the restoration of multi-party democracy in Kenya in his later years.[citation needed]

targets.targetText: Henry Pius Masinde Muliro (30 ga Yuni, 1922 [1] - Agusta 14, 1992) ɗan siyasan Kenya ne daga ƙabilar Bukusu na babban mutanen Abaluhya na yammacin Kenya. Ya kasance daya daga cikin jigo a tsakiya wajen tsara yanayin siyasa a Kenya. Wani mai adawa da mulkin mallaka, ya yi fafutukar ganin an maido da tsarin dimokuradiyyar jam'iyyu da yawa a Kenya a shekarun baya. [ abubuwan da ake bukata ]

Henry Pius Masinde Muliro (30 ga watan Yuni, 1922 [1] - Agusta 14, 1992) ɗan siyasan Kenya ne daga ƙabilar Bukusu na babban mutanen Abaluhya na yammacin Kenya. Ya kasance ɗaya daga cikin jigo a tsakiya wajen tsara yanayin siyasa a Kenya. Wani mai adawa da 'yan mulkin mallaka, ya yi fafutukar ganin an maido da tsarin dimokuraɗiyyar jam'iyyu da yawa a Kenya a shekarun baya. [ abubuwan da ake bukata ]

items.sourceText: He was succeeded by his brother, Kipeles arap Kimnyole (aka Tamasun),[7] while his son, Barsirian arap Manyei (born 1894), would later become the Nandi leader from 1919 until 1922 when he was detained by the British colonial government. Barsirian was not released until 1964, after independence, making him the longest-serving political prisoner in Kenyan history.[2]

targets.targetText: Ɗan uwansa, Kipeles arap Kimnyole (aka Tamasun), [1] ya gaje shi yayin da ɗansa, Barsirian arap Manyei (an haife shi a shekara ta 1894), daga baya zai zama shugaban Nandi daga shekarun 1919 har zuwa 1922 lokacin da gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta Burtaniya ta tsare shi. Ba a sake Barsirian ba sai a shekara ta 1964, bayan samun 'yancin kai, wanda hakan ya sa ya zama fursunonin siyasa mafi daɗewa a tarihin Kenya. [2]

Dan uwansa, Kipeles arap Kimnyole (aka Tamasun), [1] ya gaje shi yayin da dansa, Barsirian arap Manyei (an haife shi a shekara ta 1894), daga baya zai zama shugaban Nandi daga 1919 har zuwa 1922 lokacin da gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta Burtaniya ta tsare shi. Ba a sake Barsirian ba sai a shekara ta 1964, bayan samun 'yancin kai, wanda hakan ya sa ya zama fursunonin siyasa mafi dadewa a tarihin Kenya. [2]

items.sourceText: As chief of staff, Boumédiène entered into conflict with the FLN's government-in-exile, the GPRA, which towards the end of the war attempted to dismiss him. He then supported an alliance of FLN politicians against the GPRA's provisional post-independence government, and marched the ALN towards Algiers to occupy it. The GPRA was supported by Wilayas III (Kabylia) and IV (Algérois), and the Oujda group was supported by the border army.[1] The border army defeated the GPRA and entered Algiers on 9 September 1962.[3] Ahmed Ben Bella became the president of Algeria, and Boumédiène minister of defense. In this role Boumédiène continued to exercise a powerful influence over the regime, through the Algerian military. To secure his grip over the army, he began promoting and supporting his old friends and colleagues of the Oujda group. These men and their entourage became known as the Oujda group, forming a powerful pro-Boumédiène faction within the political and military ranks of the one-party state, but in their turn dependent on him for their positions.

targets.targetText: A matsayinsa na shugaban ma'aikata, Boumédiène ya shiga rikici da gwamnatin FLN da ke gudun hijira, GPRA, wanda a ƙarshen yaƙin ya yi ƙoƙarin kore shi. Daga nan sai ya goyi bayan kawancen ‘yan siyasar FLN a kan gwamnatin wucin gadi ta GPRA bayan samun ‘yancin kai, sannan ya zarce da ALN zuwa Algiers domin mamaye ta. GPRA tana samun goyon bayan Wilayas III ( Kabylia ) da IV ( Algérois ), kuma ƙungiyar Oujda tana samun goyon bayan sojojin kan iyaka. [1] Sojojin kan iyaka sun fatattaki GPRA kuma suka shiga Algiers a ranar 9 ga Satumba 1962. [2] Ahmed Ben Bella ya zama shugaban kasar Aljeriya, da kuma Boumédiène ministan tsaro. A cikin wannan rawar Boumédiène ya ci gaba da yin tasiri mai ƙarfi akan tsarin mulki, ta hanyar sojojin Aljeriya . Domin tabbatar da nasararsa a kan sojojin, ya fara tallata da tallafawa tsoffin abokansa da abokan aikinsa na kungiyar Oujda. Wadannan mutanen da mukarrabansu sun zama sanannun kungiyar Oujda, inda suka kafa wani bangare mai karfi na goyon bayan Boumédiène a cikin tsarin siyasa da na soja na kasar mai jam'iyya daya, amma a nasu bangaren sun dogara da shi kan mukamansu.

A matsayinsa na shugaban ma'aikata, Boumédiène ya shiga rikici da gwamnatin FLN da ke gudun hijira, GPRA, wanda a ƙarshen yaƙin ya yi ƙoƙarin korar sa. Daga nan sai ya goyi bayan kawancen ‘yan siyasar FLN a kan gwamnatin wucin gadi ta GPRA bayan samun ‘yancin kai, sannan ya zarce da ALN zuwa Algiers domin mamaye ta. GPRA tana samun goyon bayan Wilayas III (Kabylia) da IV (Algérois), kuma ƙungiyar Oujda tana samun goyon bayan sojojin kan iyaka. [1] Sojojin kan iyaka sun fatattaki GPRA kuma suka shiga Algiers a ranar 9 ga watan Satumba 1962. [2] Ahmed Ben Bella ya zama shugaban ƙasar Aljeriya, da kuma Boumédiène ministan tsaro. A cikin wannan rawar Boumédiène ya ci gaba da yin tasiri mai ƙarfi akan tsarin mulki, ta hanyar sojojin Aljeriya. Domin tabbatar da nasararsa a kan sojojin, ya fara tallata da tallafawa tsoffin abokansa da abokan aikinsa na kungiyar Oujda. Waɗannan mutanen da mukarrabansu sun zama sanannun kungiyar Oujda, inda suka kafa wani ɓangare mai karfi na goyon bayan Boumédiène a cikin tsarin siyasa da na soja na ƙasar mai jam'iyya ɗaya , amma a nasu ɓangaren sun dogara da shi kan muƙamansu.

items.sourceText: At age 16, he joined the Parti du peuple algérien (PPA) and its successor organization MTLD. Later, he joined the Front de libération nationale (FLN), to become an officer in its military wing, the Armée de libération nationale (ALN) during the Algerian War of Independence (1954–61), in which he fought as a guerrilla soldier from 1955. A medical student, in 1956, he was one of the co-founders of the Union générale des étudiants musulmans algériens (UGEMA), the FLN's student organization which later became the national student organization of Algeria.[4]

targets.targetText: Yana da shekaru 16, ya shiga jam'iyyar Parti du peuple algérien (PPA) da ƙungiyar magajinsa MTLD . Daga baya, ya shiga cikin Front de liberation nationale (FLN), don zama jami'i a reshenta na soja, Armée de Liberation nationale (ALN) a lokacin Yaƙin 'Yancin Aljeriya (1954-61), wanda ya yi yaƙi a matsayin sojan fage daga 1955. Wani dalibin likitanci, a shekarar 1956, yana daya daga cikin wadanda suka kafa kungiyar Union générale des étudiants musulmans algériens (UGEMA), kungiyar dalibai ta FLN wadda daga baya ta zama kungiyar dalibai ta kasa ta Aljeriya. [1]

Yana da shekaru 16, ya shiga jam'iyyar Parti du peuple algérien (PPA) da ƙungiyar magajinsa MTLD. Daga baya, ya shiga cikin Front de liberation nationale (FLN), don zama jami'i a reshenta na soja, Armée de Liberation nationale (ALN) a lokacin Yaƙin neman 'Yancin Aljeriya (1954-61), wanda ya yi yaƙi a matsayin sojan fage daga shekarun 1955. Wani ɗalibin likitanci, a shekarar 1956, yana ɗaya daga cikin waɗanda suka kafa kungiyar Union générale des étudiants musulmans algériens (UGEMA), ƙungiyar ɗalibai ta FLN wacce daga baya ta zama kungiyar dalibai ta kasa ta Aljeriya. [1]

items.sourceText: After the arrest of Sheik-el-Haddad, the jihad continued under Bouamama. There were also other small insurrectionary movements at Blessed-Menaceur, where rebel forces besieged Cherchel, Zurich, Vesoul-Benian and Hammam-Rirha. This movement was also crushed. From July to September 1872, French forces had still to completely subdue the Kabylie. Bou-Mezrag took refuge at Maadid, and later managed to escape the French forces finding allies among the Tuareg tribes of the South. General Delacroix with a small expeditionary force, continued to pursue the rebels beyond Ouargla. Bou-Mezrag Mokrani, who had been for six days without drink or food, was finally captured.

targets.targetText: Bayan kama Sheik-el-Haddad, jihadi ya ci gaba a ƙarƙashin Bouamama. Haka kuma an sami wasu ƙananan ƙungiyoyin tawaye a Happy-Menaceur, inda dakarun 'yan tawaye suka yiwa Cherchel, Zurich, Vesoul-Benian da Hammam-Rirha ƙawanya. Wannan yunkuri kuma an murkushe shi. Daga watan Yuli zuwa Satumba 1872, sojojin Faransa sun ci gaba da mamaye Kabylie gaba ɗaya. Bou-Mezrag ya fake ne a Maadid, sannan daga baya ya yi nasarar tserewa dakarun Faransa da ke samun abokan ƙawance a tsakanin ƙabilun Abzinawa na Kudu. Janar Delacroix tare da 'yan ƙaramin runduna, ya ci gaba da bin 'yan tawayen bayan Ouargla. An kama Bou-Mezrag Mokrani, wanda ya kwashe kwanaki shida ba sha ko abinci ba.

Bayan kama Sheik-el-Haddad, jihadi ya ci gaba a karkashin Bouamama . Haka kuma an sami wasu ƙananan ƙungiyoyin tawaye a Happy-Menaceur, inda dakarun 'yan tawaye suka yiwa Cherchel, Zurich, Vesoul-Benian da Hammam-Rirha kawanya. Wannan yunkuri kuma an murkushe shi. Daga Yuli zuwa Satumba 1872, sojojin Faransa sun ci gaba da mamaye Kabylie gaba daya. Bou-Mezrag ya fake ne a Maadid, sannan daga baya ya yi nasarar tserewa dakarun Faransa da ke samun abokan kawance a tsakanin kabilun Abzinawa na Kudu. Janar Delacroix tare da 'yan karamin runduna, ya ci gaba da bin 'yan tawayen bayan Ouargla. An kama Bou-Mezrag Mokrani, wanda ya kwashe kwanaki shida ba sha ko abinci ba.

items.sourceText: The members of the Rahamania Brotherhood: disciples of the Sheik Ahaddad (El Haddad); played an eminent part in the success of the insurrection of El Mokrani (Amokrane), in particular after Sheikh Ahaddad (El Haddad) had proclaimed war against the French on April 8, 1871. The insurrection acquired a general character through the increase in the number of combatants who joined it and its extension to the west, north and the east where outposts of the colonial army were encircled in several areas.

targets.targetText: 'Yan uwa na Rahamaniya: Almajiran Sheik Aaddad (El Haddad); ya taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen nasarar tada ƙayar bayan El Mokrani (Amokrane), musamman bayan Sheikh Aaddad (El Haddad) ya shelanta yaki da Faransa a ranar 8 ga watan Afrilu, 1871. Rikicin ya samu kwarin guiwa ne ta hanyar karuwar yawan mayakan da suka shiga cikinta tare da faɗaɗa shi zuwa yamma, arewa da gabas inda aka kewaye sansanonin sojojin 'yan mulkin mallaka a yankuna da dama.

'Yan uwa na Rahamaniya: Almajiran Sheik Aaddad (El Haddad); ya taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen nasarar tada kayar bayan El Mokrani (Amokrane), musamman bayan Sheikh Aaddad (El Haddad) ya shelanta yaki da Faransa a ranar 8 ga Afrilu, 1871. Rikicin ya samu kwarin guiwa ne ta hanyar karuwar yawan mayakan da suka shiga cikinta tare da fadada shi zuwa yamma, arewa da gabas inda aka kewaye sansanonin sojojin mulkin mallaka a yankuna da dama.

items.sourceText: The Battle of the Col des Beni Aïcha or Battle of Thenia, which broke out on 19 April 1871, was a battle of the Mokrani Revolt between the Algerian rebels, and the France, which was the colonial power in the region since 1830.[1]

targets.targetText: Yakin Col des Beni Aïcha ko yakin Thenia, wanda ya barke a ranar 19 ga Afrilu 1871, yakin Mokrani ne na tawayen Mokrani tsakanin 'yan tawayen Aljeriya, da kuma Faransa, wadda ita ce ta yi mulkin mallaka a yankin tun 1830. [1]

Yakin Col des Beni Aïcha ko yakin Thenia, wanda ya ɓarke a ranar 19 ga watan Afrilu 1871, yakin Mokrani ne na tawayen Mokrani tsakanin 'yan tawayen Aljeriya, da kuma Faransa, wacce ita ce ta yi mulkin mallaka a yankin tun a shekarar 1830. [1]

items.sourceText: In 1979, he formed the "Group for Defense against the Illicit", intended to pressure the government to adopt policies seen as reflecting Islamic values, such as implementation of the sharia. As his efforts failed, he began considering the possibility of an armed effort, and started stockpiling weapons from mid-1981. In April 1982, a confrontation occurred between his group and the police in which his brother Mokhtar was shot; this incident convinced him that violence was called for.

targets.targetText: A shekara ta 1979, ya kafa "Group for Defence against the Inlicit", da nufin tursasawa gwamnati ta aiwatar da manufofin da ake ganin suna nuna dabi'un Musulunci, kamar aiwatar da shari'ar Musulunci . Yayin da kokarinsa ya gaza, sai ya fara la'akari da yuwuwar yunkurin yin amfani da makamai, kuma ya fara tara makamai tun tsakiyar 1981. A watan Afrilun 1982, an yi arangama tsakanin kungiyarsa da ‘yan sanda inda aka harbe dan uwansa Mokhtar; wannan al'amari ya tabbatar masa da cewa an kira tashin hankali.

A shekara ta 1979, ya kafa "Group for Defence against the Inlicit", da nufin tursasawa gwamnati ta aiwatar da manufofin da ake ganin suna nuna ɗabi'un Musulunci, kamar aiwatar da shari'ar Musulunci. Yayin da kokarinsa ya gaza, sai ya fara la'akari da yuwuwar yunkurin yin amfani da makamai, kuma ya fara tara makamai tun tsakiyar shekarar 1981. A watan Afrilun 1982, an yi arangama tsakanin ƙungiyarsa da ‘yan sanda inda aka harbe ɗan uwansa Mokhtar; wannan al'amari ya tabbatar masa da cewa an kira tashin hankali.

items.sourceText: After a shot fired from inside the building killed the British negotiator, Erskine ordered his troops, which included the Lancashire Fusiliers, to attack the building. Though the Egyptian policemen were greatly outmatched, being equipped solely with firearms compared to the British, who had tanks, field guns and armoured fighting vehicles, they continued to resist for over an hour. The British eventually managed to capture the building after two hours of fighting, when the Egyptians ran out of ammunition. Captain Salah Zulfikar was a major key figure who volunteered in the battle.[1][2] Both sides had suffered minor casualties: the British suffered 13 soldiers killed and 22 wounded, while the policemen had more substantial losses- 56 killed and 73 wounded.[8][9][10] All policemen who survived the engagement were taken captive by British forces.[11][12][13][14]

targets.targetText: Bayan harbin da aka harba daga cikin ginin ya kashe mai shiga tsakani na Burtaniya, Erskine ya umarci dakarunsa, waɗanda suka haɗa da Fusiliers na Lancashire, da su kai hari kan ginin. Ko da yake 'yan sandan Masar sun yi fice sosai, suna sanye da bindigogi kawai idan aka kwatanta da na Birtaniya, waɗanda ke da tankokin yaki, bindigogi da motocin yaki masu sulke, sun ci gaba da yin tirjiya na sama da sa'a guda. Daga ƙarshe dai turawan Ingila sun yi nasarar kwace ginin bayan kwashe sa’o’i biyu ana gwabzawa, lokacin da Masarawa suka kare da harsashi. Kyaftin Salah Zulfikar ya kasance babban jigo wanda ya ba da kai a yakin. [1] [2] Ɓangarorin biyu sun samu ƙananan raunuka: Sojojin Burtaniya sun kashe sojoji 13 da raunata 22, yayin da ‘yan sanda suka samu hasara mai yawa- 56 aka kashe da 73 suka jikkata. [3] [4] [5] Duk 'yan sandan da suka tsira da ransu, sojojin Burtaniya sun kama su. [6] [7] [8] [9]

Bayan harbin da aka harba daga cikin ginin ya kashe mai shiga tsakani na Burtaniya, Erskine ya umarci dakarunsa, wadanda suka hada da Fusiliers na Lancashire, da su kai hari kan ginin. Ko da yake 'yan sandan Masar sun yi fice sosai, suna sanye da bindigogi kawai idan aka kwatanta da na Birtaniya, wadanda ke da tankokin yaki, bindigogi da motocin yaki masu sulke, sun ci gaba da yin tirjiya na sama da sa'a guda. Daga karshe dai turawan Ingila sun yi nasarar kwace ginin bayan kwashe sa’o’i biyu ana gwabzawa, lokacin da Masarawa suka kare da harsashi. Kyaftin Salah Zulfikar ya kasance babban jigo wanda ya ba da kai a yakin. [1] [2] Bangarorin biyu sun samu kananan raunuka: Sojojin Burtaniya sun kashe sojoji 13 da raunata 22, yayin da ‘yan sanda suka samu hasara mai yawa- 56 aka kashe da 73 suka jikkata. [3] [4] [5] Duk 'yan sandan da suka tsira da ransu, sojojin Burtaniya sun kama su. [6] [7] [8] [9]

items.sourceText: French aircraft conducted bombing runs over the area, with squadrons of 9 to 12 planes each causing chaos among the FLN fighters. Meanwhile, helicopters were en route from Bousaada, and artillery and tanks joined the fray. The FLN fighters bided their time, waiting for the dust to settle and the French to let their guard down. When the opportunity arose, they opened fire on the French forces, but the French leaders refrained from retreat, and forced their men to fight back, with the FLN economising on ammo only shooting when they needed to, by 9PM both sides had retreated.[1] the French lost about 400 men with 3 Aircraft, and the FLN lost 2 Martyrs.[3]

targets.targetText: Jiragen saman Faransa sun kai harin bama-bamai a yankin, tare da rundunonin jirage 9 zuwa 12 kowannensu ya haifar da ruɗani a tsakanin mayakan FLN. A halin da ake ciki, jirage masu saukar ungulu na kan hanyarsu daga Bousaada, sai da manyan bindigogi da tankokin yaki suka shiga fafatawar. Mayakan FLN sun ba da lokacinsu, suna jiran kura ta lafa, Faransawa kuma su bar tsaronsu. Da dama ta samu, sai suka buɗe wuta kan sojojin Faransa, amma shugabannin Faransa sun ƙauracewa ja da baya, suka tilastawa mutanensu yaki, inda FLN ta samu taɓarɓarewar ammo kawai a lokacin da suke buƙata, da karfe 9 na dare dukkan bangarorin biyu suka ja da baya. [1] Faransawa sun yi asarar kimanin mutane 400 da Jiragen sama 3, kuma FLN ta yi asarar Shahidai 2. [2]

Jiragen saman Faransa sun kai harin bama-bamai a yankin, tare da rundunonin jirage 9 zuwa 12 kowannensu ya haifar da rudani a tsakanin mayakan FLN. A halin da ake ciki, jirage masu saukar ungulu na kan hanyarsu daga Bousaada, sai da manyan bindigogi da tankokin yaki suka shiga fafatawar. Mayakan FLN sun ba da lokacinsu, suna jiran kura ta lafa, Faransawa kuma su bar tsaronsu. Da dama ta samu, sai suka bude wuta kan sojojin Faransa, amma shugabannin Faransa sun kaurace wa ja da baya, suka tilastawa mutanensu yaki, inda FLN ta samu tabarbarewar ammo kawai a lokacin da suke bukata, da karfe 9 na dare dukkan bangarorin biyu suka ja da baya. [1] Faransawa sun yi asarar kimanin mutane 400 da Jiragen sama 3, kuma FLN ta yi asarar Shahidai 2. [2]

items.sourceText: The Battle of Agounennda was an engagement of the Algerian War fought from the 23–25 May 1957 between the French 3rd Colonial Parachute Regiment under Lieutenant Colonel Marcel Bigeard and FLN’s Commando 41 (‘Ali Khodja’) under Si Azzedine. Bigeard and his regiment were sent to hunt down the Commando after it had carried out several successful ambushes against French units. They met at Agounennda where the French paratroopers tried to ambush the FLN force, but the FLN discovered the French and instead concentrated their force against an outlying French company.

targets.targetText: Yakin Agounennda wani yakin Aljeriya ne da aka gwabza daga ranar 23-25 ga watan Mayu 1957 tsakanin Faransawa na 3 na Turawan mulkin mallaka a ƙarƙashin Laftanar Kanar Marcel Bigeard da FLN's Commando 41 ('Ali Khodja') a ƙarƙashin Si Azzedine. An aike da Bigeard da rundunarsa domin farautar kwamandan bayan da ya yi nasarar kai harin kwantan ɓauna a kan wasu sassan Faransa. Sun haɗu ne a Agounennda inda sojojin Faransa suka yi kokarin yi wa sojojin FLN kwanton ɓauna, amma FLN ta gano Faransawan kuma a maimakon haka suka maida karfinsu kan wani kamfani na Faransa.

Yakin Agounennda wani yakin Aljeriya ne da aka gwabza daga ranar 23-25 ga Mayu 1957 tsakanin Faransawa na 3 na Turawan mulkin mallaka a karkashin Laftanar Kanar Marcel Bigeard da FLN 's Commando 41 ('Ali Khodja') a karkashin Si Azzedine. An aike da Bigeard da rundunarsa domin farautar kwamandan bayan da ya yi nasarar kai harin kwantan bauna a kan wasu sassan Faransa. Sun hadu ne a Agounennda inda sojojin Faransa suka yi kokarin yi wa sojojin FLN kwanton bauna, amma FLN ta gano Faransawan kuma a maimakon haka suka maida karfinsu kan wani kamfani na Faransa.

items.sourceText: Bigeard managed to redeploy and surround the FLN force; it withdrew successfully albeit with heavy casualties. However, the French were unable to recover large caches of weapons - the FLN having taken them off the field. The battle altered FLN tactics, reminding them that they were unable to meet the French in open battle. Conversely, it gave the French renewed confidence in a military victory. However, sceptics on both sides saw it as evidence that neither faction would ever gain ascendancy in the other's arena. The FLN avoided military combat with the French, relying on guerrilla warfare.[4]

targets.targetText: Bigeard ya yi nasarar sake turawa da kewaye rundunar FLN; ya janye cikin nasara duk da cewa an samu hasarar rayuka sosai. Duk da haka, Faransawa sun kasa kwato manyan tarin makamai - FLN sun kwashe su daga filin wasa. Yaƙin ya canza dabarun FLN, yana tunatar da su cewa ba su iya haduwa da Faransawa a fili ba. Akasin haka, ya bai wa Faransa sabon tabbaci ga nasarar soja. Sai dai masu shakkun bangarorin biyu na ganin hakan a matsayin shaida cewa ko wanne bangare ba zai taba samun daukaka a fage na daya ba. FLN ta kaucewa fadan soji da Faransawa, tare da dogaro da yakin neman zabe. [1]

Bigeard ya yi nasarar sake turawa da kewaye rundunar FLN; ya janye cikin nasara duk da cewa an samu hasarar rayuka sosai. Duk da haka, Faransawa sun ƙasa kwato manyan tarin makamai - FLN sun kwashe su daga filin dagar. Yaƙin ya canza dabarun FLN, yana tunatar da su cewa ba su iya haɗuwa da Faransawa a fili ba. Akasin haka, ya bai wa Faransa sabon tabbaci ga nasarar soja. Sai dai masu shakkun ɓangarorin biyu na ganin hakan a matsayin shaida cewa ko wanne ɓangare ba zai taɓa samun ɗaukaka a fage na ɗaya ba. FLN ta kaucewa faɗan soji da Faransawa, tare da dogaro da yakin neman 'yanci. [1]

items.sourceText: The Battle of Bab el Oued (French: Bataille de Bab el Oued) was a violent confrontation which occurred during the latter stages of the Algerian War (1954–1962) between the French Army and the Organisation armée secrète (OAS) which opposed Algerian independence. It took place in Bab El Oued, then a working-class European quarter of Algiers, from 23 March to 6 April 1962.

targets.targetText: Yaƙin Bab el Oued wani rikici ne mai cike da tashin hankali wanda ya faru a lokacin ƙarshen yakin Aljeriya (1954-1962) tsakanin Sojojin Faransa da Kungiyar Armiya Secrète (OAS) da ke adawa da 'yancin kai na Aljeriya. An yi shi a Bab El Oued, sannan wani kwata na Turai mai aiki a Algiers, daga watan 23 Maris zuwa 6 ga watan Afrilu 1962.

Yaƙin Bab el Oued ( French: ) wani rikici ne mai cike da tashin hankali wanda ya faru a lokacin karshen yakin Aljeriya (1954-1962) tsakanin Sojojin Faransa da Kungiyar Armiya Secrète (OAS) da ke adawa da 'yancin kai na Aljeriya. An yi shi a Bab El Oued, sannan wani kwata na Turai mai aiki a Algiers, daga 23 Maris zuwa 6 Afrilu 1962.

items.sourceText: An ambush was orchestrated by Algerian Mujahideen on a French supply convoy near the Algeria–Libya border. Following this incident, the Mujahideen retreated into Libyan territory, prompting the French occupation army to pursue them across the border.[3] The escalation of hostilities led to the bombing of the village of Issin by French forces on October 3, 1957, further exacerbating tensions between Algeria, Libya, and France.[4][5][6]

targets.targetText: Wani harin kwantan bauna da Mujahidan Aljeriya suka shirya a kan ayarin motocin Faransa da ke kusa da iyakar Aljeriya da Libya . Bayan faruwar wannan lamari ne Mujahiddin ya koma cikin kasar Libya, lamarin da ya sa sojojin mamaya na Faransa suka fatattake su ta kan iyaka. [1] Hare-haren ta’addanci ya kai ga harin bam a kauyen Issin da sojojin Faransa suka yi a ranar 3 ga Oktoban 1957, lamarin da ya kara ta’azzara rikici tsakanin Aljeriya, Libya da Faransa. [2] [3] [4]

Wani harin kwantan ɓauna da Mujahidan Aljeriya suka shirya a kan ayarin motocin Faransa da ke kusa da iyakar Aljeriya da Libya. Bayan faruwar wannan lamari ne Mujahiddin ya koma cikin ƙasar Libya, lamarin da ya sa sojojin mamaya na Faransa suka fatattake su ta kan iyaka. [1] Hare-haren ta’addanci ya kai ga harin bam a ƙauyen Issin da sojojin Faransa suka yi a ranar 3 ga watan Oktoban 1957, lamarin da ya kara ta’azzara rikici tsakanin Aljeriya, Libya da Faransa. [2] [3] [4]

items.sourceText: The Palestro ambush, or Djerrah ambush, took place on 18 May 1956, during the Algerian War, near the village of Djerrah in the region of Palestro (now Lakhdaria) in Kabylie. A section of about forty men from the National Liberation Army (ALN) under the command of Lieutenant Ali Khodja ambushed a unit of 21 men from the 9th Colonial Infantry Regiment of the French Army commanded by Second Lieutenant Hervé Artur.

targets.targetText: Kwanton bauna na Palestro, ko Djerrah, ya faru ne a ranar 18 ga watan Mayu 1956, a lokacin yakin Aljeriya, kusa da ƙauyen Djerrah a yankin Palestro (yanzu Lakhdaria) a Kabylie. Wani sashe na kimanin mutane arba'in daga rundunar 'yantar da ƙasa (ALN) a ƙarƙashin jagorancin Laftanar Ali Khodja sun yi wa wata runduna ta mutum 21 kwanton ɓauna daga runduna ta 9 ta sojojin Faransa ta turawan mulkin mallaka ƙarƙashin jagorancin Laftanar Hervé Artur na biyu.

Kwanton bauna na Palestro, ko Djerrah, ya faru ne a ranar 18 ga Mayu 1956, a lokacin yakin Aljeriya, kusa da kauyen Djerrah a yankin Palestro (yanzu Lakhdaria ) a Kabylie . Wani sashe na kimanin mutane arba'in daga rundunar 'yantar da kasa (ALN) a karkashin jagorancin Laftanar Ali Khodja sun yi wa wata runduna ta mutum 21 kwanton bauna daga runduna ta 9 ta sojojin Faransa ta turawan mulkin mallaka karkashin jagorancin Laftanar Hervé Artur na biyu.

items.sourceText: On the morning of 18 May, the unit went on a reconnaissance mission to the villages near Ouled Djerrah. The guerilla attack lasted less than twenty minutes and ended in an ALN victory. Only five members of the 2nd section survived the ambush: sergeant Alain Chorliet, master corporal Louis Aurousseau, and Lucien Caron. The three were injured, as were two other men, Jean David-Nillet and Pierre Dumas. Gravely wounded, Caron was left with the kabyle villagers of the douar, and the other survivors taken away by the moudjahideen. The two wounded men were entrusted to the villagers of the neighboring douar, Bou Zegza. David-Nillet and Dumas were held as prisoners by Khodja, who retreated into the mountains.

targets.targetText: A safiyar ranar 18 ga Mayu, sashin ya tafi aikin leken asiri zuwa kauyukan da ke kusa da Ouled Djerrah. Harin ‘yan ta’addan dai bai fi mintuna ashirin ba ya kare da nasarar ALN. Mambobi biyar ne kawai na sashe na 2 suka tsira daga kwanton bauna: Sajan Alain Chorliet, babban kofur Louis Aurousseau, da Lucien Caron. Mutanen uku sun jikkata, haka kuma wasu mutane biyu, Jean David-Nillet da Pierre Dumas. An raunata Caron tare da ƙauyen kabyle na douar, da sauran waɗanda suka tsira da moudjahideen suka tafi da su. Mutanen biyu da suka jikkata an damka amanarsu ga mazauna kauyen Douar makwabciyarta, Bou Zegza. An tsare David-Nillet da Dumas a matsayin fursuna ta Khodja, wanda ya koma cikin duwatsu.

A safiyar ranar 18 ga watan Mayu, sashin ya tafi aikin leken asiri zuwa ƙauyukan da ke kusa da Ouled Djerrah. Harin ‘yan ta’addan dai bai fi mintuna ashirin ba ya kare da nasarar ALN. Mambobi biyar ne kawai na sashe na 2 suka tsira daga kwanton ɓauna: Sajan Alain Chorliet, babban kofur Louis Aurousseau, da Lucien Caron. Mutanen uku sun jikkata, haka kuma wasu mutane biyu, Jean David-Nillet da Pierre Dumas. An raunata Caron tare da ƙauyen kabyle na douar, da sauran waɗanda suka tsira da moudjahideen suka tafi da su. Mutanen biyu da suka jikkata an damka amanarsu ga mazauna kauyen Douar makwabciyarta, Bou Zegza. An tsare David-Nillet da Dumas a matsayin fursuna ta Khodja, wanda ya koma cikin duwatsu.

items.sourceText: The Battle of Philippeville, also known as the Philippeville massacre or the August Offensive, was a series of raids launched on 20 August 1955 on various cities and towns of the Constantine region by FLN insurgents and armed mobs during the Algerian War between France and the Algerian rebels. The raids, which mostly took the form of ethnic riots, resulted in the massacre of several dozens of European settlers, known as pieds-Noirs. The massacres were then followed by reprisals by the French army and pied-noir vigilantes, which resulted in the death of several thousand Muslim Algerians. The events of late August 1955 in the Constantinois region are considered to be a major turning point of the Algerian War.

targets.targetText: Yakin Philippeville, wanda kuma aka fi sani da kisan kiyashi na Philippeville ko kuma harin watan Agusta, wani jerin hare-hare ne da aka kaddamar a ranar 20 ga watan Agustan shekarar 1955 a garuruwa da garuruwa daban-daban na yankin Constantine da 'yan ta'addar FLN da wasu 'yan tawaye ɗauke da makamai a lokacin yakin Aljeriya tsakanin Faransa da 'yan tawayen Aljeriya. Hare-haren, wanda akasari ya ɗauki nauyin tarzomar ƙabilanci, ya yi sanadin kisan kiyashin da aka yi wa ɗimbin mazauna Turai, da aka fi sani da pieds-Noirs. Kisan gilla ya biyo bayan ramuwar gayya daga sojojin Faransa da 'yan banga na pied-noir, wanda ya yi sanadin mutuwar musulmin Aljeriya dubu da dama. Abubuwan da suka faru a ƙarshen watan Agustan 1955 a yankin Constantinois ana ɗaukar su a matsayin wani babban sauyi na yakin Aljeriya.

Yakin Philippeville, wanda kuma aka fi sani da kisan kiyashi na Philippeville ko kuma harin watan Agusta, wani jerin hare-hare ne da aka kaddamar a ranar 20 ga watan Agustan shekarar 1955 a garuruwa da garuruwa daban-daban na yankin Constantine da 'yan ta'addar FLN da wasu 'yan tawaye dauke da makamai a lokacin yakin Aljeriya tsakanin Faransa da 'yan tawayen Aljeriya . Hare-haren, wanda akasari ya dauki nauyin tarzomar kabilanci, ya yi sanadin kisan kiyashin da aka yi wa dimbin mazauna Turai, da aka fi sani da pieds-Noirs . Kisan gilla ya biyo bayan ramuwar gayya daga sojojin Faransa da 'yan banga na pied-noir, wanda ya yi sanadin mutuwar musulmin Aljeriya dubu da dama. Abubuwan da suka faru a karshen watan Agustan 1955 a yankin Constantinois ana daukar su a matsayin wani babban sauyi na yakin Aljeriya.

items.sourceText: The main attack was conducted on the city of Philippeville, which is now known as Skikda. A large mob of several thousands civilians, led by FLN members, launched a general assault on the city with the aims of attacking Europeans and moderate Muslim personalities[14][15] and taking over the police station's weaponry. Only half of the insurgents were armed with firearms, and the rest carried farming tools, knives or makeshift bombs device. As the mob arrived in the city, Europeans in the streets were murdered on sight. However, the reaction of police forces and French Army paratroopers was swift, and the insurrection was soon defeated after 14 police officers had been killed during the crackdown.[16] Once the assault was over, the bodies of over 100 insurgents were found in the streets, with many more captured by French forces.[16]

targets.targetText: An kai babban harin kan birnin Philippeville, wanda a yanzu ake kira Skikda. Wani babban gungun dubban fararen hula, ƙarƙashin jagorancin 'yan kungiyar FLN, sun kaddamar da wani hari na gama-gari a birnin da nufin kai hari ga Turawa da musulmi masu matsakaicin ra'ayi [ 14 ] [1] da kuma karɓe makaman ofishin 'yan sanda. Rabin masu tayar da kayar baya ne kawai ke ɗauke da makamai, sauran kuma na ɗauke da kayan aikin noma, wukake ko na'urar bama-bamai. Yayin da ’yan ta’addan suka isa birnin, an kashe Turawa a kan tituna da suka gani. Sai dai martanin jami'an 'yan sanda da sojojin Faransa sun yi gaggawar ɗaukar matakin, kuma ba da daɗewa ba aka yi nasarar fatattakar 'yan tada ƙayar bayan da aka kashe 'yan sanda 14 a yayin farmakin. [ 16 ] Da aka kawo ƙarshen harin, an gano gawarwakin mahara sama da 100 a kan tituna, tare da kama wasu da dama daga hannun dakarun Faransa. [ 16 ] Manazarta
