Wani babban gungun dubban fararen hula, karkashin jagorancin 'yan kungiyar FLN, sun kaddamar da wani hari na gama-gari a birnin da nufin kai hari ga Turawa da musulmi masu matsakaicin ra'ayi [ 14 ] [1] da kuma karbe makaman ofishin 'yan sanda . Rabin masu tayar da kayar baya ne kawai ke dauke da makamai, sauran kuma na dauke da kayan aikin noma, wukake ko na'urar bama-bamai . Yayin da ’yan ta’addan suka isa birnin, an kashe Turawa a kan tituna da suka gani. Sai dai martanin jami'an 'yan sanda da sojojin Faransa sun yi gaggawar daukar matakin, kuma ba da dadewa ba aka yi nasarar fatattakar 'yan tada kayar bayan da aka kashe 'yan sanda 14 a yayin farmakin. [ 16 ] Da aka kawo karshen harin, an gano gawarwakin mahara sama da 100 a kan tituna, tare da kama wasu da dama daga hannun dakarun Faransa. [ 16 ]

items.sourceText: The French army mobilized 850 soldiers to surprise attack 35 mujahideen of the Algerian National Liberation Front as revenge for the Algerian victory in the battle of Sidi Mohand Aklouche on 26 April 1957. The battle lasted more than 4 hours, and French commander Gaudion and his battalion suffered a heavy defeat which cost him more than 150 dead and more than 200 wounded, meanwhile the Algerians only lost two men, Si Slimane and Si Mahfoud.[2][3]

targets.targetText: Dakarun Faransa sun hada sojoji 850 domin kai farmakin ba-zata kan mujahidai 35 na kungiyar 'yantar da kasar Aljeriya a matsayin ramuwar gayya ga nasarar da Aljeriya ta samu a yakin Sidi Mohand Aklouche a ranar 26 ga watan Afrilun shekarar 1957. An kwashe sama da sa'o'i 4 ana gwabzawa, kuma kwamandan Faransa Gaudion da bataliyarsa sun sha kashi mai tsanani wanda ya yi sanadin mutuwar sama da mutane 150 da raunata fiye da 200, yayin da 'yan Algeria suka rasa maza biyu kawai, Si Slimane da Si Mahfoud. [1] [2]

Dakarun Faransa sun haɗa sojoji 850 domin kai farmakin ba-zata kan mujahidai 35 na ƙungiyar 'yantar da ƙasar Aljeriya a matsayin ramuwar gayya ga nasarar da Aljeriya ta samu a yakin Sidi Mohand Aklouche a ranar 26 ga watan watan Afrilun shekarar 1957. An kwashe sama da sa'o'i 4 ana gwabzawa, kuma kwamandan Faransa Gaudion da bataliyarsa sun sha kashi mai tsanani wanda ya yi sanadin mutuwar sama da mutane 150 da raunata fiye da 200, yayin da 'yan Algeria suka rasa maza biyu kawai, Si Slimane da Si Mahfoud. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: On 24 May, French paratroopers from the Algerian corps landed on Corsica and took the French island in a bloodless action, Opération Corse.[1][2] Operation Resurrection would be implemented if de Gaulle was not approved as leader by the French Parliament, if he asked for military assistance to take power, or if any organised attempt by the French Communist Party to seize power or to stall his return needed to be thwarted.

targets.targetText: A ranar 24 ga Mayu, sojojin Faransa daga cikin gawarwakin Aljeriya sun sauka a Corsica kuma suka dauki tsibirin Faransa a wani mataki na rashin jini, Operation Corse. [1] [2] Za a aiwatar da Operation Resurrection idan majalisar dokokin Faransa ba ta amince da de Gaulle a matsayin shugaban kasa ba, idan ya nemi taimakon soja don ya karbi mulki, ko kuma duk wani yunkuri na jam'iyyar gurguzu ta Faransa na kwace mulki ko hana dawowarsa yana bukatar a dakile.

A ranar 24 ga watan Mayu, sojojin Faransa daga cikin gawarwakin Aljeriya sun sauka a Corsica kuma suka ɗauki tsibirin Faransa a wani mataki na rashin jini, Operation Corse. [1] [2] Za a aiwatar da Operation Resurrection idan majalisar dokokin Faransa ba ta amince da de Gaulle a matsayin shugaban ƙasa ba, idan ya nemi taimakon soja don ya karɓi mulki, ko kuma duk wani yunkuri na jam'iyyar gurguzu ta Faransa na kwace mulki ko hana dawowarsa yana buƙatar a dakile.

items.sourceText: The 4th Tirailleurs was disbanded on 31 May, two months after the massacre.[11] It was concluded that to deploy exhausted and demoralised Muslim troops untrained for police duties, under only one junior officer, to control a large and excited crowd of European demonstrators had been a serious error of judgement.[12]

targets.targetText: An watse Tirailleurs na 4 a ranar 31 ga Mayu, watanni biyu bayan kisan kiyashin. [1] An kammala cewa tura dakaru musulmi da suka gaji kuma ba su horar da su zuwa aikin ‘yan sanda ba, karkashin karamin jami’i daya kacal, don sarrafa dimbin masu zanga-zangar Turawa, babban kuskure ne na yanke hukunci. [2]

An watse Tirailleurs na 4 a ranar 31 ga watan Mayu, watanni biyu bayan kisan kiyashin. [1] An kammala cewa tura dakaru musulmi da suka gaji kuma ba su horar da su zuwa aikin ‘yan sanda ba, ƙarƙashin ƙaramin jami’i ɗaya kacal, don sarrafa ɗimbin masu zanga-zangar Turawa, babban kuskure ne na yanke hukunci. [2]

items.sourceText: The militants herded men, women and children into huts and set fire to them, hacking down with machetes anyone who attempted escape, before throwing them back into the burning huts. The attack at Lari was so extreme that "African policemen who saw the bodies of the victims ... were physically sick and said 'These people are animals. If I see one now I shall shoot with the greatest eagerness'", and it "even shocked many Mau Mau supporters, some of whom would subsequently try to excuse the attack as 'a mistake'."[8][9][4] The colonial government used the attack as propaganda and showed the massacre to journalists.[1] The massacre prompted retaliatory attacks.[10] 400 Mau Mau rebels were reputedly killed by colonial troops, including the King's African Rifles, in revenge.[1]

targets.targetText: ‘Yan tawayen sun yi garkuwa da maza da mata da ƙananan yara cikin bukkoki tare da cinna musu wuta, inda suka riƙa kutsawa da adduna da duk wanda ya yi yunkurin tserewa, kafin su mayar da su cikin bukkokin da ke cin wuta. Harin da aka kai a Lari ya wuce gona da iri cewa "'yan sandan Afirka da suka ga gawarwakin waɗanda aka kashe ... sun kasance marasa lafiya kuma sun ce 'Waɗannan mutane dabbobi ne. Idan na ga ɗaya yanzu zan harbe da babban sha'awar' ", kuma "har ma ya girgiza magoya bayan Mau Mau da yawa, wanda wasu daga cikinsu za su yi ƙoƙari su ba da uzuri a matsayin 'kuskure'." [ 8 ] [1] [ 4 ] Gwamnatin 'yan mulkin mallaka ta yi amfani da harin a matsayin farfaganda kuma ta nuna kisan kiyashin ga 'yan jarida. Kisan gillar ya haifar da harin ramuwar gayya. [2] An yi zaton cewa sojojin 'yan mulkin mallaka sun kashe 'yan tawayen Mau Mau 400, ciki har da Bindigan Afirka na Sarki, a matsayin ramuwar gayya.

‘Yan ta’addan sun yi garkuwa da maza da mata da kananan yara cikin bukkoki tare da cinna musu wuta, inda suka rika kutsawa da adduna da duk wanda ya yi yunkurin tserewa, kafin su mayar da su cikin bukkokin da ke cin wuta. Harin da aka kai a Lari ya wuce gona da iri cewa "'yan sandan Afirka da suka ga gawarwakin wadanda aka kashe ... sun kasance marasa lafiya kuma sun ce 'Wadannan mutane dabbobi ne. Idan na ga daya yanzu zan harbe da babban sha'awar' ", kuma "har ma ya girgiza magoya bayan Mau Mau da yawa, wanda wasu daga cikinsu za su yi ƙoƙari su ba da uzuri a matsayin 'kuskure'." [ 8 ] [1] [ 4 ] Gwamnatin mulkin mallaka ta yi amfani da harin a matsayin farfaganda kuma ta nuna kisan kiyashin ga 'yan jarida. Kisan gillar ya haifar da harin ramuwar gayya. [2] An yi zaton cewa sojojin mulkin mallaka sun kashe 'yan tawayen Mau Mau 400, ciki har da Bindigan Afirka na Sarki, a matsayin ramuwar gayya.

items.sourceText: Following Algeria's independence in 1962, Belhouchet focused on structuring and organizing the ANP, the successor to the ALN. He held several key military positions, including serving as the chief of staff of the ANP from November 22, 1986, until November 1988. In addition, he was appointed deputy minister of National Defense and oversaw the General Inspectorate of the ANP, which underscored his influence within the military hierarchy.[1]

targets.targetText: Bayan da Aljeriya ta samu 'yancin kai a shekarar 1962, Belhouchet ya mayar da hankali wajen tsarawa da tsara jam'iyyar ANP, wanda ya gaji jam'iyyar ALN. Ya riƙe manyan muƙamai na soja da dama, ciki har da zama shugaban ma’aikatan jam’iyyar ANP daga ranar 22 ga watan Nuwamba, 1986, har zuwa Nuwamba 1988. Bugu da ƙari, an naɗa shi mataimakin ministan tsaro na ƙasa da kuma kula da babban sufeton jam’iyyar ANP, wanda hakan ya nuna tasirinsa a cikin muƙamin soja. [1]

Bayan da Aljeriya ta samu 'yancin kai a shekarar 1962, Belhouchet ya mayar da hankali wajen tsarawa da tsara jam'iyyar ANP, wanda ya gaji jam'iyyar ALN. Ya rike manyan mukamai na soja da dama, ciki har da zama shugaban ma’aikatan jam’iyyar ANP daga ranar 22 ga Nuwamba, 1986, har zuwa Nuwamba 1988. Bugu da kari, an nada shi mataimakin ministan tsaro na kasa da kuma kula da babban sufeton jam’iyyar ANP, wanda hakan ya nuna tasirinsa a cikin mukamin soja. [1]

items.sourceText: Colonel Saïd Mohammedi (Arabic: السعيد محمدي; 27 December 1912 – 6 December 1994), also known as Si Nacer, was an Algerian nationalist, soldier and politician.

targets.targetText: Colonel Saïd Mohammedi ( Arabic ; 27 Disamba 1912 – 6 Disamba 1994), kuma aka sani da Si Nacer, ɗan ƙasar Aljeriya ne, soja kuma ɗan siyasa.
Colonel Saïd Mohammedi ( Arabic ; 27 Disamba 1912 – 6 Disamba 1994), kuma aka sani da Si Nacer, ɗan kishin ƙasa ne kuma ɗan ƙasar Aljeriya, soja kuma ɗan siyasa.

items.sourceText: Mohammedi was elected at the Congress of Tripoli to be a member of the Political Bureau, responsible for the Education and Public Health sector. Deputy of Tizi Ouzou on 20 September 1962, and he was appointed Minister of Former Mujahedin and War Victims in the first government of Ahmed Ben Bella. On 16 May 1963, he became 2nd vice-president of the Council, and member of the Central Committee and the Political Bureau of the FLN on 24 April 1964. He was dismissed by Ben Bella and lost his ministerial post during the reshuffle of 2 December 1964.

targets.targetText: An zaɓi Mohammedi a Majalisar Tarabulus don zama memba na Ofishin Siyasa, mai alhakin sashen Ilimi da Kiwon Lafiyar Jama'a. Mataimakin Tizi Ouzou a ranar 20 ga Satumbar 1962, kuma an nada shi ministan tsofin Mujahedin da wadanda yaki ya shafa a gwamnatin farko ta Ahmed Ben Bella . A ranar 16 ga Mayu 1963, ya zama mataimakin shugaban majalisa na 2, kuma memba na kwamitin tsakiya da ofishin siyasa na FLN a ranar 24 ga Afrilu 1964. Ben Bella ya kore shi kuma ya rasa mukaminsa na minista a lokacin sake fasalin 2 Disamba 1964.

An zaɓi Mohammedi a Majalisar Tarabulus don zama memba na Ofishin Siyasa, mai alhakin sashen Ilimi da Kiwon Lafiyar Jama'a. Mataimakin Tizi Ouzou a ranar 20 ga watan Satumbar 1962, kuma an naɗa shi ministan tsofin Mujahedin da waɗanda yaki ya shafa a gwamnatin farko ta Ahmed Ben Bella. A ranar 16 ga watan Mayu 1963, ya zama mataimakin shugaban majalisa na 2, kuma memba na kwamitin tsakiya da ofishin siyasa na FLN a ranar 24 ga watan Afrilu 1964. Ben Bella ya kore shi kuma ya rasa muƙaminsa na minista a lokacin sake fasalin 2 ga watan Disamba 1964.

items.sourceText: Ahmed Boumendjel ( born on 22 April 1908[1][2] in Beni Yenni, Tizi Ouzou Province and died on 19 November 1982[3][4]) was an Algerian politician and nationalist.

targets.targetText: Ahmed Boumendjel (an haife shi a ranar 22 ga watan Afrilu 1908 [1] [2] a Beni Yenni, Lardin Tizi Ouzou kuma ya mutu a ranar 19 ga watan Nuwamba 1982 [3] [4] ) ɗan siyasan Aljeriya ne kuma ɗan kishin ƙasa.
Ahmed Boumendjel (an haife shi a ranar 22 ga Afrilu 1908 [1] [2] a Beni Yenni, Lardin Tizi Ouzou kuma ya mutu a ranar 19 ga Nuwamba 1982 [3] [4] ) ɗan siyasan Aljeriya ne kuma ɗan kishin ƙasa.

items.sourceText: Latif's background, as both a soldier and a member of Sudan's black African community, meant he was able to reach out, through personal contacts, with a massive swath of the population, particularly the segments needed to for a political struggle. His military background meant he was able to spread his message of anti-colonialism to officers and soldiers, whilst his black African background meant he could politicize the de-tribalised and growing urban black community in the Khartoum-Khartoum North-Omdurman area. This section of the population; the newly urbanised and de-triblaised southern Sudanese black community, had been seen by the British administration as a segment as especially vulnerable to politicization.[1]

targets.targetText: Asalin Latif, a matsayinsa na soja da kuma memba na al'ummar Afirka baƙaƙen fata na ƙasar Sudan, na nufin ya iya tuntuɓar juna, ta hanyar tuntuɓar juna, tare da ɗimbin jama'a, musamman sassan da ake buƙata domin gwagwarmayar siyasa. Tarihinsa na soja yana nufin ya iya isar da sakonsa na kin jinin mulkin mallaka ga hafsoshi da sojoji, alhali baƙar fata na Afirka na nufin zai iya siyasantar da al'ummar baƙaƙen fata na birane masu ƙabilu da karuwa a yankin Khartoum - Khartoum North - Omdurman. Wannan ɓangare na yawan jama'a; sabuwar al'ummar baƙaƙen fata na kudancin Sudan da aka yi birane da ƙabilu, gwamnatin Birtaniyya ta ɗauka a matsayin wani ɓangare da ke da rauni musamman ga siyasa. [1]

Asalin Latif, a matsayinsa na soja da kuma memba na al'ummar Afirka bakaken fata na kasar Sudan, na nufin ya iya tuntubar juna, ta hanyar tuntubar juna, tare da dimbin jama'a, musamman sassan da ake bukata domin gwagwarmayar siyasa. Tarihinsa na soja yana nufin ya iya isar da sakonsa na kin jinin mulkin mallaka ga hafsoshi da sojoji, alhali bakar fata na Afirka na nufin zai iya siyasantar da al'ummar bakaken fata na birane masu kabilanci da karuwa a yankin Khartoum - Khartoum North - Omdurman . Wannan bangare na yawan jama'a; sabuwar al'ummar bakaken fata na kudancin Sudan da aka yi birane da kabilanci, gwamnatin Birtaniyya ta dauka a matsayin wani bangare da ke da rauni musamman ga siyasa. [1]

items.sourceText: The protest was immediately and bloodily suppressed by the colonial forces. The massacre and ensuing disturbances has been named the Zemla Intifada, or uprising, after the place the demonstration was held. A nationwide hunt for members of the movement followed: Bassiri himself was arrested and "disappeared" in Spanish custody. He is assumed to have been killed by his jailors, and is counted by the present-day Sahrawi nationalist movement as its first modern-day martyr (Morocco, which claims Western Sahara as its own province, has also similarly attempted to appropriate his legacy, arguing that the Harakat Tahrir was primarily interested in ejecting Spain, not in achieving independence as a nation separate from Morocco).

targets.targetText: Nan take sojojin 'yan mulkin mallaka suka murkushe zanga-zangar. An sanya wa kisan kiyashi da hargitsin sunan Zemla Intifada, ko tayar da zaune tsaye, bayan wurin da aka gudanar da zanga-zangar. Farautar 'yan kungiyar a duk faɗin ƙasar ya biyo baya: An kama Bassiri da kansa kuma "ya bace" a hannun sipanya. Ana kyautata zaton cewa fursunonin gidan yari ne suka kashe shi, kuma kungiyar ‘yan kishin ƙasa ta Sahrawi a yau ta kirga shi a matsayin shahidin farko na wannan zamani (Moroco, wacce ke ikirarin yammacin Sahara a matsayin lardinta, ita ma ta yi yunƙurin dacewa da gadonsa, yana mai cewa Harakat Tahrir ya fi sha’awar korar Spain, ba don samun ‘yancin kai a matsayin al’ummar da ta rabu da Maroko ba).

Nan take sojojin mulkin mallaka suka murkushe zanga-zangar. An sanya wa kisan kiyashi da hargitsin sunan Zemla Intifada, ko tayar da zaune tsaye, bayan wurin da aka gudanar da zanga-zangar. Farautar 'yan kungiyar a duk fadin kasar ya biyo baya: An kama Bassiri da kansa kuma " ya bace " a hannun Mutanen Espanya. Ana kyautata zaton cewa fursunonin gidan yari ne suka kashe shi, kuma kungiyar ‘yan kishin kasa ta Sahrawi a yau ta kirga shi a matsayin shahidin farko na wannan zamani (Moroco, wacce ke ikirarin yammacin Sahara a matsayin lardinta, ita ma ta yi yunƙurin dacewa da gadonsa, yana mai cewa Harakat Tahrir ya fi sha’awar korar Spain, ba don samun ‘yancin kai a matsayin al’ummar da ta rabu da Maroko ba).

items.sourceText: In December 1934, a small group of nationalist leaders formed the Moroccan Action Committee. They submitted the Plan of Reforms to the sultan, resident general and the French foreign ministry, calling for a return to indirect rule, unification of judicial systems of Morocco, admission of Moroccans to government positions, elimination of the judicial powers of qaids and pashas, and the establishment of representative councils. The Plan of Reforms was rejected by the French government, causing a split in the nationalist movement. A number of violent incidents in September 1937 caused the French administration to suppress the Istiqlal Party and arrest its leaders, including Allal al-Fassi.[1]

targets.targetText: A cikin watan Disamba 1934, wani ƙaramin rukuni na shugabannin kishin ƙasa sun kafa kwamitin Aiki na Moroccan. Sun gabatar da shirin gyare-gyare ga Sarkin Musulmi, Janar mazauna da ma'aikatar harkokin wajen Faransa, suna kira da a mayar da mulkin kai tsaye, haɗewar tsarin shari'a na Maroko, shigar da 'yan Morocco a muƙaman gwamnati, kawar da ikon shari'a na Qaids da Pashas, da kafa majalisar wakilai. Gwamnatin Faransa ta ki amincewa da shirin na sake fasalin, wanda ya haifar da rarrabuwar kawuna a harkar kishin ƙasa. Tashin hankali da dama a cikin watan Satumban 1937 ya sa gwamnatin Faransa ta danne jam'iyyar Istiqlal tare da kame shugabanninta ciki har da Allal al-Fassi. [1]

A cikin Disamba 1934, wani ƙaramin rukuni na shugabannin kishin ƙasa sun kafa kwamitin Aiki na Moroccan. Sun gabatar da shirin gyare-gyare ga Sarkin Musulmi, Janar mazauna da ma'aikatar harkokin wajen Faransa, suna kira da a mayar da mulkin kai tsaye, hadewar tsarin shari'a na Maroko, shigar da 'yan Morocco a mukaman gwamnati, kawar da ikon shari'a na Qaids da Pashas, da kafa majalisar wakilai. Gwamnatin Faransa ta ki amincewa da shirin na sake fasalin, wanda ya haifar da rarrabuwar kawuna a harkar kishin kasa. Tashin hankali da dama a cikin watan Satumban 1937 ya sa gwamnatin Faransa ta danne jam'iyyar Istiqlal tare da kame shugabanninta ciki har da Allal al-Fassi. [1]

items.sourceText: The Massacre of April 7, 1947 (popularly in Moroccan Arabic: ضربة ساليغان darbat saligan 'Strike of the Senegalese,' more officially: مجزرة 7 أبريل 'Massacre of April 7' or أحداث 7 أبريل 'Events of April 7') was a massacre of working-class Moroccan civilians in Casablanca committed by Senegalese Tirailleurs in the service of the French colonial empire.[2][3] The attack was instigated by the French authorities in an attempt to disrupt the visit of Sultan Mohammad V to the Tangier International Zone to deliver the Tangier Speech demanding the independence of Morocco and the unification of its territories.[4]

targets.targetText: Kisan Kisan 7 ga Afrilu, 1947 (wanda aka fi sani da Moroccan darbat saligan 'Yajin Senegal,' a hukumance: مجزرة 7 أبريل 'Kisan Kisan 7 ga watan Afrilu' ko أحداث 7 أبريل 'Abubuwan da suka faru a ranar 7 ga watan Afrilu') kisan kiyashi ne na fararen hula 'yan Morocco masu aiki a Casablanca da Tirailleurs na Senegal suka yi a cikin hidimar daular Faransa ta mulkin mallaka. [1] [2] Hukumomin Faransa ne suka kaddamar da harin da nufin kawo cikas ga ziyarar da Sultan Mohammad V ya kai yankin Tangier na ƙasa da ƙasa domin gabatar da jawabin Tangier na neman ‘yancin kan ƙasar Maroko da kuma haɗe yankunanta. [3]

Kisan Kisan 7 ga Afrilu, 1947 (wanda aka fi sani da Moroccan Arabic darbat saligan 'Yajin Senegal,' a hukumance: مجزرة 7 أبريل 'Kisan Kisan 7 ga Afrilu' ko أحداث 7 أبريل 'Abubuwan da suka faru a ranar 7 ga Afrilu') kisan kiyashi ne na fararen hula 'yan Morocco masu aiki a Casablanca da Tirailleurs na Senegal suka yi a cikin hidimar daular Faransa ta mulkin mallaka . [1] [2] Hukumomin Faransa ne suka kaddamar da harin da nufin kawo cikas ga ziyarar da Sultan Mohammad V ya kai yankin Tangier na kasa da kasa domin gabatar da jawabin Tangier na neman ‘yancin kan kasar Maroko da kuma hade yankunanta. [3]

items.sourceText: In 1932, the Ait Atta tribes gathered at Ksar Taghya and elected Assou Oubasslam as the overall leader of the jihad. With much of Morocco under French occupation, colonial forces attempted to infiltrate southeastern Morocco and subjugate the Saghro region and Ait Atta tribes. The resistance of Assou Oubasslam served as a barrier to their expansion. Assou Oubslam led the Islamic resistance against French colonization, engaging in battles that decisively favored the resistance. He inflicted significant losses on the occupying forces and lured the invaders into exhausting battles at locations such as "Taouza", "Al Nif", "Tazarin" and "Naqoub."[5] In 1933, after multiple confrontations, the Battle of Bogafar erupted in the Saghro, Asef Mulul, and Mount Baddou regions in the eastern High Atlas. It ended with the victory of the resistance over the French colonizers.

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 1932, kabilun Ait Atta sun taru a Ksar Taghya suka zaɓi Assou Oubasslam a matsayin babban jagoran jihadi. Da akasarin ƙasar Maroko ƙarƙashin mamayar Faransa, sojojin ‘yan mulkin mallaka sun yi yunkurin kutsawa kudu maso gabashin Maroko tare da fatattakar yankin Saghro da kuma ƙabilun Ait Atta. Juriyar da Assou Oubasslam ya yi ya zama shinge ga faɗaɗa su. Assou Oubslam ya jagoranci gwagwarmayar Islama a kan turawan mulkin mallaka na Faransa, inda ya shiga faɗace-faɗacen da suka nuna goyon baya ga tsayin daka. Ya yi hasarar gagarumar hasarar sojojin mamaya tare da jan hankalin maharan zuwa ga gumurzun faɗace-faɗace a wurare kamar "Taouza", "Al Nif", "Tazarin" da "Naqoub." [1] A cikin shekarar 1933, bayan fafatawar da yawa, yakin Bogafar ya ɓarke a yankunan Saghro, Asef Mulul, da Dutsen Baddou a gabashin High Atlas. Ya kare ne da nasarar tirjiya a kan Turawan mulkin mallaka na Faransa.

A cikin 1932, kabilun Ait Atta sun taru a Ksar Taghya suka zabi Assou Oubasslam a matsayin babban jagoran jihadi . Da akasarin kasar Maroko karkashin mamayar Faransa, sojojin ‘yan mulkin mallaka sun yi yunkurin kutsawa kudu maso gabashin Maroko tare da fatattakar yankin Saghro da kuma kabilun Ait Atta. Juriyar da Assou Oubasslam ya yi ya zama shinge ga faɗaɗa su. Assou Oubslam ya jagoranci gwagwarmayar Islama a kan turawan mulkin mallaka na Faransa, inda ya shiga fadace-fadacen da suka nuna goyon baya ga tsayin daka. Ya yi hasarar gagarumar hasarar sojojin mamaya tare da jan hankalin maharan zuwa ga gumurzun fadace-fadace a wurare kamar "Taouza", "Al Nif", "Tazarin" da "Naqoub." [1] A cikin 1933, bayan fafatawar da yawa, yakin Bogafar ya barke a yankunan Saghro, Asef Mulul, da Dutsen Baddou a gabashin High Atlas . Ya kare ne da nasarar tirjiya a kan Turawan mulkin mallaka na Faransa.

items.sourceText: He settled in Casablanca in 1952 and co-founded the Moroccan Secret Organization. Armed with a revolver, he had a reputation for being merciless with the French and those loyal to them. He was arrested in 1954, but was able to escape after 40 days of torture.

targets.targetText: Ya zauna a Casablanca a cikin 1952 kuma ya kafa kungiyar asirin Moroccan. Makamai da dan tawaye, ya yi suna don rashin tausayi ga Faransawa da masu biyayya gare su. An kama shi a shekara ta 1954, amma ya sami damar tserewa bayan kwanaki 40 na azabtarwa.

Ya zauna a Casablanca a cikin shekarar 1952 kuma ya kafa kungiyar asirin Moroccan. Makamai da ɗan tawaye, ya yi suna don rashin tausayi ga Faransawa da masu biyayya gare su. An kama shi a shekara ta 1954, amma ya sami damar tserewa bayan kwanaki 40 na azabtarwa.

items.sourceText: Passionate about soccer, Zarqtuni played for the Mawludiat Bou Tawiil Club (نادي مولودية بوطويل) in 1948 and recruited the youth of the medina. He was made the manager of a championship tournament for clubs representing different neighborhoods in Casablanca. Certain athletic organizations, such as the Free Soccer League, which organized the neighborhood championship, had nationalist leanings. From this league, many notable nationalists, such as Abdeslam Bennani (fr), Abderrahman el-Youssoufi, Abderrahman Belmejdoub (fr), and others rose up.

targets.targetText: Mai sha'awar ƙwallon ƙafa, Zarqtuni ya taka leda a Mawludiat Bou Tawiil Club ( نادي مولودية بوطويل ) a 1948 kuma ya dauki matasan madina aiki. An nada shi manajan gasar zakarun kungiyoyin da ke wakiltar unguwanni daban-daban a Casablanca. Wasu kungiyoyin wasanni, irin su Free Soccer League, wadanda suka shirya gasar zakarun unguwanni, suna da kishin kasa. Daga wannan gasar, manyan masu kishin kasa da yawa, irin su Abdeslam Bennani ( fr ), Abderrahman el-Youssoufi, Abderrahman Belmejdoub ( fr ), da sauransu sun tashi.

Mai sha'awar ƙwallon ƙafa, Zarqtuni ya taka leda a Mawludiat Bou Tawiil Club ( نادي مولودية بوطويل ) a shekarar 1948 kuma ya ɗauki matasan madina aiki. An naɗa shi manajan gasar zakarun kungiyoyin da ke wakiltar unguwanni daban-daban a Casablanca. Wasu kungiyoyin wasanni, irin su Free Soccer League, waɗanda suka shirya gasar zakarun unguwanni, suna da kishin ƙasa. Daga wannan gasar, manyan masu kishin ƙasa da yawa, irin su Abdeslam Bennani ( fr ), Abderrahman el-Youssoufi, Abderrahman Belmejdoub ( fr ), da sauransu sun tashi.

items.sourceText: After the revolution of 1969 many Libyan nationals fled from Libya, resulting in the establishment of a Libyan diaspora across the world in North America, Europe and the MENA region, In particular, Libyan immigration to Tunisia is a long-term phenomenon.[15][16] During the 2011 revolution, there was support for and part taking in the revolution by Libyan people across the world.[17] The diaspora shared a common feeling of one nation, of connectedness and of belonging to one community.[18] Social media was an important factor in making this possible.[18]

targets.targetText: Bayan juyin juya hali na shekarar 1969 'yan ƙasar Libya da dama sun yi gudun hijira daga ƙasar Libya, lamarin da ya haifar da kafa 'yan gudun hijirar Libya a faɗin duniya a Arewacin Amirka, Turai da kuma yankin MENA, musamman shige da ficen Libya zuwa Tunisiya wani lamari ne na dogon lokaci. [1] [2] A lokacin juyin juya halin 2011, an sami goyon baya da kuma shiga cikin juyin juya halin da mutanen Libya suka yi a faɗin duniya. [3] Mutanen da ke zaune a waje suna da ra'ayi iri ɗaya na al'umma ɗaya, haɗin kai da kasancewar al'umma ɗaya. [4] Kafofin watsa labarun sun kasance muhimmin al'amari don tabbatar da hakan. [4]

Bayan juyin juya hali na shekarar 1969 'yan kasar Libya da dama sun yi gudun hijira daga kasar Libya, lamarin da ya haifar da kafa ' yan gudun hijirar Libya a fadin duniya a Arewacin Amirka, Turai da kuma yankin MENA, musamman shige da ficen Libya zuwa Tunisiya wani lamari ne na dogon lokaci. [1] [2] A lokacin juyin juya halin 2011, an sami goyon baya da kuma shiga cikin juyin juya halin da mutanen Libya suka yi a fadin duniya. [3] Mutanen da ke zaune a waje suna da ra'ayi iri ɗaya na al'umma ɗaya, haɗin kai da kasancewar al'umma ɗaya. [4] Kafofin watsa labarun sun kasance muhimmin al'amari don tabbatar da hakan. [4]

items.sourceText: He fought for the Ottoman cause against the Italians did during the Italo-Turkish War, but after the conclusion of the 1912 peace treaty, he led a revolt against an Italian column at Sirte. With outbreak of World War I, the Italians withdrew from Misrata. Seeing the advantage, he later took part in the battle of Gasr Bu Hadi against the Italians. For several years, he succeeded of strengthening the town of Misrata as a safe haven for Ottoman forces and an autonomous political district. In 1916, his troops clashed with Senussi forces sent to Sirte to collect taxes from the local population.[2] He is an ancestor of Abdulrahman Sewehli.

targets.targetText: Ya yi yaƙi da Daular Usmaniyya da Italiyanci a lokacin Yaƙin Italo-Turkiyya, amma bayan kammala yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya ta 1912, ya jagoranci tawaye ga rukunin Italiyanci a Sirte. Da barkewar yakin duniya na daya, Italiyawa sun janye daga Misrata. Ganin wannan fa'ida, daga baya ya shiga yakin Gasr Bu Hadi da Italiya. Shekaru da dama, ya yi nasarar karfafa garin Misrata a matsayin mafaka ga dakarun Ottoman da gundumar siyasa mai cin gashin kanta. A cikin 1916, sojojinsa sun yi arangama da sojojin Senussi da aka aika zuwa Sirte don karbar haraji daga jama'ar yankin. [1] Kakan Abdulrahman Sewehli ne .

Ya yi yaƙi da Daular Usmaniyya da Italiya a lokacin Yaƙin Italo-Turkiyya, amma bayan kammala yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya ta shekarar 1912, ya jagoranci tawaye ga ruƙunin Italiya a Sirte. Da ɓarkewar yakin duniya na ɗaya, Italiyawa sun janye daga Misrata. Ganin wannan fa'ida, daga baya ya shiga yakin Gasr Bu Hadi da Italiya. Shekaru da dama, ya yi nasarar karfafa garin Misrata a matsayin mafaka ga dakarun Ottoman da gundumar siyasa mai cin gashin kanta. A cikin shekarar 1916, sojojinsa sun yi arangama da sojojin Senussi da aka aika zuwa Sirte don karɓar haraji daga jama'ar yankin. [1] Kakan Abdulrahman Sewehli ne.

items.sourceText: More information about the incident emerged in the weeks that followed the initial reports. An investigation into the deaths ensued and it was discovered that the 11 detainees did not die of drinking foul water, but as a result of violence. The medical examiner said, "They had died from either lung congestion or shock and hemorrhage following multiple bruises and other injuries." The coroner reported, "The injuries of a number of Mau Maus apparently were consistent with their allegations that uncooperative prisoners had been beaten by guards, apparently with the consent of the commandant."[6] A report in the June 1959 edition of Time magazine entitled "The Hola Scandal" described the events. The report stated that, on 3 March 1959, 85 prisoners were marched outside and ordered to work but "dozens of the prisoners fell to the ground, refusing to work" and were beaten by the guards. When the assault had concluded, according to the magazine, 11 prisoners lay dying and another 23 needed hospital treatment.[7]

targets.targetText: An samu ƙarin bayani game da lamarin a cikin makonnin da suka biyo bayan rahotannin farko. An gudanar da bincike kan mutanen da suka mutu, inda aka gano cewa fursunonin 11 ba su mutu ne da shan ruwa ba, amma sakamakon tashin hankali. Likitan ya ce, "Sun mutu ne daga cunkoson huhu ko firgita da zubar jini sakamakon raunuka da dama da suka samu." Jami’in binciken ya ruwaito cewa, “Raunukan da dama na Mau Maus ya yi daidai da zargin da suke yi na cewa jami’an gadi sun yi wa fursunonin da ba su haɗin kai ba, bisa ga amincewar kwamandan. [1] Wani rahoto a cikin bugu na Yuni 1959 na mujallar Time mai suna "The Hola Scandal" ya bayyana abubuwan da suka faru. Rahoton ya bayyana cewa, a ranar 3 ga watan Maris, 1959, fursunoni 85 ne aka fita waje, aka umurce su da su yi aiki amma “da yawa daga cikin fursunonin sun faɗi ƙasa, sun ki yin aiki” kuma masu gadi suka yi musu duka. Lokacin da aka kawo ƙarshen harin, a cewar mujallar, fursunoni 11 suna mutuwa, wasu 23 kuma suna buƙatar kulawa a asibiti. [2]

Lokacin da aka kawo karshen harin, a cewar mujallar, fursunoni 11 suna mutuwa, wasu 23 kuma suna bukatar kulawa a asibiti. [2]

items.sourceText: American historian Caroline Elkins covered the Massacre in her 2005 book, Imperial Reckoning: The Untold Story of Britain's Gulag in Kenya. According to Elkins, much of the story of the British and Colonial administration was covered-up during the transition to independence in Kenya, and many official documents had been intentionally destroyed during the transition. Elkins, by carefully tracing available original documents and interviews with surviving Kenyans and colonial staff, indicates that part of Hola Prison was used as a remote punishment camp for 'hard core' Mau Mau insurgents who refused to recant their oaths or affiliation to the movement. Physical and psychological abuse were used to 'break' detainees, so they could be 'rehabilitated' and moved out of the concentration camp pipeline and back to Kikuyu reservations.[8]

targets.targetText: Masanin tarihin Amurka Caroline Elkins ya rufe Kisan Kisa a cikin littafinta na 2005 mai suna Imperial Reckoning: The Untold Story of Britain's Gulag in Kenya . A cewar Elkins, yawancin tarihin mulkin Birtaniya da na mulkin mallaka an rufe su ne a lokacin mika mulkin kasar Kenya, kuma an lalata wasu takardu da dama da gangan a lokacin mika mulki. Elkins, ta hanyar bin diddigin takardu na asali da kuma hirarraki da 'yan Kenya da suka tsira da ma'aikatan mulkin mallaka, ya nuna cewa an yi amfani da wani yanki na kurkukun Hola a matsayin sansanin horo na nesa don 'hard core' 'yan tawayen Mau Mau wadanda suka ki yin watsi da rantsuwarsu ko alakarsu da yunkurin. An yi amfani da cin zarafi ta jiki da ta hankali don 'karye' fursunonin, don haka za a iya 'gyara' su fita daga bututun sansanin taro a mayar da su wuraren ajiyar Kikuyu. [1]

Masanin tarihin Amurka Caroline Elkins ya rufe Kisan Kisa a cikin littafinta na 2005 mai suna Imperial Reckoning: The Untold Story of Britain's Gulag in Kenya. A cewar Elkins, yawancin tarihin 'yan mulkin Birtaniya da na mulkin mallaka an rufe su ne a lokacin miƙa mulkin ƙasar Kenya, kuma an lalata wasu takardu da dama da gangan a lokacin miƙa mulki. Elkins, ta hanyar bin diddigin takardu na asali da kuma hirarraki da 'yan Kenya da suka tsira da ma'aikatan mulkin mallaka, ya nuna cewa an yi amfani da wani yanki na kurkukun Hola a matsayin sansanin horo na nesa don 'hard core' 'yan tawayen Mau Mau waɗanda suka ki yin watsi da rantsuwarsu ko alakarsu da yunkurin. An yi amfani da cin zarafi ta jiki da ta hankali don 'karye' fursunonin, don haka za a iya 'gyara' su fita daga bututun sansanin taro a mayar da su wuraren ajiyar Kikuyu. [1]

items.sourceText: As a member of the African Advisory Council, Kaggia campaigned actively against the Nairobi municipal Council apartheid by-laws, which had created separate European, Asian and African areas in Nairobi. Kaggia considered it as one of his biggest achievements that these by-laws were repealed by the Municipal Council.[11]

targets.targetText: A matsayinta na memba na Majalisar Ba da Shawarwari ta Afirka, Kaggia ta yi kamfen sosai don adawa da dokokin wariyar launin fata na Majalisar karamar hukumar Nairobi, wadda ta haifar da yankuna daban-daban na Turai, Asiya da Afirka a Nairobi. Kaggia ya dauki hakan a matsayin daya daga cikin manyan nasarorin da ya samu cewa majalisar karamar hukumar ta soke wadannan dokokin. [1]

A matsayinta na memba na Majalisar Ba da Shawarwari ta Afirka, Kaggia ya yi kamfen sosai don adawa da dokokin wariyar launin fata na Majalisar ƙaramar hukumar Nairobi, wadda ta haifar da yankuna daban-daban na Turai, Asiya da Afirka a Nairobi. Kaggia ya ɗauki hakan a matsayin ɗaya daga cikin manyan nasarorin da ya samu cewa majalisar ƙaramar hukumar ta soke waɗannan dokokin. [1]

items.sourceText: DAG provides demining and anti-poaching services to customers around the world.[4] From 2019, DAG became active in Cabo Delgado, Mozambique, where they helped to fight a local Islamist insurgency. The company was hired by police chief Bernardino Rafael to help train local policemen and fight the rebels.[2][5] Its troops operate and charter out several Bat Hawk light aircraft,[6] and have deployed three Aérospatiale Gazelles, two Eurocopter AS350 Écureuils and one Aérospatiale Alouette III in Cabo Delgado.[7]

targets.targetText: DAG tana ba da sabis na lalata da hana farauta ga abokan ciniki a duk duniya.[1] Daga 2019, DAG ta zama mai aiki a Cabo Delgado, Mozambique, inda suka taimaka wajen yaki da tayar da kayar baya na Islama. Shugaban 'yan sanda Bernardino Rafael ne ya hayar kamfanin don taimakawa horar da' yan sanda na cikin gida da yaki da 'yan tawaye.[2][3] Sojojinsa suna aiki kuma suna ba da hayar jiragen sama masu sauƙi na Bat Hawk, kuma sun tura Aérospatiale Gazelles guda uku, Eurocopter AS350 Écureuils guda biyu da Aérospaiale Alouette III guda ɗaya a Cabo Delgado.[4][5]

DAG tana ba da aiyuka na lalata da hana farauta ga abokan ciniki a duk duniya.[1] Daga 2019, DAG ta zama mai aiki a Cabo Delgado, Mozambique, inda suka taimaka wajen yaki da tayar da kayar baya na Islama. Shugaban 'yan sanda Bernardino Rafael ne ya hayar kamfanin don taimakawa horar da' yan sanda na cikin gida da yaki da 'yan tawaye.[2][3] Sojojinsa suna aiki kuma suna ba da hayar jiragen sama masu sauƙi na Bat Hawk, kuma sun tura Aérospatiale Gazelles guda uku, Eurocopter AS350 Écureuils guda biyu da Aérospaiale Alouette III guda ɗaya a Cabo Delgado.[4][5]

items.sourceText: The Capture of Touggourt was a military operation carried out by the Chaamba tribe against the city of Touggourt during the Mokrani Revolt, in which the French garrison of the city and its commander were massacred. It occurred from May 14–15, 1871.

targets.targetText: Kame Touggourt wani farmakin soji ne da 'yan ƙabilar Chaamba suka kai wa birnin Touggourt a lokacin tawayen Mokrani, inda aka kashe sojojin Faransa na birnin da kwamandojinsa. Ya faru daga watan Mayu 14-15, 1871.

Kame Touggourt wani farmakin soji ne da 'yan kabilar Chaamba suka kai wa birnin Touggourt a lokacin tawayen Mokrani, inda aka kashe sojojin Faransa na birnin da kwamandojinsa. Ya faru daga Mayu 14-15, 1871.

items.sourceText: Bouchoucha was a simple Algerian shepherd who got in trouble with the French for stealing. He managed to escape to Ain Salah, where he joined forces with a tribe called Chaamba, led by Bennacer Benchohra, with them they started a resistance, capturing N’Goussa on 5 March 1871[1] before attacking Ouargla somewhere in March of the same year.[2] their main enemy was a certain Ali Bey, Agha of Touggourt[3] under the French, who had captured the city in 1854, After Ali recognized their authority.[4] After that, they head to the French controlled Touggourt to Capture it, joined by the Chaamba leader Benchohra.[5]

targets.targetText: Bouchoucha makiyayi ne mai sauki dan ƙasar Aljeriya wanda ya samu matsala da Faransa saboda sata. Ya yi nasarar tserewa zuwa Ain Salah, inda ya haɗa kai da wata ƙabila mai suna Chaamba, ƙarƙashin jagorancin Bennacer Benchohra, tare da su suka fara turjiya, inda suka kame N'Goussa a ranar 5 ga watan Maris 1871 [1] kafin su kai wa Ouargla hari a cikin watan Maris na wannan shekarar. [2] Babban makiyinsu shi ne wani Ali Bey, Agha na Touggourt [3] a ƙarƙashin Faransa, wanda ya kame birnin a shekara ta 1854, Bayan Ali ya gane ikonsu. [4] Bayan haka, sun nufi Touggourt na Faransa da ke iko da shi don kama shi, tare da shugaban Chaamba Benchohra. [5]

Bouchoucha makiyayi ne mai sauki dan kasar Aljeriya wanda ya samu matsala da Faransanci saboda sata. Ya yi nasarar tserewa zuwa Ain Salah, inda ya hada kai da wata kabila mai suna Chaamba, karkashin jagorancin Bennacer Benchohra, tare da su suka fara turjiya, inda suka kame N'Goussa a ranar 5 ga Maris 1871 [1] kafin su kai wa Ouargla hari a cikin watan Maris na wannan shekarar. [2] Babban makiyinsu shi ne wani Ali Bey, Agha na Touggourt [3] a karkashin Faransa, wanda ya kame birnin a shekara ta 1854, Bayan Ali ya gane ikonsu. [4] Bayan haka, sun nufi Touggourt na Faransa da ke iko da shi don kama shi, tare da shugaban Chaamba Benchohra. [5]

items.sourceText: According to EASF, completing a first cycle of exercise, the Force reached its Initial Operating Capability (IOC) in late 2009. Parts of this cycle were a Command Post Exercise (CPX) in Nairobi, Kenya in 2008, and a Field Training Exercise (FTX) in Djibouti in November 2009.[15] In the second cycle, EASF first conducted a Logistics Mapping Exercise (LogMAPEX) in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia in November 2010,[16] followed by a second CPX in Khartoum, Sudan in November 2011[17] and a second FTX in Jinja, Uganda in May 2013.[18] The latter involved 1,290 participants (military, police, civilian) and was intended to test EASF's deployment and mission implementation capability.[16] EASF further conducted a CPX in Ethiopia in December 2014, after which its Full Operational Capability was declared. A third FTX took place in November 2017 in Port Sudan, Republic of The Sudan for 1,029 participants drawn from the 10 Member States.

targets.targetText: A cewar EASF, kammala zagaye na farko na motsa jiki, Sojojin sun kai ga Ikon Ayyuka na Farko (IOC) a ƙarshen 2009. Sashe na wannan sake zagayowar sun kasance Kwamandan Post Exercise (CPX) a Nairobi, Kenya a cikin 2008, da kuma Field Training Exercise,FTX a Djibouti a watan Nuwamba 2009.[1] A cikin sake zagayowar ta biyu, EASF ta fara gudanar da Ayyukan Taswirar Hanyoyi (LogMAPEX) a Addis Ababa, Habasha a watan Nuwamba na shekara ta 2010, sannan CPX na biyu a Khartoum, Sudan a watan Nuwambar shekara ta 2011 [2] da FTX na biyu na Jinja, Uganda a watan Mayu na shekara ta 2013.[3][4] Wannan na ƙarshe ya haɗa da mahalarta 1,290 (soja, 'yan sanda, farar hula) kuma an yi niyyar gwada turawar EASF da ikon aiwatar da manufa.[2] EASF ta ci gaba da gudanar da CPX a Habasha a watan Disamba na shekara ta 2014, bayan haka aka ayyana Cikakken Kwarewar Ayyuka. FTX na uku ya faru a watan Nuwamba na shekara ta 2017 a Port Sudan, Jamhuriyar Sudan don mahalarta 1,029 da aka samo daga kasashe 10 .

items.sourceText: Fred Rwigema was amongst the initial 27 armed individuals, led by Uganda's President Yoweri Museveni, who took to the bush in 1981 to begin a guerilla war following Uganda's contentious Presidential elections of 1980, where Apollo Milton Obote's party the Uganda People's Congress was accused of engineering an election fraud to get victory over the Democratic Party which was led by Paul Kawanga Ssemwogerere and Uganda Patriotic Movement, which was led by Yoweri Museveni.

targets.targetText: Fred Rwigema na daga cikin mutane 27 na farko masu ɗauke da makamai, ƙarƙashin jagorancin shugaban ƙasar Uganda Yoweri Museveni, waɗanda suka tafi daji a shekarar 1981 don fara yakin neman zabe bayan zaɓen shugaban ƙasar Uganda da aka yi a shekarar 1980, inda aka zargi jam'iyyar Apollo Milton Obote na jam'iyyar adawa ta Uganda People's Congress da injiniyan magudin zaɓe don samun galaba a kan jam'iyyar Democratic Party, Patrioter S. Yoweri Museveni yake jagoranta.

Fred Rwigema na daga cikin mutane 27 na farko dauke da makamai, karkashin jagorancin shugaban kasar Uganda Yoweri Museveni, wadanda suka tafi daji a shekarar 1981 don fara yakin neman zabe bayan zaben shugaban kasar Uganda da aka yi a shekarar 1980, inda aka zargi jam'iyyar Apollo Milton Obote na jam'iyyar adawa ta Uganda People's Congress da injiniyan magudin zabe don samun galaba a kan jam'iyyar Democratic Party, Patrioter S. Yoweri Museveni ya jagoranta.

items.sourceText: An analogous dichotomy played out in the Berber policy of the French protectorate in Morocco (1912–1956).[1] According to Edmund Burke III, who described it as "one of the most enduring aspects of the French sociology of Islam, the myth and its supposed Arab-Berber dichotomy was fundamental to colonial discourse in North Africa, and its impact shaped postcolonial political discourse as well.[1][2]

targets.targetText: An buga wani kwatankwacin dichotomy a cikin manufofin Berber na Faransanci a Maroko (1912-1956). [1] A cewar Edmund Burke III, wanda ya bayyana shi a matsayin "daya daga cikin abubuwan da ke dawwama na zamantakewar zamantakewar Islama na Faransanci, tatsuniyar da abin da ake zaton Larabawa-Berber dichotomy ya kasance mai mahimmanci ga maganganun mulkin mallaka a Arewacin Afirka, kuma tasirinsa ya haifar da maganganun siyasa na bayan mulkin mallaka. [1] [2]

An buga wani kwatankwacin dichotomy a cikin manufofin Berber na Faransa a Maroko (1912-1956). [1] A cewar Edmund Burke III, wanda ya bayyana shi a matsayin "ɗaya daga cikin abubuwan da ke dawwama na zamantakewar Islama na Faransa, tatsuniyar da abin da ake zaton Larabawa-Berber dichotomy ya kasance mai mahimmanci ga maganganun 'yan mulkin mallaka a Arewacin Afirka, kuma tasirinsa ya haifar da maganganun siyasa na bayan 'yan mulkin mallaka. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: The museum also contains statuary which ornamented the avenues and plazas of colonial Luanda, which were removed after independence. These include the statue of Diogo Cão, the first European to set foot in Angola, of Paulo Dias de Novais, founder of the city of São Paulo da Assunção de Luanda, of Vasco da Gama, and of famous Portuguese poet Luís de Camões, among others.[1]

targets.targetText: Gidan kayan tarihin ya kuma ƙunshi statuary wanda ya ƙawata hanyoyi da filayen Luanda na mulkin mallaka, waɗanda aka cire bayan samun 'yancin kai. Wadannan sun hada da mutum-mutumi na Diogo Cão, Bature na farko da ya kafa ƙafa a Angola, na Paulo Dias de Novais, wanda ya kafa birnin São Paulo da Assunção de Luanda, na Vasco da Gama, da kuma sanannen mawaƙin Portuguese Luís de Camões, da sauransu. [1]

Gidan kayan tarihin ya kuma ƙunshi statuary wanda ya ƙawata hanyoyi da filayen Luanda na 'yan mulkin mallaka, waɗanda aka cire bayan samun 'yancin kai. Waɗannan sun haɗa da mutum-mutumi na Diogo Cão, Bature na farko da ya kafa ƙafa a Angola, na Paulo Dias de Novais, wanda ya kafa birnin São Paulo da Assunção de Luanda, na Vasco da Gama, da kuma sanannen mawaƙin Portuguese Luís de Camões, da sauransu. [1]

items.sourceText: On 15 March, two months later, the União das Populações de Angola (UPA), led by Holden Roberto, staged a popular revolt in the Bakongo region of northern Angola. Angolan Bantu farmers and coffee-plantation workers joined the uprising and, in a frenzy of rage, killed some 1,000 white Angolans in a few days, together with an unknown number of natives.[8] The rioters burned plantations, bridges, government facilities, and police stations, and destroyed several barges and ferries.[8] Graphic images of raped and mutilated settlers inflamed the Portuguese public, and the Portuguese Army instituted a counter-insurgency campaign that destroyed dozens of villages and killed some 20,000 people before the uprising was put down in September 1961.[8][9]

targets.targetText: A ranar 15 ga Maris, wata biyu bayan haka, União das Populações de Angola (UPA), karkashin jagorancin Holden Roberto, sun yi wata gagarumar tawaye a yankin Bakongo da ke arewacin Angola. Manoman Bantu 'yan Angola da masu aikin noman kofi ne suka shiga bore, kuma a fusace suka kashe fararen hular Angola kimanin 1,000 a cikin 'yan kwanaki, tare da wasu 'yan kasar da ba a san adadinsu ba. [1] Masu tarzomar sun kona filayen noma, gadoji, cibiyoyin gwamnati, da ofisoshin 'yan sanda, tare da lalata jiragen ruwa da jiragen ruwa da dama. [1] Hotunan da aka zana na mutanen da aka yi wa fyade da yankan rago sun harba wa jama'ar Portugal wuta, kuma Sojojin Portugal sun kafa wani kamfen na yaki da ta'addanci wanda ya lalata kauyuka da dama tare da kashe wasu mutane 20,000 kafin a kawo karshen tashin hankalin a watan Satumban 1961. [1] [2]

[1] [2]

items.sourceText: A number of young Liberals became increasingly frustrated, and, in 1960, formed the National Liberation Committee[clarification needed] (NLC).[3] Initially focused on helping hunted people escape the country, the NLC progressed to sabotage government installations and services, explicitly eschewing violence against people. It launched its first operation in September 1963. From then, until July 1964, the NLC/ARM bombed power lines, railroad tracks and rolling stock, roads, bridges and other vulnerable infrastructure, without any civilian casualties. It aimed to turn the white population against the government by creating a situation that would result in capital flight and collapse of confidence in the country and its economy. It launched four attacks in 1961, three in 1962, eight in 1963, and ten in 1964.[4]

targets.targetText: Yawancin matasa masu sassaucin ra'ayi sun kara takaici, kuma, a cikin 1960, sun kafa kwamitin 'yanci na kasa.  (NLC). [ 3 ] Da farko dai ta mayar da hankali wajen taimaka wa mutanen da ake farauta su kubuta daga kasar, kungiyar NLC ta ci gaba da yin zagon kasa ga ma’aikatu da ayyukan gwamnati, tare da kaucewa cin zarafin jama’a. Ya kaddamar da aikinsa na farko a watan Satumbar 1963. Daga nan, har zuwa watan Yuli na shekarar 1964, NLC/ARM ta yi ruwan bama-bamai da layukan wutar lantarki, titin jirgin kasa da na’urar birjik, hanyoyi, gadoji da sauran ababen more rayuwa masu rauni, ba tare da an samu asarar rayuka ba. Da nufin mayar da farar hula adawa da gwamnati ta hanyar haifar da yanayi da zai haifar da tashin hankali da rugujewar amana ga kasar da tattalin arzikinta. Ta kaddamar da hare-hare hudu a 1961, uku a 1962, takwas a 1963, da goma a 1964. [ 4 ]

Yawancin matasa masu sassaucin ra'ayi sun ƙara takaici, kuma, a cikin shekarar 1960, sun kafa kwamitin 'yanci na kasa.  (NLC). Ya kaddamar da aikinsa na farko a watan Satumbar 1963. Da nufin mayar da farar hula adawa da gwamnati ta hanyar haifar da yanayi da zai haifar da tashin hankali da rugujewar amana ga ƙasar da tattalin arzikinta. Ta kaddamar da hare-hare huɗu a shekarar 1961, uku a shekara ta 1962, takwas a 1963, da goma a 1964. [ 4 ]

items.sourceText: When SOCADEF declared a 14-day ceasefire at the end of March 2020 because of the COVID-19 pandemic, the AGovC said that the ADF would do the same if Cameroonian troops were confined to their bases for the duration of the ceasefire.[21]

targets.targetText: Lokacin da SOCADEF ta ayyana tsagaita wuta na kwanaki 14 a ƙarshen watan Maris 2020 saboda cutar ta COVID-19, AGovC ta ce ADF za ta yi haka idan sojojin Kamaru suka tsare a sansanonin su na tsawon lokacin tsagaita buɗe wuta. [1]

Lokacin da SOCADEF ta ayyana tsagaita wuta na kwanaki 14 a karshen Maris 2020 saboda cutar ta COVID-19, AGovC ta ce ADF za ta yi haka idan sojojin Kamaru suka tsare a sansanonin su na tsawon lokacin tsagaita bude wuta. [1]

items.sourceText: In March 2021, "General Efang" of the ADF publicly apologized to the population for war crimes committed by some separatist elements. He claimed that separatist fighters abusing civilians were often under the influence of drugs, and lamented that this had led to the creation of pro-government local paramilitaries.[22]

targets.targetText: A cikin watan Maris 2021, "General Efang" na ADF ya nemi afuwar jama'a a bainar jama'a game da laifukan yaki da wasu 'yan aware suka aikata. Ya yi ikirarin cewa mayakan ‘yan awaren da ke cin zarafin jama’a galibi suna shan miyagun kwayoyi, ya kuma koka da cewa hakan ne ya sa aka samar da jami’an tsaro na ƙananan hukumomi masu goyon bayan gwamnati. [1]

A cikin Maris 2021, "General Efang" na ADF ya nemi afuwar jama'a a bainar jama'a game da laifukan yaki da wasu 'yan aware suka aikata. Ya yi ikirarin cewa mayakan ‘yan awaren da ke cin zarafin jama’a galibi suna shan miyagun kwayoyi, ya kuma koka da cewa hakan ne ya sa aka samar da jami’an tsaro na kananan hukumomi masu goyon bayan gwamnati. [1]

items.sourceText: On April 9, 2021, the AGovC formally entered into an alliance with the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) and its armed wing, the Eastern Security Network (ESN).[9] According to ADF deputy defense chief Capo Daniel, this would entail joint military operations, joint training bases, and an effort to seize the mutual border and ensure a free flow of weapons.[23] By April 2022 this had been partly achieved, as Ambazonian forces and the ESN had consolidated their control over much of the common border and brought 90 percent of cross-border trade to a halt.[24] The alliance was denounced by the Interim Government of Ambazonia as well as by other Biafran separatist groups.[25]

targets.targetText: A ranar 9 ga watan Afrilu, 2021, AGovC ta shiga ƙawance da masu fafutukar kafa ƙasar Biafra (IPOB) da reshenta masu ɗauke da makamai, Eastern Security Network (ESN). [1] A cewar mataimakin babban jami'in tsaro na ADF Capo Daniel, wannan zai haɗa da ayyukan soji na haɗin gwiwa, sansanonin horar da hadin gwiwa, da kuma kokarin kwace kan iyakokin ƙasashen biyu da tabbatar da kwararar makamai cikin 'yanci. [2] A watan Afrilun 2022 an cimma wannan a wani ɓangare, yayin da sojojin Ambazoniya da ESN suka karfafa ikonsu a kan iyakar gama gari tare da kawo dakatar da kashi 90 na cinikin kan iyaka. [3] Gwamnatin riƙon kwarya ta Ambazonia da kuma wasu kungiyoyin ‘yan awaren Biafra sun yi tir da wannan kawancen. [4]

A ranar 9 ga Afrilu, 2021, AGovC ta shiga kawance da masu fafutukar kafa kasar Biafra (IPOB) da reshenta masu dauke da makamai, Eastern Security Network (ESN). [1] A cewar mataimakin babban jami'in tsaro na ADF Capo Daniel, wannan zai hada da ayyukan soji na hadin gwiwa, sansanonin horar da hadin gwiwa, da kuma kokarin kwace kan iyakokin kasashen biyu da tabbatar da kwararar makamai cikin 'yanci. [2] A watan Afrilun 2022 an cimma wannan a wani bangare, yayin da sojojin Ambazoniya da ESN suka karfafa ikonsu a kan iyakar gama gari tare da kawo dakatar da kashi 90 na cinikin kan iyaka. [3] Gwamnatin rikon kwarya ta Ambazonia da kuma wasu kungiyoyin ‘yan awaren Biafra sun yi tir da wannan kawancen. [4]

items.sourceText: In April 2023, Capo Daniel resigned from AGovC and, by extension, the ADF, in order to pursue independent activism. Ayaba Cho Lucas acknowledged his resignation and thanked him for his years of work.[6] By May, Daniel had founded a new militant group called the Ambazonia Dark Forces, and openly called on his fighters to abduct journalists for ransom.[26]

targets.targetText: A cikin Afrilu 2023, Capo Daniel ya yi murabus daga AGovC kuma, ta hanyar tsawaita, ADF, don neman fafutuka mai zaman kansa. Ayaba Cho Lucas ya amince da murabus din nasa kuma ya gode masa saboda shekarun da ya yi yana aiki. A watan Mayu, Daniel ya kafa wata sabuwar kungiyar tsageru mai suna Ambazonia Dark Forces, kuma ya fito fili ya yi kira ga mayakansa da su yi awon gaba da ‘yan jarida domin neman kudin fansa. [1]

A cikin watan Afrilu 2023, Capo Daniel ya yi murabus daga AGovC kuma, ta hanyar tsawaita, ADF, don neman fafutuka mai zaman kansa. Ayaba Cho Lucas ya amince da murabus ɗin nasa kuma ya gode masa saboda shekarun da ya yi yana aiki. A watan Mayu, Daniel ya kafa wata sabuwar kungiyar tsageru mai suna Ambazonia Dark Forces, kuma ya fito fili ya yi kira ga mayakansa da su yi awon gaba da ‘yan jarida domin neman kuɗin fansa. [1]

items.sourceText: On January 21, 2024, it was confirmed that Cameroonian forces had captured top ADF commander "General Efang", who had been wounded in action two weeks prior. This marked the second time that the ADF lost its top ground zero commander.[28]

targets.targetText: A ranar 21 ga Janairu, 2024, an tabbatar da cewa sojojin Kamaru sun kama babban kwamandan ADF "General Efang", wanda ya samu rauni a wani mataki makonni biyu da suka wuce. Wannan shi ne karo na biyu da ADF ta rasa babban kwamandan sifiri. [1]

items.sourceText: The prominent use of the Hindi language in Mauritian naming conventions is based on social and ethnic demographics; over half the national population is of Indian ancestry,[1] a direct result of the Indian labour diaspora that passed through the Immigration Depot. In Bihar and Uttar Pradesh, from where majority of these Indian Labourers where brought,"Ghat" is referred to River Bank which is used for Docking of Boats.

targets.targetText: Fitaccen amfani da yaren Hindi a cikin tarurrukan sanya suna na Mauritius ya dogara ne akan yanayin zamantakewa da kabilanci; fiye da rabin yawan al'ummar ƙasar asalin asalin Indiya ne, [1] sakamakon kai tsaye na ƴan ƙwadago na Indiya waɗanda suka ratsa ta wurin ajiyar shige da fice. A cikin Bihar da Uttar Pradesh, daga inda akasarin wadannan Ma'aikatan Indiya suka kawo "Ghat" zuwa Bankin Kogin da ake amfani da shi don Docking na Boats.

Fitaccen amfani da yaren Hindi a cikin tarurrukan sanya suna na Mauritius ya dogara ne akan yanayin zamantakewa da ƙabilu; fiye da rabin yawan al'ummar ƙasar asalin asalin Indiya ne, [1] sakamakon kai tsaye na ƴan ƙwadago na Indiya waɗanda suka ratsa ta wurin ajiyar shige da fice. A cikin Bihar da Uttar Pradesh, daga inda akasarin waɗannan Ma'aikatan Indiya suka kawo "Ghat" zuwa Bankin Kogin da ake amfani da shi don Docking na Boats.

items.sourceText: In 1810, during the Napoleonic Wars, Mauritius passed to British control, as confirmed in the Treaty of Paris,[1] at a time when the British Empire was expanding its influence in the Indian Ocean region. British commercial interest led to the rise in the production of sugar, which became the most valuable commodity in European trade beginning in the mid-18th century[12] throughout the empire in general, leading to the development of infrastructure for Port Louis as a free port in particular.

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 1810, a lokacin Yaƙin Napoleonic, Mauritius ta wuce zuwa ikon Birtaniyya, kamar yadda aka tabbatar a cikin yarjejeniyar Paris, [1] a lokacin da Daular Burtaniya ke faɗaɗa tasirinta a yankin Tekun Indiya. Sha'awar kasuwanci ta Burtaniya ta haifar da haɓakar samar da sukari, wanda ya zama mafi mahimmancin kayayyaki a cikin kasuwancin Turai tun daga tsakiyar ƙarni na 18 [2] a cikin daular gaba ɗaya, wanda ke haifar da haɓaka abubuwan more rayuwa ga Port Louis a matsayin tashar jiragen ruwa na musamman.

A cikin 1810, a lokacin Yaƙin Napoleonic, Mauritius ya wuce zuwa ikon Birtaniyya, kamar yadda aka tabbatar a cikin yarjejeniyar Paris, [1] a lokacin da Daular Burtaniya ke fadada tasirinta a yankin Tekun Indiya. Sha'awar kasuwanci ta Burtaniya ta haifar da haɓakar samar da sukari, wanda ya zama mafi mahimmancin kayayyaki a cikin kasuwancin Turai tun daga tsakiyar karni na 18 [2] a cikin daular gaba ɗaya, wanda ke haifar da haɓaka abubuwan more rayuwa ga Port Louis a matsayin tashar jiragen ruwa na musamman.

items.sourceText: Cyrene, also sometimes anglicized as Kyrene, was an ancient Greek colony and Roman city near present-day Shahhat in northeastern Libya in North Africa. It was part of the Pentapolis, an important group of five cities in the region, and gave the area its classical and early modern name Cyrenaica.

targets.targetText: Cyrene, kuma wani lokacin ana kiranta Kyrene, tsohuwar mulkin mallaka ce ta Girka da birni Roman kusa da Shahhat na yanzu a arewa maso gabashin Libya a Arewacin Afirka. Ya kasance wani ɓangare na Pentapolis, wani muhimmin rukuni na birane biyar a yankin, kuma ya ba yankin sunan gargajiya da na zamani na Cyrenaica.

Cyrene, kuma wani lokacin ana kiranta Kyrene, tsohuwar 'yar mulkin mallaka ce ta Girka da birnin Roman kusa da Shahhat na yanzu a arewa maso gabashin Libya a Arewacin Afirka. Ya kasance wani ɓangare na Pentapolis, wani muhimmin ruƙuni na birane biyar a yankin, kuma ya ba yankin sunan gargajiya da na zamani na Cyrenaica.

items.sourceText: He was Governor of Rotary International in some parts of Nigeria covering the whole of North West, North East, North Central, South West excluding Lagos and Ogun states from 2015 to 2016.[1]

targets.targetText: Ya riƙe shugaban Ƙungiyar Rotary International a wasu sassan Najeriya wanda ya haɗa da Arewa maso Yamma, Arewa maso Gabas, Arewa ta Tsakiya, Kudu maso Yamma ban da jihohin Legas da Ogun daga 2015 zuwa 2016. [1]

Ya kasance Gwamnan Rotary International a wasu sassan Najeriya wanda ya hada da Arewa maso Yamma, Arewa maso Gabas, Arewa ta Tsakiya, Kudu maso Yamma ban da jihohin Legas da Ogun daga 2015 zuwa 2016. [ 1 ]

items.sourceText: The founding Vice-chancellor of Summit University, Offa is Professor Hussein Oloyede.[1][2] The Vice-Chancellor has assured the public during the opening of the institution that the institution would be one of the cheapest private University in Nigeria. The Vice-Chancellor together with Vice Chancellors of other private universities had pleaded with the Federal Government to allow private universities to also benefit from the TETFund (Tertiary Education Trust Fund) projects, so as to enable them to survive and continue to provide quality education to everyone.[3] Professor Abiodun Musa Aibinu is now the second Vice-Chancellor of the institution. His appointment took effect from April 2022.[4]

targets.targetText: Wanda ya kafa Mataimakin Shugaban Jami'ar Summit, Offa shine Farfesa Hussein Oloyede. [1] [2] Mataimakin shugaban jami’ar ya tabbatarwa da jama’a a lokacin buɗe cibiyar cewa jami’ar za ta kasance ɗaya daga cikin jami’o’i masu zaman kansu mafi arha a Najeriya. Mataimakin shugaban jami’ar tare da mataimakan shugabannin jami’o’i masu zaman kansu, sun roƙi gwamnatin tarayya da ta bar jami’o’i masu zaman kansu suma su ci gajiyar shirin na TETFund (Tertiary Education Trust Fund), domin su samu damar rayuwa da kuma ci gaba da samar da ingantaccen ilimi ga kowa da kowa. [1]A yanzu Farfesa Abiodun Musa Aibinu shi ne mataimakin shugaban Jami'ar na biyu. Naɗin nasa ya fara aiki daga Afrilu 2022. [1]

items.sourceText: By the 19th century, most of Africa fell under European colonial rule. Having lost control of the vast territory of Brazil in South America, the Portuguese began to focus on expanding their African colonies. This brought them into direct conflict with the British.[1] Since David Livingstone had returned to the area in 1858 in an attempt to foster trade routes, British interest in Mozambique had risen, alarming the Portuguese government. During the 19th century, much of Eastern Africa was still being brought under British control, and in order to facilitate this, the British government required several concessions from the Portuguese colony.[50]

targets.targetText: A ƙarni na 19, yawancin ƙasashen Afirka sun faɗa ƙarƙashin turawan mulkin mallaka. Bayan sun rasa iko da babban yankin Brazil da ke Kudancin Amirka, Portuguese sun fara mayar da hankali kan faɗaɗa yankunan da suka yi wa mulkin mallaka na Afirka. Wannan ya kawo su cikin rikici kai tsaye da turawan Ingila. [1] Tun da David Livingstone ya koma yankin a shekarar 1858 a yunƙurin haɓaka hanyoyin kasuwanci, sha'awar Birtaniyya a Mozambique ta tashi, wanda ya firgita gwamnatin Portugal. A cikin ƙarni na 19, yawancin Gabashin Afirka har yanzu ana ƙarƙashin ikon Birtaniyya, kuma don sauƙaƙe wannan, gwamnatin Burtaniya ta buƙaci izini da yawa daga 'yan mulkin mallaka na Portugal. [2]

A karni na 19, yawancin kasashen Afirka sun fada karkashin turawan mulkin mallaka . Bayan sun rasa iko da babban yankin Brazil da ke Kudancin Amirka, Portuguese sun fara mayar da hankali kan fadada yankunan da suka yi wa mulkin mallaka na Afirka. Wannan ya kawo su cikin rikici kai tsaye da turawan Ingila. [1] Tun da David Livingstone ya koma yankin a 1858 a yunƙurin haɓaka hanyoyin kasuwanci, sha'awar Birtaniyya a Mozambique ta tashi, wanda ya firgita gwamnatin Portugal. A cikin ƙarni na 19, yawancin Gabashin Afirka har yanzu ana ƙarƙashin ikon Birtaniyya, kuma don sauƙaƙe wannan, gwamnatin Burtaniya ta buƙaci izini da yawa daga mulkin mallaka na Portugal. [2]

items.sourceText: Vocal political dissidents opposed to Portuguese rule and claiming independence were typically forced into exile. From the mid-1920s onward, unions and left-wing opposition groups were suppressed within both Portugal and its colonies by the authoritarian Estado Novo regime.[1] The Portuguese government forced black Mozambican farmers to grow rice or cotton for export, providing little for the farmers to support themselves. Many other workers—over 250,000 by 1960—were pressured to work on coal and gold mines in neighboring territories, mainly in South Africa, where they comprised over 30% of black underground miners.[41][3][4][55] By 1950, only 4,353 Mozambicans out of 5,733,000 had been granted the right to vote by the Portuguese colonial government.[49] The rift between Portuguese settlers and Mozambican locals is illustrated in one way by the small number of people with mixed Portuguese and Mozambican heritage (mestiço), numbering only 31,465 in a population of 8–10 million in 1960 according to that year's census.[41]

targets.targetText: Masu adawa da siyasa masu adawa da mulkin Portuguese da kuma da'awar 'yancin kai an tilasta musu su yi gudun hijira. Tun daga tsakiyar 1920s zuwa gaba, ƙungiyoyin ƙungiyoyi da ƙungiyoyin adawa na hagu an danne su a cikin Portugal da yankunanta ta hanyar mulkin Estado Novo. [1] Gwamnatin kasar Portugal ta tilastawa manoma bakar fata 'yan kasar Mozambique noman shinkafa ko auduga don fitar da su zuwa kasashen waje, lamarin da ya sa manoman su samu abin dogaro da kansu. Wasu ma'aikata da yawa - sama da 250,000 zuwa 1960 - an matsa musu lamba don yin aiki a kan ma'adinan ma'adinan gwal a yankuna makwabta, musamman a Afirka ta Kudu, inda suka ƙunshi sama da kashi 30% na masu hakar ma'adinai na ƙasa. [2] [3] [4] A shekara ta 1950, 'yan Mozambique 4,353 ne kawai daga cikin 5,733,000 suka samu damar kada kuri'a daga gwamnatin mulkin mallaka na Portugal. [3] An kwatanta baraka tsakanin mazauna Portuguese da mazauna ƙasar Mozambique ta hanya ɗaya ta hanyar ƴan tsirarun mutanen da ke da gaurayawar al'adun Portuguese da na Mozambique ( mestiço ), waɗanda adadinsu ya kai 31,465 kawai a cikin mutane miliyan 8-10 a 1960 bisa ga ƙidayar shekarar.

[2] [3] [4] A shekara ta 1950, 'yan Mozambique 4,353 ne kawai daga cikin 5,733,000 suka samu damar kada kuri'a daga gwamnatin mulkin mallaka na Portugal. [3] An kwatanta ɓaraka tsakanin mazauna Portuguese da mazauna ƙasar Mozambique ta hanya ɗaya ta hanyar ƴan tsirarun mutanen da ke da gaurayawar al'adun Portuguese da na Mozambique (mestiço), waɗanda adadinsu ya kai 31,465 kawai a cikin mutane miliyan 8-10 a 1960 bisa ga ƙidayar shekarar.

items.sourceText: Vieira was re-elected for another four-year term as President of PAIGC in mid-May 1998 at the party's sixth congress, with 438 votes in favor, eight opposed, and four abstaining;[1][18] the post of Secretary-General was abolished at this congress.[16] An outbreak of civil war in June 1998 eventually led to the ousting of Vieira in May 1999.[19] A few days later, former Prime Minister Manuel Saturnino da Costa was named acting President of the PAIGC on 12 May 1999.[20] Vieira was expelled from PAIGC at a party congress in September 1999 for "treasonable offences, support and incitement to warfare, and practices incompatible with the statutes of the party". Francisco Benante, the leader of reformists within the party and the only civilian in the transitional military junta, was elected as the President of PAIGC at the end of the congress on 9 September 1999.[21][22] Benante's candidacy was supported by the junta, and he received 174 votes against 133 votes for the only opposing candidate.[22]

targets.targetText: An sake zaben Vieira na wani wa'adin shekaru hudu a matsayin shugaban PAIGC a tsakiyar watan Mayun 1998 a babban taron jam'iyyar na shida, inda kuri'u 438 suka amince, takwas suka nuna adawa, hudu kuma suka kaurace; [1] [2] an soke mukamin Sakatare-Janar a wannan majalisa. [1] Barkewar yakin basasa a watan Yuni 1998 ya kai ga korar Vieira a watan Mayu 1999. [3] Bayan 'yan kwanaki, an nada tsohon Firayim Minista Manuel Saturnino da Costa a matsayin shugaban riko na PAIGC a ranar 12 ga Mayu 1999. [4] An kori Vieira daga PAIGC a wani taron jam'iyya a watan Satumba na 1999 saboda "laifi na cin amana, goyon baya da tunzura yaki, da ayyukan da suka saba wa dokokin jam'iyyar". Francisco Benante, shugaban masu neman sauyi a cikin jam'iyyar kuma farar hula daya tilo a cikin mulkin soja na rikon kwarya, an zabe shi a matsayin shugaban PAIGC a karshen taron majalisar a ranar 9 ga Satumba 1999. [5] [6] Benante ya samu goyon bayan majalisar mulkin soji, kuma ya samu kuri'u 174 inda ya samu kuri'u 133 na dan takara daya tilo da ke adawa da shi. [6]

[5] [6] Benante ya samu goyon bayan majalisar mulkin soji, kuma ya samu kuri'u 174 inda ya samu kuri'u 133 na ɗan takara ɗaya tilo da ke adawa da shi. [6]

items.sourceText: The battle seemed to be a draw. The small Italian force had surprised the Tigrayans, but their attack had been repulsed. The Italians however had survived the counterattack and were now in a strong defensive position. After two days of probing attacks, the Tigrayans retired west towards Senafe, with Baratieri in hot pursuit. The Italian forces caught up to the Tigrayans by late afternoon as they encamped. Mengesha's tent was identified and the artillery brought up. Baratieri opened fire, but mist and the darkness of night quickly enveloped the battlefield. Mengesha and his forces were able to slip away, abandoning everything. On the 18th, Baratieri returned northwards, leaving garrisons in Senafe and Segheneyti, and ordering the occupation of the strong positions of Hadish-Adi and Adi-Keih, as the Tigrayans retreated westward to regroup.

targets.targetText: Yakin ya zama kamar wasa ne. Ƙananan sojojin Italiya sun yi mamakin mutanen Tigray, amma an fatattaki su. Italiyan dai sun tsallake rijiya da baya, kuma a yanzu suna cikin wani matsayi mai karfi na tsaro. Bayan kwanaki biyu na binciken hare-haren, 'yan kabilar Tigrai sun yi ritaya zuwa yamma zuwa Senafe, tare da Baratieri suna zazzafan bin sa. Da yammacin rana ne sojojin Italiya suka ci karo da 'yan kabilar Tigrai a lokacin da suke sansani. An gano tantin Mengesha, aka kawo makaman bindigu. Baratieri ya bude wuta, amma hazo da duhun dare suka mamaye fagen fama da sauri. Mengesha da dakarunsa sun iya zamewa, suka bar komai. A ranar 18 ga wata, Baratieri ya koma arewa, ya bar runduna a Senafe da Segheneyti, kuma ya ba da umarnin mamaye manyan wurare na Hadish-Adi da Adi-Keih, yayin da 'yan kabilar Tigray suka koma yamma don sake haduwa.

Yakin ya zama kamar wasa ne. Ƙananan sojojin Italiya sun yi mamakin mutanen Tigray, amma an fatattaki su. Italiyawan dai sun tsallake rijiya da baya, kuma a yanzu suna cikin wani matsayi mai karfi na tsaro. Bayan kwanaki biyu na binciken hare-haren, 'yan ƙabilar Tigrai sun yi ritaya zuwa yamma zuwa Senafe, tare da Baratieri suna zazzafan bin sa. Da yammacin rana ne sojojin Italiya suka ci karo da 'yan ƙabilar Tigrai a lokacin da suke sansani. An gano tantin Mengesha, aka kawo makaman bindigu. Baratieri ya buɗe wuta, amma hazo da duhun dare suka mamaye fagen fama da sauri. Mengesha da dakarunsa sun iya zamewa, suka bar komai. A ranar 18 ga wata, Baratieri ya koma arewa, ya bar runduna a Senafe da Segheneyti, kuma ya ba da umarnin mamaye manyan wurare na Hadish-Adi da Adi-Keih, yayin da 'yan ƙabilar Tigray suka koma yamma don sake haɗuwa.

items.sourceText: The Ethiopians attacked a force of 350 Eritrean irregulars on the left flank, who collapsed under the Ethiopian assault, causing Toselli to send two companies of Italian infantry who halted the Ethiopian advance.[3] Just as Toselli was rejoicing in his apparent victory, the main Ethiopian assault came down on his right flank, causing Toselli to order retreat. The Emperor's best general, Ras Makonnen, had occupied the road leading back to Eritrea, and launched a surprise attack, which routed the Italians.[3] The Ethiopians had completely devastated the Italians, who suffered 19 Italian officers (including Maj Toselli), 20 Italian other ranks, and 1,500 ascari killed, and 3 officers and 300 ascari wounded.[4]

targets.targetText: 'Yan Habashan sun kai hari kan wata rundunar 'yan ta'addar Eritrea 350 a gefen hagu, wadanda suka ruguje karkashin harin Habasha, lamarin da ya sa Toselli ya aika da wasu kamfanoni biyu na sojojin kasar Italiya wadanda suka dakatar da ci gaban Habasha. [1] A daidai lokacin da Toselli ke murnar nasarar da ya samu, babban harin Habasha ya sauka a gefensa na dama, wanda ya sa Toselli ya ba da umarnin ja da baya. Babban Janar na Sarkin sarakuna, Ras Makonnen, ya mamaye hanyar da ke komawa Eritrea, kuma ya kai harin ba-zata, wanda ya fatattaki Italiyawa. [1] Habashawa sun lalata Italiya gaba ɗaya, waɗanda suka sha wahala daga jami'an Italiya 19 (ciki har da Maj Toselli), 20 na Italiyanci, da ascari 1,500, da kuma jami'ai 3 da ascari 300. [2]

Babban Janar na Sarkin sarakuna, Ras Makonnen, ya mamaye hanyar da ke komawa Eritrea, kuma ya kai harin ba-zata, wanda ya fatattaki Italiyawa.
