items.sourceText: Muhammad Abdullah Hassan was commonly referred to as the 'Mad Mullah' by the media until the defeat at Erego. Following this event, there was a shift in perception.[14] The Daily News noted that:

targets.targetText: Kafofin yada labarai na kiran Muhammad Abdullah Hassan da sunan 'Mahaukacin Mullah' har zuwa lokacin da aka sha kashi a Erego. Bayan wannan taron, an sami sauyin fahimta. [1] Jaridar Daily News ta ruwaito cewa:

Kafofin yaɗa labarai na kiran Muhammad Abdullah Hassan da sunan 'Mad Mullah' har zuwa lokacin da aka sha kashi a Erego. Bayan wannan taron, an sami sauyin fahimta. [1] Jaridar Daily News ta ruwaito cewa:

items.sourceText: Malagasy hopes for greater sovereignty were stirred by remarks given by General Charles de Gaulle at the Brazzaville Conference in 1944, where de Gaulle announced all colonies were thereafter French overseas territories entitled to representation in the French National Assembly,[10] and promised citizenship rights to residents of its overseas colonies. Despite the partial implementation of these reforms, forced labor on French-owned plantations and other rights abuses in Madagascar continued unabated.[1] The nationalist secret society Panama (Patriotes nationalistes malgaches) was founded in 1941,[2] followed in 1943 by another called Jiny after a type of local red bird. Both organizations, which sought to achieve independence by force if necessary,[11] saw their membership swell during this period.[9]

targets.targetText: Fatan Malagasy na samun yancin kai ya taso ne daga kalaman da Janar Charles de Gaulle ya bayar a taron Brazzaville a shekarar 1944, inda de Gaulle ya sanar da cewa dukkanin yankunan sun kasance bayan haka yankunan Faransanci na ketare da ke da hakkin wakilci a Majalisar Dokokin Faransa, [ 10 ] kuma ya yi alkawarin 'yancin zama dan kasa ga mazauna yankunan da ke ƙasashen waje. Duk da aiwatar da wasu gyare-gyaren da aka yi, an ci gaba da yin aikin tilasta wa gonaki mallakar Faransawa da kuma take hakki a Madagascar ba tare da katsewa ba. [1] An kafa kungiyar asiri ta ƙasa Panama (Patriotes nationalistes malgaches) a cikin shekarar 1941, [2] ta biyo baya a cikin shekarar 1943 ta wani mai suna Jiny bayan wani nau'in tsuntsu ja na gida. Duk ƙungiyoyin biyu, waɗanda suka nemi samun 'yancin kai ta hanyar ƙarfi idan ya cancanta, [1] sun ga kasancewar membobinsu a wannan lokacin. [2]

Fatan Malagasy na samun yancin kai ya taso ne daga kalaman da Janar Charles de Gaulle ya bayar a taron Brazzaville a 1944, inda de Gaulle ya sanar da cewa dukkanin yankunan sun kasance bayan haka yankunan Faransanci na ketare da ke da hakkin wakilci a Majalisar Dokokin Faransa, [ 10 ] kuma ya yi alkawarin 'yancin zama dan kasa ga mazauna yankunan da ke kasashen waje. Duk da aiwatar da wasu gyare-gyaren da aka yi, an ci gaba da yin aikin tilasta wa gonaki mallakar Faransawa da kuma take hakki a Madagascar ba tare da katsewa ba. [1] An kafa kungiyar asiri ta kasa Panama ( Patriotes nationalistes malgaches ) a cikin 1941, [2] ta biyo baya a cikin 1943 ta wani mai suna Jiny bayan wani nau'in tsuntsu ja na gida. Duk ƙungiyoyin biyu, waɗanda suka nemi samun 'yancin kai ta hanyar ƙarfi idan ya cancanta, [1] sun ga kasancewar membobinsu a wannan lokacin. [2]

items.sourceText: The name "Volta-Bani War" was coined in the book West African Challenge to Empire: Culture and History in the Volta-Bani War (2002) by Mahir Saul and Patrick Royer. The book is an anthropological analysis and detailed description of these confrontations, on the basis of military archives documents and an elaborate understanding of the region based on ethnographic fieldwork and oral history. It won the Amaury Talbot Prize of the Royal Anthropological Institute for 2002.[4] A fictional account of the revolt was the subject of one of the important literary works of West Africa, Nazi Boni's Crépuscule des temps anciens (1962).[5]

targets.targetText: An ƙirƙiro sunan "Yaƙin Volta-Bani" a cikin littafin ƙalubalen daular Afirka ta Yamma: Culture and History in the Volta-Bani War (2002) na Mahir Saul da Patrick Royer. Littafin nazari ne na nazarin ɗan adam da cikakken bayanin waɗannan arangama, bisa ga takardun tarihin soja da cikakken fahimtar yankin bisa aikin fage na ƙabilanci da tarihin baka. Ya lashe lambar yabo ta Amaury Talbot na Royal Anthropological Institute na shekarar 2002. [ 4 ] Labarin almara na tawaye shine batun ɗaya daga cikin mahimman ayyukan adabi na Yammacin Afirka, Nazi Boni's Crépuscule des temps anciens (1962). [ 5 ]

Littafin nazari ne na nazarin ɗan adam da cikakken bayanin waɗannan arangama, bisa ga takardun tarihin soja da cikakken fahimtar yankin bisa aikin fage na ƙabilanci da tarihin baka. Ya lashe lambar yabo ta Amaury Talbot na Royal Anthropological Institute na 2002. [ 4 ] Labarin almara na tawaye shine batun ɗaya daga cikin mahimman ayyukan adabi na Yammacin Afirka, Nazi Boni 's Crépuscule des temps anciens (1962). [ 5 ]

items.sourceText: In 1689 she attacked the Portuguese in Cahenda in the "Dembos" region to her west, an area that was disputed between Ndongo, Kongo, and Portugal. She was anxious to reestablish Matamba's claims over the Dembos region that lay directly to the east of Matamba, and in 1688–89 her armies moved into the area and threatened Portuguese positions around Ambaca, their fortified town that marked the westernmost edge of the colony of Angola. The Portuguese intervened, and blunted the effectiveness of the campaign.

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 1689 ta kai hari ga Portuguese a Cahenda a cikin "Dembos" yankin zuwa yammacinta, yankin da aka yi jayayya tsakanin Ndongo, Kongo, da Portugal. Ta kosa ta sake kafa da'awar Matamba akan yankin Dembos da ke gabas da Matamba kai tsaye, kuma a cikin shekarar 1688-89 sojojinta suka koma yankin suka yi barazana ga matsayin Portugal a kusa da Ambaca, garinsu mai kagara wanda ke da alamar yammacin mulkin mallaka na Angola. Portuguese sun shiga tsakani, kuma sun yi watsi da tasirin yakin.

Portuguese sun shiga tsakani, kuma sun yi watsi da tasirin yakin.

items.sourceText: Mekatilili and Mwadori organized a large meeting at Kaya Fungo where they administered the mukushekushe oath among the women and Fisi among the men who vowed never to cooperate with the colonial authorities in any way or form. The colonial authorities responded by seizing large tracts of Giriama land, burning their homes and razing Kaya Fungo. This led to the unsuccessful Giriama Uprising, known locally as kondo ya chembe.[3][2]

targets.targetText: Mekatilili da Mwadori sun gudanar da wani gagarumin taro a Kaya Fungo inda suka gudanar da rantsuwar mukushekushe a tsakanin mata da Fisi daga cikin mazan da suka sha alwashin ba za su taɓa haɗa kai da mahukunta 'yan mulkin mallaka ta kowace fuska. Hukumomin mulkin mallaka sun mayar da martani inda suka kwace filayen Giriama mai yawa, sun kona gidajensu tare da lalata Kaya Fungo. Wannan ya haifar da tashin hankalin Giriama wanda bai yi nasara ba, wanda aka fi sani da kondo ya chembe. [1] [2]

Mekatilili da Mwadori sun gudanar da wani gagarumin taro a Kaya Fungo inda suka gudanar da rantsuwar mukushekushe a tsakanin mata da Fisi daga cikin mazan da suka sha alwashin ba za su taba hada kai da mahukuntan mulkin mallaka ta kowace fuska. Hukumomin mulkin mallaka sun mayar da martani inda suka kwace filayen Giriama mai yawa, sun kona gidajensu tare da lalata Kaya Fungo. Wannan ya haifar da tashin hankalin Giriama wanda bai yi nasara ba, wanda aka fi sani da kondo ya chembe . [1] [2]

items.sourceText: She died in 1924, and was buried in Bungale, in Malindi District, in the Coast Province of the Colony and Protectorate of Kenya.[4][2] During Kenya's 1980 feminist movement, activists considered Mekatilili a symbol for the movement, as she was the first recorded Kenyan woman to participate in a fight for social change.[1] On August 9, 2020, Google celebrated her with a Google Doodle.[5]

targets.targetText: Ta mutu a cikin 1924, kuma an binne ta a Bungale, a gundumar Malindi, a cikin Lardin Coast na Mallaka da Kariya na Kenya . [1] [2] A lokacin yunkurin mata na kasar Kenya a shekarar 1980, masu fafutuka sun dauki Mekatilili a matsayin wata alama ta wannan yunkuri, domin ita ce mace ta farko da ta shiga cikin yakin neman sauyi a kasar Kenya. [2] A ranar 9 ga Agusta, 2020, Google yayi bikinta da Google Doodle . [3]

Ta mutu a cikin shekarar 1924, kuma an binne ta a Bungale, a gundumar Malindi, a cikin Lardin Coast na Mallaka da Kariya na Kenya. [2] A ranar 9 ga watan Agusta, 2020, Google yayi bikinta da Google Doodle. [3]

items.sourceText: In 1827 Emperor Pedro I presented the treaty to the Chamber of Deputies for its approval; its Committee for Diplomacy and Statistics approved the convention by three votes to two. In response, on 2 July 1827, deputy Raimundo José da Cunha Mattos, a member of the Committee who opposed the treaty, delivered a two-hour speech in defence of the continuation of the slave trade.[4]

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 1827 Emperor Pedro I ya gabatar da yarjejeniyar ga majalisar wakilai don amincewa da ita; Kwamitinta na diflomasiya da kididdiga ya amince da taron da kuri'u uku zuwa biyu. A mayar da martani, a ranar 2 ga watan Yuli 1827, mataimakin Raimundo José da Cunha Mattos, memba na Kwamitin da ke adawa da yarjejeniyar, ya gabatar da jawabin sa'o'i biyu don kare ci gaba da cinikin bayi. [1]

items.sourceText: Rabah Bouaziz was an Algerian politician and veteran of the Algerian War who served as the fourth wali of Algiers Province between 1964 and 1965.

targets.targetText: Rabah Bouaziz ɗan siyasan Aljeriya ne kuma gogaggen masanin yakin Aljeriya kuma ɗan kishin ƙasa wanda ya kasance wali na huɗu na lardin Algiers tsakanin shekarun 1964 zuwa 1965.
Rabah Bouaziz dan siyasan Aljeriya ne kuma gogaggen yakin Aljeriya wanda ya kasance wali na hudu na lardin Algiers tsakanin 1964 zuwa 1965.

items.sourceText: Bouaziz was born in 1928 in Tizi Rached, Tizi Ouzou Province, French Algeria. He served in Algerian nationalist political and guerrilla organizations from a young age, with his nom de guerre being Si Saïd. In 1958, returning from a clandestine trip to Germany with other Algerian fighters, Bouaziz was apprehended at the border and taken into custody by French officials.[1] After Algerian independence, Bouaziz became a deputy in the People's National Assembly during its first Congress. He was named wali of Algiers Province on August 8, 1965, after Ahmed Hamiani's departure.[2]

targets.targetText: An haifi Bouaziz a shekara ta 1928 a Tizi Rached, lardin Tizi Ouzou, na kasar Aljeriya . Ya yi aiki a kungiyoyin siyasa da na 'yan kishin kasa ta Aljeriya tun yana karami, tare da sunan sa Si Saïd . A shekara ta 1958, da yake dawowa daga wata tafiya ta sirri zuwa Jamus tare da wasu mayaka na Aljeriya, Bouaziz ya kama shi a kan iyakar kasar da jami'an Faransa suka kama shi. [1] Bayan 'yancin kai na Aljeriya, Bouaziz ya zama mataimaki a majalisar dokokin kasar a lokacin taronta na farko. An nada shi wali na lardin Algiers a ranar 8 ga Agusta, 1965, bayan tafiyar Ahmed Hamiani . [2]

An haifi Bouaziz a shekara ta 1928 a Tizi Rached, lardin Tizi Ouzou, na ƙasar Aljeriya. Ya yi aiki a kungiyoyin siyasa da na 'yan kishin ƙasa ta Aljeriya tun yana ƙarami, tare da sunan sa Si Saïd. A shekara ta 1958, da yake dawowa daga wata tafiya ta sirri zuwa Jamus tare da wasu mayaka na Aljeriya, Bouaziz an kama shi a kan iyakar ƙasar da jami'an Faransa suka kama shi. [1] Bayan 'yancin kai na Aljeriya, Bouaziz ya zama mataimaki a majalisar dokokin ƙasar a lokacin taronta na farko. An naɗa shi wali na lardin Algiers a ranar 8 ga watan Agusta, 1965, bayan tafiyar Ahmed Hamiani. [2]

items.sourceText: When Abdelkader laid siege to the city of Tlemcen in July 1836 to liberate it from General Louis-Eugène Cavaignac, he received news that some people had tried to rally the French and to rebel against him in Médéa.[9][10]

targets.targetText: Lokacin da Abdelkader ya kewaye birnin Tlemcen a cikin Yuli 1836 don 'yantar da shi daga Janar Louis-Eugène Cavaignac, ya sami labarin cewa wasu mutane sun yi ƙoƙari su haɗa Faransanci da tawaye a Medéa. [1] [2]

Lokacin da Abdelkader ya kewaye birnin Tlemcen a cikin watan Yuli 1836 don 'yantar da shi daga Janar Louis-Eugène Cavaignac, ya sami labarin cewa wasu mutane sun yi ƙoƙari su haɗa Faransa da tawaye a Medéa. [1] [2]

items.sourceText: Youcef Khatib (Arabic: يوسف الخطيب; 19 November 1932 – 26 October 2023) was an Algerian doctor and military officer.[1] He directed the Historic Wilaya IV [fr] during the Algerian War from August 1961 until independence in 1962.

targets.targetText: Youcef Khatib ( Arabic ; 19 Nuwamba 1932 - 26 Oktoba 2023) likita ne kuma jami'in soja na Aljeriya. [1] Ya jagoranci Historic Wilaya IV [ fr ] a lokacin Yaƙin Aljeriya daga Agusta 1961 har zuwa 'yancin kai a 1962.

Youcef Khatib (19 Nuwamba 1932 - 26 Oktoba 2023) likita ne kuma jami'in soja na Aljeriya. [1] Ya jagoranci Historic Wilaya IV [ fr ] a lokacin Yaƙin Aljeriya daga watan Agusta 1961 har zuwa 'yancin kai a shekara ta 1962.

items.sourceText: Born in Orléansville on 19 November 1932, Khatib attended the École Lallemand and the Collège d'Orléansville. He also played football with Groupement sportif orléansvillois. He then moved to Algiers to study medicine, but his studies were interrupted to join the Maquis.

targets.targetText: An haife shi a Orléansville a ranar 19 ga watan Nuwamba 1932, Khatib ya halarci École Lallemand da Collège d'Orléansville. Ya kuma buga kwallon kafa tare da Groupement sportif orléansvillois. Daga nan sai ya koma Algiers don karatun likitanci, amma karatunsa ya katse don shiga Maquis.

An haife shi a Orléansville a ranar 19 ga Nuwamba 1932, Khatib ya halarci École Lallemand da Collège d'Orléansville. Ya kuma buga kwallon kafa tare da Groupement sportif orléansvillois. Daga nan sai ya koma Algiers don karatun likitanci, amma karatunsa ya katse don shiga Maquis .

items.sourceText: Pierre Morain (12 April 1930 – 27 May 2013) was a building worker, a trades unionist, a militant libertarian communist and an anti-colonialist activist. For most purposes he would be considered a Frenchman. However, when he faced trial in connection with a newspaper article he had written opposing the government position in respect of the Algerian War, the president of the court noticed that his nineteen co-defendants were all Algerian and felt it necessary to clarify Morain's nationality: "But you .. are nevertheless French". Morain's defiant clarification is often requoted when Pierre Morain is discussed: "No, I'm not French. I'm a worker". When he was arrested on 29 May 1955 (or 29 June 1955: sources differ) Morain became the first French anti-colonialist activist to be sent to prison for supporting Algerian independence.[1][2][3]

targets.targetText: Pierre Morain (12 ga Afrilu 1930 - 27 ga Mayu 2013) ma'aikacin gini ne, ƙwararren ƙwadago, ɗan gurguzu mai fafutuka kuma ɗan gwagwarmayar mulkin mallaka . Don mafi yawan dalilai za a yi la'akari da shi Bafaranshe . Duk da haka, a lokacin da ya fuskanci shari'a dangane da labarin jaridar da ya rubuta yana adawa da matsayin gwamnati game da yakin Aljeriya, shugaban kotun ya lura cewa wadanda ake tuhumarsa guda goma sha tara duk 'yan Algeria ne kuma ya ga ya zama dole ya fayyace asalin kasar Morain: "Amma ku .. duk da haka Faransanci ne". Sau da yawa ana ambaton bayanin rashin amincewar Morain lokacin da aka tattauna Pierre Morain: "A'a, ni ba Faransanci ba ne. Ni ma'aikaci ne". Lokacin da aka kama shi a ranar 29 ga Mayu 1955 (ko 29 ga Yuni 1955: majiyoyi sun bambanta) Morain ya zama dan gwagwarmaya na Faransa na farko da aka tura gidan yari saboda goyon bayan 'yancin kai na Aljeriya . [1] [2] [3]

Pierre Morain (12 ga Afrilu 1930 - 27 ga Mayu 2013) ma'aikacin gini ne, ƙwararren ɗan ƙwadago, ɗan gurguzu mai fafutuka kuma ɗan gwagwarmaya akan 'yan mulkin mallaka. Don mafi yawan dalilai za a yi la'akari da shi Bafaranshe. Duk da haka, a lokacin da ya fuskanci shari'a dangane da labarin jaridar da ya rubuta yana adawa da matsayin gwamnati game da yakin Aljeriya, shugaban kotun ya lura cewa waɗanda suke tuhumarsa guda goma sha tara duk 'yan Algeria ne kuma ya ga ya zama dole ya fayyace asalin ƙasar Morain: "Amma ku .. duk da haka Faransanci ne". Sau da yawa ana ambaton bayanin rashin amincewar Morain lokacin da aka tattauna Pierre Morain: "A'a, ni ba ɗan Faransa ba ne. Ni ma'aikaci ne". Lokacin da aka kama shi a ranar 29 ga watan Mayu 1955 (ko 29 ga Yuni 1955: majiyoyi sun bambanta) Morain ya zama ɗan gwagwarmaya na Faransa na farko da aka tura gidan yari saboda goyon bayan 'yancin kai na Aljeriya. [1] [2] [3]

items.sourceText: In 1974, he and Joaquim Pinto de Andrade broke away from the MPLA and formed the Activa Revolt.[2] This faction later rejoined the MPLA.

targets.targetText: A cikin 1974, shi da Joaquim Pinto de Andrade sun balle daga MPLA kuma suka kafa Activa Revolt . [1] Daga baya wannan bangaren ya koma MPLA.
A cikin shekarar 1974, shi da Joaquim Pinto de Andrade sun ɓalle daga MPLA kuma suka kafa Activa Revolt. [1] Daga baya wannan ɓangaren ya koma MPLA.

items.sourceText: In 1955, he took part in the founding of the Angolan Communist Party. In 1956, he was the founder of the Popular Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA) and was elected its first President in 1960.[1] His brother, Joaquim Pinto de Andrade, was made the MPLA's first honorary President.[1]

targets.targetText: A 1955, ya shiga cikin kafa jam'iyyar gurguzu ta Angola . A cikin 1956, shi ne ya kafa Popular Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA) kuma an zabe shi shugabanta na farko a 1960. [1] Dan uwansa, Joaquim Pinto de Andrade, an yi shi ne shugaban girmamawa na farko na MPLA. [1]

A shekara ta 1955, ya shiga cikin kafa jam'iyyar gurguzu ta Angola. A cikin shekarar 1956, shi ne ya kafa Popular Movement for the Liberation of Angola (MPLA) kuma an zaɓe shi shugabanta na farko a shekarar 1960. [1] Ɗan uwansa, Joaquim Pinto de Andrade, an yi shi ne shugaban girmamawa na farko na MPLA. [1]

items.sourceText: The United States of Africa is a concept of a federation of some or all of the 54 sovereign states and two disputed states on the continent of Africa. The concept takes its origin from Marcus Garvey's 1924 poem "Hail, United States of Africa".[1][2][3] Kwame Nkrumah was the most prominent African political leader who passionately championed the idea of a Union of African States with a unified African Government, as he envisioned an African government that could drive the continent forward.[4][5]

targets.targetText: Taraiyar Kasashen Afirka ra'ayi ce ta tarayyar wasu ko duka daga cikin ƙasashe 54 masu cin gashin kansu da ƙasashe biyu da ake takaddama a Nahiyar Afirka . Tunanin ya samo asali ne daga waƙar Marcus Garvey ta 1924 mai suna "Hail, United States of Africa". [1] [2] [3] Kwame Nkrumah ya kasance fitaccen shugaban siyasar Afirka da ya yi kishi da ra'ayin samar da hadin kan kasashen Afirka tare da hadaddiyar gwamnatin Afirka, yayin da yake hasashen gwamnatin Afirka da za ta iya ciyar da nahiyar gaba. [4] [5]

Ƙasar Amirka ta Afirka ra'ayi ce ta tarayyar wasu ko duka daga cikin ƙasashe 54 masu cin gashin kansu da ƙasashe biyu da ake takaddama a Nahiyar Afirka . Tunanin ya samo asali ne daga waƙar Marcus Garvey ta 1924 mai suna "Hail, United States of Africa". [1] [2] [3] Kwame Nkrumah ya kasance fitaccen shugaban siyasar Afirka da ya yi kishi da ra'ayin samar da hadin kan kasashen Afirka tare da hadaddiyar gwamnatin Afirka, yayin da yake hasashen gwamnatin Afirka da za ta iya ciyar da nahiyar gaba. [4] [5]

items.sourceText: Deolinda Rodrigues Francisco de Almeida (nom de guerre Langidila;[1] 10 February 1939 – 1968) was an Angolan revolutionary, writer, and poet. She was a member of the Movimento Popular de Libertação de Angola (MPLA, transl. 'People's Movement for the Liberation of Angola') and, in addition to seeing combat, worked for the organisation as a translator, educator, and radio host.

targets.targetText: Deolinda Rodrigues Francisco de Almeida (nom de guerre Langidila; [1] 10 Fabrairu 1939 - 1968) 'yar juyin juya halin Angola ce, marubuciya, kuma mawaƙiya. Ta kasance memba a Movimento Popular de Libertação de Angola (MPLA, transl. 'Ƙungiyar Jama'a da kwato 'Yancin Angola') kuma, ban da ganin yaƙi, ta yi aiki da ƙungiyar a matsayin mai fassara, malama, da mai watsa shirye-shiryen rediyo.

Deolinda Rodrigues Francisco de Almeida ( nom de guerre Langidila ; [1] 10 Fabrairu 1939 - 1968) ɗan juyin juya halin Angola ne, marubuci, kuma mawaƙi. Ta kasance memba a Movimento Popular de Libertação de Angola (MPLA, transl. 'Ƙungiyar Jama'a don 'Yancin Angola') kuma, ban da ganin yaƙi, ta yi aiki da ƙungiyar a matsayin mai fassara, malami, da mai watsa shirye-shiryen rediyo.

items.sourceText: Rodrigues attended elementary school at the Escola da Missão Evangélica (transl. 'Evangelical Mission School') and high school at the Liceu Salvador Correia (transl. 'Salvador Correia High School'), where she studied Germanic languages. In 1956, as a teenager, she began working as a translator and organizer for the MPLA, and by 1958, she had joined the United Methodist Youth, writing poetry for the Methodist periodical O Estandarte (transl. 'The Banner').[3] During the late 1950s, however, she began to question the paternal attitude of both the government and the church.[5]

targets.targetText: Rodrigues ya halarci makarantar firamare a Escola da Missão Evangélica ( transl. 'Makarantar Ofishin Jakadancin bishara') da makarantar sakandare a Liceu Salvador Correia ( transl. 'Salvador Correia High School'), inda ta yi karatun harsunan Jamusanci . A shekara ta 1956, tun tana matashiya, ta fara aiki a matsayin mai fassara kuma mai shiryawa MPLA, kuma a shekara ta 1958, ta shiga United Methodist Youth, ta rubuta wakoki na Methodist periodical O Estandarte ( transl. 'The Banner'). [ 3 ] A ƙarshen 1950s, duk da haka, ta fara tambayar halin uba na gwamnati da coci. [ 5 ]

Rodrigues ta halarci makarantar firamare a Escola da Missão Evangélica (transl. 'Makarantar Ofishin Jakadancin bishara') da makarantar sakandare a Liceu Salvador Correia (transl. 'Salvador Correia High School'), inda ta yi karatun harsunan Jamusanci. A shekara ta 1956, tun tana matashiya, ta fara aiki a matsayin mai fassara kuma mai shiryawa MPLA, kuma a shekara ta 1958, ta shiga United Methodist Youth, ta rubuta wakoki na Methodist periodical O Estandarte (transl. 'The Banner'). [ 3 ] A ƙarshen 1950s, duk da haka, ta fara tambayar halin uba na gwamnati da coci. [ 5 ]

items.sourceText: Um Nyobè, known as the forgotten father of Cameroon, was born in 1913 in Song Mpeck, Kamerun. At the time, Kamerun was a German colony and was divided after World War I between France and the United Kingdom. Um Nyobè came from a family in an agricultural region of Bassa. His father was a traditional priest in their village, where they practiced animism as a form of religion. Um Nyobè, was deemed Christian by many who knew him and acquired his Christian name Ruben after he was baptized. Um Nyobè was educated in Presbyterian schools in the part of the country occupied by France and learned to speak French, Bassa, Bulu, and Do. At the age of 26, he completed his baccalaureate degree at a university in Edea. Shortly after completing his degree, he married his wife, Martha. After his university studies in 1944, he stayed in the city of Edea to pursue his passion in law.

targets.targetText: Um Nyobè, wanda aka fi sani da Uban Kamaru da aka manta, an haife shi a shekara ta 1913 a Song Mpeck, Kamerun. A lokacin, Kamerun wani yanki ne na Jamus kuma ya rabu bayan yakin duniya na ɗaya tsakanin Faransa da Birtaniya. Um Nyobè ya fito daga dangi a yankin noma na Bassa. Mahaifinsa limamin gargajiya ne a ƙauyen su, inda suke aiwatar da raye-raye a matsayin nau'in addini. Um Nyobè, mutane da yawa sun san shi Kirista ne kuma suka sami sunansa na Kirista Ruben bayan ya yi baftisma. Um Nyobè ya yi karatu a makarantun Presbyterian da ke yankin ƙasar da Faransa ta mamaye kuma ya koyi Faransanci, Bassa, Bulu, da Do. Yana da shekaru 26, ya kammala digirinsa na biyu a jami'a da ke Edea. Ba da daɗewa ba bayan ya kammala digiri, ya auri matarsa, Martha. Bayan kammala karatunsa na jami'a a shekara ta 1944, ya zauna a birnin Edea don ci gaba da sha'awar shari'a.

Um Nyobè, wanda aka fi sani da mahaifin Kamaru da aka manta, an haife shi a shekara ta 1913 a Song Mpeck, Kamerun. A lokacin, Kamerun wani yanki ne na Jamus kuma ya rabu bayan yakin duniya na daya tsakanin Faransa da Birtaniya . Um Nyobè ta fito daga dangi a yankin noma na Bassa. Mahaifinsa limamin gargajiya ne a ƙauyen su, inda suke aiwatar da raye-raye a matsayin nau'in addini. Um Nyobè, mutane da yawa sun san shi Kirista ne kuma suka sami sunansa na Kirista Ruben bayan ya yi baftisma. Um Nyobè ta yi karatu a makarantun Presbyterian da ke yankin ƙasar da Faransa ta mamaye kuma ta koyi Faransanci, Bassa, Bulu, da Do. Yana da shekaru 26, ya kammala digirinsa na biyu a jami'a da ke Edea. Ba da daɗewa ba bayan ya kammala digiri, ya auri matarsa, Martha. Bayan kammala karatunsa na jami'a a shekara ta 1944, ya zauna a birnin Edea don ci gaba da sha'awar shari'a.

items.sourceText: Um Nyobè was initiated into the Confédération générale du travail (CGT), a union that fought against the partition of Cameroon into Anglophone and Francophone regions in 1947. Due to the efforts of CGT, Um Nyobè and the members of the CGT began spreading the message of independence and denouncing the Catholic religion that justified and advocated for colonization and slavery. His efforts managed to unite diverse ethnic groups to join the resistance against the French. He was named "Mpodol Ion", which meant speaker of the nation or spokesman in the native language of the people of Bassa. His friends called him Mpodol, which meant "prophet", due to the belief that it was a biblical mandate for him to lead and speak as their prophet.[2]

targets.targetText: An fara Um Nyobè a cikin Confédération générale du travail (CGT), ƙungiyar da ta yi yaƙi da raba Kamaru zuwa yankuna masu magana da Ingilishi da Faransanci a cikin shekarar 1947. Saboda kokarin CGT, Um Nyobè da membobin CGT sun fara yaɗa sakon 'yancin kai da kuma sukar addinin Katolika wanda ya tabbatar da kuma ba da shawara ga mulkin mallaka da bautar bayi. Koƙarinta ya sami nasarar haɗa kan ƙabilun daban-daban don shiga cikin tawaye da Faransa. An kira shi "Mpodol Ion", wanda ke nufin mai magana da yawun ƙasar ko mai magana da shi a cikin yaren mutanen Bassa. Abokansa sun kira shi Mpodol, wanda ke nufin "annabi", saboda imanin cewa umarni ne na Littafi Mai-Tsarki a gare shi ya jagoranci kuma ya yi magana a matsayin annabin su.[1]

An fara Um Nyobè a cikin Confédération générale du travail (CGT), ƙungiyar da ta yi yaƙi da raba Kamaru zuwa yankuna masu magana da Ingilishi da Faransanci a cikin 1947. Saboda kokarin CGT, Um Nyobè da membobin CGT sun fara yada sakon 'yancin kai da kuma sukar addinin Katolika wanda ya tabbatar da kuma ba da shawara ga mulkin mallaka da bautar. Kokarinta ya sami nasarar haɗa kan kabilun daban-daban don shiga cikin juriya da Faransanci. An kira shi "Mpodol Ion", wanda ke nufin mai magana da yawun kasar ko mai magana da shi a cikin yaren mutanen Bassa. Abokansa sun kira shi Mpodol, wanda ke nufin "annabi", saboda imanin cewa umarni ne na Littafi Mai-Tsarki a gare shi ya jagoranci kuma ya yi magana a matsayin annabin su.[1]

items.sourceText: Manuela was born in Quito, Viceroyalty of New Granada, the illegitimate child of Maria Joaquina Aizpuru from Ecuador and the married Spanish nobleman Simón Sáenz de Vergara y Yedra (or Sáenz y Verega). Her mother was abandoned by her modest family as a result of the pregnancy and her father paid for young "Manuelita" to go to school at the Convent of Santa Catalina where she learned to read and write. While there, she encountered a microcosm of the Spanish colonial caste system, with white nuns ruling over a large group of mestiza and native servants and maids. She kept in contact with the upper class nuns of Santa Catalina for much of the rest of her life, and they provided counsel to her. She was forced to leave the convent at the age of seventeen, allegedly because she was discovered to have been seduced by army officer Fausto D'Elhuyar, the son of Fausto Elhuyar and nephew of Juan José Elhuyar, who were the co-discoverers of tungsten.[2]

targets.targetText: An haifi Manuela a Quito, Viceroyalty na New Granada, 'yar cikin shege na Maria Joaquina Aizpuru daga Ekwador kuma 'yar ƙasar Sipaniya mai aure Simón Sáenz de Vergara y Yedra (ko Sáenz y Verega). Mahaifiyarta ta kasance danginta masu tawali'u sun watsar da ita sakamakon ciki kuma mahaifinta ya biya matashin "Manuelita" don zuwa makaranta a Convent of Santa Catalina inda ta koyi karatu da rubutu. Yayin da take can, ta ci karo da wani microcosm na tsarin mulkin mallaka na Spaniya, tare da fararen nuns da ke mulki a kan babban ruƙuni na mestiza da bayi na asali da kuyangi. Ta ci gaba da tuntuɓar manyan malamai na Santa Catalina har tsawon rayuwarta, kuma sun yi mata nasiha. An tilasta mata barin gidan zuhudu tana da shekaru goma sha bakwai, saboda an gano cewa jami'in soja Fausto D'Elhuyar, ɗan Fausto Elhuyar kuma ɗan'uwan Juan José Elhuyar, sun yi lalata da ita. [1]

An haifi Manuela a Quito, Viceroyalty na New Granada, ɗan shege na Maria Joaquina Aizpuru daga Ekwador kuma ɗan ƙasar Sipaniya mai aure Simón Sáenz de Vergara y Yedra (ko Sáenz y Verega). Mahaifiyarta ta kasance danginta masu tawali'u sun watsar da ita sakamakon ciki kuma mahaifinta ya biya matashin "Manuelita" don zuwa makaranta a Convent of Santa Catalina inda ta koyi karatu da rubutu. Yayin da yake can, ta ci karo da wani microcosm na tsarin mulkin mallaka na Mutanen Espanya, tare da fararen nuns da ke mulki a kan babban rukuni na mestiza da bayi na asali da kuyangi. Ta ci gaba da tuntuɓar manyan malamai na Santa Catalina har tsawon rayuwarta, kuma sun yi mata nasiha. An tilasta mata barin gidan zuhudu tana da shekaru goma sha bakwai, saboda an gano cewa jami'in soja Fausto D'Elhuyar, ɗan Fausto Elhuyar kuma ɗan'uwan Juan José Elhuyar, sun yi lalata da ita . [1]

items.sourceText: From 31 August 1970 until his deposition by coup d'état on 13 January 1972, Akufo-Addo was President of Ghana in the Second Republic. Real power rested with the prime minister, Dr Kofi Abrefa Busia. On 17 July 1979, Akufo-Addo died of natural causes.[8]

targets.targetText: Daga ranar 31 ga watan Agustan 1970 har zuwa lokacin da aka hambarar da shi ta hanyar juyin mulki a ranar 13 ga watan Janairun 1972, Akufo-Addo ya kasance shugaban ƙasar Ghana a jamhuriya ta biyu. Iko na gaske ya rataya ne a hannun Firayim Minista, Dr Kofi Abrefa Busia. A ranar 17 ga watan Yuli 1979, Akufo-Addo ya mutu saboda dalilai na halitta. [1]

Daga ranar 31 ga Agustan 1970 har zuwa lokacin da aka hambarar da shi ta hanyar juyin mulki a ranar 13 ga Janairun 1972, Akufo-Addo ya kasance shugaban kasar Ghana a jamhuriya ta biyu. Iko na gaske ya rataya ne a hannun Firayim Minista, Dr Kofi Abrefa Busia . A ranar 17 ga Yuli 1979, Akufo-Addo ya mutu saboda dalilai na halitta. [1]

items.sourceText: Woode met Kwame Nkrumah when Nkrumah arrived in the Gold Coast from Britain in December 1948 to take up the role of General Secretary of the United Gold Coast Convention. Political differences began to emerge within the convention, leading to younger members breaking away to form the Convention People's Party (CPP) in June 1949. Nkrumah became the chairman, Komla Agbeli Gbedemah the vice-chairman, and Kojo Botsio secretary of the CPP.[2] Woode joined the Sekondi branch of the CPP. He was elected General Secretary of the Trades Union Congress (TUC) in August 1949,[2] aged just 23.[3] Pobee Biney, who became a close friend and associate of Woode, was elected Vice-President and together they forged the radical nationalist tendency, along with several others, in both the TUC and CPP. Woode helped negotiate with the miners' union.[4][page needed]

targets.targetText: Woode ya gana da Kwame Nkrumah lokacin da Nkrumah ya isa gabar tekun Gold daga Biritaniya a watan Disamba na 1948 don ya zama babban sakataren Majalisar Dinkin Duniya . Bambance-bambancen siyasa sun fara fitowa a cikin taron, wanda ya haifar da ƙananan mambobin da suka rabu don kafa Jam'iyyar Jama'a (CPP) a watan Yuni 1949. Nkrumah ya zama shugaba, Komla Agbeli Gbedemah mataimakin shugaba, da Kojo Botsio sakataren CPP. [1] Woode ya shiga reshen Sekondi na CPP. An zabe shi Babban Sakatare na Kungiyar Kwadago (TUC) a watan Agusta 1949, [2] yana da shekaru 23 kawai. [3] Pobee Biney, wanda ya zama aboki na kud-da-kud kuma abokin tarayya na Woode, an zaɓe shi a matsayin mataimakin shugaban ƙasa kuma tare suka ƙirƙiri ɗabi'ar kishin ƙasa, tare da wasu da dama, a cikin TUC da CPP. Woode ya taimaka wajen yin shawarwari da ƙungiyar masu hakar ma'adinai . [4] [ shafi ake bukata ]

Bambance-bambancen siyasa sun fara fitowa a cikin taron, wanda ya haifar da ƙananan mambobin da suka rabu don kafa Jam'iyyar Jama'a (CPP) a watan Yuni 1949. [3] Pobee Biney, wanda ya zama aboki na kud-da-kud kuma abokin tarayya na Woode, an zaɓe shi a matsayin mataimakin shugaban ƙasa kuma tare suka ƙirƙiri ɗabi'ar kishin ƙasa, tare da wasu da dama, a cikin TUC da CPP. Woode ya taimaka wajen yin shawarwari da ƙungiyar masu hakar ma'adinai. [4]  [ shafi ake bukata ]

items.sourceText: In 1949 Kaunda entered politics and became the founding member of the Northern Rhodesian African National Congress.[13] On 11 November 1953 he moved to Lusaka to take up the post of Secretary General of the Africa National Congress (ANC), under the presidency of Harry Nkumbula.[2] The combined efforts of Kaunda and Nkumbula failed to mobilise native African peoples against the European-dominated Federation of Rhodesia and Nyasaland.[7] In 1955 Kaunda and Nkumbula were imprisoned for two months with hard labour for distributing subversive literature.[7][14] The two leaders drifted apart as Nkumbula became increasingly influenced by white liberals[15] and failing to defend indigenous Africans, Kaunda led a dissident group to Nkumbula that eventually broke with the ANC and founded his own party, the Zambian African National Congress (ZANC) in October 1958.[7][15] ZANC was banned in March 1959 and in Kaunda was sentenced to nine months' imprisonment, which he spent first in Lusaka, then in Salisbury.[16][7]

targets.targetText: A shekarar 1949 Kaunda ya shiga siyasa kuma ya zama memba na Arewacin Rhodesian African National Congress. [1] A ranar 11 ga watan Nuwamba 1953 ya koma Lusaka don ya zama babban sakataren jam'iyyar ANC, ƙarƙashin shugabancin Harry Nkumbula. [2] Ƙoƙarin haɗin gwiwar Kaunda da Nkumbula sun ƙasa jawo ’yan asalin Afirka don adawa da Tarayyar Rhodesia da Nyasaland da Turawa suka mamaye. [2] A cikin shekarar 1955 Kaunda da Nkumbula an ɗaure su na tsawon watanni biyu tare da aiki tuƙuru don rarraba littattafai masu ɓarna. [2] [3] Shugabannin biyu sun rabu yayin da Nkumbula ya ƙara samun rinjaye daga masu sassaucin ra'ayi masu sassaucin ra'ayi [4] kuma ya ƙasa kare 'yan asalin Afirka, Kaunda ya jagoranci wata ƙungiya mai banƙyama zuwa Nkumbula wanda a ƙarshe ya rabu da ANC kuma ya kafa nasa jam'iyyar, Zambian African National Congress (ZANC) a watan Oktoba 1958. [2] [4] An dakatar da ZANC a cikin watan Maris 1959 kuma a Kaunda an yanke masa hukuncin ɗaurin watanni tara, wanda ya yi a farko a Lusaka, sannan a Salisbury. [5] [2]

A 1949 Kaunda ya shiga siyasa kuma ya zama memba na Arewacin Rhodesian African National Congress . [2] Ƙoƙarin haɗin gwiwar Kaunda da Nkumbula sun kasa jawo ’yan asalin Afirka don adawa da Tarayyar Rhodesia da Nyasaland da Turawa suka mamaye . [2] A cikin 1955 Kaunda da Nkumbula an daure su na tsawon watanni biyu tare da aiki tuƙuru don rarraba littattafai masu ɓarna. [2] [3] Shugabannin biyu sun rabu yayin da Nkumbula ya ƙara samun rinjaye daga masu sassaucin ra'ayi masu sassaucin ra'ayi [4] kuma ya kasa kare 'yan asalin Afirka, Kaunda ya jagoranci wata ƙungiya mai banƙyama zuwa Nkumbula wanda a ƙarshe ya rabu da ANC kuma ya kafa nasa jam'iyyar, Zambian African National Congress (ZANC) a watan Oktoba 1958. [2] [4] An dakatar da ZANC a cikin Maris 1959 kuma a Kaunda an yanke masa hukuncin daurin watanni tara, wanda ya yi a farko a Lusaka, sannan a Salisbury . [5] [2]

items.sourceText: Excluded from the PSD during the 1970s,[6] Hassib Ben Ammar resigned from his political posts in order to participate with Ahmed Mestiri in building the nascent opposition movement emerging from the Movement of Socialist Democrats (MDS / Mouvement des démocrates socialistes ).[2] In 1977, he was also a co-founder of the Tunisian Human Rights League,[5] becoming an honorary president of this association.

targets.targetText: An cire shi daga PSD a cikin 1970s, [1] Hassib Ben Ammar ya yi murabus daga mukamansa na siyasa don shiga tare da Ahmed Mestiri wajen gina ƙungiyar adawa da ta fito daga Movement of Socialist Democrats (MDS / Mouvement des démocrates socialistes ) . [2] A cikin 1977, ya kasance kuma wanda ya kafa Kungiyar Kare Hakkokin Dan Adam ta Tunisiya, [2] ya zama shugaban girmamawa na wannan ƙungiya.

An cire shi daga PSD a cikin shekarar 1970s, [1] Hassib Ben Ammar ya yi murabus daga muƙamansa na siyasa don shiga tare da Ahmed Mestiri wajen gina ƙungiyar adawa da ta fito daga Movement of Socialist Democrats (MDS/Mouvement des démocrates socialistes) . [2] A cikin shekarar 1977, ya kasance kuma wanda ya kafa Kungiyar Kare Hakkokin Ɗan Adam ta Tunisiya, [2] ya zama shugaban girmamawa na wannan ƙungiya.

items.sourceText: He was also president of the "Committee of Freedoms" (sometimes known as the "National Council for Public Freedoms"[7][8]) which originated as a demand for respect of civil liberties, and for a conference on freedoms and human rights.[9] The demand was signed by 528 intellectuals (university teachers, doctors, lawyers etc.)[4] and distributed in April 1977.[10] Ben Ammar undertook an overseas tour to invite foreign Human Rights organisations to participate.[10] The conference itself, despite being forbidden, eventually took place on 9 June 1977. It took place not in the Hotel Africa as planned,[8] but in the main concourse of Tunis–Carthage International Airport. One high-profile participant was United States Attorney General Ramsey Clark.[8]

targets.targetText: Har ila yau, ya kasance shugaban "Kwamitin 'Yanci" (wani lokaci ana kiransa "Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya don 'Yancin Jama'a" [1] [2] ) wanda ya samo asali ne a matsayin buƙatar mutunta 'yancin ɗan adam, da kuma taron kan 'yanci da 'yancin ɗan adam. [3] Masu ilimi 528 (malaman jami'a, likitoci, lauyoyi da sauransu) ne suka sanya hannu kan buƙatar [4] kuma aka rarraba a cikin watan Afrilu 1977. [5] Ben Ammar ya gudanar da rangadi a ƙasashen waje don gayyatar kungiyoyin kare hakkin bil'adama na ƙasashen waje don shiga. [5] Taron da kansa, duk da haramcinsa, a ƙarshe ya faru a ranar 9 ga watan Yuni 1977. Ba a cikin Otal ɗin Afirka kamar yadda aka tsara ba, [2] amma a cikin babban taron filin jirgin sama na Tunis-Carthage. Babban ɗan takara ɗaya shine Atoni-Janar na Amurka Ramsey Clark. [2]

Har ila yau, ya kasance shugaban "Kwamitin 'Yanci" (wani lokaci ana kiransa "Majalisar Dinkin Duniya don 'Yancin Jama'a" [1] [2] ) wanda ya samo asali ne a matsayin bukatar mutunta 'yancin ɗan adam, da kuma taron kan 'yanci da 'yancin ɗan adam. [3] Masu ilimi 528 (malaman jami'a, likitoci, lauyoyi da sauransu) ne suka sanya hannu kan buƙatar [4] kuma aka rarraba a cikin Afrilu 1977. [5] Ben Ammar ya gudanar da rangadi a kasashen waje don gayyatar kungiyoyin kare hakkin bil'adama na kasashen waje don shiga. [5] Taron da kansa, duk da haramcinsa, a ƙarshe ya faru a ranar 9 ga Yuni 1977. Ba a cikin Otal ɗin Afirka kamar yadda aka tsara ba, [2] amma a cikin babban taron filin jirgin sama na Tunis-Carthage . Babban ɗan takara ɗaya shine Atoni-Janar na Amurka Ramsey Clark . [2]

items.sourceText: In 1977 Ben Ammar launched Tunisia's first independent newspaper, Erraï (Opinion),[1] which he described as "a contribution to the spreading of democratic ideas".

targets.targetText: A cikin 1977 Ben Ammar ya kaddamar da jarida mai zaman kanta ta farko ta Tunisia, Erraï ( Ra'ayi ), [1] wanda ya bayyana a matsayin "gudumawa ga yada ra'ayoyin dimokuradiyya".
A cikin shekarar 1977 Ben Ammar ya kaddamar da jarida mai zaman kanta ta farko ta Tunisia, Erraï (Ra'ayi), [1] wanda ya bayyana a matsayin "gudumawa ga yaɗa ra'ayoyin Dimokuraɗiyya".

items.sourceText: In December 1987, a few weeks after President Zine El Abidine Ben Ali came to power, Ben Ammar closed down Erraï.[12] Sources close to the newspaper claimed that the new President was enraged by the publication of an article by Oum Zied entitled "The drift towards authoritarianism of the Ben Ali régime,"[12][13] banned the edition containing the article and launched a campaign of intimidation against Ben Ammar, which allegedly forced him to put an end to the publication.[12]

targets.targetText: A cikin Disamba 1987, 'yan makonni bayan Shugaba Zine El Abidine Ben Ali ya hau kan karagar mulki, Ben Ammar ya rufe Eraï . [1] Majiyoyin da ke kusa da jaridar sun yi iƙirarin cewa sabon shugaban ya fusata da buga wani labarin da Oum Zied ya wallafa mai take "The drift towards authoritarianism of the Ben Ali régime," [1] [2] ya haramta fitowar da ke ɗauke da labarin tare da kaddamar da wani yaƙin neman zaɓe ga Ben Ammar, wanda ake zargin ya tilasta masa kawo ƙarshen wallafar. [1]

A cikin watan Disamba 1987, 'yan makonni bayan Shugaba Zine El Abidine Ben Ali ya hau kan ƙaragar mulki, Ben Ammar ya rufe Eraï. [1] Majiyoyin da ke kusa da jaridar sun yi iƙirarin cewa sabon shugaban ya fusata da buga wani labarin da Oum Zied ya wallafa mai take "The drift towards authoritarianism of the Ben Ali régime," [1] [2] ya haramta fitowar da ke ɗauke da labarin tare da kaddamar da wani yaƙin neman zaɓe ga Ben Ammar, wanda ake zargin ya tilasta masa kawo ƙarshen wallafar. [1]

items.sourceText: Also at the end of 1987, on December 15, the president appointed him to membership of the recently established Constitutional Council [fr]. Additionally, at this time he was a co-founder with the support of Ben Ali of "The Arab Institute of Human Rights", which was based in Tunis[1] and of which he became the first president.[14]

targets.targetText: Haka kuma a karshen shekarar 1987, a ranar 15 ga watan Disamba, shugaban kasar ya nada shi zama memba a Constitutional Council da aka kafa kwanan nan. . Bugu da ƙari, a wannan lokacin ya kasance mai haɗin gwiwa tare da goyon bayan Ben Ali na "Cibiyar Kare Hakkokin Bil'adama ta Larabawa", wanda ke da tushe a Tunis [1] kuma wanda ya zama shugaban farko. [2]

Haka kuma a ƙarshen shekarar 1987, a ranar 15 ga watan Disamba, shugaban ƙasar ya naɗa shi zama memba a Constitutional Council da aka kafa kwanan nan. . Bugu da ƙari, a wannan lokacin ya kasance mai haɗin gwiwa tare da goyon bayan Ben Ali na "Cibiyar Kare Hakkokin Bil'adama ta Larabawa", wacce ke da tushe a Tunis [1] kuma wanda ya zama shugaban farko. [2]

items.sourceText: Between 1994 and 1995 Ben Ammar served on the Committee of the United Nations Convention against Torture.[15] The President also appointed him to the Higher Committee on Human Rights and Fundamental Liberties, and he has served on the board of the Association for the Prevention of Torture.[2]

targets.targetText: Tsakanin shekarun 1994 zuwa 1995 Ben Ammar ya yi aiki a kwamitin Majalisar Ɗinkin Duniya na Yaki da azabtarwa. [1] Shugaban ya kuma naɗa shi a babban kwamitin kare hakkin ɗan Adam da ’yancin walwala, kuma ya yi aiki a kwamitin kungiyar da ke yaki da azabtarwa. [2]

Tsakanin 1994 zuwa 1995 Ben Ammar ya yi aiki a kwamitin Majalisar Dinkin Duniya na Yaki da azabtarwa . [1] Shugaban ya kuma nada shi a babban kwamitin kare hakkin dan Adam da ’yancin walwala, kuma ya yi aiki a kwamitin kungiyar da ke yaki da azabtarwa. [2]

items.sourceText: Bibi Titi Mohammed was a key person for the creation of TANU (Tanganyika African National Union), which became the major political party in Tanzania. Mohammed's involvement began when she met Julius Nyerere, who would eventually become the first president. Mohammed and other women like Sofia Kawawa were able to hold positions of leadership with TANU, mostly due to Nyerere's belief in gender equality. Giving women visibility was a major priority of Nyerere's policy, giving Mohammed the platform she needed. Bibi Titi Mohammed was the leader of the women's wing of TANU, called Umoja wa Wanawake wa Tanzania (UWT). This organization was key in promoting the beliefs and ideals of TANU. UWT also was an important tool in uniting women throughout Tanzania.

targets.targetText: Bibi Titi Mohammed ta kasance babban mutum don ƙirƙirar TANU ( Tanganyika African National Union ), wadda ta zama babbar jam'iyyar siyasa a Tanzaniya. Shiga Mohammed ya fara ne lokacin da ta sadu da Julius Nyerere, wanda zai zama shugaban kasa na farko. Mohammed da sauran mata kamar Sofia Kawawa sun sami damar rike mukaman shugabanci tare da TANU, galibi saboda imanin Nyerere na daidaiton jinsi. Bayar da ganin mata shine babban fifikon manufofin Nyerere, inda ya baiwa Mohammed tsarin da take bukata. Bibi Titi Mohammed ita ce shugabar reshen mata ta TANU, mai suna Umoja wa Wanawake wa Tanzania (UWT). Wannan ƙungiyar ta kasance mabuɗin don haɓaka imani da manufofin TANU. UWT kuma ta kasance muhimmin kayan aiki wajen haɗa kan mata a duk faɗin Tanzaniya.

Bibi Titi Mohammed ta kasance babbar mace don ƙirƙirar TANU ( Tanganyika African National Union ), wacce ta zama babbar jam'iyyar siyasa a Tanzaniya. Shigar Bibi Mohammed ya fara ne lokacin da ta haɗu da Julius Nyerere, wanda zai zama shugaban ƙasa na farko. Mohammed da sauran mata kamar Sofia Kawawa sun sami damar riƙe muƙaman shugabanci tare da TANU, galibi saboda imanin Nyerere na daidaiton jinsi. Bayar da ganin mata shine babban fifikon manufofin Nyerere, inda ya baiwa Bibi Mohammed tsarin da take buƙata. Bibi Titi Mohammed ita ce shugabar reshen mata ta TANU, mai suna Umoja wa Wanawake wa Tanzania (UWT). Wannan ƙungiyar ta kasance mabuɗin don haɓaka imani da manufofin TANU. UWT kuma ta kasance muhimmin kayan aiki wajen haɗa kan mata a duk faɗin Tanzaniya.

items.sourceText: In the 1967 presidential election, Aden was defeated by Abdirashid Ali Shermarke, his former Prime Minister. His term as president ended on July 6, 1967. Aden accepted the loss graciously, making history as the first head of state in Africa (excluding Liberia) to peacefully hand over power to a democratically elected successor.[7]

targets.targetText: A zaben shugaban kasa na 1967, Aden ya sha kaye a hannun Abdirashid Ali Shermarke, tsohon Firayim Minista. Wa'adinsa na shugaban kasa ya kare a ranar 6 ga Yuli, 1967. Aden ya amince da rashi da alheri, inda ya kafa tarihi a matsayinsa na shugaban kasa na farko a Afirka (ban da Laberiya) da ya mika mulki cikin lumana ga zababben zababben shugaban kasa ta hanyar demokradiyya. [1]

A zaben shugaban ƙasa na shekarar 1967, Aden ya sha kaye a hannun Abdirashid Ali Shermarke, tsohon Firayim Minista. Wa'adinsa na shugaban ƙasa ya kare a ranar 6 ga watan Yuli, 1967. Aden ya amince da rashi da alheri, inda ya kafa tarihi a matsayinsa na shugaban ƙasa na farko a Afirka (ban da Laberiya) da ya miƙa mulki cikin lumana ga zaɓaɓɓen shugaban ƙasa ta hanyar demokradiyya. [1]

items.sourceText: On 22 May 2007, it was erroneously reported that he had died in a hospital in Nairobi, Kenya. He was, however, in critical condition and on life support. Daar died in hospital on 8 June 2007, at the age of 98.[11][12][13]

targets.targetText: A ranar 22 ga Mayu 2007, an ba da rahoton kuskuren cewa ya mutu a wani asibiti a Nairobi, Kenya . Ya kasance, duk da haka, yana cikin mawuyacin hali kuma yana kan tallafin rayuwa . Daar ya mutu a asibiti a ranar 8 ga Yuni 2007, yana da shekaru 98. [1] [2] [3]

A ranar 22 ga watan Mayu 2007, an ba da rahoton kuskuren cewa ya mutu a wani asibiti a Nairobi, Kenya. Ya kasance, duk da haka, yana cikin mawuyacin hali kuma yana kan tallafin rayuwa. Daar ya mutu a asibiti a ranar 8 ga watan Yuni 2007, yana da shekaru 98. [1] [2] [3]

items.sourceText: During 1970 Josina began to suffer from stomach pains and weakness. She traveled to Moscow for medical attention. The apparent diagnosis was liver cancer. Rest and a strict diet were recommended, but Josina returned to her duties with FRELIMO. At the end of the year, she left Samito with a friend and undertook a two-month trip, largely on foot, through Niassa Province to assess conditions and plan activities for the Department of Social Affairs.

targets.targetText: A cikin shekarar 1970 Josina ta fara fama da ciwon ciki da rauni. Ta yi tafiya zuwa Moscow don kula da lafiya. Abinda aka gano shine ciwon hanta. An ba da shawarar hutawa da abinci mai tsauri, amma Josina ta koma aikinta tare da FRELIMO. A karshen shekara ta bar Samito tare da wata ƙawarta kuma ta yi tafiya ta tsawon watanni biyu, galibi da ƙafa, ta Lardin Niassa don tantance yanayi da tsara ayyuka na Sashen Harkokin Jama'a.

A cikin 1970 Josina ya fara fama da ciwon ciki da rauni. Ta yi tafiya zuwa Moscow don kula da lafiya. Abinda aka gano shine ciwon hanta. An ba da shawarar hutawa da abinci mai tsauri, amma Josina ta koma aikinta tare da FRELIMO. A karshen shekara ta bar Samito tare da wata kawarta kuma ta yi tafiya ta tsawon watanni biyu, galibi da ƙafa, ta Lardin Niassa don tantance yanayi da tsara ayyuka na Sashen Harkokin Jama'a.

items.sourceText: A year later, FRELIMO declared April 7, the day of Josina's death, as National Women's Day in Mozambique. In March 1973, FRELIMO established the National Organization of Mozambican Women as the movement's social and political arm for women. Inspired in part by the ideals of women's emancipation that Machel had promoted, the organization continued to work for this goal following Mozambican independence in 1975. A number of Josina's sisters-in-arms went on to play important leadership roles in this organization and in government. The principal secondary school in the capital city is named after her.

targets.targetText: Shekara guda bayan haka, FRELIMO ta ayyana ranar 7 ga watan Afrilu, ranar mutuwar Josina, a matsayin ranar mata ta ƙasa a Mozambique. A cikin watan Maris 1973, FRELIMO ta kafa Ƙungiyar Matan Mozambique ta ƙasa a matsayin ƙungiyar mata ta zamantakewa da siyasa. An sami kwarin gwiwa daga wani ɓangare na akidar 'yantar da mata da Machel ta inganta, kungiyar ta ci gaba da yin aiki don wannan burin bayan samun 'yancin kai na Mozambique a 1975. ’Yan’uwan Josina da dama sun ci gaba da taka muhimmiyar rawa a wannan kungiya da gwamnati. Makarantar sakandire ta principal da ke babban birni ana kiranta da sunanta.

Shekara guda bayan haka, FRELIMO ta ayyana ranar 7 ga Afrilu, ranar mutuwar Josina, a matsayin ranar mata ta kasa a Mozambique. A cikin Maris 1973, FRELIMO ta kafa Ƙungiyar Matan Mozambique ta ƙasa a matsayin ƙungiyar mata ta zamantakewa da siyasa. An sami kwarin gwiwa daga wani bangare na akidar 'yantar da mata da Machel ta inganta, kungiyar ta ci gaba da yin aiki don wannan burin bayan 'yancin kai na Mozambique a 1975. ’Yan’uwan Josina da dama sun ci gaba da taka muhimmiyar rawa a wannan kungiya da gwamnati. Makarantar sakandire ta principal da ke babban birni ana kiranta da sunanta.

items.sourceText: Filipe Samuel Magaia (7 March 1937 – 10/11 October 1966[1]) was a Mozambican revolutionary and guerrilla leader. He was the Secretary of Defense for the Mozambican FRELIMO organisation during the Mozambican War of Independence. After a number of years fighting, Magaia was assassinated by a renegade FRELIMO soldier who was working for the Portuguese.

targets.targetText: Filipe Samuel Magaia (7 Maris 1937 - 10/11 Oktoba 1966 [1] ) jagoran juyin juya hali na Mozambique ne kuma jagoran 'yan daba. Ya kasance sakataren tsaro na kungiyar FRELIMO ta Mozambique a lokacin yakin 'yancin kai na Mozambique . Bayan an shafe shekaru ana gwabzawa, wani sojan FRELIMO da ya bijire ya kashe Magaia, wanda ke aiki da Burtugal.

Filipe Samuel Magaia (7 Maris 1937 - 10/11 Oktoba 1966 [1] ) jagoran juyin juya hali na Mozambique ne kuma jagoran 'yan tawaye. Ya kasance sakataren tsaro na kungiyar FRELIMO ta Mozambique a lokacin yakin neman 'yancin kai na Mozambique. Bayan an shafe shekaru ana gwabzawa, wani sojan FRELIMO da ya bijire ya kashe Magaia, wanda ke aiki da Burtugal.

items.sourceText: Janet Rae Mondlane (née Johnson) is an American-born Mozambican activist. Together with her husband, Eduardo Chivambo Mondlane, she founded FRELIMO and helped organize the liberation of Mozambique from Portuguese colonialism.

targets.targetText: Janet Rae Mondlane ( née Johnson) yar gwagwarmayar Mozambik haifaffiyar Amurka ce. Tare da mijinta, Eduardo Chivambo Mondlane, ta kafa FRELIMO kuma ta taimaka wajen tsara 'yantar da Mozambique daga mulkin mallaka na Portugal .

Janet Rae Mondlane ( née Johnson) 'yar gwagwarmayar Mozambik haifaffiyar Amurka ce. Tare da mijinta, Eduardo Chivambo Mondlane, ta kafa FRELIMO kuma ta taimaka wajen tsara 'yantar da Mozambique daga hannun 'yan mulkin mallaka na Portugal.

items.sourceText: Janet Rae Johnson was born in 1934[1] in Illinois. In 1951, at the age of 17, she attended a church camp in Geneva, Wisconsin, where she met the 31 year old Eduardo Mondlane, who was giving a speech about the future of Africa.

targets.targetText: An haifi Janet Rae Johnson a shekara ta 1934 [1] a Illinois. A cikin shekarar 1951, tana da shekaru 17, ta halarci wani sansanin coci a Geneva, Wisconsin, inda ta haɗu da Eduardo Mondlane mai shekaru 31, wanda ke ba da jawabi game da makomar Afirka.

An haifi Janet Rae Johnson a shekara ta 1934 [1] a Illinois . A cikin 1951, tana da shekaru 17, ta halarci wani sansanin coci a Geneva, Wisconsin, inda ta sadu da Eduardo Mondlane mai shekaru 31, wanda ke ba da jawabi game da makomar Afirka .

items.sourceText: Esperança Abiatar Muthemba was a Mozambican independence activist and politician. In 1977 she was one of the first group of women elected to the People's Assembly.

targets.targetText: Esperança Abiatar Muthemba ta kasance ɗan gwagwarmayar ƴancin kai na Mozambique kuma ɗan siyasa. A shekarar 1977 ta kasance daya daga cikin rukunin mata na farko da aka zaba a Majalisar Jama'a .

Esperança Abiatar Muthemba ta kasance 'yar gwagwarmayar neman ƴancin kai na ƙasar Mozambique kuma 'yar siyasa. A shekarar 1977 ta kasance ɗaya daga cikin rukunin mata na farko da aka zaɓa a jami'iyyar Majalisar Jama'a.

items.sourceText: Sidi Ali ibn al-Mekki Amhaouch (1844–1918) was a Moroccan religious leader who opposed the French conquest of Morocco. Amhaouch was descended from a long line of marabouts who were influential religious figures in Morocco from 1715. Amhaouch backed two rebellions against the Moroccan government and later fought against the French occupying forces. He declared a defensive jihad against France during the Zaian War but died of natural causes in 1918, three years before the war ended in the tribesmen's defeat. His son, Sidi El Mekki Amhaouch, continued to fight the French until his defeat in 1932. Amhaouch's descendant is a religious leader in modern-day Morocco.

targets.targetText: Sidi Ali ibn al-Mekki Amhaouch (1844 – 1918) shugaban addinin Moroko ne wanda ya yi adawa da mamayar da Faransa ta yi wa Maroko. Amhaouch ya fito ne daga dogon layi na marabouts waɗanda suka kasance masu tasiri a cikin addini a Maroko daga shekarun 1715. Amhaouch ya goyi bayan 'yan tawaye biyu da gwamnatin Moroko, daga bisani kuma suka yi yaki da sojojin mamaya na Faransa. Ya shelanta jihadi na kariya ga Faransa a lokacin yakin Zaiyan amma ya mutu saboda dalilai na halitta a shekara ta 1918, shekaru uku kafin yakin ya kare da cin kashi na ƙabilar. Ɗansa, Sidi El Mekki Amhaouch, ya ci gaba da yaƙi da Faransawa har zuwa lokacin da ya sha kashi a shekara ta 1932. Zuriyar Amhaouch shugaban addini ne a Maroko ta zamani.

Sidi Ali ibn al-Mekki Amhaouch (1844 – 1918) shugaban addinin Moroko ne wanda ya yi adawa da mamayar da Faransa ta yi wa Maroko . Amhaouch ya fito ne daga dogon layi na marabouts waɗanda suka kasance masu tasiri a cikin addini a Maroko daga 1715.
